title: ikipe y’ u rwanda amavubi yahesheje u rwanda agaciro itsinda benin -
content: uyu mukino wabaye itariki ukwakira gihe ikipe y’u rwanda neza n’ubwo yatsinda mukino itazajya mikino nyuma guhatanira igikombe yatsinze igitego - igitego cyabonetse munota gatandatu w’umukino gitsinzwe meddie kagere muri tsinda ryarimo andi makipe abiri u burundi ivory coast ivory coast yatsinze u burundi ibitego - ikipe y’u rwanda ikaba yarabashije gutahukana ishema ry’ u rwanda kugarurira ikizere abanyarwanda kuko yegukanye umwanya kabiri n’amanota gusa ivory coast ikaba yarigaragaje cyane kuko irusha u rwanda amanota mutijima abu bernard

title: urubyiruko itorero erc giterane cy’ububyutse kiyobowe apostle joshua masasu
content: urubyiruko itorero ry’ivugabutumwa n’isanamitima rwanda evangelic restoration church paruwasi nyarutarama rukomeje igiterane cy’ububyutse n’ivugabutumwa aho urubyiruko rusabwa kuba igitambo gishimwa n’imana kandi rugatumbira yesu kristo buzima bwabo buri munsi iki giterane gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti boneza amaso imbere yawe ugumye uhatumbire kandi utunganye inzira z’ibirenge byawe kugira ube igitambo gihindura umuryango nsanganyamatiko imigani - iki giterane gikomeje kuzamo abavugabutumwa basizwe amavuta ndetse n’abahanzi bahimbaza imana iki giterane cyatangiye tariki nzeri kugeza tariki ukwakira kibaba kibera i nyarutarama kabuga ahari uru rusengero iki giterane cy’ububyutse kiba buri munsi saa kumi kugeza saa moya n’igice z’ijoro minsi y’imibyizi ndetse saa munani z’amanywa kugeza saa moya n’igice z’ijoro minsi minsi y’isoza icyumweru weekend umushumba erc nyarutarama pastor seruhungo alphonse yavuze giterane gifite intego kwegereza urubyiruko imana ndetse kugira urubyiruko rwegere imana runakire agakiza babere ibitambo imiryango nayo ihinduke ubwo yatangizaga giterane mugaragaro apostle masasu joshua yavuze urubyiruko rufite imbaraga zihagije buryo babishatse bakorera imana neza kandi yatanze ubuhamya bw’uko yatangiye gukorera imana akiri muto myaka gusa yasenze akaba igitambo gishimwa n’imana apostle masasu yagize nkirangiza icyiciro mbere kaminuza nari mfite gusa imyaka nibwo natangiye gukorera imana namwe ndabasaba kwegera imana kuyikorera mukiri bato mufite imbaraga kandi muzabona imigisha myinshi buzima bwanyu umuyobozi w’urubyiruko rusengera erc nyarutarama mwamini zainabu avuga giterane kizakomeza kuba bihe bitandukanye kugira urubyiruko rutandukanye rurusheho kubona umwanya kongera ubusabane bwabo n’imana abavugabutumwa basizwe babwirije urubyiruko barimo apostle joshua masasu pastor ngoga innocent pastor seruhungo alphonse pastor masasu patrick pastor ruzindana jean marie pascale keza abahanzi kandi bazataramira abazitabira igitaramo harimo patient bizimana gabby irene kamanzi liliane kabaganza serge iyamuremye nelson mucyo arsene tuyi kaneza deborah ndetse hari n’abandi bahanzi benshi worship teams zitandukanye harimo total praise worship team erc nyarutarama hakoreshwa uburyo bwose kuramya guhimbaza drama team shining stars apostle joshua masasu iburyo pastor seruhugo hagati hirya hari maman pastor iribagiza rose patient bizimana inyuma urubyiruko erc nyarutarama kuramya guhimbaza magnifique migisha yanditswe magnifique migisha

title: rusizi bambaye udupfukamunwa n’ubwo bamwe batarameya twambara neza
content: kuri kabiri tariki gicurasi urasanga isura nshya y’abantu bacaracara mihanda y’umurenge nyakabuye karere rusizi bambaye udupfukamunwa ukabona wagirango n’impuzankano bahuriyeho bamwe baturage batuye murenge baravuga bakiriye gahunda kwirinda bakoresheje agapfukamunwa bakavuga babyishimiye rwego kwirinda kurinda abandi rundi ruhande hari ababangamiwe kukambara kuko usanga ubwambere bagakoresheje ariko bazarushaho kubimenyera kuko ubundi umuti urura niwo ukiza indwara umwe bacuruzi bakorera centre nyakabuye witwa semana jervais wavuganye muhabura rw yabwiye umunyamakuru yaba umugurira kandi ugurisha bagomba kuba bambaye udupfukamunwa rwego kwirinda yagize atikwirinda biruta kwivuza ntabwo umuntu yabura kwirinda yambara agapfukamunwa kagura y’u rwanda ukabura amagara hejuru kwanga kubahoriza amabwiriza kwirinda kurinda abandi dutahirize umugozi umwe twirinda tunarinda abandi kandi icyorezo tuzagitsinda umusaza nsabimana w’imyaka mirongo irindwi waganiriye n’umunyamakuru aje kugura kurya isoko nyakabuye rirema buri kabiri buri gatandatu yavuze yabyakiriye neza ariko akomeje kugorwa kukambara yagize atinibyo rwose kwirinda byiza gusa njye kukambara byangoye buryo bugaragara kuko nikintu ntarimenyereyekuvuga birikunanira nkanavuga cyane nibwira turikuvugana atarikunyumva mukeshimana claudine umucuruzi centre nyakabuye avuga agapfukamunwa gafasha kwirinda icyirezo coronavirus nkuko yagiye abibona ahandi agasanga intambwe itewe n’akarere rusizi n’igihugu rusange yagize atino bushinwa usanga abantu benshi batwambaye rwego kwirinda kurinda abandi kandi ariho iko cyorezo covid- cyatangiriye uburyo bwiza kwirinda kurinda abandibravo leta y’ubumwe ku ruhande rwabacuruza udupfukamunwa bavuga ntacyo batakoze hamwe n’abafatanyabikorwa kugirango buri muturage wese abe yagura agapfukamunwa kamurinda kakanarinda n’abandi uhagarariye urugaga rw’abikorera murenge nyakabuye bwana ndayisabye emmanuel avugana muhabura yavuze urebye agapfukamunwa kari kugura amafaranga aringaniye buryo rwitazo uvuga hari uwakabuze yagize atiamafaranga magana atanu si menshinku buryo hari uwazana urwitwazo kutakambara agapfukamunwa avuga gahenzerwose dufatanye dukumire cyorezo kuko ingamba ikomeye kdi ihamye kucyirinda icyi cyemezo kwambura udupfukamunwa giherutse gufatirwa nama y’abaministiri yafataga imyanzuro gukomeza kwirinda icyorezo covid- ndetse kukirinda abandiaho bavuze kandi buri munyarwanda wese agomva kwambara agapfukamunwa rwego kwirinda icyorezo covid- ibi kandi birashimangirwa n’itangazo ryashyizweho umukono ministiri w’ubucuruzi madame nyirahakuziyaremye suraya ruburira abanyarwanda umubare wabagomba gukorera isoko bangaba kandi ahamya ugura ndetse n’umucuruzi bagomba gutanga service kuyihabwa bambaye agapfukamunwa hirindwa ikwirakwiza ry’icyo cyirezo gihangayikishije u rwanda n’isi rusange denis fabrice nsengumuremyimuhaburarw

title: light family choir igiye gukora igitaramo cy’amateka yatumiyemo ambassadors of christ
content: korali light family ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa itorero makoro ry’abadiventisite b’umunsi karindwi rikorera karere rubavu gutegura igitaramo kumurika volume y’indirimbo zikozwe majwi kizitabirwa n’abaririmbyi bakomeye ndetse n’amakorali anyuranye arimo ambassador of christ choir korali light family ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa itorero makoro ry’abadiventisite b’umunsi karindwi rikorera karere rubavu gutegura igitaramo kumurika volume y’indirimbo zikozwe majwi kizitabirwa n’abaririmbyi bakomeye ndetse n’amakorali anyuranye arimo ambassador of christ choir iki gitaramo kiri gutegurwa n’iyi korali kizakorwa byiciro bibiri icya mbere kizabera i rubavu basangiza abakunzi ndirimbo zirimo ubutumwa bwiza ndetse icyiciro kabiri gikorerwe i kigali i nyamirambo rusengero rw’abadiventisite b’umunsi karindwi umuyobozi korali light family nzabonimpa augustin yabwiye ukwezicom giterane kigamije kongera guhura n’abakunzi bayo bakabasangira ndirimbo zabo nshya bazinyuza kumurika volume dvd gatandatu y’indirimbo z’amajwi n’iya ndirimbo z’amashusho yakomeje avuga igitaramo cyabo kizakorwa byiciro bibiri kimwe kizabera i rubavu n’icyiciro kabiri kizabera i kigali nyamirambo akomeza avuga gitaramo kizaba gikomeye cyane kuko cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo abazaturuka congo amakorali akomeye kandi akunzwe gihugu hanze yacyo yagize ni igitaramo gushyira ahagaragara dvd audio volume dvd y’amashusho volume kizaba buryo bubiri igitaramo mbere kizabera i gisenyi tariki uku kwezi igitaramo kabiri kibere i kigali nyamirambo itorero ry’abadiventisite tariki nzeri mwaka nzabonimpa augustin yanavuze intego y’igitaramo kigali harimo kwigaragariza abakunzi bagahura bagasabana ndetse bakanasangira ibyiza birimo indirimbo guhimbaza imana igitaramo nbere kizabera gisenyi tariki kanama kizitabirwa n’amakorali atandukanye nk’ abakurikiye yesu b’i kigali kacyiru ababimbuzi kacyiru hazaba hari korali abakanguzi congo hazaba hari hallellua familly choir gisenyi ndetse korali iwacu heza nayo ku gisenyi mu bahanzi giti cyabo bazitabira igitaramo mbere hazaba hari uwitwa fanuel w’i kigali jonathan congo igitaramo kabiri kizitabirwa korali ambassador of christ iyitwa ibyiza by’ijuro korali abahamya muhima new paradise choir kabeza ndetse korali abakurikiye yesu n’ababimbuzi umuyobozi korali light family augustin avuge kwinjira gitaramo bizaba ubuntu buri wese ariko bakaba bifuza inkunga mishanga gutegura kugura ibyuma bisobanutse bizajya bibafasha gutunganya umurimo w’imana buryo bugezweho korali light family yatangiye gukora umurimo w’imana tariki gashyantare ikaba imaze gusohora volume y’indirimbo z’amashusho volume ndirimbo z’amajwi iyi korali kugeza ifite abaririmbyi umuyobozi korali light family nzabonimpa augustin korali light family imaze imyaka ikora umurimo w’ivugabutumwa binyuze ndirimbo

title: saa niyo saha nziza gutera akabariro bashakanye
content: yifashishije science’ umwanditsi akaba n’inzobere bijyanye n’ubuzima muntu yagaragaje isaha nyayo ibereye gutera akabariro gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bashakanye alisa vitti inzobere kubaza ibibazo akaba yarananditse igitabo kitwa womancode’ avuga isaha nziza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina waba umugabo cyangwa umugore uvuga masaha umugabo cyangwa umugore afite ubushake gutera akabariro dore umusemburo witwa prolactin’ ugira uruhare mikorerwe y’intanga bagabo bagore uba wavubuye mpande zombi akomeza avuga musemburo witwa follicle-stimulating hormone’ utuma hakorwa amasohoro bagabo bagore ugatuma hakorwa igi rikura uba gukora neza masaha uyu mwanditsi yongeyeho ruhande rw’abagabo indi isaha nziza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina gitindo kare ibi bigaterwa umugabo aryamye umubiri uvura cyane umusemburo testostrone’ utera ubushake gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ubushake mugabo bwongera kuba bwinshi gicamunsi ndetse mugore akaba aribyo ashingiraho avuga saa isaha nziza gutera akabariro bashakanye

title: ibyo wamenya bifaru by’abarusiya bitabonwa radars’
content: igisirikare cy’igihugu cy’uburusiya cyamaze kugira ibifaru bubiko bwacyo bitabonwa n’ibyuma bigenzura ikirere radars ndetse ibinyamakuru bitandukanye bika byaramaze kubiha akabyiniriro invisible tanks ibifaru bitaboneka ubusanzwe bifaru byitwa t- armata bikoresha ikoranabuhanga rihambaye rituma bidashobora kubonwa radars z’abanzi nyuma y’aho minsi isi ibihugu bikomeza kurebana ay’ingwe ndetse ibihangange bikaba bihora byikanga intambara byahuriramo n’ibindi bihugu bifite intwaro zihambaye the sun dukesha nkuru itangaza vladimir putin perezida w’uburusiya yasabye hakorwa ibifaru t- armata bigera ijana nabyo kugeza igisirikare cy’uburusiya gitunze ikindi kidasanzwe bifaru bifite bishobora kurasa umwanzi km miles bikoresheje imbunda irasa ibisasu munota umwe kandi ishobora kwihindukiza ikarasa byerekezo byose igifaru t armata karasisi gicurasi mwaka kuba bifaru bitabonwa radars bibifashwamo n’uburyo bwitwa mantiya bwakorewe bifaru kubifasha guhisha igifaru abagikoresha ndetse n’ibindi bikoresho byose bifaru bikoresha t- armata ikurura waves’ radar y’umwanzi ikazica ingufu kuburyo bituma idakomeza kuyikurikirana cyangwa imenye inyuze t- armata kandi ifite ubushobozi kuba itaraswa n’ibisasu leta zunze ubumwe amerika javelin bikoresha uburyo gukurikirana ubushyuhe kugira birase umwanzi the sun kandi itangaza ibifaru t- armata bikubye inshuro kugira ikoranabuhanga ryisumbuyeho ubigereranyije abrams tank by’abanyamerika leclerc tank by’abafaransa cyangwa leopard by’abadage ibifaru bitabonwa radars byatangiye gukorwa leta zunze ubumwe amerika ubwongereza ubushinwa n’uburusiya bimwe bihugu byabanje kwinjira mushinga muri australia nayo yatangiye kwiga uburyo yakora ibifaru bitabonwa ariko ikongeraho gukora ibyihinduranya amabara bitewe n’aho bigeze kuburyo bitanaboneshwa ijisho nkuko uruvu ruhindura amabara yarwo bitewe n’aho rugeze ni umushinga gihugu kiri gufashwamo university of south australia the national interest itangaza nyuma yaho uburusiya bukoreye armata amerika nayo igiye gukora ikindi gifaru cyitwa ma sep v abrams gifite ikoranabuhanga ryisumbuyeho cyihuta kandi kinafite intwaro zihambaye byitezwe gifaru cyahawe akazina super char kizashyirwa mugaragaro ariko amakuru y’ibizaba bikigize aracyagizwe ibanga

title: arsenal yirukanye unai emery n’abari bamwungirije
content: kuri gatanu nibwo ikipe arsenal yatangaje yamaze gutandukana n’uwari umutoza wayo unai emery ndetse ajyana n’abari bamwungirije gutoza kipe mu itangazo arsenal yashyize ahagaragara bagize bati uyu munsi turatangaza icyemezo cyamaze gufatwa gutandukana n’umutoza mukuru unai emery ndetse n’abari bamwungirije josh kroenke wavuze izina arsenal banyirayo kroenke sportsentertainment yagize turashimira cyane unai bagenzi batahwemye gukoreshe bashoboye kose bagarure ikipe irushanwa rwego twifuzaga ndetse twabasabaga turifuriza unai n’abo bakorana intsinzi bihe biri imbere arsenal yifurije emery amahirwe bihe bye biri imbere nk’uko tangazo rikomeza ribisobanura cyemezo cyafashwe kubera umusaruro utari rwego mutoza yasabwaga gutanga kugeza kipe yashyizwe maboko freddie ljungberg usanzwe umwe bungirije unai emery wagizwe umutoza mukuru by’agateganyo bati dufitiye freddie icyizere cyuzuye kudufasha kuzamuka gushakisha umutoza mushya biracyakomeje kandi ibizavamo muzabitangarizwa gihe gikorwa kizaba cyarangiye freddie wahawe ikipe arsenal by’agateganyo freddi yatangiye kuba umutoza wungirije arsenal mwaka akaba n’umwe bakinnyi bayo b’igihe kirekire yayikiniye guhera kugeza nyuma akaza kuhava yerekeje west ham

title: wizkid yatumiwe n’ umuryango perezida awukorera private concert’ yishyurwa akayabo abaturage bashonje
content: wizkid umwe bahanzi bakunzwe cyane nigeria batunze amafaranga menshi yatumiwe gitaramo kihariye n’ umuryango perezida cameroon paul biya wizkid umwe bahanzi bakunzwe cyane nigeria batunze amafaranga menshi yatumiwe gitaramo kihariye n’ umuryango perezida cameroon paul biya icyatumye bimenyekana amafoto y’ umukobwa perezida biya kumwe wizikid wagiye ahagaragara akwirakwira mbuga nkoranyambaga uwo mukobwa yambaye akagabutura k’ ikoboyi gakufi cyane umupira w’ ingofero w’ irosa yanisize ibirungo nyongerabwiza muri gitaramo brenda biya wagize isabukuru y’ amavuko nyina chantal biya barirekuye babyinana n’ musitari nigeria barangije bamwishyura miliyoni z’ ama-cfa ahanywe n’ ibihumbi by’ amayero ukuvuga miliyoni zirenga mafaranga y’ u rwanda abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga cameroon bavuga muryango perezida wakoze ugusesagura gihe kuko cy’ abatuye cameroon inzara iranuma ntabwo ubwa mbere muryango utumiye abahanzi bawukorere igitaramo kihariye rugo perezida kuko singuila yagikoreyeyo isabukuru brenda biya mbere singuila koffi olomid yakoreye igitaramo uru rugo gusa amafaranga agenda gitaramo kihariye kibera rugo perezida ataratangazwa

content: uyu muririmbyi uzwi ndirimbo naratomboye umugisha ntamahitamo n’izindi avuga koko ingaragu kandi kuba yarabyanditse facebook kindi kibiri inyuma king james yagize njyewe byanjemo gutyo gusa ndabyandika nta kindi nashakaga kuvuga ndi ingaragu ariko sindashaka umwanya kugira inshuti y’umukobwa nimbona unyura nzagirana ubucuti ku kibazo cy’uko yasobanura uburyo adafite inshuti y’umukobwa kandi icyamamare kandi ibyamamare bigira abantu benshi babikunda king james avuga gukunda ibintu byizana kuba atamufite igihe kitaragera king james agira ubu mfite imyaka mukobwa ndabona anyure numve yaba umukunzi wanjye igihenzamubonera nibwo tuzakundana nanageza n’imyaka nkimutegereje asubiza umuntu wanditse king james yigeze kugira umukunzi muhanzi yavuze afite umukunzi akaba atakibarizwa rwanda kandi bakaba batakiri inshuti king james umuririmbyi baririmbyi bakunzwe cyane rwanda kuko yabaye uwa kabiri irushanwa primus guma guma superstar ryagaragazaga umuririmbyi ukunzwe kandi ufite n’ubuhanga nyuma kugenda k’umuririmbyi the ben benshi bemezaga kinga james ufite abafana benshi b’igitsinagore nubwo bushakashatsi burabikorwaho jean baptiste micomyiza

title: rwandair yahagaritse ingendo ziva cyangwa zerekeza bushinwa bitunguranye
content: sosiyete y’ubwikorezi kirere rwandair yahagaritse ingendo zayo ziva cyangwa zerekeza mujyi guangzhou bushinwa kubera icyorezo coronavirus kiri gihugu ihagarikwa ry’agateganyo ry’izi ngendo rije nyuma y’aho ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbuye ryita buzima oms ijoro ryakeye ritangaje coronavirus icyorezo cyugarije isi mu ijoro ryakeye umuyobozi mukuru oms dr tedros adhanom yatangaje cyemezo gufata koronavirus nk’ikiza kibasiye isi nyuma y’inama y’agataraganya yahuje abagize akanama oms gashinzwe ibijyanye n’ibyorezo kureba uburyo bibangamiye isi yakomeje avuga kuba abafashe cyemezo bitavuga gukomanyiriza u bushinwa ahubwo ikigamijwe ukugira ngpo cyorezo kidakomeza gusakara bindi bihugu n’ibifite ubushobozi buke bijyanye n’ubuvuzi gutangaza ibihe bidasanzwe bitewe n’indwara bigendana gutanga amabwiriza n’ubushobozi bihugu kugira cyorezo kiba cyagizwe ikiza cyibasiye isi kidakomeza gukwirakwira hafatwa ingamba zikomeye ariko zitabangamira ubuhahirane n’imibanire y’ibihugu kugeza ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima rwanda kivuga rwanda cyorezo kitarahagaragara indwara coronavirus iteye ite koronavirusi koronavirusi umuryango mugari virusi zitera indwara zitandukanye harimo ibicurane bisanzwe n’ibicurane bikomeye bita acute respiratory syndromesars-cov n’ibyo bita middle east respiratory syndromemers-cov ibimenyetso by’iyo ndwara bigaragarira buhumekero kugira umuriro kuzana ibimwira gukorora guhumeka nabi rimwe rimwe hari bikomera umuntu akarwara umusonga impyiko ndetse bikaba byanamuviramo urupfu iyo ndwara yandura ite umuntu yanduzwa koronavirusi n’uwayanduye yandurira mwuka wahumetswe n’uwakoroye ayanduye yandura umuntu akoze wayanduye cyangwa amusuhuje yandura umuntu akoze kintu cyangwa ahantu hari virusi noneho agakora munwa izuru cyangwa maso mbere gukaraba intoki rimwe rimwe ishobora kwandurira mwanda musarani koronavirusi iravurwa igakira nta muti wihariye uvura ndwara igishoboka kugeza kuyivura batanga imiti ifasha guhangana n’ibimenyetso byayo antibiyotike zivura udukoko twa bagiteri zitera umusonga imiti igabanya ubukana bw’iyo virusi gufasha umurwayi guhumeka bamwongerera umwuka ogisijene kuki koronavirusi nshya ikibazo

title: akarere rubavu karishimira ibikorwa by’amajyambere kagezeho
content: mu bikorwa byamuritswe harimo umuhanda uhuza imipaka yombi y’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo grande et petite barierre ukazatwara akayabo k’amafaranga akabakaba miliyoni ndetse n’ umuhanda pave ujya biro by’akarere watangiye gukorwa munsi umuyobozi w’akarere sheh bahame hassan yavuze akarere kabwiye rwiyemezamirimo imodoka zikora mihanda zitazasubirayo utugari tutazikoresheje dusane uduhanda tujya hasuwe kandi umusozi wimuweho imiryango kubera ikibazo cy’isuri yicaga abahatuye gihe cy’imvura uyu musozi murenge gisenyi guterwamo ibiti binyuranye bifata ubutaka hakazubakwamo uduhanda intebe n’ibitare kuruhukiramo mukerarugendo iki gikorwa kizatwara amafaranga miliyoni bavuye musozi ubuyobozi b’akarere rubavu bwasuye akagari karukogo umurenge rubavu birebera ibikorwa ndengera foundation uyu muryango wubatse amasoko y’amazi agemurira abaturage amazi meza ndetse n’ibitaro kijyambere umuyobozi w’akarere yasabye umuyobozi ndengera foundation gufatanya n’akarere bakareba masoko y’amazi yakwaguka abaturage benshi bakavomaho abayobozi banagejejwe ahari kubakwa amashanyarazi ako kagali jean berchmas bahige ukuriye ewsa rubavu yasobanuye mashanyarazi azagera baturage tugali twa byahi kanembwe karukogo ibarizwa mirenge rubavu cyanzarwe bahige yashimangiye mashanyarazi afite ingufu zihagije zizafasha abaturage kwivana bukene bahige yagize mushinga wizwe neza ibikoresho byose birahari igikorwa cyose gikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi kizahakora kirahari mpungenge hasuwe n’isoko ryo ako kagali ariko rizatangira gukorerwamo mutarama nyuma y’ubunani uru rugendo rwasorejwe isoko kijyambere ry’akarere rubavu riri kubakwa mujyi rwagati murenge gisenyi imirimo kubaka soko iracyari hasi ariko irimo kwihutishwa kugira rizatangire gukoreshwa aho riri isoko risanzwe rikorera hazazamurwa irindi gorofa hanubakwe imodoka zihagarara asoza gikorwa umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheh bahame hassan yibukije inshingano buri wese kurinda gukoresha neza ibikorwa remezo gihe bizaba byuzuye bahame yagize ibikorwa nk’ibi iby’umuturage turifuza buri wese agira uruhare kubibungabunga kubikoresha kuko uburenganzira bweumwe baturage utuye kagari karukogo seth mugema asanga amajyambere kwihuta abagana buryo yiteguye gutangiza umushinga iwabo cyaro nogosha imisatsi mujyi none kubera batuzaniye amashanyarazi ngiye kwimurira salon yanjye karukogo nk’uko byagaragaye akarere rubavu kari kwihutisha ibikorwa remezo bijyanye n’icyerekezo ariko cyane cyane hubakwa imihanda ariko inzira ikiri ndende akarere karateganya kuganira n’abafite amazu mujyi rwego kubafasha kwihutisha bikorwa bakihutisha iterambere aka karere pascaline umulisa

title: kidum ugiye gukorana indirimbo bruce melody yahishuye afite abana
content: jean-pierre nimbona umuhanzi w’ umurundi ukunzwe cyane karere k’ afurika y’ iburasirazuba wataramiye abarenga nama transform africa yahishuye afite abana jean-pierre nimbona umuhanzi w’ umurundi ukunzwe cyane karere k’ afurika y’ iburasirazuba wataramiye abarenga nama transform africa yahishuye afite abana kidum wamamaye ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo mapenzi umbamwo intimba y’ urukundo n’ izindi avuga afite indirimbo zirenga ndetse amaze imyaka irenga muziki ubwo yasusurutsaga abitabiriye tas yahishuye agiye gukorana indirimbo n’ umuhanzi w’ umunyarwanda itahiwacu brucebruce melody bruce melody avuga umufana kidum kera buri umwe afite byinshi azi bagiye kubihuriza hamwe bahe abakunzi wabo indirimbo nziza cyane ntabwo batangaje igihe ndirimbo izagira ahagaragara gusa bagiye guhita bayitangira kidum umuhanzi ukuze ukunzwe kurangwa gutera urwenya mu minsi yashize yavuzweho uburwayi bukomeye yararozwe ariko magingo ameze neza muri kidum yahawe igihembo cy’ umuhanzi w’ umugabo uhiga abandi afurika y’ iburasirazuba cyatanzwe kora awards avuga akora siporo cyane kuko umukinnyi w’ iteramakofe gusa bimusaba guhora aseka kuko arakaye ibintu byaba bibi cyane yagize ndi umuboxer njyewe nagukubita abantu bakibaza wagonze n’ imodoka mfite centure noire karate ikindi kabiri nkina umupira w’ amaguru icya nterura ibyuma njyewe naguterura kurya baterura umugati sinshavura mpora twenza n’ abantu kuko ndamutse nshavuye ngafata ngahamu ijosi kameza bugali c’ est fini kidum yakomeje abwira afrimaxtv afite abana ndetse muntu umurusha abana benshi karere k’ afurika y’ ibiyaga bigari ati njyewe banyita baba yaoumubyeyi wabo muhanzi ufite abana benshi kundusha mfite abana papa wemba yaremeye kidum avuga muntu ukwiye kubabazwa igihugu cye cyatumiye abahanzi hanze y’ igihugu kandi umuhanzi ahubwo muntu akwiye guhita abona agomba kuzamura urwego ariho agakora ibintu byiza kurushaho

title: - intashyo ikipe y’igihugu amavubi
content: -ese habuze kugeza magingo imyaka irihiritse amaso yaraheze kirere abanyarwanda bafite inyota kongera kwinaga ibicu ubufatanye buri wese niwo muti ku itariki nyakanga nyuma y’urugendo rutoroshye nibwo abahungu b’amavubi besheje umuhigo kujyana u rwanda gikombe cy’afurika ibyishimo n’umunezero bisakara gihugu hose muri nkuru sindi bugaruke byishimo bitagira bisa sindi butinde kukuba tike yaravuye menyo rubamba ndetse kandi sindi bugaruke buryo ibendera ry’u rwanda ryazamuwe u rwanda rukongera rukagaragara ruhando mpuzamahanga ahubwo nkuru ndagaruka kwibaza nti ese byishimo bizagaruka ryari ibi kandi ntibiri bumbuze kongera kwibaza nti ese amasomo twigiye mateka yaba yaramariye abanyarwanda twibuke bigwi byabaye myaka gusa u rwanda ruvuye jenoside yakorewe abatutsiicyo gihe nari nkiri muto ariko wabaga ungana kose wabaga uzi amazina kabuhariwe-jimmy gatete karekezi -danger man cyangwa ntaganda elias umukoranabushake n’abandi patriot-mafisango nubwo ahenshi gihugu bitari byoroshye kubabona televisiyo ntabwo bisaba kuba warabyize ishuri cyangwa ube uzi imibare myinshi kumva abakinnyi bahembwaga make ndetse n’ibikorwa remezo byari bike ariko nanone ntagushidikanya umukinnyi wabaga yambaye ibendera ry’igihugu yarwanaga kugeza mwuka wanyuma nunze murya ntuza ubanza ariho ibijyanye guhiganwa byasoreje manda abantu bakinjira bijyanye gukina ndetse gutera agapira muri nkuru kandi si ngiye gutanga ibisubizo bibazo ndetse sindi buvuge uwabiteje n’uzabikemura kuko atari ubwa mbere bivuzweho ahubwo ndakomoza bimwe mubyirengagizwa nkana ndetse bikwiye gushyirirwaho umurongo uhamye watuma myaka imbere abanyarwanda bongera kwinaga ibicu ishyaka kudatsimburwa n’umuco w’umupira nta muntu utaziko abanyarwanda biyemeje bakigeraho abatsinzi kamere banga guseba kandi bagashyigikirana mukuru kugera muto muri wabonaga abakunzi ruhago bashyize hamwe kandi bakagaragaza gushyigikira umupira byimazeyo gusa ishyaka ryo gukunda umupira ryagiye rigabanuka kubera gutegereza ibyishimo ariko amaso agahera kirere nubwo bitabujije umupira kugenda utera imbere buryo bw’amafaranga gusa imyaka igashira indi igataha dutegereje gusubira gikombe cy’afurika ubu amaso yaheze kirere ibi ariko ntibyabujije abakinnyi kugurwa menshi guhembwa menshi gukorera locale mahoteli akomeye ariko ugasanga shyaka urukundo ruhago ishema ry’igihugu ruhago bigenda bigabanuka gusa benshi bakunda kwibaza hagati y’abayobozi bawucungiraga abafana bawihebeye ndetse n’abakinnyi bawubamo n’akazi kabatunze ni bande bakuyemo akabo karenge mbere gusa kugeza magingo benshi bawurimo ariko bibereye ahandi cyangwa bindi benshi bibuka amaradiyo asigaye abwira abafana gukunda umupira wabo kujya bibuga n’ibindi aho kwitana mwana kurebana ikijisho gutakaza ikizere abantu bakwiye kwicara bakibaza icyabaye bagashyiraho ingamba zihamye ndetse kandi bakiha intego z’igihe kirambye cyane bafite ibihugu bigiraho byaba mugabane w’afurika n’ i burayi izimira ry’ikiragano mu isi rwego rumwe cyangwa uruganda rushobora gutera imbere rutarimo inararibonye mu rwanda ikiragano nibo dufite babashije kugera kure mateka ruhago ndetse bafitiwe ikizere n’abanyarwanda benshi abanyarwanda babeheruka tuniziya abandi bashatse gutanga umusanzu wabo ntibashyigikirwa bamwe ntibashaka kugira bavuga mupira ndetse abandi bibarenze bavugira mbuga nkoranyambaga mu bihugu tuzi isi makipe yashinze imizi mupira w’amaguru usanga abantu batekerereza amakipe abayagira inama buryo tekiniki ababategurira abana ababakorera imishinga y’igihe kirekire abawukinnye rwego hejuru ndetse kandi niyo abakiri bato bababona bibatera imbaraga kandi bavuze barumvwa hari kandi n’ababa bafite amashyirahamwe y’abakanyujijeho abandi bagashinga amakipe y’abakiri bato aha twakwibaza ese abari mupira koko barawuzi barawukunda se ese abanyuze twabubakiraho tukagera kure umupira wubatswe musenyi ubwo twari tukiri abana mashuri siporo y’umwuga ryabagaho ahubwo umupira umuco ndetse watembaga benshi maraso benshi twari tuzi ibigo bikomeye nk’inyemeramihigo college imena gs gahini gs butare n’ibindi twibagiwe cyane twabimenyaga kubera umupira ikindi kandi wasangaga abana batera agapira gihugu hose benshi wasangaga bakinisha ibirenge cyangwa ikipe yakuyemo imyenda hejuru gusa bafite amayeri n’amacenga karemano muri gihe nubwo hari amakipe y’abana buryo kinyamwuga ariko usanga politiki kuzamura abana ihuriweho ishyirwamo imbaraga ndetse kandi imyaka igenda ishira indi igataha amwe agenda asenyuka ndetse andi akamara imyaka baringa mukinnyi arazamura ikindi kandi urebye uburyo ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru isi fifa ritanga amafaranga gufasha kuzamura abana buri gihe usanga abantu bakwiye kwicara bakisuzuma ndetse bagakora imishinga y’igihe kirambye kubaka umusingi uhamye ruhago gukinisha abenegihugu byavuyemo hashize igihe kitari gito amwe makipe ashyizeho gukinisha abanyarwanda gusa andi akaba atemerewe kurenza abanyamahanga batatu buri mpinduka zigira ingaruka zazo kandi zigasiga n’amasomo muri minsi ubajije abantu batandukanye abakinnyi babakoze mutima abenshi baza mbere ikiragano cy’uyu munsi numwe wibukwa ndetse bishoboka bikomeje gutya bizagorana kugira usigara mitima benshi ikindi kandi bamwe bakinnyi b’abanyarwanda bagiye bakomera abenshi usanga abagiye bakinana n’abakinnyi bakomeye baravuye hanzeicyo gihe abanyarwanda bagendaga bakurira guhangana gukomeye ndetse nabo bagakomera ikibazo wenda hano si byatumye bamwe banyarwanda barebye umupira kera bacika bibuga ahubwo niyo ubajije abawureba usanga bibuka abawukinnye mbere ikindi kandi isi ibihugu bikomeye mupira ntibyigeze bishyiraho imipaka bwenegihugu ahubwo byagiye bigerageza umukinnyi uje akaza akomeye bityo agafasha mwana w’umwenegihugu bakinana mu rwanda ibi kandi byagiye bituma abakinnyi badakomeza urwego rwabo bityo n’ikipe y’igihugu ikagenda ihindagurika cyane ndetse kwambara umwenda w’igihugu bigenda byoroha kuri ntibitangaje kuba ikipe y’u rwanda yakina imikino itanu itarabona igitegokuri ngingo cyaba igihe cyiza abashinzwe umupira bakwiye gusuzuma koko gukinisha abenegihugu byaba byaratanze umusaruro bigira uruhare kudindiza umupira n’ibindi gusa ariko nanone ntitwakwirengagiza imibare kibuga ariwo mucamanza mwiza amafaranga amafaranga amafaranga umuhanzi yararirimbye amafaranga niyo adutunga niyo aduteranya gatsindwa kandi kabyara iyo ugenzuye ibibazo biri mupira w’amaguru rwanda usanga byose biterwa n’amafaranga ariko nanone ugasanga bizakemurwa n’amafaranga uburyo abakinnyi basigaye babona amafaranga kubagura bafatwa akenshi usanga bidahwanye n’ibyo batanga ndetse bamwe ugasanga bahise bata umutwe bakishora ngeso mbi ibijyanye gukina bigasubira inyuma atararenga n’umutaru ubunyangamugayo buke bamwe bayobozi b’amakipe kutamenya umupira kutawukunda bigenda bituma abayayobora badatekereza ikintu cyatunga ikipe gihe kirambye idateze amaso mafaranga kibuga gusa aribyo bituma rimwe rimwe amwe makipe ahora mazi abira n’ibizazane gushora nabi kutagira abajyanama bazi umupira nibyo bituma amwe makipe akoresha abakinnyi bavuye hanze azana benshi bakinnyi badashoboye buryo usanga rimwe rimwe bicazwa n’abakinnyi b’abanyarwanda nabo batari rwego rushamaje aya mahanya kandi niyo yazanyemo umwanda urimo amatiku imisifurire mibi ruswa kugambanirana iraha amarozi n’ibindi benshi mubakurikirana cyangwa baganira n’abakinnyi basanga umupira urimo izindi firimi nyinshi ndetse bituma n’abawukunda bagenda bacika bibuga kuri hari abizera umupira utagikinirwa kibuga ahubwo iminota myinshi itegurirwa inyuma y’ikibuga perezida kagame azaduhoza amarira ntihazwi umunsi n’isaha perezida kagame yagarukaga bijyanye n’ikipe y’igihugu y’umupira w’amaguru kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye kamena yavuze arebye abakinnyi bakora akareba n’imyitwarire y’abayobozi abona bakwiye kubireka bakajya birebera imipira y’ahandi babishoboye umukuru w’igihugu kandi yagiye yumvikana agaragaza bibazo umupira rwanda ufite hatarimo ubushobozi bijyanye n’amafaranga ahubwo utangwaho akayabo ariko umusaruro ugakomeza kuba rwego hasi nongeye gutekereza jambo nabonaga umukuru w’igihugu mashusho gufana bikomeye ikipe y’igihugu u rwanda rwatwaraga cecafa nahise nibaza nti bishoboka bite u rwanda rufite umuyobozi ukunda umupira gutya ariko imyaka ikaba ishira indi igataha ruhago itaduha ibyishimo ikindi kandi tuvuze title: benshi bagore bagira uruhare gucibwa inyuma n’abo bashakanye
content: nsengiyumva joseph akora akazi gutwara abantu moto i kabuga avuga bitangira umugore agukunda akwitaho ndetse akanakubaha ariko nyuma bikaza guhinduka hano atanga urugero avuga umuntu agishakana n’umugore usanga agushyuhiriza amazi koga nijoro ntabe yarya umugabo ataraza ariko bamaranye amezi atanu ntaba akinamushyirira amazi rwiyuhagiriro cyangwa abe yamutegereza barye ahubwo atangira kumubaza yatinze ikindi umugore atangiye kugenda ahindura imico bituma urukundo rugabanuka n’imibiri igahagana bigatuma umugabo ajya gushaka umunezero ahandi amwenyura nsengimana yagize erega burya umugore abyaye niko abyara ingeso kandi ahanini iza itari nziza tunguhore isaac ufite umugore umwe n’umwana umwe avuga igituma abagore bacibwa inyuma usanga rimwe rimwe bigira nabi bakanga gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n’abagabo bavuga bararwaye yagize se nk’ubu uwanjye muciye inyuma naba nkosheje dore amaze icyumweru atampa hmmmm tudatera akabariro tunguhore yavuze ahanini abagore babyikururira kuko ntiwamara igihe kingana n’iminsi irindwi uryama uteye umugabo ikibuno abure kwigira ahandi ikindi mugabo yagarutseho hari abagore bamara gushaka bundi kanwa kabo ntihongere gusohokamo ijambo riryoheye ugutwi ahubwo bagahorana umwanga n’umushiha ngo hari n’abandi bamara gushaka bagatandukana kwiyitaho kwisiga kwambara neza babiheruka batarabyara umwana mbere yongeraho erega burya isuku n’amagambo ava mugore nibyo bimuryoshya tunguhore avuga mpamvu kugirango umugore yumve yafatishije ubundi yitware ashaka abagore bavuga ingeso kamere mbi z’abagabo ineza solange umubyeyi w’imyaka y’amavuko isaha saa saba n’iminota arimo azunguza acuruza inkweto gare giporoso mujyi kigali avuga amaze imyaka ibiri atabana n’umugabo batandukanye kubera yamucaga inyuma ineza avuga gucibwa inyuma bitavuga umugore yitwaye nabi ahubwo ingeso abagabo bifitemo yagize uwanjye yatangiye gushurashura nkibyara umwana mbere ntaranacupira jye mbona ingeso kamere mbi zabo akomeza avuga abagabo bagira kamere kwikunda kwikakaza iyo akubajije ikintu ukamusubiza bwoba abona wamusuzuguye agatangira kujya gushaka abamwumva kukurusha kwisiga gucya ntacyo bivuze mugabo wamaze kuraruka urubuga rwitwa cheatingwayscom rugaragaza impamvu eshanu zituma abagabo baca inyuma abagore harimo kumva urugo rwe rutamuhaza kuba umugore atakiyitaho kurambirwa gukorera imibonano mpuzabitsina rugo rwe kuba atarigeze akunda umugore impamvu gatanu iy’ingeso gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: ingabo z’u rwanda zarinze umutekano papa
content: ingabo z’u rwanda ziri butumwa bw’amahoro centrafrique zagaragaye barinze umutekano papa francis yasesekaraga murwa mukuru w’iki gihugu bangui cyumweru tariki ugushyingo nk’uko bigaragara ifoto yatangajwe n’ikinyamakuru bbc n’andi acicikana mbuga nkoranyambaga abasirikare b’u rwanda bagaragiye papa francis abasanzwe barinda umutekano perezida catherine samba-panza wakiriye mushumba kiliziya gatolika bbc yatangaje butumwa bw’ibanze papa francis yatanze gihugu kirangwamo amakimbirane yitirirwa amadini burimo icyizere afitiye amatora yitezwe kwezi k’ukuboza akomeza yigisha n’abanyagihugu kubana batishishanyapapa francis yashimangiye icyizere afitiye umusaruro w’amatora ashobora guhosha amakimbirane hagati y’imitwe y’abakirisituanti balaka n’abayisilamu slka akimara gusesekara ngoro perezida i banguiyakanguriye abaturage gihugu kugira ubumwe kwirinda ibishuko bibatera gutinyana kudasabana n’abadahuje ubwoko cyangwa imyumvire politiki n’imyemereremu ruzinduko rwe biteganyijwe azifatanya n’abayoboke kiliziya gatolika ndetse akanahura n’umuyobozi mukuru w’abayisilamu musigiti w’umujyi bangui ahazwi cyane pk yanditswe sarongo richardmuhaburarw

content: ibi byagarutsweho benshi barokotse jenoside bitabiriye imihango kwibuka jenoside nshuro rwibutso mwurire karere rwamagana munsi tariki munyaneza jean baptiste ukuriye ihuriro ry’abarokotse jenoside yagize amahano jenoside yabaye ndengakamere atwara abacu benshi abarokotse shimo twabonera abaduhishe n’ingabo zari iza fpr zahagaritse bwicanyi tukabona agahenge ubu duhagaze gitwari twibeshaho ndetse turangamiye imbere heza terambere rutareka vianney wavuze izina benshi barokokeye i mwurire yibukije bahabanye gitwari bihe bibi bafashanya kandi banasangira duke bafite yanabwiye abataratahaye abatutsi bahahungiye bafatanye urunana kwirwanaho nubwo ababahigaga bitwaje intwaro nyinshi zirimo n’imbunda bahabwaga n’abari abayobozi babi gihe imfubyi zifite ababyeyi n’abavandimwe biciwe i mwurire zaserutse zishimira ababyeyi n’abavandimwe batabarutse gitwari bazize ubusa zashimye abakomeje kuzifasha nyuma jenoside benshi bakaba babaye abasore n’inkumi abandi abagabo n’abagore bizihiye u rwanda bose bashimiye cyane ingabo zari iza fpr inkotanyi zahagaritse ubwicanyi banashimira cyane bamwe batarahigwaga bahishe cyangwa bakaburira abahigwaga igihe abicanyi babaga badashaka hagira n’umwe urokoka mu mihango kwibuka yabereye i mwurire hanashyinguwe imibiri y’abantu bashyinguwe hirya hino rwamagana ahishakiye jean d’amour

title: abakobwa baraburirwa kudakunda abasore b’amatuza manini
content: abakobwa ndetse n’abagore benshiusanga bakunda abahungu bafite ibigango binini amatuza manini yego rwose banagaragara neza inyuma ariko mibanire myiza bagira ndetse usanga rukundo nyarwo bafite ushobora kushidikanya mwanditsi wanditse nkuru ariko ntushidikanye siyansi mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe kaminuza westminister bwagaragaje abasore cyangwa abagabo bafite ibigango binini batagira imibanire myiza nk’abandi basanzwe iyi kamunuza yerekanye bagabo usanga bakunze kugora abakunzi ndetse bagira ibitekerezo bishaje imbere y’abagore bagize bati igihe cyose usanga bifitemo imyumvire mibi abagabo bahamye kandi badatsindwa bagendeye miterere n’ingano bafite nyamara mumutwe hatekereza bafite ntibaca bugufi biyoroshye imbere y’abakunzi babomu bushakashatsi bwakorewe bagabo barenga bwagaragaje abagabo bafite inda nini nyakubahwa bagira imibanire myiza ndetse n’urukundo abagabo baringaniye bakagira kwiyoroshya imbere y’abakunzi nabyo bakundirwa ndetse bikabafasha kubaka ingo zabo neza gusa nanone usanga kuba umugabo afite urukundo kandi yita kumukunzi akenshi biba biturutse kamereye abakobwa ndetse n’abagore benshiusanga bakunda abahungu bafite ibigango binini amatuza manini yego rwose banagaragara neza inyuma ariko mibanire myiza bagira ndetse usanga rukundo nyarwo bafite ushobora kushidikanya mwanditsi wanditse nkuru ariko ntushidikanye siyansingaho bakobwa nababwira mujye mushishoza muguhitamo mwihebera yanditswe ukurikiyimfura leoncemuhaburarw

title: akarere rubavu karishimira ibikorwa by’amajyambere kagezeho
content: mu bikorwa byamuritswe harimo umuhanda uhuza imipaka yombi y’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo grande et petite barierre ukazatwara akayabo k’amafaranga akabakaba miliyoni ndetse n’ umuhanda pave ujya biro by’akarere watangiye gukorwa munsi umuyobozi w’akarere sheh bahame hassan yavuze akarere kabwiye rwiyemezamirimo imodoka zikora mihanda zitazasubirayo utugari tutazikoresheje dusane uduhanda tujya hasuwe kandi umusozi wimuweho imiryango kubera ikibazo cy’isuri yicaga abahatuye gihe cy’imvura uyu musozi murenge gisenyi guterwamo ibiti binyuranye bifata ubutaka hakazubakwamo uduhanda intebe n’ibitare kuruhukiramo mukerarugendo iki gikorwa kizatwara amafaranga miliyoni bavuye musozi ubuyobozi b’akarere rubavu bwasuye akagari karukogo umurenge rubavu birebera ibikorwa ndengera foundation uyu muryango wubatse amasoko y’amazi agemurira abaturage amazi meza ndetse n’ibitaro kijyambere umuyobozi w’akarere yasabye umuyobozi ndengera foundation gufatanya n’akarere bakareba masoko y’amazi yakwaguka abaturage benshi bakavomaho abayobozi banagejejwe ahari kubakwa amashanyarazi ako kagali jean berchmas bahige ukuriye ewsa rubavu yasobanuye mashanyarazi azagera baturage tugali twa byahi kanembwe karukogo ibarizwa mirenge rubavu cyanzarwe bahige yashimangiye mashanyarazi afite ingufu zihagije zizafasha abaturage kwivana bukene bahige yagize mushinga wizwe neza ibikoresho byose birahari igikorwa cyose gikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi kizahakora kirahari mpungenge hasuwe n’isoko ryo ako kagali ariko rizatangira gukorerwamo mutarama nyuma y’ubunani uru rugendo rwasorejwe isoko kijyambere ry’akarere rubavu riri kubakwa mujyi rwagati murenge gisenyi imirimo kubaka soko iracyari hasi ariko irimo kwihutishwa kugira rizatangire gukoreshwa aho riri isoko risanzwe rikorera hazazamurwa irindi gorofa hanubakwe imodoka zihagarara asoza gikorwa umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheh bahame hassan yibukije inshingano buri wese kurinda gukoresha neza ibikorwa remezo gihe bizaba byuzuye bahame yagize ibikorwa nk’ibi iby’umuturage turifuza buri wese agira uruhare kubibungabunga kubikoresha kuko uburenganzira bweumwe baturage utuye kagari karukogo seth mugema asanga amajyambere kwihuta abagana buryo yiteguye gutangiza umushinga iwabo cyaro nogosha imisatsi mujyi none kubera batuzaniye amashanyarazi ngiye kwimurira salon yanjye karukogo nk’uko byagaragaye akarere rubavu kari kwihutisha ibikorwa remezo bijyanye n’icyerekezo ariko cyane cyane hubakwa imihanda ariko inzira ikiri ndende akarere karateganya kuganira n’abafite amazu mujyi rwego kubafasha kwihutisha bikorwa bakihutisha iterambere aka karere pascaline umulisa

title: perezida kagame yasabye hakemurwa ikibazo cy’imanza zitarangizwa zarabaye itegeko
content: perezida repubulika paul kagame yasabye inzego zose gufatanya zigakemura ikibazo cy’imanza zitarangizwa kandi zaramaze kuba itegeko ry’urukiko kuko bitabaye yaba inenge ikomeye rwego rw’ubutabera n’izindi nzego z’igihugu rusange ibi umukuru w’igihugu yabigarutseho kabiri yatangizaga mugaragaro umwaka w’ubucamanza gutangiza umwaka w’ubucamanza byahuriranye n’impera manda y’imyaka perezida w’urukiko rw’ikirenga prof sam rugege perezida repubulika paul kagame yashimye akazi kakozwe n’urwego rw’ubucamanza perezida w’urukiko rw’ikirenga by’umwihariko umukuru w’igihugu yanakomoje banyamategeko bamaze iminsi basaba urukiko rw’ikirenga gusuzuma zimwe ngingo z’amategeko atandukanye zitanyunyuranye n’itegeko nshinga abigaragaza nk’ ikimenyetso cy’icyizere abaturage bafitiye urwego butsinda cyazamutse cyigeze rusange ariko nanone bukavuga buhangayikishijwe n’ubwiyongere dosiye bwakira kuko uretse kuba umutwaro uru rwego ugereranyije n’umubare w’abakozi rufite n’ikimenyetso cy’ubwiyongere bw’ibyaha bikorwa muryango nyarwanda imibare y’umwaka w’ubucamanza igaragaza myaka ishize dosiye ubushinjacyaha bwakira ziyongereye gipimo ziva ibihumbi zigera bihumbi ibi kandi maguru mashya yagize n’ubwo hari byinshi kwishimira hari n’imbogamizi twagiye duhura kandi n’ubu zitarakemuka muri twavuga nk’umubare w’imanza udahwema kwiyongera ugereranyije n’umubare w’abakozi n’ubwo hagiye hafatwa ingamba zinyuranye twavuze ibisubizo dutanga usanga nko kuzimya umuriro gusa gihe hadafashwe ingamba zituma amakimbirane abyara imanza agabanuka muryango nyarwanda aha umukuru title: rafiki avuga pggss season hari ibyakosowe buryo izagenda neza
content: mu kiganiro twagiranye tariki yagize njye nabonye hari byinshi byakosowe buryo numva izagenda neza rwose reba nk’ubushize biriya tom close byaratinze cyane n’ubwo byagiye studio professionnel twamubajije yabyakira n’akamaro byamugirira aramutse yegukanye pggss season asubiza magambo numva ikintu cyonyine byamarira ukujya studio professionnel rwego rw’isi numva ikintu gikomeye cyane jye iyo opportunity yatuma ubona n’ibindi byinshi byiza byakugirira akamaro muzika yawe rafiki uherutse gukora indirimbo yilekelemo yavugishije abantu benshi cyane gukora indirimbo ebyiri ndishimye dj b hindukira jay p marie clemence cyiza uwimanimpaye

title: gakenke inkeragutabara n’abafasha barahuguwe mateka
content: kubakira byiza mateka y’u rwanda kugira uruhare kubungabunga umutekano hatangwa amakuru gihe muntu wese wahungabanya umutekano bimwe byagarutsweho mahugurwa yateguwe komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe agenewe inkeragutabara n’abafasha yabereye biro by’akarere gakenke ukwakira afungura mahugurwa umuyobozi komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe abahoze rugamba ntara y’amajyaruguru madamu niyonteze clemence yasabye abitabiriye mahugurwa kuyakurikirana neza kuko ingirakamaro mibereho n’abaturanyi yakomeje avuga mahugurwa agamije guhugura cyane cyane abagore b’inkeragutabara bagahugukirwa gahunda leta dore batigeze bahugurwa bagaruka rwababyaye ndetse kumenya ibibazo bafite bwana safali wilson watanze ikiganiro mateka y’u rwanda mahugurwa yasobanuriye abitariye amahugurwa imvano y’amateka yateye jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yavuze abazungu banditse kandi bakigisha amateka y’u rwanda bayagoreka nkana kugira bacemo ibice abanyarwanda babashe kubategeka bise cyongereza divide and rule by’umwihariko ababiligi banditse amateka y’abanyarwanda bagendeye mateka y’amacakubiri gihugu cyabo hagati y’abafurama flamands n’abawaru wallons dore iwabo byacikaga hagati yayo moko uretse bakoroni safali yakomeje avuga natwe ubwacu twabigizemo uruhare cyane cyane ubutegetsi butandukanye bwagiye busimburana bwahembereye macukubiri kugeza abanyarwanda barangajwe imbere n’ubutegetsi bubi bamburaga ubuzima abavandimwe basaga miliyoni asobanura ikigenderewe kwiga amateka yavuze kubaka ejo hazaza bwana safali yagize kumenya amateka yacu bidufasha kwirinda amabi jenoside tukubakira mateka meza bidufasha kandi kumenya twatsinzwe n’aho twatsinze nk’abanyarwanda ni byiza kwiga amateka kuko ushaka kwiyibagiza amateka ashaka kuyasubiramo ibyo bigamije kubaka ejo hazaza h’igihugu cyacu kizira amacakubiri n’ingengabiterezo jenoside umutekano isoko y’iterambere lt muhozi charles ubarizwa batayo ikorera karere gakenke watanze ikiganiro mutekano yavuze iterambere u rwanda rwagezeho rurikesha umutekano niyo mpamvu tugomba kuwubungabunga kugira tutazasubira inyuma yibukije abitariye amahugurwa batagomba kwirara bagomba gutanga amakuru gihe muntu wese ushobora kuhungabanya umutekano koloneli karegeya claudien komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe witandukanyije fdlr yabasabye gukangurira abavandimwe ndetse n’inshuti zabo zikiri mashyamba kongo gutahuka bagafatanya n’abandi banyarwanda kubaka igihugu cyabo kandi abizeza kuzabafasha kubagezaho butumwa izo nkeragutabara zitandukanyije fdlr zinjijwe gahunda zitandukanye z’iterambere barihirwa amashuri y’imyuga barubakiwe bavanwa nyakatsi ndetse baninjizwa gahunda gira inka mushimiyimana jeannette umwe mubakurikiranye mahugurwa avuga mahugurwa yayungukiyemo byinshi yavuze yasobanukiwe imvano jenoside amateka yagoretswe akaba agiye gufata iya mbere akayarwanya avuga amateka y’ukuri kandi agomba kubaka igihugu cy’u rwanda ayo mahugurwa yitabiriwe n’inkeragutabara hamwe n’abafasha basaga baturutse turere twa rulindo gakenke batahutse bava mashyamba repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo guhera kugeza mwaka turimo nshimiyimana leonard

content: umuhanzi nyarwanda uririmba indirimbo kuramya guhimbaza imana roben nshimiyimana umaze kumenyekana roben arasaba abanyarwanda kwita butumwa buba buri ndirimbo zihimbaza imana cyane gutwarwa cyane n’irari ry’iby’isi ibi yabidutangarije twamusuraga yiga atuganiriza ntego muzika kuramya guhimbaza ndetse n’impamvu ariyo yahisemo uyu muhanzi arasaba abanyarwanda ndetse n’abakunzi yewe n’abakunda cyane umuziki urimo ubutumwa kwegera imana kumufasha bagakurikirana indirimbo ze kuko zirimo ubutumwa buhembura imitima y’abantu kandi zuzuyemo amagambo meza kuramya kwegerana n’imana nshimiyimana roben yadutangarije yatangiye kuririmbira imana akiri umwana muto cyane yabitangiriye sunday school ecole de dimanche yasengeraga adepr betel i gisenyi karere rubavu roben kandi yatubwiye atari yatangira kugira ibitaramo bikomeye yitabira cyangwa atumirwemo akaba yahereye asaba abategura bitaramo bikomeye kujya batekereza mpano zikizamuka kugira nabo bigaragaze isi n’abayituye nabo babone bashoboye uyu musore kandi yasabye abanyarwanda kumwereka bamuri inyuma kugira akomeze kubagezaho indirimbo zifite ubutumwa bwiza bagafatanyiriza hamwe kuramya imana kugeza ubungubu amaze gukora indirimbo ebyiri harimo umugambi roben nsiga amavuta roben ziboneka youtube kanda hano wumve indirimbo nsiga amavuta ya roben

content: bale wagaragaye akina iminota mukino real madrid yatsindagamo celta vigo - umutoza zidane yatangaje azaba akoreshwa mukino barakiramo as roma i santiaga bernabeu mukino kwishyura uefa championsleague bale ufite ikibazo cy’imbwana calf muscle yagiriye mukino shampiyona wabahuje sporting gijon kuwa mutarama kuri afite impuzandengo y’igitego kimwe n’ibice mikino shampiyona ngo asatanga umusanzue guha akazi myugariro as roma bitumen batishyura ibitego batsindiwe murugo ral kandi ishobora kugarura toni kroos luka modric marcelo batari bameze neza mukino weekend nyuma y’umukino umutoza zinedine zidane yagize bale yishimye kuko yongeye gukora akazi nyuma igihe kitari gito tuzamubona mukino roma kandi ndakeka azaba ameze neza bale yabwiye urubuga realmadridcom yishimye iby’igiciro kuza uvuye bihe bukomeye ukazana insinzi rutahizamu karim benzema aracyashidikanywaho kuburyo birikuvugwa umwana muto cyane borja mayoral ashobora kongera guhabwa amahirwe zidane akeneye abakinnyi bafite inararibonye kuko intego ukukora undecima igikombe uefa championsleague nacyo gikombe cyonyine bafite amahirwe gutwara mwaka roma nayo ije i madrid ifite icyizere kuko umukino uheruka yatsinze fiolentina - byatumye yegera umwanya gatatu muri bitego harimo n’icya mohamed salah umeze neza luciano spaletti umutoza as roma ntiyashyize myugariro antonio rudiger rutonde kubera imvune naho radja nainggolan ukina hagati arashidikanywaho mugihe daniele de rossi adahari yanditswe rukundo xavermuhaburarw

title: video byinshi bitangaje safari isaac wabyaye abana bagore batandukanye
content: safari isaac umuhanzi w’indirimbo zihimbaza imana ndetse n’amakorasi yamamaye cyane myaka ishize gusa kugeza hari indirimbo ze nyinshi zizwi ariko abantu batazi ize ndetse ubwe hari abatazi umuhanzi gusa ahanini biterwa n’ubuzima yabayemo bwakurikiye ubwamamare bwe yaje gutandukana n’umugore avuga yasambanaga n’umushoferi hanyuma akaza kujya bagore batandukanye yabyaranye abana basaga safari isaac umuhanzi w’indirimbo zihimbaza imana ndetse n’amakorasi yamamaye cyane myaka ishize gusa kugeza hari indirimbo ze nyinshi zizwi ariko abantu batazi ize ndetse ubwe hari abatazi umuhanzi gusa ahanini biterwa n’ubuzima yabayemo bwakurikiye ubwamamare bwe yaje gutandukana n’umugore avuga yasambanaga n’umushoferi hanyuma akaza kujya bagore batandukanye yabyaranye abana basaga niba ujya wumva ikorasi abarokore baririmba bagira bati nzakagendana nzakagendana agakiza k’imana nzakagendana menya uyikesha safari isaac nunyura baririmba bagira bati yadutuye imitwaro yaduhetamishaga tugenda twemye nabyo uzamenye ubikesha safari isaac uyu muhanzi yaramamaye myaka ishize ndetse benshi bahanzi baririmba indirimbo zihimbaza imana yarabafashije ariko ntakigaragara cyane mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ukwezi safari isaac yagaragaje bimwe bihe bikomeye yanyuzemo byatumye abura cyane muzika ndetse bikaba byarabaye intandaro kuba atagisengera itorero adepr yahoze asengeramo kimwe ukuba yaratandukanye n’umugore barashakanye buryo bwemewe n’amategeko bakanasezerana imbere y’imana byatewe n’uko mugore yamuciye inyuma agasambana n’umushoferi safari isaac yatangarije ikinyamakuru ukwezi gutandukana n’umugore byatumye aryamana n’abandi bagore batandukanye akabyarana nabo kuburyo afite abana basaga aba bana arabemera kandi agerageza kubitaho ashoboye kandi bamwe bababyaranye bashatse abagabo kuburyo bafite uburyo babayeho butuma bafatanya kwita bana safari isaac ashimangira aticuza kuba yarabyaye bana ariko akemeza intandaro yabyo ugutandukana n’umugore byatumye yishora bandi bagore batandukanye avuga afite umugore babana n’ubwo batarasezerana kandi azi bana aranabakunda kuburyo bakunda kubasura bakaba rugo rwabo ntabigireho ikibazo muri kiganiro twagiranye safari isaac yahishuye byinshi byihariye uburyo abantu benshi bamuzi kandi bamukunda imibanire n’umugore batandukanye n’ibindi byinshi byumvikana nk’ibidasanzwe reba video y’ikiganiro twagiranye hano

title: uburwayi umutwe indwara nk’izindi kandi buravurwa
content: mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru kabiri tariki ukwakira dr kayiteshonga yvonne ukuriye ishami rishinzwe iby’ubuzima mutwe minisiteri y’ubuzima yagaragaje intera urwanda rumaze gutera title: umunyafurika yakoze mudasobwa ntoya izwi izina tablet
content: mu kwezi cyenda mwaka nibwo mudasobwa yashyizwe ahagaragara nama y’ibijyanye n’ikorabuhanga rigezweho yitwa africa web summit yaberaga i brazzaville ho kongo ariko uku kwezi cumi guhera tariki nibwo mudasobwa yatangiye kugera bindi bihugu afrika ubusanzwe byari bimenyerewe ibikoresho by’ikorababuhanga biza afrika ariko byarakorewe bihugu hanze y’afrika cyane cyane burayi bushinwa ndetse amerika ariko kuba umunyafrika yaragize igitekerezo gukora mudasobwa byahise bihindura amateka gusa ariko n’ubwo mudasobwa yakorewe kongo yateranyirijwe gihugu cy’ubushinwa ngo kubera afrika bikoresho kuyiteranya byari bihari mudasobwa ntoya ariko ikora nk’izindi zisanzwe ubundi mudasobwa tablet n’ubwo iba ntoya kuburyo umuntu ashobora kuyitwara mufuka w’umwambaro yambaye ikora nk’izindi mudasobwa zisanzwe mu rwanda nk’uko ikoranabuhanga riri gutera imbere mudasobwa hari abazitunze ingnieur neza nice fabrice ushinzwe ibijyanye tekinike techinque radio salus asobanurira bene mudasobwa zikora atangira avuga tablet mudasobwa nto cyane ijya kungana telefone zisanzwe cyangwa ikayiruta ho gatoya gusa ariko ikikwereka mudasobwa nayo ijyamo amaporogaramu programmes akoreshwa n’izindi mudasobwa zisanzwe agira mudasobwa ishobora kujyamo windows linux hari n’izijyamo bita android avuga impamvu abantu bashobora kwitiranya mudasobwa telefone hari telefone nazo zishobora kujyamo maporogaramu agira kubera iterambere ry’ikoranabuhanga porogaramu bagiye bazikoresha matelefoni amwe bita smart-phones iphone blackbelly cyangwa ipad yongeraho tablet iba mudasobwa kandi iba ifite bita touch-screen ecran bakoreshamo intoki ng’aho kugira wandike ukoresheje clavier nk’izamudasobwa zisanzwe ukora screen cyangwa ecran yayo ukandika ukoresheje intoki cyangwa ikaramu yabugenewe akomeza avuga kandi mudasobwa tablet itandukanye laptop zisanzwe cyangwa se laptop ntoya zitwa notbook ikindi kandi n’ubwo nto cyane ifite ubushobozi gukora nk’ibyo izindi mudasobwa zikora hirengagijwe izishobora gukora ibintu byinshi icyarimwe ngo kuba abahanga by’ikoranabuhanga bagenda bakora ibikoresho bitoya umuntu ashobora kugendana agiye hose bifite akamaro agira uko bagenda babigira bitoya bigenda bifasha buri muntu wese ubifite kubona amakuru buryo bworoshye ahantu ho hose ubundi mudasobwa ntoya izwi izina tablet yabanje gukorwa n’uruganda microsoft amerika ruzwi ho gukora ibijyanye mudasobwa urwo ruganda rukaba rwarayikoze mwaka kuva gihe kugeza izindi nganda zagerageje gukora mudasobwa harimo uruganda apple narwo rukora ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga rwatangijwe n’umunyamerika steve jobs umaze iminsi yitabye imana kuri hiyongera ho uruganda rim canada ruzwi ho gukora ibijyanye n’itumanaho ndetse n’izindi nganda zizwi ikoranabuhanga by’itumanaho norbert niyizurugero

title: ibintu bizonga umukobwa rukundo
content: umukobwa ariwe wese agiye rukundo asa n’utuye umutwaro umuremereye kuko yumva imibereho igiye guhindurwa n’uwo bakundanye cyane cyane yamwihitiyemoiyo umukobwa atunguwe kubona ibinyuranye n’ibyo yarategereje rukundo ashobora kudahita afata icyemezo gutandukana n’umuhungu bakundanye ariko akaba urwo rukundo adatekanye ahangayitse kandi yumva agenda acika integer hanaziramo kuba yatendeka kuko atanyuzweabakobwa benshi ubushakashatsi bugaragazwa n’abahanga by’urukundo buvuga badakunda kwisabira abakunzi gutandukana akaba ariyo mpamvu bahitamo kubatendeka kubasaba gutandukana urubuga le pluriellesfr ruvuga bimwe bishobora kuzongakubuza amahoro umukobwa rukundo byanamutera gutendeka iyo atitaweho buryo butandukanye kandi aribwo bwose n’umuhungu bakundana iyo umuhungu bakundanye amubangamira cyangwa se amuyoborana igitugu ndetse akanamufatira ibyemezo buri gikorwa cyose iyo umuhungu bakundanye atajya ashaka kugaragaza cyangwa kumwereka atewe ishema aha nk’igihe ahora yumva urukundo rwabo bombi rwaguma ibanga ryabo bombi gusa ariko bandi bagenzi rukaba ibanga iyo umuhungu mpano n’imwe by’umwihariko iciriritse ajya amuha cyane abakobwa benshi bikundira impano zidahanitse ndetse zitanahenze zivuye bakunzi iyo buri gihe umuhungu ahora ifuhe n’ishyari bitera umukobwa gutekereza atajya yigera umwizerwa imbere y’umukunzi iyo umuhungu akunda kugira incyuro cyangwa se ubika inzika niba umukobwa akoze agakosa gato umuhungu akazajya ahora akamucyurira kabone nubwo haba hashize igihe iryo kosa yararimusabiye imbabazi ibi umukobwa abifata nko kumuhoza nkeke iyo umuhungu ahora ashaka ndetse arwanira umukobwa yatera nkawe buri kimwe cyose cyangwa bahuza imitekerereze kandi ntibishoboka kuko buri wese afite atekereza abona ibintu ahubwo bakora ugushyira hamwe ibitekerezo byabo hamwe kuzuzanya yanditswe sarongo richard muhaburarw

content: mu ijoro ryo werurwe nibwo icyamamare ndirimbo kumya guhimbaza imana sinach yageze rwanda aje gitaramo easter celebration azafatanyamo patient bizimana cyumweru tariki mata munsi pasika title: ibyamamare rwanda byinjiye bukangurambaga kwamagana iyicwa ry’abirabura amerika
content: kuri isi ihanze amaso leta zunze ubumwe amerika nyuma y’umwirabura george floyd wishwe anigishijwe ivi n’umupolisi w’umuzungu ndetse bamwe kwiroha mihanda rwego kwamagana iyicwa rikorerwa abirabura babayo ni urupfu rwababaje benshi biturutse mashusho yasakajwe mwirabura gutakamba avuga guhera umwuka’ ariko bikirengagizwa kugeza yajyanywe muganga agahita ahuhuka ndetse leta zunze ubumwe amerika imyigaragambyo ikomeje gufata indi ntera ibihumbi by’abaturage bagiye mihanda bitwaje ibyapa bigaragaza uburakari batewe n’urupfu rw’umwirabura george floyd abandi kwifashisha imbuga nkoranyambaga bagaragaza akababaro kabo ndetse bagasabira ubutabera mugabo wishwe ahowe ubusa ibyamamare rwanda nabyo byinjiye bukangurambaga mbuga nkoranyambaga bifashishije hashtag zirimo blacklivesmatter cyangwa justiceforfloyd kwamagana ubwicanyi bukorerwa abirabura amerika ibi byamamare birimo akiwacu colombe wabaye nyampinga w’u rwanda mutesi jolly wambitswe iryo kamba nimwiza meghan waryambaye nishimwe naomie uherutse gutorerwa kuba miss rwanda bahati grace wabaye nyampinga w’u rwanda aba butumwa bashyize nkuta zabo bagaragaza ubuzima bw’abirabura amerika bukwiye guhabwa agaciro nka nimwiza meghan yanditse ubutumwa burebure agira kugeza igihe bazarekera kuduhiga nk’inyamanswa kugeza igihe tuzareka gusaba kutureka tugahumeka kugeza igihe tuzatangira kugenda twiruka muhanda dukora siporo kibazo dufite tutari kwiruka buzima bwacu kugeza igihe bazabona dukozwe n’amaraso ameze neza arongera kugeza igihe imitima yacu izaba itumva iremerewe n’agahinda k’abacu bicwa n’abakabaye babarinda kugeza igihe tuzatsinda urugamba kugeza gihe ntabwo tuzigera duceceka imitima yacu yarashenjaguritse kandi ntabwo duteze kurekera kugeza igihe tuzumvwa hakagira igikorwa abandi bagaragaje bifatanyije n’isi kwamagana iyicwa rikorerwa abirabura mpamvu harimo umuhanzi the ben princess priscillah nirere shanel igor mabano nel ngabo shaddy boo jules sentore buravan dj toxxyk abandi barimo nadja giramata umunyarwandakazi maraso ariko afite ubwenegihugu bw’u bwongereza akaba n’umunyamerika atuye mujyi new york uyu mukobwa usanzwe umunyamideli yanditse instagram ku george floyd ariko none n’abandi mbere kandi ndizera kundi nyuma y’ibi floyd w’imyaka witabye imana yakoraga barinda umutekano nzu icuruza amafunguro yishwe n’umupolisi leta minnesota

title: u rwanda rugiye gutangira kwifashisha indege nto zitagira umupiloti guhashya malaria
content: inkuru gutangiza mushinga yatangarijwe nama yabaye mutarama itegura inama yiga kurandura malariya n’indwara zititwabwaho bikwiye izabera i kigali kamena mwaka uyu mushinga guverinoma y’u rwanda ifatanyije sosiyete y’abanyarwanda yitwa ’charis unmanned aerial solutions’ uratangirizwa murenge jabana karere gasabo mutarama uyu mushinga uzunganira izindi ngamba guverinoma y’u rwanda isanzwe ifite guhashya indwara malaria zirimo gukwirakwiza baturage inzitiramibu gutera imiti bishanga nzu n’ahandi hari indiri y’imibu itera ndwara yugarije ibihugu bikiri nzira y’amajyambere n’ibikennye kwegereza abaturage ubuvuzi munsi abajyanama b’ubuzima babasha kuyisuzuma kuyivura n’izindi biteganyijwe drones zizakoreshwa mushinga izaba ifite ubushobozi gutwara icupa ririmo litiro z’umuti yifashisha kuhera bice bikekwaho kuba indiri y’umubu utera malaria nko bihuru bishanga n’ahandi izi ndege zifite ubushobozi gukora urugendo nibura rw’iminota zigafuhereye muti buso bungana nibura hegitari munsi umuyobozi ushinzwe ishami ryo kurwanya malaria kigo cy’ubuzima rbc mbituyumuremyi aimable yavuze drones zisanzwe zifashishwa bindi bihugu kurwanya indwara malaria kandi bitanga umusaruro ati zizadufasha kugera bice bimwe by’indiri y’imibu byatugoraga kugeramo twifashishije amapombo dusanzwe duteresha umuti wica imibu harimo nko bishanga mirima y’imiceri n’ahandi iki kimwe bikorwa bitandukanye biteganyijwe gukorwa bukangurambaga kurandura malaria buzamara amezi atandatu kugeza nama kamena ibaye imibare y’iyi minisiteri igaragaza umwaka ushize w’ingengo y’imari malaria yagaragaye barwayi basaga miliyoni mu mezi ashize malaria yagaragaye bantu miliyoni bavuye miliyoni yagaragayeho mwaka wawubanjirije bisobanuye yagaragayeho bagabanutseho hagati y’iyo myaka imibare kandi igaragaza ndwara zihangayikishije ibihugu bikiri nzira y’amajyambere yica bagabanutse cyane kuko bageze mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize gihe yishe bangana n’igabanuka minisante igaragaza mwaka izatanga inzitiramibu zisaga miliyoni zirimo zizakorerwa gihugu ndetse uturere tuzaterwamo imiti yica imibu email protected

title: umunyezamu rayon sports yatewe rugo bamushinja gutuma batsindwa apr fc
content: mu masaha y’igicuku ijoro rishyira kane umunyezamu w’ikipe rayon sports bashunga abouba yagabweho igitero n’abantu bataramenyekana bamenaguye ibirahure by’inzu atuyemo n’umuryango banateragura amabuye hejuru y’inzu banamubwira amagambo yumvikanisha bamushinja kuba yagize uruhare gutsindisha ikipe rayon sports yatsinzwe mukeba wayo apr fc mu masaha y’igicuku ijoro rishyira kane umunyezamu w’ikipe rayon sports bashunga abouba yagabweho igitero n’abantu bataramenyekana bamenaguye ibirahure by’inzu atuyemo n’umuryango banateragura amabuye hejuru y’inzu banamubwira amagambo yumvikanisha bamushinja kuba yagize uruhare gutsindisha ikipe rayon sports yatsinzwe mukeba wayo apr fc bashunga yabwiye ikinyamakuru ukwezicom abantu bataramenyekana bateye urugo rwe ruherereye ruyenzi murenge runda bakamena ibirahure by’inzu atuyemo bakanamubwira amagambo y’uko yatsindishije ikipe rayon sports gitego kabiri cyabonetse minota y’inyongera bigatuma apr fc itahana instinzi y’ibitego rayon sports bashunga avuga yababajwe gutsindwa mukino ariko ntako batari bagize gushyira imbagara gushaka intsinzi n’ubwo bitabakundiye ntabwo yakwishimira kuba batakaje amanota mukino ukomeye kandi usobanuye byinshi ikipe bashunga abouba avuga umugore n’abandi babana rugo bagize impungenge kubera bantu babateye rugo ariko yagerageje kubihanganisha abumvisha akazi kabo katoroshye kandi yizeye biza gushira bagatuza bashunga abouba n’umugore bamaze umwaka bakoze ubukwe uyu munyezamu rayon sports asaba abakunzi b’iyi kipe gushyira imbaraga mikino isigaye gushyira hamwe bagatahiriza umugozi umwe akanabizeza mukino itaha bazakora ibishoboka byose bakitwara neza

title: umunyarwanda louis baziga yiciwe mozambique
content: umunyarwanda louis baziga umaze imyaka akorera ubucuruzi gihugu mozambique ndetse akuriye abanyarwanda babayo mbere tariki kanama yishwe arashwe n’abantu bataramenyekana umunyarwanda louis baziga umaze imyaka akorera ubucuruzi gihugu mozambique ndetse akuriye abanyarwanda babayo mbere tariki kanama yishwe arashwe n’abantu bataramenyekana ambasaderi w’ u rwanda mozambique yatangajeko baziga yarashwe modoka ma saa sita z’ amanywa ambasaderi claude nikobisanzwe yabwiye bbc baziga nzira ava iwe ajya igaraje gace kitwa matola maputo yaraswaga ngo haje imodoka imubuza inzira havamo abantu baramurasa imodoka ihita igenda abatabaye bamugejeje muganga bagezeyo basanga yapfuye amb nikobisanzwe avuga bamurasiye nzira nyabagendwa kandi ituweho abumvise amasasu bahise batabara ariko basanga abamurashe bagiye ntibabamenya arakomeza ubu twabihariye inzego zishinzwe iperereza ntabwo twamenya impamvu bamwishe bashakaga ntabwo twabimenya kuko haracyari kare amb nikobisanzwe avuga bantu azi bafitanye amakimbirane bazigaavuga azi yakoraga ubucuruzi bwose bwemewe n’amategeko akanayobora ’diaspora’ y’abanyarwanda gihugu umwe muryango yabwiye bbc umurambo baziga wahise ujyanwa ’hospital provincial da matola’ mujyi maputo uyu utifuje gutangazwa amazina avuga baziga yarashwe mumodoka wenyine yitwaye indi modoka bwoko mercedes benz itwawe n’umukanishi bagiye kuyikoresha bibabye gihe kamena aribwo u rwanda rwafunguye kumugaragaro ambasade yarwo mozambique igihugu kibamo abanyarwanda barenga muri gicurasi mwaka camir nkurunziza umunyarwanda impunzi yiciwe muhanda i cape town afurika y’epfo igihugu gituranyi mozambique polisi ivuga bisa n’aho ashimuswe

title: nagerageje kumva akamaro miss ariko narakabuze-ingabire immacule
content: mu gihe ibikorwa gutora miss rwanda biri kugera musozo bamwe bayobozi ndetse n’abaturage ntibymva akamaro k’iki gikorwa kuko amafaranga ajyamo menshi yakabaye akora ibindi bifasha abaturage kubaho neza gupfusha ubusa akayabo kagendera itegurwa ry’iki gikorwa umuyobozi transparency international rwanda ingabire marie immacule asanga musaruro miss rwanda agira iterambere ry’igihugu umuyobozi transparency international rwanda ingabire marie immacule abinyujije rukuta rwe yagaragaje atishimiye gato itorwa miss rwanda kuko asanga ntacyo amarira igihugu ingabire yagize nagerageje kumva akamaro miss ariko wapi narakabuze sinzi imariye abanyarwanda dore n’abayizi bake cyane n’ababaye miss kugeza simbona akarusho bazanye iterambere ry’igihugu mu bagerageje kumusubiza bagargaje nabo badashyigikiye itegurwa ry’iki gikorwa kuko amafarannga ajyamo yakabaye afasha abakene cyanwa ibigo by’amashuri adeline niyigena yagize njye nshyigikiye abantu bumva miss rwanda itabaho kuko amafaranga itakanzwaho yakabaye afashishwa abakene batagira n’aho uzi gutakaza akayabo miss kandi hali abantu badashobora kwiyubakira toilets ubwiherero ibigo by’amashuri bitagira ibikoni bigaburire abana hari n’ababona imitegurire yabyo yakwiye guhinduka abategura marushanwa ntibite nyungu zabo gusa ahubwo bakareba n’ingaruka zishobora kubaho gihe basezerera uwatsinzwe masaha y’ijoro mutesi scovia yagize nsanga abategura miss rwanda bagombye kubanza gutekereza kurusha kureba inyungu bakura kwirirwa bamamaza ubwiza bw’abakobwa kugeza bumva gutaha nijoro k’uvuyemo kibazo ingabire marie immacule yasabye byibuze hajyaho amarushanwa ahuza urubyiruko rufite imishinga yayashyigikira kibazo iby’amarushanwa y’ubwiza umuntu mwiza imbere y’umureba gusa yagize njyewe umunsi bakoze amarushanwa ’nkubito z’icyeza’ cyangwa ay’abakobwa bafite imishinga y’iterambere rigera rubyirukorwinshi nzayishyigikiranaho umukobwa mwiza wapiubwiza bw’umuntu biterwa n’umureba ibi bije gihe munsi w’ejo aribwo abategura rushanwa bazaba bamaze gusezerera abakobwa batanu boot camp i nyamata hagasigara bazavamo umwe uzegukana ikamba miss rwanda kuwa gatandatu tariki mutarama birori bizabera intare arena i rusororo srcmakuruki

title: abatangabuhamya rubanza munyenyezi bemerewe kubutanga
content: steven mcauliffe yatangajeko umwirondoro w’abatangabuhamya wujuje ibisabwa kandi kizinga awubonamo nkuko byari byatangajwe n’abunganira munyenyezi yanasabye hakumvwa ubuhamya bwabo kuko bamaze gukorerwa ubugenzuzi nubwo mpande zombi bubasha zifite guha cyangwa kwambura abanyamahanga uburenganzira nkiko umushinjacyaha yatangaje bategarugori aribo bisabiye gutanga ubuhamya bushake uru rubanza biteganijwe ruzatangira kuburanishwa kwezi umwaka utaha umushakashatsi by’umutekano thomas andersen jr wakoze igenzura buhamya bw’abarega munyenyezi avuga munyenyezi aregwa kuba yaragiye atanga abantu kumwe bakicwa abandi barimo abategarugori akabashyira abasirikare bagakorerwa ibyamfura mbi amagambo n’imvugo zitesha umuntu agaciro n’ibindi munyenyezi batrice w’imyaka yinjiye leta zunze ubumwe amerika mwaka ahabwa kuba umuturage w’iki gihugu yaje gutabwa yombi mwaka w’ kwezi aregwa kuba yarabeshye kubijyanye kwinjira guhabwa uburenganzira gutura leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika ubwo munyenyezi yasabaga uburenganzira gutura gihugu yahakanye ruhare yagize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda mwaka w’ nyuma y’igihe ariko byaje kugaragara yabeshye ubushinjacyaha bukaba bumukurikirana marie jose ikibasumba

title: umuraperi tupac aza kuba akiriho yujuje imyaka y’amavuko -amateka n’impaka k’urupfu rwe

title: ikirenga bahanzi kayirebwa amaze imyaka irenga muziki wimakaza umuco nyarwanda
content: umunyabigwi muziki w’u rwanda ccile kayirebwa agiye gurataramira abanyarwanda gitaramo kiswe kirenga bahanzi akanashimirwa imyaka irenga amaze muziki wimakaza umuco nyarwanda uyu mugore w’igishongore utamenya akuze cyane asigaye gihugu cy’ububiligi yatangiye kuririmba myaka yigaga karubanda yasohoreye indirimbo mbere mbere y’uko arangiza amashuri yisumbuye azwi cyane ndirimbo nyarwanda cyane cyane umunezero yafunguraga ibiganiro radio muhabura gihe cy’intambara kubohora ihihugu indi ubumanzi aririmba umuntu ukomeye utavugwaho rumwe avuga imana yamuhaye ubutware imana yahaye ubumanzi ijya kumurema yamutatse imitanaga nta n’uwabura kwibuka uwicyeza iwacu numukobwa marebe atembaho amaribori rwabazigama inyange none twaza mwajyahe tarihinda inkindi ikizungerezi rwanda n’izindi nyinshi cecile kayirebwa ikirenga koko niwe ugiye kubimburira abandi bahanzi b’abanyabigwi gitaramo ngaruka mwaka kiswe ikirenga bahanzi kigamije gushimira abahanzi kwimakaza gukundisha abandi umuco nyarwanda gusa cecile kayirebwa avuga ruhare yagize itegurwa ry’iki gitaramo azahemberwamo avuga gusa azakiririmbamo nyuma kugitumirwamo agira mushinga ruhare nawugizemo babiteguye ibyabo nabimenye babirangije guhabwa ishimwe babimbwiye nyuma ndabishima cyane nkanasezeranya nzakomeza mushinga nshoboye amahanga arahanda karibu asbl ntagengwa omar uba gihugu cy’ububiligi bateguye gitaramo ntagengwa asanzwe ategurira ibitaramo binyuraye by’abanyarwanda bubiligi ariko akavuga gifatika bimarira urubyiruko rubayo kuko ruba rwaramaze kuvanga imico avuga gitaramo kigamije gushishikariza abahanzi gukundisha gusakaza umuco nyarwanda kizakomeza kubaho rwanda ndetse mahanga ibitaramo nk’ibi mahanga tuba tugerageza kubitegura gusa biragoye bana babyirukira hariya gukomera muco kuko bahahurira n’ibindi byinshi ariko babyeyi ho turagerageza kuwubakundisha biciye bitaramo umuyobozi bwiza media kayiranga melchiore nayo bateguye gitaramo ruhande rw’abanyarwanda b’imbere gihugu avuga buri wese uzitabira gitaramo giteganyijwe cyumweru taliki werurwe azaba afite amahirwe gushimira kayirebwa gite cye gihe azaba abyifuje ni igitaramo kizahurirana n’umunsi mpuzamahanga w’umugore abagabo bazaba bifuriza umunsi mwiza bashiki nyirasenge ababyeyi abakobwa nyirabukwe igitaramo ikirenga bahanzigiteganyijwe tariki werurwe birori bizabera camp kigali kugeza amatike kugurishwa amafaranga frw gusa bavuga uzagura tike munsi w’igitaramo kwinjira myanya y’icyubahiro vvip bizaba gihe ahasanzwe vip azaba ndetse ahasigaye hose karegeya omar

title: ngororero igiye gukemura ikibazo cy’amacumbi

title: nsanzimana etienne yishwe anizwe anatewe ibyuma

content: uwiringiyimana theogene wamamaye theo bosebabireba umuhanzi ndirimbo kuramya guhimbaza imana yahagaritswe burundu itorero adepr ndetse n’indirimbo ze zikaba zamaze gukomanyirizwa torero kubera ingeso zakunze kumugaragaraho zirimo ubusambanyi n’indi mico idakwiye umukirisitu nyawe uwiringiyimana theogene wamamaye theo bosebabireba umuhanzi ndirimbo kuramya guhimbaza imana yahagaritswe burundu itorero adepr ndetse n’indirimbo ze zikaba zamaze gukomanyirizwa torero kubera ingeso zakunze kumugaragaraho zirimo ubusambanyi n’indi mico idakwiye umukirisitu nyawe theo bosebabireba yakunze kujya yumvikana binyamakuru bivugwa hari abakobwa yagiye atera inda ndetse afite abana benshi yabyaranye n’abakobwa batandukanye bamwe yagiye abemera abandi akabihakanauku kugera atera abakobwa inda ndetse n’izzindi ngeso yagiye avugwaho zzirimo ubusinzi bimwe ntandaro kuba yahagaritswe torero amakuru guhagarika umuhanzi theo bosebabireba yemejwe pasitoro rubazinda callixte uyobora umudugudu kicukiro sell paruwasi kagarama ho uwiringiyimana theo yabarizwaga kiganiro yahaye ibyishimo dukesha nkuru pasitoro rubazinda yavuze muhanzi yahagaritswe burundu ndetse n’ibihangano bye bitemerewe gukoreshwa itorero adepr ariho hose yagize twaramuhagaritse kubera yakoze ibyaha make twasanze yaraguye kandi tubimubajije arabitwemerera hanyuma tumubwira tumuhagaritse ntabwo akiri umukirisitu wacu azongera kuba umukirisitu wacu yamaze gusaba imbabazi itorero ruhame ndetse akanasaba imbabazi yahemukiye hari amakuru agera kinyamakuru ukwezicom avuga muhanzi theo bosebabireba cyumweru tariki mutarama yakumiriwe muhango w’igaburo ryera kuko atari umukirisitu w’itorero adepr ubwo twatunganyaga nkuru twagerageje kuvugisha muhanzi agire adutangariza cyemezo yafatiwe n’itorero yasengeragamo ntibyadukundiye kuko inshuro zose twamuhamagaye telefone igendanwa numero yavuye murongo

content: perezida leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika donald trump yakumiriye ingendo z’abantu bava bihugu by’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’u burayi rwego gukumira icyorezo virusi corona trump yavuze cyemezo kigomba kubahirizwa minsi uhereye igihe cyafatiwe gusa trump yasobanuye iryo kumira rireba abantu ritareba ibicuruzwa yavuze amerika hagaragaye abantu bake bafite coronavirus kurusha i burayi bityo amerika ikaba igomba gukumira abaturuka i burayi kuko u burayi bwananiwe gukumira abaturuka bushinwa n’ahandi hugarijwe coronavirus trump yavuze kumira ritareba abava bwongereza ndetse n’abanyamerika binjiye i burayi bamaze gusuzumwa screening iri kumira kandi nk’uko byasobanuwe ntirireba u burayi bwose ahubwo rireba ibihugu bikoresha viza shengen austria u bubiligi repubulika check denmark estonia finland u bufaransa u budage u bugereki hongiriya iceland u butaliyani latvia liechtenstein lithuania luxembourg malta u buholandi norvege pologne portugal slovakia slovenia espagne suwede n’u busuwisi trump yavuze cyemezo cyagombaga gufatwa nk’uko hafashwe gukumira abaturuka bushinwa sinzazuyaza gufata ingamba zikenewe kurinda ubuzima n’umutekano w’abanyamerika iteka nzashyira imbere inyungu z’abanyamerika inkuru cnn

title: kwitwara neza buroko gufasha urukiko bimwe bitumye bagaragaza agiye kurekurwa
content: iki cyemezo cyafashwe tariki ukwakira n’umucamanza khalida rachid khan uyobora urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u rwanda tpir gusaba irekurwa bagaragaza michel wakatiwe igihano w’u burayi nyakanga umunyarwanda michel bagaragaza yahoze umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo ocir- ishami ry’icyayi akaba yarafatwaga nk’umwe nkoramutima juvnal habyarimana perezida w’u rwanda yamaze igihe ashakishwa tpir byaha kunoza umugambi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi kugira uruhare jenoside n’ubufatanyacyaha jenoside tariki kanama bagaragaza yishyikirije tpir bwende bwe yitaba urukiko munsi ukurikiyeho ariko ahakana byaha byose yashinjwaga nyuma y’aho bidashobokeye yoherezwa kuburanishirizwa rwanda nyuma kugirana imishyikirano yihariye n’ubushinjacyaha bagaragaza yemeye kuba yaragize uruhare ruziguye jenoside kuko yaremeye intwaro zari zigenewe gukora jenoside zibikwa ruganda rw’icyayi rubaya ndetse akaba yaranaguriraga interahamwe inzoga akanaziha amafaranga yemereye urukiko kandi yahaga interahamwe imodoka z’uruganda bazikoreshe ngendo zabo ariko yongeraho yabikoraga akiza amagara n’umuryango uko gufasha interahamwe bikaba aribyo byatumaga ubushinjacyaha buvuga yazorohereje akazi bigatuma zibasha kwica abantu bahungiye musozi kesho kiliziya nyundo utwo duce twose turi karere rubavu kubera kwemera yaregwaga kubisabira imbabazi imbere y’urukiko tariki
