buroko ernestine musanabera

title: ikipe bizimana djihadi aheruka gusinyira yanyagiwe akayabo k’ibitego
content: ikipe bizimana djihad aherutse gusinyira gihugu cy’ububiligi cyiciro mbere yitwa waasland beveren yanyagiwe ibitego umunani busa sv zulte waregem mikino kamarampaka gushaka amakipe azasohokera gihugu europa league irushanwa kabiri rikomeye burayi nyuma champions league iyi kipe yarangije umwaka w’imikino usanzwe mwanya itsinze imikino icyenda inganya umunani itsindwa gihe club brugge anderlecht zimenyerewe mikino mugabane w’u burayi arizo zari ziyoboye nk’uko bigenda bubiligi amakipe yarangije shampiyona y’icyiciro mbere hagati y’imyanya karindwi yiyongeraho atatu yabaye mbere cyiciro kabiri akaba agashyirwa matsinda abiri rimwe ry’amakipe atandatu buri igahura n’indi mukino ubanza n’uwo kwishyura ikipe irangije iyoboye itsinda a ihura n’iyoboye irya b mukino nyuma itsinze igahura mukino umwe kamarampaka n’ikipe yabaye iya gatanu shampiyona itsinze igahita ikatisha itike kuzakina imikino mugabane w’u burayi europa league waasland-beveren bizimana djihad nayo makipe arwanira tike itsinda a irimo mwanya nyuma mikino umunani ikaba imaze gutsinda umwe inganya ibiri itsindwa itanu mu mukino yakinnye kabiri zulte-waregem iyoboye tsinda yayinyagiye ibitego - byatumye amahirwe kuzagaragara mikino mugabane w’u burayi ayoyoka kuko n’iyo yatsinda imikino isigaje itashyikira iya mbere ifite amanota biteganyijwe bizimana djihad wabanje kugaruka rwanda nyuma yogusinyira kipe amasezerano y’imyaka itatu agomba gusubirayo bitarenze tariki kamena kugira atangirane bagenzi imikino ibanziriza shampiyona y’umwaka utaha pre season’ iyi kipe yashinzwe yitwa red star iza kugenda ihindurirwa amazina kugera yiswe waasland-beveren ntirabasha kwitabira rimwe imikino mugabane w’u burayi ndetse igihe kinini yakimaze byiciro hasi bubiligi abakinnyi zulte waregem bishimira kimwe bitego umunani banyagiye waasland beveren agahinda kari kenshi bakinnyi waasland-beveren nyuma y’umukinowaasland beveren bizimana djihad yanyagiwe ibitego umunani busa mukino gushaka itike kuzitabira europa league yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: urubyiruko rurakangurirwa kugira uruhare rugaragara gahunda z’icyunamo
content: mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru mbere y’amasaha make u rwanda n’isi bitangire kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi umuhuzabikorwa w’inama y’igihugu y’urubyiruko philbert uwiringiyimana yasabye urubyiruko guhagarika gahunda rwari rusanzwe rukora zagaragara nk’izidaha kwibuka agaciro uwiringiyimana yibukije urubyiruko rudakwiye gufata igihe kwibuka nk’igihe kwiryamira cyangwa guhura n’incuti bitwaje bagiye ahabera igikorwa kwibuka abanyamakuru nabo basabwe gufata iya mbere gushyira bikorwa bakangurira abandi umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’inama y’igihugu y’urubyiruko alphonse nkuranga yavuze amateka agomba gusigasirwa n’urubyiruko akabikwa buryo bujyanye n’igihe tugezemo bityo gihe kizaza bakazayasanga ku bijyanye kuba abacitse icumu nkuranga yijeje abari nama inama y’igihugu y’urubyiruko ifasha urubyiruko rwacitse icumu rushaka kwiteza imbere yatanze urugero rw’ishyirahamwe ry’ubuhinzi ry’urubyiruko rwacitse icumu ry’i nyamagabe bahawe inka ebyiri z’inzungu insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka igira iti kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi twigire mateka twubaka ejo hazaza emmanuel n hitimana

title: psg iguze rutahizamu neymar miliyoni euros
content: rutahizamu neymar usanzwe akinira ikipe fc barcelone esipanye amaze kugurwa n’ikipe paris saint germain bufaransa neymar umwe bakinnyi bigaragaje cyane myaka ishize bikaba akarusho mwaka ushize yatsindiye ikipe fc barcelone ibitego birenga ayifasha kwegukana ibikombe bitandukanye yafashije kandi ikipe y’igihugu bresil kwegukana igikombe cy’imikino ngororamubiri cyaberaga gihugu abakunzi ruhago benshi ntibatekerezaga musore yava kipe bitewe n’ubufatanye bukomeye hagati messi ndetse suarez ikipe fc barcelone nayo yabaye nk’itunguwe n’icyemezo cy’uyu musore uyu mwaka barcelone ihugiye kongerera amasezerano lionel messi gusinyisha umutoza wayo mushya ernesto valverde iyi nkuru y’inshamugongo bafana fc barcelone imaze gushimangirwa n’impande zombie amasezerano neymar yasinye amushyize mwanya mbere w’umukinnyi w’umupira w’amaguru uhenze kurusha abandi isi neymar w’imyaka y’amavuko yaguzwe miliyoni euros amafranga akoreshwa mugabane w’uburayi kizigenza fc barcelone lionel messi yahise asohora ubutumwa amushimira ibihe babanye anamwifuriza ibihe byiza psg yanditswe niyomugabomuhaburarw

title: princess priscilla scillah yasohoye indirimbo ikubiyemo inkuru mpamo y’inshuti yahiriwe n’urushako
content: mutima indirimbo ikubiyemo ubutumwa bw’urukundo igaragaza umuntu wihebeye buryo bukomeye hari mukobwa aririmba umwe myanzuro nafashe ntazigera nicuza ukuguha umutima wanjye uwuyobore wibere uwawe butunzi ntabara rukundo ntahara sinibona udahari kukubura biragatsindwa ubuzima bufite injyana kuko ndi kumwe mukunzi avuga ndirimbo scillah yahishuye ishingiye nkuru mpamo y’ubuzima bw’urukundo bw’inshuti ati iyi ndirimbo inkuru mpamo y’inshuti yanjye amaze igihe kingana n’umwaka ashyingiwe twari turi kuganira ambwira ukuntu imana yamugiriye ubuntu agashaka neza umugabo yashatse aricara akumva umutima uterera hanze y’umubiri hari amafoto angaragaza ntwite mashusho y’iyi ndirimbo asobanura nyuma yaho baje kwibaruka umwana mwiza cyane w’umuhungu yishimye cyane agereranya umwana n’umutima iyi ndirimbo nyituye umuntu wese wumva yaba umutware cyangwa umwana yibarutse umutima kuko ababashije kugirirwa ubuntu kwibaruka cyangwa gushaka neza biyumva mu minsi ishize muhanzikazi yavuze atari uzabona igihe kigeze akorere igitaramo rwanda yishimane n’abakunzi b’ibihangano bye dore yigaruriye benshi scillah uherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo yise ’ihumure’ yavuze agiye gusohora indirimbo nyinshi album mbere izaba iriho indirimbo zakozwe n’aba-producers batandukanye barimo lick lick umunya-kenya giggz n’abandi batandukanye uyu muhanzikazi yakunzwe rwanda ndirimbo icyo mbarusha’ nka paradizo’ ntacyadutanya yafatanyije the ben’ nkeneye umukunzi’ itangazo’ mbabarira’ n’izindi nyinshi zitandukanye yerekeje leta zunze ubumwe amerika tariki kanama yagiye gukomereza amasomo kaminuza yiga ibijyanye n’inozabubanyi international relations gusa nyuma yaje kuvangamo n’ibijyanye n’umuziki azarangiza kwiga mwaka

title: uburayi bugiye gukemura ibibazo biri hagati apple samsung
content: izi nganda ziregana kwibana uburenganzira bumenyi bwite droit de la proprit intellectuelle bikoresho bikoreshwa gukora amatelefone agendanywa apple ivuga samsung yayibye bimwe bikoresho ndetse n’ubumenyi bwakoreshejwe gukora telephone ndetse mudasobwa ntoya igendanywa tablet samsung glaxy ibi byageze kure kuko minsi ishize apple yigeze gusaba bikoresho samsung byavanywa isoko bihugu b’iburayi iyi akaba nayo mpamvu nyamukuru yatumye komisiyo burayi yiyemeza gukora ubushakashatsi kibazo kugira ukuri kujye ahagaragara ubu iperereza ryahereye koreya y’amajyepfo uruganda samsung rukomoka nk’uko umuhanga bijyanye n’uburenganzira bumenyi bwite florian mueller yabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru by’ubwongereza si gusa kuko nganda zinafitanye ibibazo bijyanye n’uburenganzira gucuruza droit de licence ibicuruzwa byabo uruganda apple rukorera amerika rukaba rukora ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bwoko ipod iphone hamwe ipad uru ruganda rwatangiye gukora imirimo yarwo taliki mbere mata leta california rutangira rwitwa apple computer inc ruza guhindurirwa izina rwitwa apple inc taliki mbere mutarama nyuma y’iminsi mirongo itatu ruvutse uruganda samsung urwo koreya y’amajyepfo rukaba ruhereye mujyi samsung ahitwa seoul rwatangiye gukora mwaka w’ ubu urwo ruganda rukorana n’izindi nganda zikomeye isi izo nganda sony dell hp verizon communications att ndetse apple inc bafitanye ibibazo anne marie niwemwiza

title: nta ngaruka n’imwe u rwanda ruzaterwa n’abarusebya perezida kagame
content: mu ijambo rye ritangiza icyunamo kwibuka abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi u rwanda cyatangiye gatandatu tariki perezida paul kagame yasezeranyije abanyarwanda leta n’inzego ishamikiyeho bizakora ibishoboka byose kugira inzira y’iterambere u rwanda rwihaye idahagarara perezida paul kagame yagize nababwiraga mahirwe miliyoni miliyoni mahirwe bafitemo kugira badusubize inyuma kuko bidashoboka ntibishoboka ntabwo bishoboka muri jambo yavuze ndimi ebyiri icyongereza n’ikinyarwanda umukuru w’igihugu yibajije impamvu ibihugu byitwa byateye imbere demokarasi ntacyo bikora bigeze imbere y’ubutabera abakoze jenoside bidegembya mijyi yabyo gihe u rwanda rwibuka yavuze n’iyo babafashe babikora nyirarureshwa nyuma y’igihe gito bakabarekura gihe bihugu batewe byiyambaza isi kugira ibifashe guhangana n’abagizi nabi kagame yakomeje agira ntabwo byakumvikana impamvu banyarwanda cyangwa bandi dufitanye isano nk’abanyafurika bitagenda bityo bivuze wenda agaciro k’abanyarwanda cyangwa abanyafurika gato perezida w’u rwanda yasoje ijambo rye asaba abanyarwanda gukomeza kugira imbaraga gukomeza gufatanya kugira bakomeze guhangana n’ibibazo bahura kubaka ubuzima bwabo emmanuel n hitimana

title: umukobwa yagize ikiniga miss rwanda ararira - video
content: annastasha ashely umukobwa waje kwitabira amarushanwa miss rwanda ahatanira guhagararira umujyi kigali gatandatu tariki ukuboza yafashwe n’ikiniga ararira imbere y’abagize akanama nkemurampaka annastasha ashely umukobwa waje kwitabira amarushanwa miss rwanda ahatanira guhagararira umujyi kigali gatandatu tariki ukuboza yafashwe n’ikiniga ararira imbere y’abagize akanama nkemurampaka uyu mukobwa yamaze igihe kirekire imbere y’abagize akanama nkemurampaka abazwa ibibazo ariko agasubiza agaragara nk’ufite ubwoba bwinshi ndetse bigera n’aho byanga amarira arashoka uyu mukobwa wasobanuye abiterwa kuba atamenyereye kujya imbere y’imbaga y’abantu benshi yaje guhabwa amazi n’umwe bagize akanama nkemurampaka anywaho hanyuma akomeza gusubiza ibibazo yabazwaga reba video uko byari byifashe hano

title: gisagara umugabo n’umwana w’imyaka bishwe batemaguwe
content: ntezirembo jean w’imyaka n’umwana witwaga kwizera jean de dieu kagali nyaruteja murenge nyanza karere gisagara bishwe batemaguwe nyuma umugabo akorerwa iyica rubozo ritamenyerewe nzeli uwo bivugwa yabahitanye yitwa niyibizi jean damascene abaturage n’ubuyobozi bakaba bemeza gihe cyashize arwaye mutwe ariko bakaba bazi yakize abageze niyibizi yakoreye mahano bavuga yateye icyuma ntezirembo akanamutemesha umuhoro yitwaje yerekeza murima ngo nyuma kumutemagura akica umwana wahuye ihene yagarutse aca umutwe nteziyaremye awumanika muhanda ahari iteme ni amakuru ubuyobozi bw’umurenge buvuga ababaje bikaba byatumye niyibizi ahita asubizwa bitaro by’indwara mutwe caraes ndera mujyi kigali niyibizi yabyukanye icyuma ahuye ntezirembo ajya guhinga arakimutera ariko cyanga kwinjira noneho amwambura umuhoro afite amutema imipaga myinshi ako kanya abona akana gashoreye ihene atema ihene arakomeza arakirukankana nako aragatema karapfa aya amwe magambo izubarirasherw twatangarijwe n’uwitwa misigaro theoneste uvuga nyuma kwica nyakwigendera niyibizi yanagarutse agafata umupanga akaza agaca ijosi rye akarishyira iteme riri niyibizi yaje gufatwa n’abaturage yashakaga gutera rundi rugo avuga bimubabaje kuba atashoboye gutema abanyeshuri bava ishuri hategekimana emmanuel aragira tukimara kumufata yaravuze ntabwo arangije mudugudu ashigajemo arabavuga arabarangiza abaturage bavuga mahano yaje atunguranye kuko nubwo niyibizi yigeze kurwara mutwe bazi atakirwaye kuko amaze amezi atandatu ahagaritse imiti umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’umurenge nyanza uwimana jean bosco yabwiye izubarirashe mu by’ukuri niyibizi twe twari twamujyanye muganga mwaka bamutugarurira amaze imyaka batwereka yakize kandi imiti yayifataga ariko biragoye kumenya iby’umuntu ufite ikibazo mutwe uwimana avuga ibyakozwe niyibizi byatumye ubuyobozi batekereza bandi bantu bafite ikibazo mutwe bakaba bamaze kubona mudugudu bityo bakaba bagiye kuvuzwa avuga abaturage bakwiye kujya bakurikirana bakareba uwagiye kuvuzwa yarakize koko kugira bigaragaye yateza ikibazo asubizwe muganga hakarebwa mutwe bitarahindutse buryo yateza ibindi bibazo ati tugiye gukurikirana imyitwarire y’umuntu wese waba yaragize ikibazo mutwe turebe imyitwarire dukoresheje gahunda menya nkumenye avuga kandi abarwayi mutwe bakuwe muganga bagiye gusaba kujya babasuzuma nibura nyuma y’amezi hazirikanwa ibisazi atari indwara ikira nk’izindi inkuru izubarirasherw

title: ikinyabupfura n’ubunyamwuga musanganywe bizabafashe gukomeza kuzamura ibendera ry’u rwanda-digp felix namuhoranye
content: umuyobozi mukuru wungirije polisi y’u rwanda ushinzwe ibikorwa digpops felix namuhoranye yahaga impanuro itsinda ry’abapolisi b’u rwanda bagiye butumwa kubungabunga amahoro gihugu repubulika santarafurika yabasabye kuzakomeza kurangwa n’ikinyabupfura gukora kinyamwuga rwego gukomeza kuzamura ibendera ry’u rwanda ruhando rw’amahanga aba bapolisi nabo bamwijeje bazaharanira hatazagaragara icyasha cyangwa kidobya yatuma u rwanda rugaragara nabi mahanga incident free ikiganiro cyabaye kabiri tariki mutarama kibereye cyicaro gikuru polisi y’u rwanda kacyiru tsinda ry’abapolisi bagiye bayobowe senior superintendent of police ssp valens muhabwa ubwo yaganirizaga polisi digp felix namuhoranye yabagaragarije kugeza u rwanda rufite isura nziza mahanga bitewe n’uko abapolisi barwo bitwara bagiye butumwa kubungabunga amahoro ndetse n’iyo rwanda yabasabye kuzakomereza bagenzi bagejeje bazamura ibendera ry’u rwanda ndetse nibiba ngombwa bazashyireho akarusho kabo yagize mugiye muhagarariye igihugu nicyo kibatumye nta burenganzira mufite gutuma intambwe yatewe n’abababanjirije isubira inyuma igito mwakora ugukomereza abandi bakoze ariko mwebwe mushobora gushyiraho akarusho buryo n’abandi bazabasimbura bazabigenderaho mugomba gushyiraho uburyo butuma hatazaba icyasha cyatuma mugaragara nabi kuko n’igihugu cyaba kigaragaye nabi yakomeje ababwira byose bazabigeraho bitewe n’uko polisi y’u rwanda isanganywe indangagaciro z’ikinyabupfura gukora kinyamwuga ati ikinyabupfura n’ubunyamwuga ibintu bizwi polisi y’u rwanda kandi ingenzi biri bushobozi bwacu kandi bisanzwe bituranga dufite tuzwi n’amahanga bijyanye n’ikinyabupfura ndetse gukora kinyamwuga ntimuzabisubize inyuma ku kinyabupfura digp namuhoranye yabasabye umupolisi agomba kuba agomba kuba gukora ikintu gihe cyacyo ibyo kandi bikagaragarira buryo avuga agenda yambara akora n’ibindi yabagaragarije ubunyamwuga polisi y’u rwanda bugaragarira buhamya bw’amahanga baragiye kugarura amahoro bavuga barinzwe n’abapolisi b’u rwanda imitima iba gitereko bizeye barinzwe neza yabibukije akazi bagiyemo bazagahuriramo n’imbogamizi zitandukanye ariko ntizizatume bacogora kinyabupfura n’ubunyamwuga ati muzahura n’uruhurirane rw’ibintu byinshi bibageraho bikabagora kazistress hari imiterere y’igihugu ubwacyo imitwe yitwara gisirikare imico y’abantu batandukanye kiriya gihugu kugira mubitsinde ugushyira umutima bitekerezo byiza aba bapolisi icyikiro gatanu cy’abapolisi b’u rwanda bashinzwe kurinda abayobozi bakuru gihugu repubulika santarafurika ndetse n’abakozi b’umuryango w’abibumbye bagiye gusimbura bagenzi nabo bamaze umwaka butumwa nk’ubwo bazaba bakorera murwa mukuru w’iki gihugu bangui chief editor muhaburarw

title: ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ibitangazamakuru rwanda bitarabasha kumenya uburyo kwiteza imbere
content: ntwari bnathandirector of mcrd unit mhc basura radio y’abaturage karongiphotosarongo richard ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’itangazamakuru mhc mibereho y’ibitangazamakuru n’ababikoramo hano rwanda bwagaragaje ibitangazamakuru bitarabasha kumenya uburyo kwiteza imbere kuzamura u rwego rw’abakozi babyo murugendo shuli konzwe n’abanyamakuru batandukanye rwanda kuwa mata baka rukorera karere karongi kugirango bigire radiyo y’abatuge yabashije gukoresha bike ikagera kuribyinshi aho yatangiranye ibikoresho bifite agaciro k’amafaranga miriyoni makumyabiri neshanu frw ikaba igeze miriyoni frw ikigo cy’igihugu cy’itangazamakuru mhc mibereho y’ibitangazamakuru n’ababikoramo hano rwanda cyahisimo ibitangaza makuru kunjya gufata urugero rwiza radio y’abaturage yagezeho ibitangazamakuru rwanda byaba ibyandikaradiyo televiziyo biragenda byiyongera bitandukanye n’uko byari mbere gusa uku kwiyongera nti kujyana n’iterambere ryabyo ndetse kubo bikoresha mpamvu z’uko byinshi bidakora inyigo ihamye y’icyo bishaka kugeraho bigatuma bikomeza guhomba ndetse bimwe bikanafunga burundu n’ikibazo gituruka bafite ibitangazamakuru badakora inyigo ihamye igaragaza neza imibereho n’uburyo bw’iterambere bw’igitangazamakuru bityo ugasanga batangira guhura n’ibibazo by’ubukene ikubitiro umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa mhc peacemaker mbungiramihigo yasabye nyir’ibitangazamakuru kumenya bashaka n’abo bakorera kugira birinde ibihombo hato hato yagize urabona benshi mwe muhitamo kwandika cyangwa kuvuga ibijyanye n’ibyo mushaka ariko ntimubanza mumenye mukorera bashaka abe aribyo mukora bituma mukomeza kubura amasoko bityo guhemba mukoresha bikabagora jorome rwasa asobanurira abanyamakuru ibyiza bamaze kugeraho yakomeje abasaba kwirinda umuco usa n’uwahawe intebe itangazamakuru ushingiye gukoresha abakozi batarinjira neza mwuga w’itangazamakuru bigishirizwa kazi kubera gutinya kuzana abakozi b’umwuga bigatuma ibitangazamakuru bidakurura abakiriya rimwe rimwe bigakora ibihabanye n’amabwiriza agenga itangazamakuru rwanda ba nyir’ibitangazamakuru bagaragaje imbogamizi bahura nazo zirimo kuba buvugizi bakorerwa kuba amahirwe abonetse ajya bimwe bitangazamakuru n’ikibashije kwibeshaho mbungiramihigo yabijeje ubufatanye gukora ubuvugizi bishoboka ariko nabo bagashyira imbaraga bakora kugerageza kuzuza inshingano zabo bashyira ngiro amasezerano bagirana n’abakozi ubushakashatsi mhc bugaragaza ibitangazamakuru byandika bidafite imishinga ishobora kubigoboka gihe hatabonetse amatangazo yamamaza aturuka leta ibi bituma kwitunga gutunga abakozi babyo bigorana buryo basabwa guhindura imikorera kwigira bandi kugira babashe kubaho buryo burambye ikigo cy’igihugu cy’itangazamakuru mhc mibereho y’ibitangazamakuru n’ababikoramo hano rwanda bwagaragaje ibitangazamakuru bitarabasha kumenya uburyo kwiteza imbere kuzamura u rwego rw’abakozi babyo ko bakwiye kwigira radio y’ abaturage karongi peacemaker mbungiramihigo yashimiye umuyobozi radio jorome rwasa mubuhamya umuyobozi radio jorome rwasa tanze yavuze bitari byoroshye gutangira bafite ibikoresho gusa nabyo arinkunga bagatangira abakozi babiri habayeho gukora cyane kutarangamira inkunga leta ndetse kwagura amaso bakareba kure kubindi byara amafaranga ikigo cy’igihugu cy’itangazamakuru mhc mibereho y’ibitangazamakuru cyahare radio y’abaturage seretifika y’ishwemwe kimwe mubitangazamakuru byabashije gukoresha bicye cyikaba cyimaze kugera byinshi ubu radio y’abaturage karongi iritegura kubaka etaje nivo eshatuyanditswe sarongo richardmuhaburarw

title: ngoma ewsa irihanangiriza abazamuye ibiciro by’amazi

title: minisitiri biruta avuga umushinga ugamije guhangana n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere uzazamura imibereho y’abaturage
content: minisitiri w’ibidukikije dr vincent biruta yijeje abaturage murenge itandukanye igize akarere gicumbiko umushinga w’iterambere ry’icyaro rishingiye bukungu butabangamira ibidukikije kandi bw’ihanganira imihindagurikire y’ibiheuje igisubizo kuko usibye guhangana n’ ibiza bikunze kwibasira ubuzima bwabo bazaboneramo n’akazi ibi minisitiri biruta yabigarutseho gatandatu tariki ukwakira gikorwa cy’umuganda usoza ukwezi rwego rw’igihugu wabereye karere gicumbi ahanatangirijwe umushinga w’iterambere ry’icyaro rishingiye bukungu butabangamira ibidukikije kandi bw’ihanganira imihindagurikire y’ibihe uyu mushinga uzatwara miliyari zirenga mirongo z’amadorari y’amanyamerika uzafasha buryo bufatika abaturage ibihumbi ikubitiro ukazamara imyaka itandatu byibuze mirenge igize akarere gicumbi ituwe n’abaturage ibihumbi abagera batunzwe n’ubuhinziimiterere y’aka karere igizwe ahanini n’imisozi ihanamye yorohereza amazi gutemba ntankomyi akangiriza abaturage serugendo claude ngabowera daniel m urenge cyumba baravuga uburyo isuri yibasira imirima kugeza yimura abaturage bakajya gutuzwa ahandi serugendo atiisuri ituruka ruguru hari igihe iza byinshi ikamanur amatarasi twakozehari n’igihe yatwaye umuntu umwe ndetse n’ikindi gihe hano hari huzuye niki cyayi cyose cyabuze ngabowera atidore naha abantu bimutsemo kubera impamvu z’iyi surihano hari hatuye abantu barahimurwa bajya gutuzwa ahandi umuyobozi w’akarere gicumbi ndayambaje felix ashimangira ibiza bikunze kwibasira aka karere arinayo mpamvu yingamba zirambye zigenda zifatwa muguhanga n’ingarukaaha aratanga ishusho y’uburyo ibiza byangije gihembwe cy’iginga gishize atihegitari zigera bihumbi bitanu n’ijana cumi n’ebyiri ha zarangiritse byagize ingaruka twagiye dukorana n’uruganda mulindi dusha ibisubizo ariko bikaba ibisubizo bitarambye minisitiri w’ibidukikije dr vincent biruta avuga kubufatanye bw’ikigega gishinzwe imihindagurikire y’ibihe bitanga ikizere guhangana n’ibikibangamiye imihindagurikire y’ibihe ashingiye mirimo izibandwaho kandi bikazafasha abaturage batari bake kutagerwaho n’ibiza nako bibazamura mibereho myiza buri munsi atiharimo ibikorwa byinshi birimo gukora amaterasi y’indinganiregutera ibiti bivangwa n’imyakagutera amashyamba kuyavugurura ndetse hari n’igice kwimura abaturage bagera batuye manegeka bakazatuzwa mudugudu ugezweho kandi wubatse buryo ubasha guhangana n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe ikindi tugashaka n’uburyo twafasha abaturage b’aha ndetse n’uruganda rw’icyayi kureba ubundi buryo bakoresha guteka cyangwa gutunganya icyayi batangirije amashyamba

title: perezida kagame yahishuye icyasubitse inama eac yagombaga gufatira hamwe ingamba guhashya coronavirus
content: perezida kagame yavuze impamvu yatumye abakuru b’ibihugu by’umuryango afurika y’iburasirazuba eac batagiranye inama yiga ngamba zihuriweho kurwanya icyorezo coronavirus karere ashimangira ubufatanye gukemura kibazo rusange nzira nziza perezida kagame yavuze eac ikeneye gushyira hamwe guhangana coronavirus mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye mbere perezida kagame yavuze icyorezo coronavirus cyagera karere rwego eac hari inama zagiye zikorwa zirimo iy’abaminisitiri b’ubuzima n’abashinzwe ibikorwa by’umuryango kandi bemeranyije ingamba rusange kurwanya icyorezo iyi nama yafatiwemo ingamba kwirinda ikwirakwira coronavirus gushyiraho ingamba guhangana n’ingaruka yateza karere ibihugu binyamuryango byasabwe korohereza amakamyo n’imodoka zitwaye ibicuruzwa ndetse bigashyiraho uburyo gusuzuma ababitwaye mipaka yabyo perezida kagame yavuze ngamba zidahagije kuko hagikenewe izindi nama n’imbaraga zihuriweho kurwanya icyorezo karere nayo mpamvu abakuru b’ibihugu bagerageje kugirana inama batange umurongo ngenderwaho ariko ntibikunde ati ntiyabayeho kuko umubare w’ibihugu bitatu bitewe n’inzira zikoreshwa eac ibihugu binyamuryango byose bigomba kuboneka nama igiye kuba ibyo ntabwo byabaye kuko abahagarariye ibihugu bitatu batabashije kwihuza n’abandi twese dusigaye nama perezida kagame yakomeje avuga bushake kongera gukora inama y’abakuru eac bwakomeje nshuro kabiri kugira inama ibe yindi tariki inyuze buri wese ariko nanone bikagaragara n’umwe witeguye kuyitabira ati mu by’ukuri hano twashegeshwe cyane n’inzira gukoramo inama kuruta ikibazo gihari mu yandi magambo inshingano duhuriyeho ndetse n’ikibazo dufite inzira gukora ikintu runaka zigirwa iz’ibanze kurenza ikibazo gihari perezida kagame kandi yavuze hari ibindi bibazo umuryango eac ukwiriye gukoranaho ugashakira ibisubizo binyuze koroherezanya gushyira hamwe cyane cyane bijyanye n’ibikorwa byambukiranya umupaka nk’amakamyo n’abayatwara ibihugu eac bikomeje guhura n’imbogamizi ikomeye y’ubwiyongere bw’abatwara amakamyo yambukiranya imipaka n’ababafasha bakomeje kwandura icyorezo coronavirus bwinshi perezida kagame yagize nk’uko mwabibonye ruhande rw’u rwanda turimo kubona kibazo mu gihe twafashe ingamba kucyitaho guhagarika virus by’ukuri turabizi twari dufite abantu benshi bakize kuruta abakirwaye abari kato ariko buryo butunguranye ibikorwa byambukiranya imipaka byazanye indi mibare byihuse kandi turimo kugerageza guhangana ku rundi ruhande ariko umukuru w’igihugu avuga nta buryo bwiza guhangana burenze kubinyuza butwererane n’akarere gushyira hamwe kumvikana umwe wundi kugira dukemure kibazo duhuriyeho perezida kagame yasubije ababona kuba eac idashyira hamwe gushakira igisubizo icyorezo coronavirus byaba biterwa n’icyuho buyobozi bwayo arangaje imbere yavuze afite inshingano nk’umuyobozi kimwe bihugu binyamuryango ndetse akanaba umuyobozi eac ariko kuba umuyobozi w’umuryango uba ufite inzitizi runaka zikubuza gukora byinshi wagakoze nubwo waba ushaka kubikora’ yashimangiye nubwo uba umuyobozi eac ibihugu bikomeza kwiyobora ubwabyo buryo bubinogeye ariko asanga gukorera hamwe kugira bihangane n’ikibazo kibyugarije ingenzi kuruta ibindi byose kugeza rwanda abanduye coronavirus bamaze kuba gihe bayikize ntawe irahitana mu burundi bamaze kuba umwe niwe wapfuye bane barayikize muri tanzania abanduye abapfuye bamaze kuyikira uganda abanduye barayikize ntawe irahitana muri sudani y’epfo batandatu wurayikira cyangwa apfe ayizize muri kenya yarabishe bamaze kuyikira srcigihe

content: aba basore bakora akazi kubika gushyingura neza inyandiko n’ibindi bivuga mamateka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda bagiye kwiga uburyo amateka jenoside rwanda yashyingurwa buryo bugezweho cyane cyane kubika amateka buryo bw’amashusho n’amajwi iki kigo gifite uburambe kubika ubutumwa bw’amajwi amashusho ndetse n’inyandiko birebana n’amateka jenoside umuyobozi w’iyi fondasiyo karen jungblut ukurikirana mushinga gukusanya amateka jenoside rwanda yatangajeko mubyo umubano w’ibi bigo uzibandaho harimo guhana ubuhamya kugirango amateka jenoside amenyekane kw’isi bateganya gushaka amajwi n’amashusho bijyanye jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda nayo ashyirwe bubiko bw’iki kigo kuko kugeza bafite ubuhamya bwanditse gusa nabwo bwaje kinyarwanda bikagerageza kubushyira zindi ndimi ikigo mpuzamahanga shoah foundation ntigiharanira inyungu kikaba gikora ubushakashatsi bijyanye n’amateka jenoside ibikorwa kwibuka abaguye ntambara kabiri y’isi iki kigo kivuga kigamije ukugerageza gufasha abantu kurenga ibibazo by’urwikekwe kugira imitima ibababarira hagati y’umwaka w’ muryango wabashije kwakira ubuhamya bw’abantu bihugu bagiye barokoka buryo butandukanye marie jose ikibasumba

title: australie yaciye agahigo kugira internet yihuta kurusha izindi isi
content: itsinda ryo kaminuza yitwa monash swinburne rmit niryo ryakoze bushakashatsi ryifashishije agakoresho gato bashyize muyoboro ukoreshwa guhanahana amakuru itumanaho rikoreshwa mujyi melbourne ako gakoresho bagashyize muyoboro usanzwe ukoreshwa n’ikigo cy’igihugu australie gishinzwe umuyoboro internet ariwo wakoreraho ubushakashatsi aba bahanga bavuze gihe cy’imyaka ibiri cyangwa itatu bene ako gakoresho kazaba kaboneka buryo kakoreshwa bushakashatsi hanyuma gihe cy’imyaka itanu kagatangira gucuruzwa magingo singapore niyo icuruza internet yihuta kurusha izindi zose umuturage ashobora kugura internet imuha megabyte mbps isegonda ubusanzwe australie ikigereranyo cy’uburyo internet yihuta kiri mbps igenda gahoro nibura inshuro ugereranyije n’iyo bashakashatsi babonye igerageza ryabo iyo internet babonye ihesha umuntu kuyikoresho ubushobozi kuba yamanura download filimi nibura zifite amashusho hd gihe cy’isegonda nko bwongereza ho umuyoboro mugari internet uvuduka kigero mbps ako gakoresho bifashishije kugira babone internet kari bwoko bumwe n’akifashishwa miyoboro migari internet fibre-optique hirya hino isi ibyavuye bushakashatsi byatanze isura y’uko gihe kiri imbere internet izaba imeze hirya hino isi

title: amerika yifatanyije n’abanyarwanda kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika tariki rigira riti twifatanyije n’abanyarwanda rusange n’abacitse icumu by’umwihariko ndetse n’abasizwe iheruheru jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda bihe by’umubabaro batewe kubura ababo mu rwego kwifatanya n’abanyarwanda gusubiza icyubahiro abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika ziratangaza zizakomeza gukorana neza n’u rwanda guteza imbere abanyarwanda baharanira ubwisanzure n’uburenganzira bw’abanyagihugu buramba ubutabera bugahabwa intebe buryo amahanga azabibona kandi akabyishimira nubwo abanyarwanda banyuze bihe bitoroshye leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika zinezezwa cyane n’uburyo abanyarwanda bakomeje kurangwa n’ubutwari bakivana bihe banyuzemo bagakura amaboko mifuka bagakora kandi bakaba bamaze kwiteza imbere nk’uko umuvugizi minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika yabivuze uwo muvugizi yongeyeho leta zunze ubumwe z’amelika zigira byinshi banyarwanda cyane cyane uburyo baharaniye kwivana bihe bikomeye nk’ibyo guharanira amahoro n’imbere heza ndetse n’imibereho myiza y’abana b’igihugu yuma gusohoka jenoside u rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe igaragara nzego zose haba buzima burezi buhinzi rwego kuzamura iterambere ry’igihugu n’imiyoborere myiza ibyo bigaragara buryo u rwanda ruhagaze neza mahoro n’umutekano kugeza n’aho abanyarwanda bageze rwego kubungabunga amahoro bindi bihugu kandi n’ubukungu bwarwo bukaba buhagaze neza nk’uko iryo tangazo rikomeza ribivuga muri iryo tangazo kandi leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika zivuga zishimira iterambere u rwanda rumaze kugeraho kandi n’imikoranire hagati y’ibihugu byombi igenda neza buryo bazakomeza gushyiramo imbaraga kwagura ibikorwa anne marie niwemwiza

title: umuganda inyunganizi ngengo y’imari y’igihugu
content: kimwe n’indi myaka yashize mwaka - wakozwemo ibikorwa binyuranye by’umuganda gihugu hose birimo guhanga imihanda y’imigenderano gutinda amateme kubaka amazu y’abatishoboye kubaka amashuli y’uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka ybe kubaka ubwiherero kubaka ibigega guhunikamo imyaka gucukura imyobo guteramo ibiti gutera ibiti kubaka ibiro by’utugari gucukura ibyobo bifata amazi n’ibindi ibikorwa byose byakozwe bikaba byarahawe agaciro kangana y’amafaranga y’u rwanda nk’uko bigaragara rapport yashyizwe ahagaragara minaloc italiki mbere nzeli n’ubwo ibikorwa byakozwe bifite agaciro kanini gihugu hose ariko ntibyabujije hakorwa ibarura rigamije kumenya ubwitabire buri ntara muri raporo baragaragaza umujyi kigali hamwe n’intara y’uburengerazuba ziri mwanya nyuma n’ubwitabire bungana akaba nazo zifite ubwitabire buri hasi ugereranyije n’izindi ntara gihe intara y’amajyaruguru mwanya mbere n’ubwitabire igakurikirwa n’intara y’amajyepfo ifite intara y’uburasirazuba ikaza mwanya gatatu n’ubwitabire bungana aha intara zititwaye neza zikaba zisabwa kwikubita agashyi nyuma kumenya ubwitabire buhagaze gihugu hose barebye intara yakoze ibikorwa bifite agaciro kanini intara y’iburasirazuba iza isonga n’ibikorwa bifite agaciro kangana z’amafaranga y’u rwanda gihe umujyi kigali uza mwanya nyuma n’ibikorwa bifite agaciro kangana z’amanyarwanda aha kugira agaciro k’ibikorwa by’umuganda karusheho kuzamuka abakoze raporo berekanye hari ibintu by’ingenzi bitatu bigomba kwitabwaho ubwitabire bw’abaturage umurava buri wese witabiriye igenamigambi rinoze kandi risesengura neza ibikorwa by’ingenzi bifitiye abaturage n’igihugu rusange akamaro si gusa ariko byakozwe kuko mpera z’ukwezi werurwe minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu yatangije amarushanwa y’ibikorwa by’umuganda nshuro kabiri akaba yarashyiriweho kugirango atere imbaraga n’ubushake abaturage barusheho gukunda kwitabira ibikorwa by’umuganda benshi binyuze muco guhiga guhanga udushya umurenge kavumu karere ngororero intara y’uburengerazuba akaba waje mwanya mbere rwego rw’igihugu ubikesha urugomero rw’amashanyarazi rwubatswe n’abaturage bakabasha kwivana icuraburindi ku mwanya kabiri haje umurenge musange karere nyamagabeintara y’amajyepfo wahinze inanasi buso bungana ha bikazabafasha kwikura bukene ku mwanya gatatu hari umurenge manyagiro karere gicumbi intara y’amajyaruguru abaturage bawutuyemo bubatse amazu y’abahejwe inyuma n’amateka rwego kubafasha kwiteza imbere batura heza uretse ibikorwa byakozwe muganda rusange kandi raporo irerekana ibindi byakozwe n’ingabo polisi cyumweru army week police week n’ibindi byakozwe n’abanyarwanda banyuranye nzego zitandukanye hari kandi n’ibyakorewe mahanga babaga butumwa rwego kumenyekanisha umuco mwiza igihugu cyacu gifite aha twavuga ingabo z’u rwanda butumwa bw’amahoro bw’umuryango w’abibumbye majyaruguru darfur ahitwa el-fasher batangizaga umuganda buri kwezi bafatanyije n’ingabo z’ibindi bihugu ziri butumwa nyuma y’umuganda hagendaga habaho ibiganiro bitandukanye bigamije gukangurira abaturage kwitabira gahunda leta hamwe kugira uruhare bikorwa bibakorerwa batanga umusanzu wabo rwego kwiyubakira igihugu cyane cyagerwaho content: iyo koperative yavutse mwaka yashimiwe kuba ifite inzego zubatse neza buryo byubahirije amategeko agenga amakoperative rwanda kandi ikaba yariteje imbere ndetse n’abanyamuryango hon mudidi emmanuel ukuriye komisiyo yagize twagiye ahantu henshi tuhasanga ibibazo ariko hano tuhasanze ibisubizo ibi biduhaye morale dukurikije inzego zubatse mukurikiza amategeko izo ntumwa rubanda zahamagariye abanyamuryango koperative abakundakawa rushashi kugana umurenge-sacco kuko zabafasha kurushaho gutera imbere kandi umutekano w’amafaranga ukaba wizewe ijana ijana abanyamuryango b’iyo koperative bagejeje badepite ikibazo kutagira inzu bwite gukoreramo ariko bakaba barimo gusaba akarere ikibanza kubakamo ibyagezweho koperative koperative abakundakawa rushashi yongereye umusaruro uva toni mwaka zagurishijwe miliyoni none igeze toni zinjije miliyoni zisaga mwaka mu rwego guteza imbere abanyamuryango bayo kongera ifumbire gufumbira ikawa bakagera ikawa y’umwimerere koperative yatanze inka z’inzungu zisaga banyamuryango ihene ndetse n’ingurube nk’uko rucamumakuba jean marie vianney umuyobozi w’inama y’ubutegetsi abitangaza akomeza avuga kubera imikorere myiza iranga koperative koperative yasabye inguzanyo miliyoni mwaka none yarangije kuzishyura inunguka miliyoni yaguze imodoka daihatsu miliyoni kugeza kawa gihe ruganda mu irushanwa kawa abakundakawa rushashi begukanye umwanya gatatu gihugu cyose koperative abakundakawa rushashi ikorera kagari kageyo murenge rushashi igizwe n’abanyamuryango bagera yatangiye mwaka iza guhinduka koperative nshimiyimana leonard

title: hagiye kuba ibirori by’imbonekarimwe bizahuza ibyamamare nyarwanda n’abafana
content: miss sandra teta miss vanessa uwase raissa bageze kure imyiteguro y’ibirori mbonekarimwe bizaba mpera z’iki cyumweru bikazahuza ibyamamare nyarwanda ngeri zitandukanye n’abafana miss sandra teta miss vanessa uwase raissa bageze kure imyiteguro y’ibirori mbonekarimwe bizaba mpera z’iki cyumweru bikazahuza ibyamamare nyarwanda ngeri zitandukanye n’abafana abahanzi bakora muzika abakinnyi filime abakinnyi b’umupira w’amaguru abanyamakuru n’abandi bantu bafite bahuriye n’imikino n’imyidagaduro bazahurira birori bishimane hagati ariko nanone bazishimana n’abakunzi cyangwa abafana basigarane urwibutso rwiza rw’ibihe byiza bazaba bagiranye ibi birori kandi bizabamo n’umwanya guhemba bamwe bahanzi abanyamakuru abakinnyi filime n’abandi bitanga bagakora cyane bijyanye n’imyidagaduro bakaba bazagenerwa ishimwe rizatangirwa birori muri birori kandi abahanzi knowless charly nina active bazasusurutsa abazabyitabira bizatangira saa kumi n’imwe z’umugoroba kwinjira bikazaba amafaranga y’u rwanda aho bizabera hitwa beirut i kibagabaga

title: umutoza w’ikipe argentina yahishuye impamvu lionel messi atari kwitwara neza gikombe cy’isi
content: umutoza w’ikipe argentina jorge sampaoli yatangaje impamvu ikomeye gutuma lionel messi atitwara neza gikombe cy’isi kiri kubera burusiya yavuze ikiri gutuma cyamamare kititwara neza bagenzi batari rwego hejuru ndetse batigeze bakora cyane anavuga kandi imbaraga zabo messi ariko mukino yabuze ibi sampaoli yabitangaje nyuma kwandagazwa n’ikipe croatia mukino kabiri w’itsinda d ibatsinze ibitego - mukino lionel messi atigeze atera ishoti rimwe rigana izamu cyangwa hanze yaryo kuko abasore croatia bamunize karahava sampaoli yavuze bagenzi messi rwego hasi ndetse ntibanabashije gukorana avuga kandi imbaraga argantine messi sampaoli yagize kubera ubuhanga buke bw’abakinnyi argentinabyatumye messi atigaragazamessi ntiyabashije kwigaragaza kubera bagenzi batabashije gukorana naweimbaraga zacu leoariko ntitwabashije kumubonatwashatse gukina nk’ikipe tukamuha imipira ariko twari duhanganye baduhagaritsebirababaje cyane uyu mukinnyi w’icyamamare yavuzwe cyane n’itamgazamakuru ryo gihugu cye bagiye bavuga atakiri messikongeraho numero ahubwo nimero ukuyemo messiumwe bakanyujijeho ruhago wanatwaye igikombe cy’isi argantine yatwaye witwa jorge valdanoyavuze argantine yakinaga nk’iyitarimo messi argentina mazi abira kuko iceland ibashije kwitwara neza ishobora gutuma kigugu cyageze mukino nyuma gikombe cy’isi giheruka gisezererwa matsinda nkuko byagenze argentina isigaranye umukino umwe izakina nigeria gusa amahirwe yayo gukomeza hasi cyane kuko byose bizaterwa n’uko iceland nigeria bazitwara messi byamuyobeye nyuma kwandagazwa croatia yatsinzwe -jorge sampaoli yavuze ikiri gutuma icyamamare kititwara neza bagenzi batari rwego hejuru ndetse batigeze bakora cyane anavuga kandi imbaraga zabo messi ariko mukino yabuze yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: gatsibo batangiye icyunamo baharanira ubumwe
content: intwaro yakoreshejwe kugira jenoside igerweho ugucikamo abanyarwanda ibice nk’uko byasobanuwe n’ umunyamabanga nshingwbaikorwa w’akagari kabarore rigati gaspard yagize icyo dukwiye gukora uguharanira ubumwe nk’uko leta yacu ibidushishikariza tukirinda ibidukandukanya ahubwo tugahuriza umugozi umwe dufasha abafite intege nke tukagera iterambere mu kagari kabarore umurenge kabarore abaturage baganiriye uburyo mbere y’umwaduko w’abazungu abanyarwanda babanye neza bagarutse kandi buryo abazungu batangiye kuzana ivangura ishuri kugeza nubwo batangiye kwandika ubwoko marangamuntu kimwe ntwaro zakoresheshe kubiba itandukaniro ry’abanyarwanda uretse kuganiro ibiganiro by’amateka yaranze u rwanda abaturage karere gatsibo bafashe umwanya gutekereza bazakorera abacitse icumu jenoside biyemeje buri mudugudu ugomba kugira utegura kizagenerwa abacitse icumu batishoboye abaturage bamaganye bamwe bagaragaye bapfobya igikorwa kugenera inkunga kubacise icumu batishoboye bavuga ivangura bagombye gufasha abatishoboye abaturage bavuga ntacyo bakora bashobore guhoza uwabuze abantu nubwo batanga inkunga ukumufata mugongo atari ivangura kuko gahunda leta zafasaha abantu biciye budehe abaturage bemeranyijwe bagomba kujya bahura buri saa munani kugira go bagire ibiganiro kandi basabwa kwirinda kwamagana ingengabitekerezo jenoside kuko abaharanira ubumwe batagomba kugira ikibatandukanya ku rwego rw’akarere gatsibo igikorwa gutangiza icyunamo cyatangiriye murenge muhura mudugudu taba ariko abaturage siho bagiye kuko bamwe midugudu bagiye bagira ibiganiro bisesengura icyateye jenoside bibukiranya amateka sylidio sebuharara

title: pasiteri uciyimihigo wahanuye abagabo bakobwa bagumiwe yongeye guhabwa ubuhanuzi
content: rev pasiteri uciyimihigo xavier uyobora itorero umurage w’abera silowamu’ yavuze yigeze kuvugana n’imana ikamuha ubuhanuzi bw’uko abakobwa bagumiwe bagiye kubona abagabo akabwirwa moto zigiye gufungwa ndetse yigeze kubwiwa n’imana hagiye kugwa imvura bigasohora imana yamuhaye ubundi buhanuzi bw’uko rwanda hagiye kubaho ihumure amahoro n’umudendezo rev pasiteri uciyimihigo xavier uyobora itorero umurage w’abera silowamu’ yavuze yigeze kuvugana n’imana ikamuha ubuhanuzi bw’uko abakobwa bagumiwe bagiye kubona abagabo akabwirwa moto zigiye gufungwa ndetse yigeze kubwiwa n’imana hagiye kugwa imvura bigasohora imana yamuhaye ubundi buhanuzi bw’uko rwanda hagiye kubaho ihumure amahoro n’umudendezo ibi pasiteri uciyimihigo yabitangaje kabiri tariki ukwakira kiganiro kihariye yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ukwezicom twamusuraga uru rusengero ruhereye kinamba gisozi ahitwa gakire muri kiganiro mukozi w’imana yagarutse buhanuzi butandukanye yagiye akunda guhabwa n’imana kandi bugasohora harimo kuba yarahanuye imvura n’ihagarikwa moto bikaba ndetse hari n’amamisiyo yagiye ahanurira polisi n’abasirikare akabaho none hari ubundi buhanuzi yahawe n’imana kandi nabwo bugiye gusohora vuba yagize kimwe imana yanshishijemo yambwiye mbwire abanyarwanda bahumure kuko yongeye gutanga amahoro n’ihumure gihugu cy’u rwanda bagende bahinge beze barye banywe baryame bakizwe bezwe bakiranuke bashake imana bayikorere kuko yambwiye yongeye gutanga amahoro n’ihumure rwanda uyu muvugabutumwa kandi yakomeje avuga kugeza abahanuzi bakiriho minsi aribo bakozi b’imana gusa hari n’abandi batari ab’ukuriyanavuze umwe bahanuzi ibihumbi banze gupfukamira bayari nayo mpamvu imana ikimukoreramo ikanamuha ahanurira abizera by’umwihariko abayoboke itorero umurage w’abera silowamu abereye umushumba ndetse n’umuvugizi mukuru pasiteri uciyimihigo xavier yamamaye cyane guhanurira abakobwa babuze abagabo bagiye kubabona binyuze bubasha bw’imana uyu pasiteri yageraga n’ubwo afata abakobwa akabambika agatimba nk’ikimenyetso cy’uko minsi vuba bazaba babonye abagabo nabo bakakambara bagiye gusezerana imbere y’imana rev pasiteri uciyimihigo xavier yahawe n’imana ubundi buhanuzi bw’uko u rwanda rugiye kuba bihe by’amahoro n’ihumure abakirisitu b’itorero umurage w’abera silowamu bakira ubuhanuzi nyuma y’amateraniro abakirisitu batashye basigwa amavuta abinjiza buzima bushya

content: nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri polisi y’igihugu ibashakisha gatandatu ma saa yine z’ijoro nibwo polisi yabataye yombi ndetse n’abagore i nyamabuye karere muhanga mu kiganiro n’amabanyamakuru nyandwi yatangaje yemera icyaha yakoze akanagisabira imbabazi kandi ingeso y’ubujura atari ayisanganwe ati nari nsanzwe ntora amafaranga mesnhi nkayabasubiza nange sinzi byangendekeye kuko nagiye gukora amasuku nsanga icyumba kirafunguye ndebye kabati mbonamo amafaranga mpita nyatwara abibye amafaranga bamaze gukoreshamo ibihumbi baguzemo ibikoresho munzu mu mafaranga yibwe habonetse agera miliyoni n’ibihumbi n’amadolari asubizwa nyirayo uwibwe anil kumar yashimiye polisi y’igihugu kuba yamufashije kugaruza mafaranga yatangaje kuba yongeye kubona mafaranga bizamugarurira icyizere bagenzi bakorana amafarnga yibwe sosiyete angelique international kumar akaba umuyobozi wungirije sosiyete yari amaze iminsi afite ikibazo bakorana bazakeka ariwe wayatwaye none gikorwa cyaramufashije cyane umuvugizi polisi y’igihugu supt theos badege yasabye abantu kwirinda kwibikaho amafaranga menshi kuko bikurura ibibazo byakabaye byirinzwe yibukije hari uburyo kubika amafaranga mutekano kandi akayabona igihe ayashakiye yatanze urugero rw’amakarita atm asigaye akoreshwa n’amabanki menshi gihugu emmanuel hitimana

content: alassane ouattara w’imyaka yongeye kugirirwa ikizere n’abaturage cote d’ivoire akaba yatorewe kuyobora gihugu manda itaha ikaba izamara myaka itanu nk’uko amajwi y’agateganyo abyerekana wegukanye insinzi n’akayabo k’amajwi asaga by’abaturage cote d’ivoire muri gitondo gatatu tariki ukwakira nibwo komisiyo yigenga ishinzwe amatora yatangaje alassane ouattara yatsinze amatora kuwa ukwakira by’agateganyo kigero cy’amajwi uyu ouattara alassane akaba yatsinze bahanganye mwanya affi n’guessan wabonye amajwi aya matora kigero by’abari gutora ukuvuga abasaga gato miliyoni eshatu esheshatu n’ibihumbi byari byiyandikishijeouattara yageze butegetsi atsinze perezida gbagbo matora yakurikiwe n’imvururu zaje guhitana ubuzima bw’abasaga ibihumbi bitatu yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: jules sentore yavuze impamvu atatumiye muyangonyiranyamibwa teta daina gitaramo cye
content: jules sentore umuririmbyi w’ijyana gakondo myiteguro y’igitaramo yise inganzo yaratabaye’ kigamije kubwira kwereka abanyarwanda uruhare rw’inganzo kubohora igihugu jules sentore umuririmbyi w’ijyana gakondo myiteguro y’igitaramo yise inganzo yaratabaye’ kigamije kubwira kwereka abanyarwanda uruhare rw’inganzo kubohora igihugu kuri kabiri tariki nyakanga sentore yagiranye ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru asobanura imyiteguro y’iki gitaramo igeze ndetse atangaza nabo bazafatanya gitaramo yataumiye nyirarume masamba intore ingangare babyara basanzwe bubiligi ibihame cultural troupe ndetse n’abagize gakondo group yubatse izina rikomeye gutaramira abanywanye n’umuco nyarwanda rusange muri kiganiro n’itangazamakuru sentore kumwe ntazinda marcel umuyobozi gakondo group wabwiye itangazamakuru batirengagije gutumira bamwe bahanzi bakuru bahimbye indirimbo zifashishijwe rugamba kubohora igihugu yagize ntabwo twirengagije gutumira abahanzi bakuru bafite indirimbo zifashishijwe rugamba oya ahubwo twashatse guha umwanya abakiri bato bagaragaze koko igihe basigiwe inkoni gukomera muco gakondo gukomeza guhanga ibihangano byubaka abanyarwanda babibasha’’ yakomeje avuga baganirije bahanzi bakuru barimo muyango nyiranyamibwa bakasaba kwitabira igitaramo gusa bamwe ntibabonetse nyiranyamibwa bubiligi ingangare babyara sentore basanzwe bubiligi bazafatanya gitaramo jules yavuze yiteguye kuko amaze amezi myiteguro yagize nakoze imyiteguro ihagije ijana ijana’ kandi bagenzi bange biteguye kugaragaza ubuhanga n’ubutore’ gitaramo nahaye umwihariko w’injyana gakondo nakoze ngacika intege ariko nkongera nkabyuka yakomeje avuga atigeze ajenjeka bijyanye n’umukino imbyino ibihangano n’ibindi azerekana gitaramo avuga atari kubwira abantu mugambo ahubwo bazabibona bikorwa sentore yavuze teta diana yagombaga kwitabira gitaramo ariko kiza guhurirana n’izindi gahunda yarafite bituma ataboneka sentore yavuze kwishimira kuba hamwe teta diana ariko ntibyakunze kwinjira gitaramo myanya isanzwe ibihumbi icumi frw vip muntu umwe ibihumbi mirongo itatu frw meza y’abantu umunani ibihumbi magana abiri frw igitaramo inganzo yaratabaye’ kizabera kigali conference and exhibition village ahazwi camp kigali kuya nyakanga

title: ingingo jeff bezos umuherwe mbere isi ahamya soko y’ubutunzi bwe
content: jeff bezos mukire mbere isi ndetse uvuze uwa mbere akanikurikira ntabwo waba wibeshye kuko bill gates mwanya kabiri amurusha agera miliyari jeff bezos atunze agera miliyari bill gates atunze miliyari muri gihe isi yugarijwe coronavirus mukire mbere isi yungutse amafaranga atagira angana nubwo benshi hirya hino gutaka ibihombo bikabije ndetse abandi bagataka uburyo batakaje akazi kabo buri munsi bimwe ushobora kwibaza butunzi jeff jezos -ni irihe banga arusha abatuye isi -ni abatuye isi bagakwiye kumwigiraho -ubutunzi afite ndetse n’inzira akoresha ayobora ibigo bye imbuto yavukanye nkuko benshi bakunze kuvuga ubuyobozi umurage nkuko abahanga bijyanye n’ubumenyamuntu ndetse n’inzobere bumenyi bujyanye n’ubukungu babitangaza bavuga guhirwa bukungu cyangwa kugira ibigo bikora neza hari abashobora kubigeraho bitewe n’inzira z’uburiganya bakoresheje gusa hari n’abandi babikorera bitewe n’ubwenge bwabo bwaganje ubumenyi bityo bakabasha kugira intambwe batera buzima mu gihe ubwenge bwakoreshejwe kuruta ubumenyi igihe abatunzi bafata amafaranga bakabasha gukoresha inzobere kintu runaka bitagomboye bafite ubumenyi buhambaye ahubwo bafite ubwenge kugenzura imikoranire n’imikorere tsinda ry’inzobere ibi umuntu wabigezeho mbere umukire mbere bushinwa nyiri ikigo alibaba jack ma uretseko hari n’abandi kuri nshuro bwana jeff bezos umwe bantu mbere bahiriwe n’ubucuruzi murandasi hari ingingo avuga arizo yifashisha kuyobora ibigo bye neza bityo akabasha kugera rwunguko rw’umurengera ingingo shingiro z’urwunguko jeff bezos ita bakiriya ureke kwita muhanganye ni kenshi abantu bacuruza bakunze guta umwanya guhangana n’abacuruza nk’ibyo bacuruza umuyobozi w’ibigo bikomeye amazon blue origin avuga akenshi umuyobozi w’ikigo cy’ubucuruzi ugamije gutera imbere agomba guhora arajwe ishinga gukora icyanezeza abakiriya kuruta guta umwanya ahangana n’abakora nk’ibyo akora ku rundi ruhande kumenya abacuruza nk’ibyo ucuruza ntabwo bibi gusa nanone mpamvu kubitamo umwanya munini kuko ukorera abakiriya bawe ugomba guha umwanya munini irengere ingaruka zishingiye buyobozi bw’amasoko mu magambo bezos yanditse raporo yashyize ahagaragara amaze imyaka atangiye ikigo amazon yavuze atari ngombwa kugira ubwoba gushora ndetse ugomba gushora ufite amacyenga yuko ushobora guhomba asobanura nuramuka ushoye ubizi neza uzunguka gihe ntabwo bizaba bikiri ubucuruzi bwiza kuko ubucuruzi burimo kwirengera ingaruka nyinshi bwunguka cyane kuri ngingo avuga umuyobozi wese agomba guhora yiteze kwirengera ingaruka ry’ihungabana ry’amasoko ashoraho imali kora ibishoboka byose buryo unezeza abayobozi bagufasha kuyobora ikigo kugera batecyereza bikorera bezos ahamya umukoresha mwiza uha agaciro umuyobozi akoresha kigo cye ndetse akagerageza gutuma mukuru wabakozi abona yitaweho kandi n’igihe habonetse inyungu mukozi akabona agahimbaza musyi kisumbuye masezerano yahawe umuherwe jeff bezos avuga mikorere bamwe bayobozi hari ukuntu agenda abahemba igisa n’imigabane kigo cye kuruta kubaha amafaranga kuko gihe bazi nakora neza inyungu izazamuka iturutse migabane kandi agakomeza akabona umushara ku ngingo gukoresha abakozi banezerwe kandi batanga umusaruro mwiza igihe ukoresha umukozi uzi neza nakora asabwa byose uzamuhemba kandi ukamuhembera igihe kubaka indangagaciro zishingiye muco zigenga ikigo cyawe bezos nta ntego kugenderaho cyangwa ibitecyerezo ahubwo igikorwa ukureba icyingenzi kigakorwa kenshi gashoboka hagamijwe kureshya abakiriya bibikorwa bikigo cyawe cy’ubucuruzi kuri ngingo irebana n’ibijyanye n’amahame ndetse nibintu umukozi cyangwa wese agomba kuba azi kugikora ikosa cyangwa guhesha agaciro gacye ikigo ikigo cyiza ikigira kirazira kigenderaho kandi kigakoresha abakozi bazi ubwenge ndetse batewe ishema kuvuga ikigo bakorera tera title: kwibuka abo bapfobya barahari bubiligi abazukuru mbonyumutwa - dr jean damascene bizimana
content: kuri nshuro u rwanda rwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi abanyarwanda barasabwa kwima amatwi abashobora kubabibamo ibitekerezo kuyipfobya kuyihakana bitwikiriye icyorezo koronavirusi cyatumye kwibuka bizabaho buryo budasanzwe ni ubutumwa komisiyo y’igihugu ishinzwe kurwanya jenoside ndetse n’umuryango ibuka mu kiganiro cyahuje umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa cnlg dr jean damascene bizimana perezida ibuka prof dusingizemungu jean pierre ndetse yvonne kayiteshonga ushinzwe ubuzima mutwe rbc bashimangiye kwibuka bizaba n’ubwo bizakorwa buryo budasanzwe bakaba bamara impungenge abatekerezaga bitazaba kubera abantu zabo dr bizimana abo wigeze kuvuga bapfobya barahari nahoze mbisoma hari abari bubiligi bavuga kwibuka babikuyeho biranabereka jenoside bavuga idafite agaciro hari abantu babyanditse abuzukuru mbonyumutwa jambo bubiligi ni mpamvu tugomba kubumva tugakurikira bakora ariko ntibagomba kudutesha umwanya kuduhangayikisha runaka yanditse ese wuramusubizatwe tuzababwira ukuri binyuze nyandiko komisiyo yagiye ikora ku bibaza ubuhamya bwatangwaga bihe kwibuka bamazwe impungenge bashobora kububona baciye rubuga cnlg ndetse n’urw’urwibutso jenoside kigali ku bashobora kuzahura n’ihungabana dr yvonne kayiteshonga yavuze bazafashwa n’ababari bakaniyambaza abajyanama b’ubuzima bakaba babafasha kugezwa muganga atiinama dutanga abantu bamenya abari basanzwe bagira ibibazo bakababa hubahirizwa amabwiriza leta kwirinda koronavirusi twakoze ubushakashatsi dusanga bagifite ihungabana ariko basigaye bazita bandi bafite telefoni bazatelefonaho bahumurize bagenzi nibyanga bazahamagara abajyanama b’ubuzima babafashe telefoni gusa ibimenyetso nibikomeza tuzahamagara umujyanama w’ubuzima adufashe ariko ibimenyetso nibikomeza azahamagara azi uburyo bazitaba baze bafate umuntu bamujyane muganga bajye kumwitaho bagaruka isomo icyorezo koronavirusi gisigiye abanyarwanda by’umwihariko buryo kwibuka umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa cnlg avuga isomo ririmo ukurushaho kwishakamo ibisubizo ho umuyobozi ibuka akavuga bibasigiye isomo ryo gushimangira ibufatanye bw’inzego prof dusingizemungu yagize twajyaga tubikora n’ubundi ariko ngubu byariyongereye buryo budasanzwe umuvandimwe wanjye damascene tuvugana nibura inshuro inkeya haba gitondo haba manywa haba ryari kugira dusangire amakuru cyakorwa kandi dupfunditse kikarara kigeze dushinzwe ubufatanye n’inzego isomo rikomeye kuri kabiri tariki mata icyumweru cy’icyunamo kizatangira kikazarangira tariki mata abari mahanga bazibuka ariko bubahiriza amabwiriza y’ibihugu barimo arebana kwirinda icyorezo koronavirusi denis fabrice nsengumuremyi muhaburarw
