content: mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka nibwo ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere rdb cyashyize ahagaragara ibiciro bishya gusura ingagi byiyongereye ugereranyije n’ibyari bisanzweho kuva tariki ibiciro by’abanyamahanga basura ingagi birunga biziyongeraho kimwe kabiri cyayo basanzwe batanga byatumye hari abibaza bishobora kuzagabanya umubare mukerarugendo basura ingagi ariko siko ubuyobozi bw’iyi pariki bubibonabuvuga mukerarugendo aribo bisabiye mafaranga yakongerwa ikindi bashingiraho imibare babona y’ubwiyongere mukerarugendo umwaka utashye nk’uko prosper uwingeri umuyobozi parike y’igihugu y’ibirunga abitangaza avuga abasura pariki aribo bivugiye ariwo musanzu wabo batanga rwego kubungabunga ngagi ziboneka hacye isi uwingeri yongeraho icyemezo kuzamura ibiciro gusura ingagi biri rwego kongera umusaruro w’amafaranga akomoka ngagi bijyanye n’amategeko n’amahame mpuzamahanga arengera ingagi z’imisozi miremire bene mahame mpuzamahanga avuga umuryango umwe w’ingagi usurwa n’itsinda ritarengeje abantu umunani kandi bakamarana n’ingagi isaha itarenga uwingeri akavuga batashatse hakwiyongera abagize itsinda cyangwa se nyuma y’itsinda rimwe habe hajyayo irindi tsinda umunyamahanga utaba rwanda usura ingagi azava madolari y’amerika ajye madolari arenga ibihumbi manyarwanda umunyarwanda azava mafaranga ibihumbi makumyabiri ajye mafaranga ibihumbi mirongo itatu gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: espoir bbc yabonye itike gukina umukino nyuma irushanwa ryo gutera inkunga agdf
content: muri mukino espoir bbc ihabwa amahirwe kwegukana irushanwa bitewe n’uburyo yatangiye yitwara neza kugeza yatsinze csk amanota - ihita ibona itike kuzakina umukino nyuma uzaba cyumweru tariki undi mukino cy’irangiza ugomba guhuza apr bbc kigali basketball club kbc ikipe itsinda izakina espoir bbc mukino nyuma mu bagore rushanwa ryitabiririwe n’amakipe atatu kaminuza y’u rwanda apr bbc rapp bitewe n’uko amakipe y’abagore atatu azahura hagati yayo mini- championnat hazakorwe igiteranyo cy’amanota ikipe igize menshi ihabwe igikombe kuri gatandatu tariki apr bbc y’abakobwa yatsinze rapp amanota - imikino cy’irangiza n’umukino nyuma igomba kwishyurwa amafaranga akazakusanywa agashyirwa kigege agaciro development fund’ theoneste nisingizwe

title: turifuza umunyarwanda wese gaciro n’ubwenge afite yumva umutekano inshingano-minisitiri shyaka
content: minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu prof shyaka anastase yasabye abaturage karere ngoma kumva umutekano buri munyarwanda inshingano ndetse ababwira bizagerwaho buri muntu abaye ijisho mugenzi ibi yabigarutseho kabiri tariki ugushyingo kagari ruhinga murenge zaza ho karere ngoma yifatanyije n’abaturage gikorwa kwakira ibyifuzo by’abaturage igenamigambi ry’ibibakorerwa - iki gikorwa cyabereye aka karere rwego rw’igihuguabaturage murenge zaza basabye igenamigambi ry’ibibakorerwa murenge wabo hashyirwamo ibintu bine bikenewe kurusha ibindi birimo amashanyarazi ibitaro imodoka itwara abarwayi ndetse n’imodoka itwara abagenzi mu gisa n’amatora yakozwe n’abaturage abaturage bifuza leta yazabahabahisemo ibintu bine by’ingenzi bakeneye kurusha ibindi mu bikenewe byihutirwa harimo ibitaro bafite ikigo nderabuzima bakaba bifuza ibitaro byabegerezwa bagakira umuruho kujya bajyana abarwayi bitaro bikuru kibungo biri birometero bisaga mu bindi basabye harimo imodoka itwara abagenzi kuko bibagora ako kagari bajya i kibungo ngomai rwamagana ndetse n’i kigali bagaragaje kandi bakeneye imodoka itwara abarwayi yazajya ibafasha kujyana abarwayi bitaro bikuru kibungoikindi basabye uguhabwa amashanyarazi bakabasha kugira bimwe bakora byabageze iterambera usibye byashyizwe murongo w’ibikenewe cyane baturage bagaragarije minisitiri shyaka bifuza amashuri y’imyaka abegereye kuko basanzwe bafite ay’imyaka icyendaibi bikazafasha abana bakora urugendo rw’ibirometero bisaga bajya ndetse bava kwiga mashuri gusa n’ubwo babisabye kandi bakemererwa bizabonerwa ibisubizominisiti shyaka yabahaye umukoro w’ibyo nabo bagomba gufasha leta nabo batiyibagiwe yabasabye guharanira gusigasira umutekano kuko ariwo w’ibanze bakora byose uzabafasha kuryoherwa n’ibyo basabye leta atiariko turifuza umuturage wese w’umunyarwanda gaciro afite n’ubwenge afite yumva umutekano inshingano zaburi weseburi wese akaba ijisho mugenzi weniyo mpamvu umuhigo natwe tugiye gusezerana namweari umutekano utagira agitotsi murenge aka karere aha afatanyije n’umwe baturage bavuze ibigize umutekano uzira agatotsi abaturage bagomba kugiramo uruharebigizwe gukora amarondokurwanya amakimbirane bakorera masibo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge n’inzoga z’inkorano yakomeje avuga byose nabo basabye bitabaho hari umutekano muke abasaba bafatanya n’inzego z’umutekana kuwubungabunga banirinda inzoga z’inkorano n’ibiyobyabwenge atiuyu murenge n’aka karere ibikorwa by’amajyambere mwavuzeibyifuzo by’iterambere mwavuze ntabwo byabangikanywa kuba abaturage badatekanyeturashaka umutekano buri wese akaba ijisho mugenzi weku rwanya ibiyobyabwengeinzoga z’inkorano byose tuzabishyira mihigo y’umuryango yabasabye kandi bagomba kurinda ibyagezweho bashyigikira ubumwe n’ubwiyunge banyarwanda minisitiri shyaka yashimiye abaturage bitekerezo byiza batanze abibutsa nabo basabwa kugira uruhare kwirindira umutekano yababwiye ibyifuzo batanze akarere kazabishyira igenamigambi kandi bikazabonerwa ibisubizo mbere gutangiza gahunda kwakira ibiterezo by’abaturage karere ngoma minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu kumwe guverineri w’intara y’uburasirazuba fred mufulukye babanje gusura icyumba ntangamakuru kiri bitaro rukoma-sake ndetse n’icy’umudugudu nyagasozi yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: natnael tesfazion ashobora kwegukana tour du rwanda nubwo agace nyuma kagoye
content: tour du rwanda irasozwa cyumweru hakinwa agace munani kazenguruka mujyi kigali ntera y’ibilometero nyuma gusoza agace karindwi kakiniwe i nyamirambo ejo hashize gatandatu komiseri ntiyamira jean sauveur yabwiye igihe natnael tesfazion asa n’uwamaze kwegukana tour du rwanda keretse habayeho izindi mpamvu zituma adasoza isiganwa ati kuyoyoka kw’amahirwe y’abanyarwanda ntabwo umuntu yapfa kubivuga ariko isiganwa riteye abakinnyi bagera munsi nyuma bananiwe ikigaragara uriya munya-erythre atatakaje ibihe itt ahubwo mose mugisha niwe watakaje bahabwaga amahirwe ejo munsi etape nyuma izamuka biragoye njye nakwemeza uriya munya-erythre tesfazion yatakaza umwambaro w’umuhondo keretse agize ibindi byago nko kugwa akavamo cyangwa akagira izindi mpamvu nk’uburwayi nkurikije bimeze njye ndemeza umwambaro w’umuhondo yawutwaye kuri cyumweru siganwa riza kuba risozwa abakinnyi barahaguruka i gikondo ahasanzwe habera imurikagurisha expo ground berekeze i rebero bazanyura norvge mutwe ntera y’ibilometero inzira y’agace nyuma kigali expo ground-rwandex-rond point kanogo-cercle sportif-mburabuturo-gikondo-monte pave-rebero finish line-nyamirambo-sp nyamirambo-tapis rouge-kimisagara- nyabugogo-giticyinyoni-nouvelle route direction mont kigali -norvege-mont kigali-stade regionale de nyamirambo-tapis rouge -kimisagara-mur de kigali chez mutwe-prison -apacope-carrefour yamaha-kinamba-route des poida lourds-rondpoint kanogo-cercle sportif-mburabuturo-gikondo-monte pave-rebero finish line kuzenguruka rimwe abakinnyi mbere rutonde rusange nyuma y’uduce turindwi duheruka ibilometero amafoto niyonzima mose

title: bari abashomeli ariko batanga akazi
content: madamu chantal mukamazimpaka mukuru uwera marie claire bagize unique dcor bakora ntaho babyize gusa umwe azana igitekerezo akamwunganira cyane ibintu by’imitako babikunda cyera intandaro y’ibyo byose akaba umwalimu wabigishaga hanyuma rimwe arimo kwigisha aravuga muntu utagira ashobora gukora gusa ikibazo buri wese adafata umwanya yicare hamwe yitekerezeho hanyuma arebe ikintu kiri ashobora gukora kandi kikamugirira akamaro kuva nibwo chantal yicaye afata umwanya uhagije kwitekerezaho aza gusanga akunda imitako kandi yabasha kuyikora niko kubibwira claire aramwunganira baratangira mu gutangira kwabo babanje kwitinya bakoze bakabibika nzu ibindi bakabyihera abantu nk’impano ariko baza gutinyurwa n’imurikagurisha ryahuje ibihugu afurika y’i burasirazuba mwaka nabwo mbere ibintu bakoraga byagiye mugaragaro ndetse biza gukundwa cyane ubwo twaganiraga unique dcor bagize bati abantu baratunguwe kuko batumvaga bintu bikorerwa rwanda bagize biva hanze nyamara bikorerwa hano iwacu kandi tukabikora twifashishije ibikoresho dusanzwe tubona hano iwacu bigatuma babikunda cyane bimwe bihangano unique dcor nyuma yaho baje kujya mbere marushanwa yateguwe minicom begukanye umwanya mbere rwego rw’igihugu bagahabwa igikombe n’amafaranga ibihumbi magana atatu y’u rwanda mu bikorwa byabo bakora harimo imitako amavazi decoration bakaba bakora kandi n’indabo bifashishije imyeyo n’ibishishwa by’ibigori ibyo bikaba bimaze kubageza byinshi kuko binjiza amafaranga y’amanyarwanda ibihumbi y’inyungu kwezi baha akazi abatari bake kandi bakabasha kwibeshaho ndetse bakanabona bakeneye badategereje ak’i muhana barakangurira abanyarwanda cyane cyane urubyiruko kutitinya kureka impano zabo zikamenyekana kuko bizabagirira akamaro bimwe bihangano unique dcor ngo gahunda barateganya kwagura ibikorwa byabo kandi bakagira amasoko ahagije bazajya bagemura bakoze haba hanze cyangwa se imbere gihugu anne marie niwemwiza

title: rayon sports - mukura vs abanya nigeria bahesheje ikipe y’i nyanza tike
content: umukino itsinda ry’amajyepfo n’uburengerazuba wahuzaga ikipe rayon sports mukura vs urangiye ikipe y’i nyanza itsinze ibitego - by’abakinnyi bashya igeragezwa muri mukino wabereye stade muhanga gatatu ikipe rayon sports yakoze impinduka nke ugereranyije n’ikipe yatsinze amagaju ibitego - kuwa mbere w’icyi cyumweru rutahizamu davis kasirye wigaragaje mukino w’amagaju ntabwo yagaragaye bakinnyi b’uyu mukino ahubwo hari abakinnyi batatu bashya bakomoka nigeria nubwo mukura victory sports yabonanaga neza kibuga ntangiro z’umukino rayon sports yafunguye amazamu munota igitego cyatsinzwe onyeka augustine ukomoka nigeria mupira uvuye ndayisenga alexis ku munota cyiza hussein yishyuriye mukura vs mupira wazamukanywe habimana yussuf wacenze myugariro rayon sports awutanga ruhande zagabe jean claude wahereje cyiza biba igitego - rayon sports yongeye gusatira cyane izamu mukura vs bwumvikane bucye myugariro n’umunyezamu shyaka regis irehe emeka wavuye nigeria abatsinda igitego kabir munota i rayon sports iyobora umukino n’ibitego - amakipe yombi yakomeje gukina agerageza gushaka ibindi bitego ariko igice mbere kirangira - rayon sports yugarije mukura gice mbere mu gice kabiri amakipe yombi yakoze impinduka zitandukanye ruhande rayon sports uwayezu bernard yasimbuye onyake augustin watsinze igitego mbere gihe umutoza sosthene yahaye umwanya kwigaragaza munya nigeria oryi emeka udafite byinshi yagaragaje mukino myugariro wavuye marines manzi thierry yakinnye umukino mbere rayon sports asimbuye irehe emeka ndetse muhire kevin wakinaga umukino mbere avuye isonga yinjiye asimbuye alexis gucishamo bagahanahana umupira makipe yombi n’ishyaka ryiganjemo amakosa atandukanye byaranze igice kabiri ariko kubona inshundura bikaba ingorabahizi mukura yahushije uburyo butatu bwabonywe rutahizamu bayo barimo igitego cyahushijwe nshimiyimana ibrahim kimwe n’umupira watewe muhadjili mukura manzi sincere huberto rayon sports awukozeho werekeza izamu ariko bakame arahagoboka rayon sports yashoboraga kubona igitego gatatu coup-franc yatewe djabel ariko umunyezamu shyaka regis awushyira corner ishimwe kevin wasimbuye imanishimwe emmanuel yabonye uburyo bwiza gutsinda igitego gatatu yinjiranaga myugariro mukura ariko ntiyabasha kurenza umupira shyaka regis umukino ugiye kurangira minota y’inyongera cyiza hussein yabonye ikarita itukura nyuma gukubita niyonzima olivier rayon sports gihe umunyezamu mukura yahawe ikarita y’umuhondo yaburaniraga umukinnyi mugezi rayon sports ikaba ibonye tike gukina umukino cy’irushanwa ry’agaciro development fund ry’uyu mwaka izahura sunrise yasezereye as kigali abakinnyi babanjemo mpande zombi rayon sports ndayishimiye eric bakame nzayisenga jean damour mayor irambona eric niyonkuru vivier manzi sincere huberto niyonzima olivier imanishimwe emmanuel djabel manishimwe irehe emeka ndacyayisenga alexis onyeka augustine abasimbura hategekimana bonheur uwayezu bernard manzi thierry nsengiyumva moustapha ishimwe kevin muhire kevin oryi emeka umutoza habimana sosthene mukura vs shyaka regis hakizimana alimas mwiseneza daniel ndayishimiye celestin muyango ombeni ndayegamiye abas aman mugisho zagabe jean claude cyiza hussein hakizimana yussuf hakizimana muhadjili abasimbura nshimiyimana jean claude habimana hussein shyaka philbert nshimiyimana ibrahim habihirwe aristide gakuru jean claude umutoza okoko godeffroie srcruhago

title: psf igiye kongera ubuvugizi ikorera abacuruzi hasi
content: ejo basuraga akarere gasabo yvette mukarwemo umuyobozi mukuru w’agateganyo psf yagize ntago wakwicara biro umenye bihagaze turagira iteganyangamba ry’uyu mwaka tuzashyiremo twabwiwe n’abacuruzi mukarwemo avuga ngendo hazasinywa amasezerano y’ubufatanye hagati y’inzego zihagarariye abacuruzi n’ubuyobozi bwite leta bw’akarere kugirango hatangizwe ibiro psf karere izo ngendo zari zigamije gusura ibikorwa by’abacuruzi kurebera hamwe uburyo byatezwa imbere mu karere gasabo hasuwe amakoperative atandukanye arimo izikora ibijyanye n’ububaji emmanuel n hitimana

title: umufasha ben rutabana yahakanye ibyibaruwa yitiriwe
content: umufasha benjamin rutabana yahakanye ibaruwa imaze iminsi icicikana binyamakuru n’imbuga nkoranyambaga bivugwa wayanditse nyuma y’aho umugabo aburiwe irengero diane rutabana umufasha w’umuhanzi benjamin rutabana ben rutabana ibaruwa avuga yamwitiriwe yatangiye gukwirakwizwa ntangiriro z’uku kwezi bivugwa wayandikiye ihuriro rnc n’izindi nzego zirimo iza uganda azisaba kumufasha kumenya umugabo aherereye muri baruwa nk’uko ibinyamakuru bitandukanye byagiye bibitangaza bivugwa ben rutabana yavuye bubiligi kwezi gushize yerekeza burasirazuba afurika rutabana akaba yaravuye bubiligi nzeri ahagana saa tatu z’ijoro itariki nzeri agera kibuga cy’indege entebbe uganda saa agomba gukomereza urugendo rwe repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo muri baruwa diane avuga yamwitiriwe bivugwa rutabana yakomeje kujya avugana yava rugo kugera nzeri byari biteganijwe rutabana azasubira i burayi akagera kibuga cy’indege emirates nzeri akagera bubiligi nzeri ariko ntabwo byashobotse haba muryango ndetse n’abo rnc bemeza rutabana atigeze ataha rugo mu kiganiro yagiranye voa diane yagize iyo nyandiko si iyanjye inyandiko y’ikinyoma yanyitiriwe urwandiko rwanditse buryo butanasobanutse kuko urwandiko rumwe rugenewe inzego z’umutekano rnc n’iza uganda ikintu gitangaje urwandiko rumwe rwagenerwa serivisi ebyiri zitandukanye yakomeje avuga urwo rwandiko rugenewe ururiho by’umwihariko abarwanditse bazi neza serivisi ebyiri bavuga rwagenewe uyu mufasha ben rutabana avuga abanditse baruwa bagamije gukoresha izina rye politiki nyungu zabo bwite kandi ntaho ahuriye nayo ati bigamije gukoresha izina ryanjye nyungu zabo politiki ntaho mpuriye politiki n’ubwo izina ryanjye rikwiriye gukoreshwa bene aka kageni binyoma atunga agatoki bimwe binyamakuru rwanda kuba byaba biri inyuma y’iyo baruwa gusa gihe byashakaga kumubariza umugabo bitari bikwiriye gukoresha izina rye bimwitirira inyandiko atazi ati kuba bambariza sibibi ariko binyitirira amagambo ntavuze batangire gushinja abantu ntazi bavuga arinjye ubashinja ntabwo nabyemera uruhande rwanjye urw’ukuri nifuza havugwa amakuru y’ukuri gushakisha umutware wanjye yakomeje avuga bifashishije leta y’u bufaransa nk’abafite ubwenegihugu bw’iki gihugu bayisaba kubafasha gushakisha ben rutabana gihe bivugwa yaba yaraburiye uganda

title: ngororero impanuka yabaye hitabazwa kajugujugu kugira irokore inkomere
content: kuri gatutu tariki nzeri mu karere ngororere ho ntara y’iburengerazuba habereye impanuka ahagana masaha saa munani bikaba byatewe n’umuvuduko udasanzwe w’uwari utwaye modoka umuvugizi polisi ishami rishinzwe umutekano muhanda spjean marie ndushabandi yatangaje umushoferi utwaye modoka ataza kuba yiruka cyane imodoka iba yatangiriwe n’ibiti biri muhanda bikayigarura iyi mpanuka yatwaye ubuzima bw’abagenzi bane abandi barakomereka ariko muribo nibo bakomeretse cyane buryo bahise bajyanwa bitaro bikuru kaminuza i kigali chuk n’indege bwoko kajugujugu gusa haracyari gukorwa iperereza kugirango hamenyekane neza umubare w’abahitanywe n’iyi mpanuka cyane bashobora kwiyongera indege bwoko kajugujugu yatabaye abaguye mpanuka yanditswe muhaburagmailcommuhaburarw

title: inkengero z’ikiyaga sake zigiye kugirwa ahantu nyaburanga
content: kugeza uretse kuba amazi yakurura abantu kuza hareba bindi bintu byakurura mukerarugendo biri kiyaga sake yaba amahoteri cyangwa andi mazu yacumbikamo abaje kuhatemberera ubwo yakiraga intumwa zaturutse rwanda housing authority zari zaje kuganira gishushanyo mbonera cy’uyu mujyi nyaburanga ugiye gushyirwa nkengero z’iki kiyaga tariki umuyobozi w’akarere ngoma wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu mupenzi george yavuze muntu wemerewe kubaka nkengero z’ kiyaga gihe gishushanyombonera kitarashyirwa ahagaragara abakozi b’iki kigo bakomeje urugendo bagana mirenge ihana imbibe n’ikiyaga sake kugira baganire buryo gishushanyo cyarushaho gukorwa neza iki kiyaga sake gihana imbibi n’imirenge sake jarama rukumberi uretse kuba cyakitabazwa kubaka umujyi nyaburanga ngoma ikiyaga sake kizwi ho kugira amafi menshi giherutse guterwaho ibiti rwego kukibungabunga jean claude gakwaya

title: nyabihuumupolisi yarashe umucuruzi w’inkweto aramwica
content: ahagana i saa sita z’amanywa gatanu tariki nzeri kagari kijote umurenge bigogwe karere nyabihu harasiwe umugabo witwa habarurema jean claude bakundaga kwita gasore bikekwa atwaye magendu y’inkweto ahita apfa umwe bibonye yabwiye muhaburarw mugabo usanzwe acuruza inkweto modoka ituruka rubavu igana musanze afite agafuka karimo imiguru y’inkweto yabona polisi ibahagaritse agafata agafuka ke akiruka nabwo umupolisi yahise amwirukaho akamurasa amasasu ane nabyo byamuviriyemo urupfu abo baturage bagaragazaga umujinya mwinshi bavuga umupolisi yamwirukankanaga yamurashe amasasu abiri amuhusha nyuma akaza kumurasa andi abiri yamaze kumugeraho ndetse akaba yabanje kumukubita inshyi ebyiri ni ibintu abaturage bavugaga byabarakaje cyane nayo mpamvu bashatse gukora igisa n’imyigaragambyo bagahagarara muhanda banga umurambo w’uwishwe utwarwa nubwo bitamaze akanya aya makuru yemejwe n’umuvugisi polisi y’u rwanda cp john bosco kabera kiganiro yagiranye tvradio yavuze ariyo ngo abapolisi bacunze umutekano muhanda bahagaritse imodoka hakavamo umuntu ufite igikapu akiruka umupolisi yamurasa isasu rigafata cyico ku bivugwa n’abaturage muturage amasasu abiri nyuma yayarashwe yamanitse amaboko buryo yashobora gufatwa atishwe umuvugizi polisi yakomeje abwira tvradio harimo gukorwa iperereza harebwe koko mupolisi kazi yaba yakoresheje imbaraga z’umurengera akaba yabibabazwa abaturage bifuza gihe byazagaragara mupolisi yakoze ibidakwiye yazaza kuburanishirizwa ruhame kuko aribyo byabereka koko ntawe hejuru y’amategeko n’uwemerewe guhutaza umuturage nyakwigendera usanzwe yitwa gasore wapfuye arashwe n’umupolisi asanzwe atuye murenge nyakaliba karere rubavu bakunze kwita mahoko nubwo yarasiwe murenge bigogwe karere nyabihu agiye isoko gucuruza inkwetoapfuye asize umugore n’abana batatu chief editormuhaburarw

title: beyonc yaririmbye umugabo jay-z akomoka rwanda
content: umuririmbyikazi bakomeye isi yakoze nganzo aririmba indirimbo nshya yise mood eva’ album nshya the lion king the gift avugamo jay-z umuraperi amerika akaba n’ umugabo afite ibisekuru rwanda umuririmbyikazi bakomeye isi yakoze nganzo aririmba indirimbo nshya yise mood eva’ album nshya the lion king the gift avugamo jay-z umuraperi amerika akaba n’ umugabo afite ibisekuru rwanda muri ndirimbo yasohotse gatanu beyonc knowles afatanyijemo n’uyu mugabo jay- z n’umuhanzi childish gambino gitero cye aririmba mo my baby father bloodline rwanda ntibizwi neza koko ibisekuru by’umugabo jay-z -bafitanye abana batatu biri rwanda cyangwa byari iby’inganzo y’abahanzi gusa ikizwi album nshya beyonc yasohoye munsi yiyegereje cyane umugabane afurika ndore aherutse kuririmba igiswahili mu ndirimbo zigize album indirimbo zimwe zaririmbwe izindi yaziririmbanye n’abahanzi afurika y’iburengerazuba muri bahanzi harimo tekno yemi alade mr eazi tiwa savage nigeria john kani afurika y’epfo salatiel cameroun muri iriya ndirimbo mood eva baririmbamo ibindi bintu cyangwa abantu byerekeye afurika nelson mandela jay-z akigereranya butunzi mansa musa umwami w’abami w’ubwami mali bivugwa bantu batunze kurusha abandi mateka y’isi muri ndirimbo kandi beyonc aririmba umwamikazi sheba queen of sheba avugwa mateka yavuye afurika akajya gusura umwami salomon w’abisiraheli kuri album nshya kandi indirimbo beyonc yise ’spirit’ itangizwa n’amagambo y’igiswahili aririmbwa ’uishi muda mrefu mfalme’ bivuze urambe mwami kubera iterambere ry’ubukungu n’ikoranabuhanga bigenda bigerwaho abahanga bukungu bavuga isoko rishya ryo gucuruzaho n’ibihangano by’ubuhanzi n’ubugeni gihe kiri kuza afurika abakurikiranira ibya muzika bavuga beyonc n’umugabo bashaka kurushaho kwiyegereza kwigarurira abakunzi muzika soko rishya riri kuzamuka

title: nyir’ibyago umukinnyi film yahuye n’uruva gusenya nyuma gufatwa kwiba iphones
content: nyuma y’uko nollywood star seun egbegbe afatiwe agakubitwa akanafungwa azira kwiba iphones i logos abacuruzi isoko ricuruza mudasobwa bongereye umunyu gikomere bavugaga yigeze kubiba uyu mugoba uzwiho kuba producer yoruba yahoze umukunzi watoyin aimakhu mukinnyi nollywood ku wakabiri w’icyi cyumweru yafashwe agerageza kwiba iphones icyenda zose azikuye bubiko bwazo isoko ry’i logos kugeza n’ubu aracyari maboko police seun egbegbe yarafashwe arakubitwa aranafungwa azira kwiba iphones i logos umucuruzi wagurishaga iphones segun akinola yavugiye imbere y’ibitangazamakuru gatatu w’icyi cyumweru egbegbe bizwi karitsiye igisambo yagize ntitwirengagije n’ubwo urukiko ruzamuhamya icyaha ariko si ubwa mbere uwitwa akinola yagize egbegbe yigeze n’ubundi gukaragara bintu nk’ibi ariko ntibijye hanze cyane n’ingaruka byamugiraho ariko nshuro ho yanditswe lucky van rukundomuhaburarw

title: ibyaranze umunsi mbere w’inama mpuzamahanga yiga buringanirereba amafoto
content: inama mpuzamahanga yiga buringanire global gender summit ibereye i kigali rwanda mbere ibereye mugabane afurika ikaba yitabiriwe n’abayobozi batandukanye rwego hejuru barimo perezida kagame wanayitangije mugaragaro abo bayobozi barimo perezida sahle-work zewde w’igihugu ethiopia moussa faki mahamat umuyobozi komisiyo afurika yunze ubumwe auc n’abandi banyacyubahiro banyuranye banagejeje n’ijambo bitabiriye nama mu ijambo ryeperezida kagame yavuze abagore hari byinshi bagenda bageraho bice binyuranye kimwe basaza ariko hakiri urugendo yagize hari byinshi byiza abagore bagezeho iterambere haba buzima burezi bucuruzi guhanga imirimo gusa haracyari byinshi gukora kuko tutaragera twifuza kuba turi arongera turabizi ntangiriro dufite akazi kenshi gukora kugira tugabanye ubusumbane buri hagati y’ibitsina byombi hashize igihe tubishyizemo ingufu kugira twizere umugore aza imbere bandi baturage bijyanye n’iterambere ry’igihugu cyacu naho akinwumi adesina uyobora banki nyafurika itsura amajyambere afdb kiganiro yatanze yavuze guteza imbere ishoramari bagore bigomba gushyirwamo imbaraga kuko bigira uruhare iterambere yagaragaje u rwanda kimwe bihugu afurika nyuma y’imyaka ishize byateye intambwe guteza imbere ihame ry’uburinganire rufite imibare hejuru nteko ishinga amategeko zindi nzego zifatirwamo ibyemezo ati nyuma y’imyaka ishize u rwanda rwamenye imbaraga z’abagore kandi bahabwa agaciro bakwiye abagore bagomba guhabwa amahirwe kwiteza imbere nka afdb tugomba gutera imbere gukuraho imbogamizi zibangamiye uburenganzira bw’abagore nk’ubu abagore bungutse nibura y’ibyo bafite bikoreshwa kwita zabo harimo n’abagabo hari ikigega cyashyizweho kigamije gufasha by’abagore batagira amahirwe kubona imari abagore bahawe inguzanyo bishyura inguzanyo kigero ni gihe perezida ethiopia sahle-work zewde yavuze inzego z’abagore zigikeneye ubumenyi avuga nibura gihugu cyabo hari icyakozwe guteza imbere abagore gutuma bagira uburenganzira avuga kandi inzira ihari ikenewe guteza imbere abagore ukwiga kandi n’inzira iba irimo ibibazo bimwe ati kwiga inzira usangamo ibibazo bitandukanye kuko uragwa ariko ugahaguruka ugasaba imbabazi ugakomeza urugendo’’ inama mpuzamahanga yiga buringanire izamara iminsi ibera rwanda insanganyamatsiko yayo iragira iti kurandura imbogamizi zibangamiye uburinganire ni inama ibaye gihe u rwanda rwatangiye ubukangurambaga buzamara iminsi bugamije kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye gitsina nk’uko byagarutsweho minisitiri w’uburinganire n’iterambere ry’umuryango amb nyirahabimana solina kugeza rwanda abagore bihariye by’abaturage rufite umubare munini w’abagore nteko ishinga amategeko bagera bagize guverinoma yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: ingabo na polisi bahanye amakuru ku bikorwa byo kubungabunga amahoro
content: polisi y’u rwanda butumwa bw’amahoro bihugu bitandatu bi bihugu byose usibye kubungabunga umutekano nk’inshingano mbere polisi y’igihugu inakora n’ibikorwa bifasha abaturage buzima bwabo buri munsi polisi y’u rwanda kandi niyo ifite umubare munini w’abapolisi b’abagore benshi isi umubare wabo ungana n’ ingabo z’u rwanda zibarizwa bihugu bibiri bikorwa kubungabunga amahoro hose ngabo zikomeje gushimirwa imyitwarire myiza kazi buri munsi ikindi zinakora ibikorwa gufasha abaturage buzima buri munsi nko kubigisha gukoresha amashyiga rondereza umuganda n’ibindi kugeza u rwanda rufite ingabo polisi bagera butmwa bu mahanga mahugurwa akaba afasha gukusanyiriza hamwe bahura nabyo butumwa bityo bikajya bibafasha kunoza imikorere kwerekana itandukaniro gukora akazi neza mutijima abu bernard

title: ruhango abaturage bifatanyije n’abandi kwibuka jenoside nshuro
content: uyu muhango karere ruhango watangijwe n’urugendo rwabaye mutuzo rwitabiriwe n’abaturage benshi baturutse mujyi ruhango berekeza rwibutso rw’akarere banaboneyeho umwanya kunamira imibiri isaga ibihumbi ihashyinguye nubwo hari byinshi byagezweho abacitse icumu aka karere basabye bafashwa bijyanye n’ubuvuzi kuko hagenda hagaragara abacitse icumu bagihura n’ibikomere batewe jenoside kuri nshuro hibukwa abazize jenoside yakorerewe abatutsi karere ruhango hazibandwa gufasha abacitse kwicumu babashakira imibereho myiza nk’uko byatangajwe n’umuyobozi karere ruhango mbabazi xavier francois ikindi kizibandwaho minsi kwibuka ugutunganya inzibutso ziri hirya hino karere ruhango zitaratunganywa uhagarariye ingabo z’u rwanda karere ruhango yasabye imbaraga zakoreshejwe guhagarika jenoside nazo zakoreshwa guteza imbere abacitse icumu eric muvara

title: skol yashimishije abatuye huye
content: iki gitaramo cyateguwe skol cyabereye club universitaire kikaba kandi cyari kinagamije kumenyekanisha nzoga skol kubatari bwakayimenyeuhagarariye skol karere huye nyaruguru nyamagabe maniragaba dieudonn yatangaje bateguye gitaramo kugirango nakire abanyeshuri bashya kaminuza iki gitaramo cyahuriranye n’isozwa ry’ibizamini leta mashuri yisumbuye bibam akarusho usibye ibibazo bijyanye n’ibyuma muzika byagiye bigaragara ubundi abanyeshuri n’abandi bitabiriye gitaramo batangaje baryohewe cyane n’ibyo bateguriwe birimo igabanyirizwa ry’ibiciro skol nini n’intoya tombora ndetse n’umuziki ugezweho dieudonn aravuga ubwitabire yabonye bwari buhagije kuko gikorwa kitanateguwe igihe kinini kuri habonetse abantu atakekaga kandi n’ibinyobwa bye bikaba byaguzwe bihagije ikirutaho akaba yabashije gushimisha abantu akahava atagawe abaturage n’abanyeshuri mujyi huye bitabiriye gitaramo barasaba ibitaramo nk’ibi byajya bibageraho kenshi theogne umwe bitabiriye gitaramo yagize abahatuye tutakidagadura kandi bitaramo bizajya binafasha huye kwivugurura kuko kuvugurura si ukubaka gusa dieudonn aratangaza ibitaramo nk’ibi biteganyijwe aka gace byinshi kandi gihe kitarambiranye ngo bizajya biba birimo tombora nyinshi kuruta izari zirimo joro akaba ahamagarira abantu kuzajya babyitabira benshi iki gitaramo cyatangiye saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba kikarangira gitondo gatandatu cyitabiriwe n’abantu hagati kwinjira byari amafaranga ugahabwa skol ntoya y’ubuntu muryngo ibihembo byatanzwe tombora byari imipira kwambara amakarito y’ibirahure y’inzoga n’ibirahuri skol clarisse umuhire

title: urwishe ruracyayirimo leah karegeya yahize guhirika ubuyobozi kayumba nyamwasa rnc
content: ibibaso bikomeje kuba urusobe bayobozi bawo barimo kayumba nyamwasa kugeza n’aho leah karegeya umugore w’umwe bashinze mutwe avuze agiye kwihuza n’abandi badashyigikiye kayumba nyamwasa bakamuhirika ni nyuma y’uko abari basigaye bakomeye mutwe basa n’abitandukanyije kayumba nyamwasa kuko frank ruhinda musaza leah karegeya wabaga uganda yamaze gutoroka rnc agahungira canada yagiye kwifatanya tabita gwiza uheruka kwirukanwa rnc uyu tabitha gwiza yahoze komiseri ushinzwe abari n’abategarugoli ntara rnc canada akaba n’umubitsi w’akarere windsor ariko minsi ishize yarirukanwe uyu gwiza mushiki ben rutabana uheruka kuburirwa irengero ikibazo cyasembuye umwiryane mutwe frank ruhinda umwe bagize uruhare runini gushora abanyarwanda uganda mutwe p afatanyije cmi ababyanze bagakorerwa ibikorwa by’iyicarubozo abandi bakanicwa kwihuza leah karegeya frank ruhinda tabita gwiza n’abandi bafatwa nk’abari ibikomerezwa mutwe bigamije kotsa igitutu kayumba ushinjwa kurigisa umutungo rnc akawushora bikorwa bye by’ubucuruzi biri afurika y’epfo mozambique n’ahandi leah karegeya wahoze kanama gashinzwe imyitwarire n’imikorere rnc minsi ishize yashyize hanze ibaruwa ifunguye ikubiyemo ubwegure bwe nshingano yarahawe muri urwo rwandiko yavuze yeguye kubera komite ayoboye itizewe buryo imyanzuro bafata idahabwa agaciro ati nasanze mpamvu kuguma kuba umuyobozi gihe komite yahawe inshingano gufata ibyemezo bayobozi gaciro babiha imwe myanzuro harimo irebana n’uwari umuvugizi wayo jean paul turayishimye uheruka kwirukanwa nyuma kuzamura ikibazo kirimo ibura ry’umwe komiseri rnc benjamin rutabana leah yavuze itsinda rye ryemeje turayishimye yirukanwe kubera yagaragaje impungenge ibura rutabana gusa nyamwasa yahisemo ahubwo kumwirukana atabagishije inama leah karegeya yafatwaga nk’inararibonye rnc kuko umuyobozi kanama k’inararibonye kagishwaga inama bikorwa bitandukanye by’uyu mutwe kandi akaba umwe bantu bakunzwe n’abayoboke benshi rnc amakuru avuga benshi bashyigikiye leah karegeya batuye afurika y’epfo i burayi canada gukora bashoboye kose bitandukanye rnc ariko bakabinyuza buryo kwegura bavuga mpamvu zabo bwite birinda kwiteranya kayumba kuva hamenyekana amakuru y’ibura ben rutabana bikekwa ryagizwemo uruhare kayumba nyamwasa benshi bayobozi mutwe w’iterabwoba bareguye abandi bareguzwa baranirukanwa ibi byahise bitanga ishusho rnc yabaye nk’ubwato buri kurohama kandi butagifite umusare ubuyoboye ibi kandi byaje bikurikiye icyemezo leta afurika y’epfo kibuza impunzi ziri butaka bwayo gukora ibikorwa n’inama zifite zihuriye politiki kugeza abafatwaga nk’inkingi mwamba rnc bitandukanyije nayo dr thogne rudasingwa kazungu jean paul dr muvunyi paulin bwayihuku mathias nsabimana callixte wiyita sankara maboko y’ubutabera rwanda mu baburiwe irengero buryo budasobanutse bikekwa byakozwe n’ubuyobozi rnc maj nkubana emmanuel rwarinda michel benjamin rutabana ukuriye ikigega cyitiriwe umuryango rwigara cyanyuzwamo by’inkunga yatungaga rnc umuzi w’ibibazo leah karegeya afitanye n’ubuyobozi rnc si uwa vuba kuko umugabo patrick karegeya yapfa abasigaye buyobozi bwawo ntibigeze bamuha ijambo nyamwasa n’umugore inzobere kunyereza umutungo bashoye umutungo rnc bucuruzi bw’umuryango wabo harimo amahahiro akomeye afurika y’epfo mozambique n’ahandi nk’uko amakuru abivuga nyamwasa ashinjwa kwiharira rnc bagenzi bafatanyije gushinga mutwe bamushinja kunyereza umutungo kutagira imiyoborere inoze kwironda gukoresha icyenewabo kwigwizaho iby’uyu mutwe kayumba yagiye akorana n’abo muryango barimo muramu frank ntwari akaba yaranamuhaye imbaraga kuba komiseri ushinzwe urubyiruko ntwari yagiye ashinjwa n’umugore rutabana diane rutabana umuntu wagiye atera ubwoba umugabo diane yavuze inshuro nyinshi yagiye agaragaza ikibazo afite yanabwiye ijwi amerika ntwari yagiye atera ubwoba rutabana gihe yaba asubiye uganda azamufunga

title: ibimenyetso byakwereka umusore wihebeye atakigukunda
content: birumvikana bishengura kubona bimwe bimenyetso bikwereka umuhungu wihebeye ashobora kuba atakigukunda cyane igihe wowe wumvaga urushaho kumukunda gusa igihe ubashije kubibona amahirwe wowe kuko bikurinda gutakaza umwanya ndetse ukaba wamenya imyanzuro ukwiriye gufata hakiri kare ibi bimwe bimenyetso bishobora kukwereka umuhungu wihebeye atakigukunda arakurakarira n’aho bitari ngombwa umuhungu mukundana atagishaka mukundana wakoraga bikamushimisha hari igihe ubikora bikamurakaza cyangwa wagira umubaza niyo cyaba cyoroshye gusubiza akagusubizanya umushiha uyu mushiha n’uburakari yindi mpamvu uzi ibimutera nk’umunaniro yakuye kazi cyangwa ibibazo afite bye giti cye biba ikimenyetso cy’uko atakigushaka ndetse yifuza urukundo rwanyu ruhagarara aratinda cyangwa ntasubize ubutumwa bwawe iyo urukundo rugitangira abakundana bashaka kubonana kenshi gashoboka igihe bitakunze bakohererezanya ubutumwa bwinshi kandi ntibatinde gusubizanya mu gihe umuhungu mukundana usigaye umwandikira ubutumwa bugufi ntagusubize cyangwa akagusubiza haciyemo igihe wabimubaza bikamurakaza ndetse ntagire impamvu aguha yumvikana yatumye abikora biba ikindi kimenyetso yifuza urukundo rwanyu ruhagarara ahagarika kukubwira agukunda iyo umusore rukundo arabigaragaza ndetse agashaka umenya uburyo yiyumva akubwira agukunda kenshi bishoboka gihe atakikubwira agukunda kandi yarajyaga abikora ndetse wamubaza akigukunda akakubaza impamvu ubimubajije ikimenyetso cyerekana ashobora kuba atakigukunda ntaguha umwanya igihe ubona umuhungu mukundana atakiguha umwanya uze imbere buzima bwe ikimenyetso cy’uko ashaka urukundo rwanyu ruhagarara umuhungu ugukunda n’ubwo yaba ahuze cyane agerageza gushaka umwanya mukabonana cyangwa mukavugana igihe akubwiye ahuze akabigira impamvu kuba mutabonana uburyo kukwigizayo ariko akaba adafite imbaraga kukubwira atakigukunda mbere ntaguhumuriza bibazokimwe byiza kuba rukundo ukumva ufite umuntu ukuri ndetse ushobora kugufasha bibazo byose wahura nabyo akabana mu gihe ubona umuhungu mukundana atakikuba ahubwo ibibazo byaza ukabona ararushaho kuguhunga bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy’uko atakigukunda akunda kugaragara nk’utishimye birasanzwe rukundo umuntu wese agira igihe yumva atameze neza ndetse atishimye ariko igihe ubibona buryo buhoraho musore mukundana ariko utazi impamvu ibimutera wenda ituruka hanze y’urukundo rwanyu bishobora ikimenyetso cy’uko ashaka muhagarika umubano wanyu

title: perezida kagame yagaragaje isoko rusange afurika ryahoze bitekerezo by’abanyafurika
content: perezida paul kagame yagaragaje isoko rusange afurika afcfta ryabaye impamo kubera ubushake politiki buri bayobozi mugabane umukuru w’igihugu witabiriye inama yiga ishoramari afurika n’u bwongereza yabigarutseho mbere tariki mutarama kiganiro kivuga bucuruzi n’ishoramari perezida kagame yagihuriyemo mugenzi guinea alpha cond uwa malawi peter mutharika n’umunyamabanga leta y’u bwongereza ushinzwe ubucuruzi n’ishoramari liz truss ibihugu afurika nibyo byitabiriye inama yiga ishoramari afurika n’u bwongereza bihagarariwe rwego rw’abakuru b’ibihugu guverinoma perezida kagame yavuze u rwanda rwakoze buryo budasanzwe gufasha ishoramari buryo ruri mwanya kabiri mugabane afurika yagize ku ruhande rwacu twakoze ishoramari gushyira ubushobozi gucuruza gukurura ishoramari banki y’isi yashyize u rwanda bihugu by’imbere byoroshye kuhakorera ubucuruzi turi kabiri afurika’’ u rwanda kandi ruza mwanya isi koroshya ishoramari umukuru w’igihugu yanavuze imibare igaragaza ubucuruzi hagati banyafurika bugiye kuzatera imbere amahirwe rwanda n’ibindi bihugu afurika byiteguye kuyungukiramo gutangamo umusanzu yagize isoko rusange afurika ryabaye impamo bisobanuye ubushake politiki ruhande rw’abayobozi bashyize hamwe ibi kandi byaje bishyigikira ingufu n’icyifuzo kwishyira hamwe twakomeje kujya dutekereza kuzageraho muri nama kandi u rwanda banki y’isi bazashyira isoko ry’imari n’imigabane ry’i londres impapuro mvunjwafaranga z’imyaka itatu zifite agaciro miliyoni ibigo bitandukanye bikorera rwanda byitabiriye nama harimo banki kigali entreprise urwibutso mara phones rwanda yashyizweho umukono n’abayobozi b’ibihugu afurika werurwe i kigali kuyashyira bikorwa bizatuma ubukene bugabanuka by’umwihariko abagera miliyoni bazava bukene bukabije ukuvuga by’abatuye mugabane muri title: umuganda inyunganizi ngengo y’imari y’igihugu
content: kimwe n’indi myaka yashize mwaka - wakozwemo ibikorwa binyuranye by’umuganda gihugu hose birimo guhanga imihanda y’imigenderano gutinda amateme kubaka amazu y’abatishoboye kubaka amashuli y’uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka ybe kubaka ubwiherero kubaka ibigega guhunikamo imyaka gucukura imyobo guteramo ibiti gutera ibiti kubaka ibiro by’utugari gucukura ibyobo bifata amazi n’ibindi ibikorwa byose byakozwe bikaba byarahawe agaciro kangana y’amafaranga y’u rwanda nk’uko bigaragara rapport yashyizwe ahagaragara minaloc italiki mbere nzeli n’ubwo ibikorwa byakozwe bifite agaciro kanini gihugu hose ariko ntibyabujije hakorwa ibarura rigamije kumenya ubwitabire buri ntara muri raporo baragaragaza umujyi kigali hamwe n’intara y’uburengerazuba ziri mwanya nyuma n’ubwitabire bungana akaba nazo zifite ubwitabire buri hasi ugereranyije n’izindi ntara gihe intara y’amajyaruguru mwanya mbere n’ubwitabire igakurikirwa n’intara y’amajyepfo ifite intara y’uburasirazuba ikaza mwanya gatatu n’ubwitabire bungana aha intara zititwaye neza zikaba zisabwa kwikubita agashyi nyuma kumenya ubwitabire buhagaze gihugu hose barebye intara yakoze ibikorwa bifite agaciro kanini intara y’iburasirazuba iza isonga n’ibikorwa bifite agaciro kangana z’amafaranga y’u rwanda gihe umujyi kigali uza mwanya nyuma n’ibikorwa bifite agaciro kangana z’amanyarwanda aha kugira agaciro k’ibikorwa by’umuganda karusheho kuzamuka abakoze raporo berekanye hari ibintu by’ingenzi bitatu bigomba kwitabwaho ubwitabire bw’abaturage umurava buri wese witabiriye igenamigambi rinoze kandi risesengura neza ibikorwa by’ingenzi bifitiye abaturage n’igihugu rusange akamaro si gusa ariko byakozwe kuko mpera z’ukwezi werurwe minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu yatangije amarushanwa y’ibikorwa by’umuganda nshuro kabiri akaba yarashyiriweho kugirango atere imbaraga n’ubushake abaturage barusheho gukunda kwitabira ibikorwa by’umuganda benshi binyuze muco guhiga guhanga udushya umurenge kavumu karere ngororero intara y’uburengerazuba akaba waje mwanya mbere rwego rw’igihugu ubikesha urugomero rw’amashanyarazi rwubatswe n’abaturage bakabasha kwivana icuraburindi ku mwanya kabiri haje umurenge musange karere nyamagabeintara y’amajyepfo wahinze inanasi buso bungana ha bikazabafasha kwikura bukene ku mwanya gatatu hari umurenge manyagiro karere gicumbi intara y’amajyaruguru abaturage bawutuyemo bubatse amazu y’abahejwe inyuma n’amateka rwego kubafasha kwiteza imbere batura heza uretse ibikorwa byakozwe muganda rusange kandi raporo irerekana ibindi byakozwe n’ingabo polisi cyumweru army week police week n’ibindi byakozwe n’abanyarwanda banyuranye nzego zitandukanye hari kandi n’ibyakorewe mahanga babaga butumwa rwego kumenyekanisha umuco mwiza igihugu cyacu gifite aha twavuga ingabo z’u rwanda butumwa bw’amahoro bw’umuryango w’abibumbye majyaruguru darfur ahitwa el-fasher batangizaga umuganda buri kwezi bafatanyije n’ingabo z’ibindi bihugu ziri butumwa nyuma y’umuganda hagendaga habaho ibiganiro bitandukanye bigamije gukangurira abaturage kwitabira gahunda leta hamwe kugira uruhare bikorwa bibakorerwa batanga umusanzu wabo rwego kwiyubakira igihugu cyane cyagerwaho batabigizemo uruhare anne niwemwiza

content: ibi bimwe byavugiwe kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kane tariki akaba ikiganiro cyateguwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima ishami rishinzwe kurwanya sida iki kiganiro kikaba cyari kigamije kumenyekanisha ibizigirwa nama y’igihugu ngarukamwaka kurwanya icyorezo sida bana izabera i kigali tariki kugeza ugushyingo mwaka ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima rwanda biomedical center rbc kivuga nubwo gahunda gukwirakwiza udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye igifite ingorane kutumvikanwaho bitazatuma gahunda idashoboka dr anita asiimwe umuyobozi mukuru wungirije rbc avuga kubera imyaka y’abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye ibarirwa hagati gahunda gukwirakwiza udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye niyemerwa hazabaho ubushakashatsi bw’udukingirizo tuberanye n’abo banyeshuri dr anita asiimwe agira hazabaho ubushakashatsi bwihuse hagamijwe kumenya udukingirizo turi isoko dutoya cyangwa tunini bana ubu hari ubushakashatsi dufite bwakozwe minisiteri y’ubuzima buvuga hari abavuga udukingirizo duhari isoko ry’u rwanda tudafite impumuro nziza n’ibi tuzabyigaho hazanwe udukingirizo dufite impumuro zidatuma hari abanga gukoresha udukingirizo ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita muryango un family naryo rivuga u rwanda nirwemeza ikwirakwiza ry’udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye rugomba gukora ubushakashatsi dukingirizo tuberanye n’abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye dr landry tsigain akorera un family avuga kumenya udukingirizo tungana kuko hari udukingirizo dushobora kuba tunini bamwe utundi tukaba duto bandi yatanze urugero bihugu by’afurika y’amajyepfo kuko higeze kuza udukingirizo tunini bagabo ubushakashatsi bwakozwe minisiteri y’ubuzima mwaka buzima bw’imyororokere y’ingimbi n’abangavu bugaragaza abakobwa batangira gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina myaka abahungu bagatangira myaka inzego z’ubuvuzi zivuga kuba hari abakobwa batwara inda mashuri yisumbuye ikimenyetso cy’uko hadafashwe ingamba zikomeye habaho ubwiyongere bw’ubwandu sida mashuri yisumbuye rubyiruko rusange jean baptiste micomyiza

title: ngoma kubufatanye leta police y’u rwanda iti bayi bayi gatadowa buje
content: mugutangiza icyumweru cy’ibikorwa police y’u rwanda police week rwego rw’akarere ngoma byabereye m’umurenge jarama akagali karenge umudugudu kanombeaho bacaniye imiryango bakoresheje ingufu zituruka imirasire y’izuba gahunda guca agatadowa ndetse buje igikorwa kikaba gikomeje police y’u rwanda kandi iteganya gucanira imiryango ibihumbi turere gihugu nkuko biri gukorwa turere tugize igihugu ubufatanye leta police y’u rwanda ikomeje ibikorwa bitandukanye mugihe cy’ icyumweru police week gufasha abanyarwanda kubona umuriro w’amashanyarazi ukomoka ngufu z’imirasire y’izubauwo muhango rwego rw’akarere ngoma watangiriye murenge jarama kagari karenge witabiriwe n’abayobozi batandukanye harimo umujyana minisitiri w’urubyiruko n’ikoranabuhangaingabo policeumuyobozi w’akarere ndetse n’abaturage watangijwe gutaha bimwe mubikorwa byakozwe basura imiryango yacaniwe bamwe miryango banejejwe n’iterambere leta y’u rwanda ndetse police babagejejeho bamwe bemeza bizatuma babasha ku’irindira umutekano mugihe hari ubujura bukabije kubera umwijima umuturage yarambikaga igale hasi ageze murugo kugirango akingure yacyebuka inyumaagasanga bararitwayeariko kubera urumuribasigaye bafite umutekanomwijambo umuyobozi wungirije police y’u rwanda dgatare yageje kubari yavuze cyumweru week police bateganya gucanira ingo ibihumbi turere gihugu k’ubufatanye leta y’u rwanda abatangariza ibikorwa kwibandaho cyumweru harimo umusanzu guca agatadowa buje bamaze gucanira imiryango m’umudugudu kanombegukangurira abaturage umutekano barwanya ingengabitekerezo jenoside ndetse kubungabunga ibidukikijekurwanya ibiyobyabwengekurwanya ihohoterwa rikorerwa igitsina n’icuruzwa ry’abantukurwanya ruswa ndetse kwirinda impanuka mumuhanda asoza asaba abari ibimaze kugerwaho birindwa abashaka kubyangiriza umuyobozi w’akarere ngoma nambaje aphrodis yatangiye ashimira police y’ u rwanda ndetse n’ubuyobozi bukuru bw’igihugu buyobowe nyakubahwa perezida repubulika paul kagameku amashanyarazi batanze akomoka mirasire y’izuba umusemburo w’iterambere nkuko biri cyerekezo abanyarwanda bazaba bacana amashanyarazi gipimo bagasezera gucana agatadowa akomeza agaragaza imikorere myiza police agira atiisura nziza police yacu umwihariko kwisi kuko ifatanya n’abaturage bikorwa gucunga umutekano yongeraho kandi bikomoka miyoborere myiza leta y’u rwandaagira iyi myumvire y’abanyarwanda kurindira hamwe umutekano policeiyi mikorere myiza police gukorana n’abaturagebikomoka miyoborere myiza igihugu cyacu kimaze kugeraho tubicyesha nyakubahwa perezida repubulika y’u title: bugesera umurego kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge
content: ibi baturage babitangaje cyumweru polisi y’igihugu bufatanye n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere bagiye kariya gace guta yombi abaturage bacuruza ibinyobwa bitemewe n’amategeko abaturage batuye aka gace mirambi bavuga gakunda kugaragaramo ikibazo cy’umutekano muke bikururwa n’ibibazo bitandukanye birimo ubujura n’icuruzwa ry’ibiyobyabwenge kanyanga irimo cyane mezi abiri ashije hiciwe abantu babiri karemera sam umuyobozi polisi ntara y’iburasirazuba witabiriye igikorwa guta yombi abaturage bakoze uruganda gucuruza kanyanga kariya gace yatangarije abaturage gihe kitari gito polisi igiye gushyira bikorwa icyifuzo cyabo gufungura ishami ryayo aka gace icyakora ariko karemera yababwiye icyihutirwa kurusha ibindi ukugira ubushake gufatanya n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere guhangana n’ibikorwa bibahungabanyiriza umutekano rwagaju louis umuyobozi w’akarere bugesera kubufatanye n’abari bahagarariye inzego z’umutekano bitabiriye gikorwa yabwiye abaturage bagomba kwirinda ibikorwa gucuruza kanyanga n’ibindi biyobyabwenge byose kuko nyir’abayazana w’umutekano muke karere bugesera rwagaju kandi yavuze ubuyobozi bw’akarere bwari busanzwe buzi ibihakorerwa icyari gisigaye ukuza guta yombi abacurizi kanyangaati’’twari tubizi icyari gisigaye cyari umwanya kuza kubafata iyo uhamwe n’icyaha gucuruza kanyanga inzoga itemewe n’amategeko y’u rwanda uhanishwa igihano cy’igifungo kiri hagati y’amezi atatu n’imyaka itanu cyangwa ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi byaba ngombwa ukabihanishwa byombi mimi rachel mukandayisenga

title: imfubyi jenoside zirasaba kurushaho kwegerwa
content: nubwo u rwanda rufite rugeze guhangana n’ingaruka jenoside abana bagizwe imfubyi baracyakeneye inama urukundo gusurwa kwitabwaho kuko abakagombye kubibaha batagihari nk’uko byatangajwe n’uhagarariye ibuka karere rubavu kabanda innocent kabanda yasabye abanyarubavu kwita bana ndetse n’abapfakazi kabanda yongeyeho ubupfura batojwe butabemerera kwangana mpamvu biteguye gutanga imbabazi babiciye babishaka yagize ntabwo tuzizirika muntu watwiciye uzashaka imbabazi azatwegere tuzazimuha uyu munsi kwibuka tariki wabimburiwe n’urugendo ruva murenge rugerero rujya rwibutso rw’uwo murenge wanaranzwe n’indirimbo z’abana barokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bibumbiye itsinda ryitwa imanzi’ ubuhamya gushyira indabo rwibutso rugerero ku isaha saa sita abanyarubavu bunamiye inzirakarengane iminota itatu hanyuma bakurikirana radiyo ijambo nyakubahwa perezida repubulika yavugiye sitade amahoro mujyi kigali umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheikh bahame hassan yashimiye abaturage b’ako karere kuba bitabiriye gahunda benshi anabasaba kuzitabira gahunda z’icyumweru cy’icyunamo zizaba zirimo ibiganiro yongeyeho kwegera abacitse icumu ingenzi bagahumurizwa urwibutso rugerero rushyinguyemo imibiri y’abatutsi gusoza icyumweru cy’icyunamo karere rubavu bikazabera murenge mudende tariki mata kugeza imibare yavuye bushakashatsi bwakozwe ibuka yerekana abazize jenoside bangana rwanda hose pascaline umulisa

title: imihango n’imigenzo yakorwaga n’abanyarwanda kwirukana ibiza n’ibyorezo
content: imihango yakorwaga ahanini yabaga ishingiye biteganywa n’ubwiru umwuga w’ubupfumu ubuvubyi ubuhennyi ubuhoryo n’ubuhaditsi igitabo imizi y’u rwanda cyanditswe n’umusizi nsanzabera jean de dieu inzobere muco amateka n’ubuvanganzo havugwamo buri cyorezo cyateraga u rwanda habaga hari uburyo bwateguwe kucyohera cyangwa kukirukana bakoreshejwe migenzo n’imihango yashyizwe u rwanda rwahangwaga inzira kivu ni inzira yabagamo urwunge rw’imihango yakorwaga gihe gihugu habaga hateye umwuzure ukangiza byinshi gihugu bakoraga imihango kwirunka mwuzure inzira muhekenyi ni inzira yabagamo urwunge rw’imihango yakorwaga gihe habaga hateye ibyonnyi n’indwara z’amatungo bityo hagakorwa imihango n’imigenzo kuyohera nyuma y’imihango y’ibwami ijyanye n’ubwiru kohera ibiza n’ibyorezo hakurikiragaho abahanga gakondo kuvura icyateye cyorezo kucyohera ntikizagaruke bamwe bakoraga mihango bakurikira abavubyi mu rwanda ha mbere abavubyi bafite umumaro uhanitse mibereho myiza y’abaturage cyane cyane buhinzi umwuga wabo gakondo kuvuba imvura ikagwa yabaga yahagamye kuyohera ikagenda yabaga yaciye ibintu iyo habaga hateye amapfa cyangwa se umwuzure gihe nibwo abavubyi nk’inzobere kumanura imvura bahagurukaga bagakora imihango kuyimanura ikagwa amapfa akagenda iyo yabaga yaciye ibintu hakaba umwuzure nabwo bakoraga imihango kuyohera abahoryo abahoryo nabo bamwe banyamihango b’ibwami bagiraga uruhare runini gukurikirana ibihingwa murima kuvura ibyonnyi by’indwara zabaga zadutse myaka barahagurukaga bagakora imihango kuvuma byonnyi kuvuguta imiti kubyamurura butaka bw’u rwanda abahaditsi ni bamwe banyamihango b’ibwami bagiraga uruhare runini gukurikirana indwara z’amatungo zabaga zadutse bworozi bw’i rwanda icyo gihe nibwo abahaditsi barahagurukaga bagakora imihango kuvuguta imiti kubyamurura rwanda abahennyi abahennyi nabo bamwe banyamihango b’ibwami bifashishwaga kuvura indwara z’ibyorezo zibasiye abantu kuvuma ababisha banga u rwanda iyo habaga hateye ibyorezo by’indwara icya mbere bakoraga ukumenya inkomoko yabyo basanga ibirogano bagahenera uwabikoze akaba ikivume basanga icyorezo cy’inzaduka bakagishakira amasubyo kucyohera nibo batangaga amasubyo kuvura amahumane ibinyoro ubushita n’izindi mu kwamurura kohera ibyozezo by’indwara z’abantu n’amatungo abanyarwanda bifashishaga kandi amazi y’ubuhoro yeza igihugu agakiza ubwandure akamurura ibiza by’indwara n’umuze byazengereje igihugu bigaragaza kera abanyarwanda bafite ubuhanga n’ubushobozi bifashishaga guhashya umwanzi w’ubuzima bwabo n’ibyabo ni abantu bakoresheje ubwenge bw’umwimerere kwirwanaho bahagarara buzima bwabo butaganzwa n’ibyorezo by’indwara n’ibiza by’amapfa n’imyuzure

title: umuganda inyunganizi ngengo y’imari y’igihugu
content: kimwe n’indi myaka yashize mwaka - wakozwemo ibikorwa binyuranye by’umuganda gihugu hose birimo guhanga imihanda y’imigenderano gutinda amateme kubaka amazu y’abatishoboye kubaka amashuli y’uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka ybe kubaka ubwiherero kubaka ibigega guhunikamo imyaka gucukura imyobo guteramo ibiti gutera ibiti kubaka ibiro by’utugari gucukura ibyobo bifata amazi n’ibindi ibikorwa byose byakozwe bikaba byarahawe agaciro kangana y’amafaranga y’u rwanda nk’uko bigaragara rapport yashyizwe ahagaragara minaloc italiki mbere nzeli n’ubwo ibikorwa byakozwe bifite agaciro kanini gihugu hose ariko ntibyabujije hakorwa ibarura rigamije kumenya ubwitabire buri ntara muri raporo baragaragaza umujyi kigali hamwe n’intara y’uburengerazuba ziri mwanya nyuma n’ubwitabire bungana akaba nazo zifite ubwitabire buri hasi ugereranyije n’izindi ntara gihe intara y’amajyaruguru mwanya mbere n’ubwitabire igakurikirwa n’intara y’amajyepfo ifite intara y’uburasirazuba ikaza mwanya gatatu n’ubwitabire bungana aha intara zititwaye neza zikaba zisabwa kwikubita agashyi nyuma kumenya ubwitabire buhagaze gihugu hose barebye intara yakoze ibikorwa bifite agaciro kanini intara y’iburasirazuba iza isonga n’ibikorwa bifite agaciro kangana z’amafaranga y’u rwanda gihe umujyi kigali uza mwanya nyuma n’ibikorwa bifite agaciro kangana z’amanyarwanda aha kugira agaciro k’ibikorwa by’umuganda karusheho kuzamuka abakoze raporo berekanye hari ibintu by’ingenzi bitatu bigomba kwitabwaho ubwitabire bw’abaturage umurava buri wese witabiriye igenamigambi rinoze kandi risesengura neza ibikorwa by’ingenzi bifitiye abaturage n’igihugu rusange akamaro si gusa ariko byakozwe kuko mpera z’ukwezi werurwe minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu yatangije amarushanwa y’ibikorwa by’umuganda nshuro kabiri akaba yarashyiriweho kugirango atere imbaraga n’ubushake abaturage barusheho gukunda kwitabira ibikorwa by’umuganda benshi binyuze muco guhiga guhanga udushya umurenge kavumu karere ngororero intara y’uburengerazuba akaba waje mwanya mbere rwego rw’igihugu ubikesha urugomero rw’amashanyarazi rwubatswe n’abaturage bakabasha kwivana icuraburindi ku mwanya kabiri haje umurenge musange karere nyamagabeintara y’amajyepfo wahinze inanasi buso bungana ha bikazabafasha kwikura bukene ku mwanya gatatu hari umurenge manyagiro karere gicumbi intara y’amajyaruguru abaturage bawutuyemo bubatse amazu y’abahejwe inyuma n’amateka rwego kubafasha kwiteza imbere batura heza uretse ibikorwa byakozwe muganda rusange kandi raporo irerekana ibindi byakozwe n’ingabo polisi cyumweru army week police week n’ibindi byakozwe n’abanyarwanda banyuranye nzego zitandukanye hari kandi n’ibyakorewe mahanga babaga butumwa rwego kumenyekanisha umuco mwiza igihugu cyacu gifite aha twavuga ingabo z’u rwanda butumwa bw’amahoro bw’umuryango w’abibumbye majyaruguru darfur ahitwa el-fasher batangizaga umuganda buri kwezi bafatanyije n’ingabo z’ibindi bihugu ziri butumwa nyuma y’umuganda hagendaga habaho ibiganiro bitandukanye bigamije gukangurira abaturage kwitabira gahunda leta hamwe kugira uruhare bikorwa bibakorerwa batanga umusanzu wabo rwego kwiyubakira igihugu cyane cyagerwaho batabigizemo uruhare anne niwemwiza

content: bagosora nsengiyumva barajuririra igihano cy’igifungo burundu bahawe kubera ibyaha jenoside n’ibindi byaha byibasiye inyoko muntu ntawukulilyayo yajuririye igihano cy’igifungo cy’imyaka yakatiwe kubera uruhare yagize jenoside ku itariki ukuboza nibwo bagosora wahoze ayobora ibiro minisitiri w’ingabo yakatiwe nyuma guhamwa n’ibyaha jenoside ibyaha byibasiye ikiremwamuntu n’ibyaha by’intambara birimo kwica uwari minisitiri w’intebe agathe uwilingiyimana n’abandi basirikare b’ababiligi onu bagosora anashinjwa kugira uruhare ishyirwaho bariyeri hirya hino kigali gisenyi hagati y’itariki mata nsengiyumva ukuriye ibikorwa gisirikare gisenyi yahamijwe ubwicanyi bakorewe kaminuza mudende paruwasi nyundo ndetse n’ubwicanyi bwakorewe abasivili gice ayoboye yanahamijwe kandi kuba yarohereje ibitero by’interahamwe bisesero kwica abatutsi bagosora nsengiyumva baburanishirijwe igihe kimwe hamwe n’abandi basirikare babiri aribo brigadier-general gratien kabiligi major aloys ntabakuze kabiligi yahisevarekurwa ntabakuze ajurira rubanza rwabaye itariki werurwe urubanza ntabakuze rwaje gutandukanywa n’urwabandi nyuma y’aho uwamwunganiraga mategeko umunyamerika peter erlinder ananiriwe kwitaba urukiko tariki werurwe ubujurire bwe bwaje gusomwa tariki nzeri na nubu buracyakomeza ntawukulilyayo yakatiwe igihano cy’igifungo cy’imyaka kubera uruhare yagize bwicanyi bwakorewe kibuye n’i butare umunyamakuru kigali today

title: ibuka iratabariza abarokotse jenoside batishoboye
content: jean pierre dusingizemungu yasabye umukuru w’igihugu leta ikwiye kunoza gahunda gufasha abacitse icumu bafite indwara zidasanzwe ahanini batewe jenoside kimwe kunoza amategeko ajyanye gusoza imanza gacaca hishyurwa abangirijwe imitungo mu ijamabo yavuze gatandatu tariki muhango gutangiza umuhango gutangiza icyunamo kwibuka nshuro jenoside yakorewe abatutsi perezida ibuka yagaragaje hari urubyiruko rufite ingufu n’ubushake guherekeza abandi iterambere ry’igihugu ariko bushobozi rufite ati hakenewe inkunga kubaherekeza bikorwa by’iterambere perezida ibuka yagarutse kibazo cy’ihungabana asaba hashyirwaho uburyo buhoraho kwita kibazo cy’ihungabana gikomeza kugaragara bacikacumu ubwo buryo buzaza bwunganira amatsinda ashinzwe gufasha abahura n’iryo hungabana yashyizweho rwego rw’imirenge nubwo hakiri ibibazo ariko hari byinshi byagezweho gufasha abarokotse kugeza hari abana barenga ibihumbi barihiwe farg kugeza barangije ayisumbuye abarangije kaminuza bagera bihumbi bine ndetse n’abandi ibihumbi bitanu bakiga hari abatishoboye bubakiwe amazu barenga ibihumbi abishurirwa ubwisungane buvuzi barenga ibihumbi abahabwa amafaranga y’ingoboka bakarenga ibihumbi ibyo biza byiyongera zindi gahunda bagenerwa zirimo guhabwa n’inka emmanuel n hitimana

title: akabaye icwende ntikoga
content: kuva nkundura y’amashyaka menshi u rwanda rwiswe rufite demokarasi ishingiye mashyaka harimo n’ ataravugaga rumwe leta habyarimana kugeza munsi hari abanyapolitiki bakomeje kwerekana atari abanyapolitiki bashaka impunduka kandi bashakira iterambere abaturage ahubwo bashyize imbere n’imyanya n’inda nini zabotwagiramungu faustin washaka ukongeraho rukokoma izina ritajya ribura matwi y’abanyarwanda kenshi ushobora kwikanga ryakoze iby’indashyikirwa ariko byahe kajya abarizi nyiraryo bazi imbaraga nke zishoboka mikorere ariko zigasumbwa kuvuga cyane wakwita gusakuza nk’ingunguru ikipe y’igihugu ihahombera ityo izize rukokoma mwaka umwe irarangiye burundu ndetse niyo sosiete yaje guhomba mu nkundura y’amashyaka ntiyatanzwe kuko yashatse kugarura mdr parmehutu ishyaka sebukwe kayibanda gregoire abahutu banga kumuyoboka ahubwo bigira cdr bahoraga bahanganye radio rwanda nyuma jenoside yakorewe abatutsi leta y’ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda nayo yamugiriye icyizere minisitiri w’intebe kubera amasezerano y’amahoro y’arusha kuko mbere y’uko jenoside iba tariki mutarama habyarimana yananiwe gushyiraho guverinoma twagiramungu arahire habyarimana arahira wenyine mugitondo title: kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda izashyingura abazize jenoside bagera
content: venatie nyirabahire watanze ubuhamya bw’uko bantu bishwe yavuze akeka bishwe itariki kuko tariki bumvise amasasu arivugiramo nyiramuhire avuga ababazwa n’uko abantu batsinzwe shyamba ndetse n’abiciwe i butare rusange bazize akagambane k’abanyabwenge bagizwe ahanini n’abadogiteri n’abarimu kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda nyiramuhire umwarimukazi gihea avuga butare haguye abantu benshi bitewe n’uko bafite icyizere cy’uko bazaba bagendeye perefe butare umututsi bakumva azabarinda ikindi yongeraho uwari perezida w’u rwanda juvenal habyarimana akimara gupfa basabye abantu kuguma banabizeza umutekano icyizere cy’umutekano bizeye cyatangiye kuyoyoka uwahize perezida w’inzibacyuho theodore sindikubwabo yajyaga i butare tariki mata akavuga ijambo ryabatanze mugaragaro nk’uko nyiramuhire akomeza abivuga bukeye bwaho batangiye kujya bumva amasasu avugira arboretum n’ahandi hirya hino mugi nyuma yaho ndetse abicanyi babigiriwemo inama n’abarundi barahungiye rwanda batangira kujya bifashisha intwaro gakondo nk’amahiri kwica abatutsi banga gupfusha amasasu ubusa marie claire joyeuse

title: ese waba uzi inkomoko lacoste
content: tubona abantu benshi bambara imyenda cyangwa inkweto bifite ikimenyetso kiriho cy’ingona ndetse ikagurwa nabatari bake ariko ntawabura kwibaza kimenyetso cyaturutse kugirango gitangre kwambarwa ndetse n’uwakizanye ubundi kimenyetso cy’ingona yaje kwitirirwa lacoste yatangiriye mipira gusa ndetse yambarwa n’umugabo umwe byatangiye mwaka w’i kapiteni w’ikipe y’igihugu cy’ubufaransa y’umukino tennis yashyiriragaho intego umwe muba bakinnyi w’igihangange witwa ren lacoste marushanwa coupe davis kapiteni yabwiye mukinnyi yizeraga naramuka afashije ikipe y’ubufaransa ikitwara neza marushanwa gihe atsinze umukino w’ingenzi azamuhemba ivarisi nziza cyane ikozwe ruhu rw’ingona nizo varisi zari zigezweho kandi zihenze cyane gihe bitewe n’ukuntu ren lacoste yitwaraga kibuga abanyamerika bamuhaye akazi the crocodile ingona impamvu mukinnyi atateshukaga ntego ze kuburyo yashirwaga aruko ageze yiyemeje bityo bamugereranya n’ingona kubera yuko nayo yirukankanye ikintu ukugeza ikigezeho iri zina ryaje kwamamara hose dore igihangange inshuti yitwaga robert george yaje kumushushanyiriza ingona kw’ikote yagiye yambaye kibuga noneho byerekana nk’ingona koko kandi arabyishimira cyane ntibyatinze mwaka w’i ren lacoste afatanyije andr gillier bashinga uruganda rukora imipira kwambara barwita lacoste noneho ikimenyetso kiranga uruganda bashyiraho ingona imipira mbere uru ruganda rwakoze yasaga nk’umweru ifite amaboko magufi kandi iriho akamenyetso k’ingona imbere nina mbere mateka ikimenyetso cy’uruganda cyashyizwe inyuma mipira nkuko tubibona mipira lacoste iyi mipira yahise ikundwa cyane n’abakinnyi tennis buryo gihe kugeza nubu ariyo bajya kibuga bambaye nyuma n’abantu basanzwe batangira kuyambara isakara hose lacoste si ubwoko bw’imipira gusa ahubwo hasigaye hanakorwa imyenda inkweto ndetse n’imibavu kwitera

title: umukobwa senderi yinjiye muzika ashyira hanze indirimbo mazina y’ubuhanzi kevin hit
content: umukobwa senderi international hit w’imyaka y’amavuko yinjiye muzika nyarwanda anashyira hanze indirimbo mbere ahita afata izina ry’ubuhanzi kevine hit anatangaza ingamba afite muzika nyarwanda ateganya gufatanya n’amasomo ntibimubuze kuba uwa mbere umwaka umwaka umuryango senderi international hit wungutsemo umuhanzi mushya akaba umukobwa senderi international hit witwa keza kevin wamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo mbere akanatangaza izina ry’ubuhanzi kevine hit mu kiganiro kevine hit yagiranye n’umunyamakuru inyarwandacom yashyiraga mugaragaro indirimbo mbere yise icyizere yavuze yinjiye muzika kandi ashaka kuzakomeza akazaba umuhanzikazi w’icyamamare ariko agashyira imbere amasomo ntibimubuze gukomeza kuba umuhanga ishuri nk’uko bisanzwe kevin hit ugiye kwimukira mwaka gatandatu w’amashuri abanza kigo giherereye i kayonza avuga yatangira amashuri abanza umwanya kure yabaye ishuri uwa kabiri ubusanzwe akaba yibera uwa mbere kandi akemeza bizanakomeza gutyo kuko atazemera umuziki wamurangaza umubuze kwiga ahubwo akaba azajya umwanya muzika gihe cy’ibiruhoko bikamufasha kuruhuka mutwe kevin hit avuga indirimbo se akunda iyitwa tekana ndetse n’iyitwa icyomoro bahanzikazi nyarwanda akaba akunda cyane butera knowless ariko umuhanzi ashaka kuzakurikiza akaba tom close kuko yifuza kuzaminuza akaba umuganga ariko akabifatanya muzika nk’uko tom close yabigezeho

title: rusizi abaturage bigabije akabari barakangiza bikomeye
content: abaturage kagari nyange murenge bugarama kane bigabije akabari kitwa vip bar bangiza inyubako n’ibikoresho byayo nyuma gusanga umurambo w’ umwana w’ umukobwa w’ imyaka itatu y’amavuko yapfiriye cyobo gifata amazi y’ako kabariuburakari bw’ abaturage bwazamuwe cyane n’ amagambo ushinzwe umutekano w’ ako kabari aherutse kubwira abaturage umwana azahafatira azamwica kandi yabiherewe uburenganzira nyir’ akabari uyu mwana witwaga irakoze gisle yabuze mugoroba kuwa gatatu tariki ugushyingo ababyeyi abaturage n’ ubuyobozi bw’ akagari nyange bagerageza kumushakisha ariko baramubura kuri kane gitondo nibwo umurambo watoraguwe gikari cy’ akabari kari kazwi izina vip bar cyobo gifata amazi y’ako kabari umusaza watahuye umurambo gisele yabwiye rba ndebye hirya gato bitewe n’ nari nabonye imyenda yambaye mbona yunamirije mfata gapira k’iwe mugongo n’abandi bantu batonze hariya ndababwira nti yewe dore mwana’ nibwo abantu bahise bazaabo baturage bahise bashinja nyir’akabari kuba yagize uruhare urwo rupfu kuko abashinzwe umutekano w’ako bamaze iminsi babujije ababyeyi kwemerera abana n’amatungo kuhagera undi mugore yagize njyewe mpereye magambo twabwiwe cyumweru n’ ushinzwe umutekano w’ aka kabari yaje dutuye yinjira zose aratubwira mabuja yambwiye umwana nzafata nzamuvune mwereke umwana wavunitse azampemba cyangwa mwice mwereke intumbi y’ mwana ihene nzafatira butaka bwitwa ubw’ iwe nzayibage iribwe rubanza ibi nibyo byateye abaturage uburakari bukabije birara kabari bamena ibikoresho byose bahasanze bakoresheje amabuye ibi bikorwa byahagaritswe n’abasirikare n’abapolisi banze myigaragambyo yafata indi ntera aganira muhaburarw murongo telephone umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge bugarama rukazambuga gilbert yavuze atahita ahamya nyakwigendera yishwe n’ amazi cyane umurambo wajyanywe gupimwa muganga yagize biragoye guhita duhamya uriya mwana yaguye kiriya cyobo nayo mpamvu ubuyobozi twahisemo gufata uriya murambo bakajya kuwupima nyuma ikibazo nigishyikirizwa urukiko polisi irangije gukora iperereza nibwo tuzabasha kumenya uriya mwana yazize kiriya cyoboumwe baturage batuye y’aka kabari yatangarije muhaburarw abaturage bafashe nyir’aka kabari kabitera kuko niwe wagakwiye kumenya neza ibikorerwa kabari ke ndetse ninabwo abaturage bafashe umwanzuro kwigaragambyayanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: kwitwara neza buroko gufasha urukiko bimwe bitumye bagaragaza agiye kurekurwa
content: iki cyemezo cyafashwe tariki ukwakira n’umucamanza khalida rachid khan uyobora urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u rwanda tpir gusaba irekurwa bagaragaza michel wakatiwe igihano gufungwa imyaka mwaka ushize amakuru kigalitodaycom gikesha itangazo ry’uryo rukiko aravuga mpamvu zatanzwe kumurekura harimo kuba urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho yougoslavia tpiy rufite imikorere ijya gusa n’iya tpir ruteganya imfungwa zakatiwe zishobora kurekurwa nyuma kumara bitatu kane by’igifungo barakatiwe kandi bagaragaza amaze imyaka afunze ukuvuga by’imyaka umunani yakatiwe izindi mpamvu michel bagaragaza ubwe yiyemeje kwishyikiriza urukiko akanemera yashinjwaga ndetse akerekana azi uburemere bwabyo akanabyicuza kuba yararanzwe n’imyitwarire myiza afungiye sude mugabane w’u burayi nyakanga umunyarwanda michel bagaragaza yahoze umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo ocir- ishami ry’icyayi akaba yarafatwaga nk’umwe nkoramutima juvnal habyarimana perezida w’u rwanda yamaze igihe ashakishwa tpir byaha kunoza umugambi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi kugira uruhare jenoside n’ubufatanyacyaha jenoside tariki kanama bagaragaza yishyikirije tpir bwende bwe yitaba urukiko munsi ukurikiyeho ariko ahakana byaha byose yashinjwaga nyuma y’aho bidashobokeye yoherezwa kuburanishirizwa rwanda nyuma kugirana imishyikirano yihariye n’ubushinjacyaha bagaragaza yemeye kuba yaragize uruhare ruziguye jenoside kuko yaremeye intwaro zari zigenewe gukora jenoside zibikwa ruganda rw’icyayi rubaya ndetse akaba yaranaguriraga interahamwe inzoga akanaziha amafaranga yemereye urukiko kandi yahaga interahamwe imodoka z’uruganda bazikoreshe ngendo zabo ariko yongeraho yabikoraga akiza amagara n’umuryango uko gufasha interahamwe bikaba aribyo byatumaga ubushinjacyaha buvuga yazorohereje akazi bigatuma zibasha kwica abantu bahungiye musozi kesho kiliziya nyundo utwo duce twose turi karere rubavu kubera kwemera yaregwaga kubisabira imbabazi imbere y’urukiko tariki ugushyingo bagaragaza yakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka umunani kandi urukiko rutegeka hakurwamo igihe yafunzwe michel bagaragaza azafungurwa itariki ukuboza bivuze ashigaje ukwezi kumwe n’iminsi itandatu buroko ernestine musanabera

title: bahombejwe n’inama bagiriwe n’akarere gicumbi
content: mu karere gicumbi ho ntara y’amajyaruguru murenge kisaro akarali mbuga murama bamwe baturage gatangaza bahombejwe n’inama bagiriwe n’akarere kugana ama banki bakarushaho kwiteza imbere nyuma bikaza kubaviramo guhomba abaturage bavuga babwiwe n’akarere gushora imari zabo kugura utuzu ducuruza amazi nabo bakazajya babasha kuyageza baturage bahaturiye bityo bakazajya bunguka mazi bagurisha bakabona ubwishyu banki nabo bakomeza kwiteza imbere bavuga hazaga umushinga guteza imbere iterambere ry’icyaro kisaro umushinga ugamije gukwirakwiza amazi meza muduce tugize tumwe tugari twa kisaro hamwe n’udusantere tumwe tumwe water for peoplesabaturage bavuga bakiriye neza igitekerezo bahawe n’ubuyobozi bwabo bagana banki akazu kamazi kakaba karatangwagaho ibihumbi maganabiri by’amafaranga y’u rwanda kujya yishyurwa gihe kingana n’umwaka umwe n’igice abaturage murenge kisaro kagari mbuga bakaba batangaza babyitabiriye benshi bagakomeza bavuga amazi meza yatangiye kuza batangaza byari byiza kuko bumvaga hari bavuye hari ikindi kiciro bajyiyemo kuko ubusanzwe bavugako baguraga injerekani y’amazi meza kabande bakayitangaho mazi aje bishyuraga ijerekani abaturage batangaza hashize igihe gingana n’amezi atandatu utuzu tw’amazi tugejejwe duce batuyemo gihe cy’amezi atandatu amazi akaba yarajemo igihe cy’icyumweru kimwe gusa ndori viateur wavuganye n’itangazamakuru yagize njye nitwa ndoli viateur nkaba ndi umuhinzi mworozi nkaba ntuye murenge kisaro akagali mubuga umudugudu nyakarekare avuga bavoma mibande cyanga bakareka imvura yaguye ikibazo mazi dufite hari n’abantu bafashe mazi rwiyemezamiro barangije kuyazana kugeza ubungubu babacaga ibihumbi muntu giti cye ku baturage nabo bagiye bavomera mavomo yabaga yaguzwe nabo bandi bakishyura ijerekani none byarahagaze bimaze nkamezi hejuru tandatu mbese hari ikibazo cy’amazi mvunabandi avugako babanje kumara amaze atandatu batavomesha aza kuza ukwezi kumwe none ntarongera kugaruka amaze n’imyaka ibiri ntakigendaamazi akiza barayaduhaye mazi akaba yaraje biturutse twavomaga kure tukanavoma ibirohwa sinzi umushinga waturutse uruza twe twabwirijwe n’akarere twagura utuzu twamazi nkumucuruzi narakaguze ndumva baranyatse ibihumbi urumva n’inkibihumbi biza gukomeza gukora byari kuba byiza ariko niyo baza bagakuraho impombo bazo ntacyo byantwara akaba aria ma faranga narinkuye sacco nk’inguzanyo kuko naberetse umushinga wanjye gucuruza amazi barabyemera nijye wabaye uwambere wayahaweamafaranga twayahaga umushinga twarababaye cyane kuko twajyiye gihombo kuko imyaka ibiri igiye gushira utavoma ugumya kujya kuvoma misozi nibyo ikibazo umushinga wakuraga amazi ahantu bita gahama ikibazo cyacu kizwi n’umurenge n’akarere kakizi simbizi umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa ntakintu atubwiraho atubwira amazi azaza ntakintu tujya tumubaza twe tubaza ababishinzwe baza kutwishyuza amafaranga iyo baje kureba hari ama faranga waba waravomesheje uramubwira uti ntabwo nigeze mvomesha ntamushobora damascene nkaba ntuye murenge kisaro kagali murama umudugudu kibingo bampaye akazi kujya nzamura amazi hano mwezi munani moteri yaje gushya ihiye noneho udukoresha yahise bajyana moteri bajya kuzibobinisha turategereza nkugirango twongere kuzamura amazi turategereza turaheba bahamagara twiyemeza mirimo bahamagara moteri zajyiye gukoreshwa yahamagara bakamubwira ntabwo yigeze ihagerambese umurenge wose title: umuririmbyi w’icyamamare bufaransa johnny hallyday wamamaye jean-philippe smet yitabye imana
content: umuririmbyi w’icyamamare bufaransa johnny hallyday wamamaye jean-philippe smet yitabye imana ijoro itariki ukuboza azize indwara y’ibihaha iby’urupfu rwe byatangajwe n’umugore hamwe perezida w’iki gihugu emmanuel macron mugitondo gatatu tariki ukuboza amakuru ikinyamakuru izubarirasherw gikesha urubuga httpwwwindependentcouk avuga muhanzi ukomeye njyana rock kanseri bihaha yayitewe kunywa ibiyobyabwenge iki kinyamakuru kivuga muhanzi afite ibihumbi by’amamiliyoni by’abamukurukira gihugu cye cy’ubufarasansa kuko ariwe wagurishije imizingo myinshi kurusha muhanzi wese uhakomoka iyi kanseri y’ibihaha muhanzi ayimaranye imyaka ndetse apfuye yateguraga alubumu nshya ndetse kuyimenyekanisha bitaramo bitandukanye urupfu rw’iki cyamamare rwavuzweho n’abatari bake perezida w’u bufaransa emmanul mcro yagize myaka umuntu w’igitangaza undi wagize avuga umugore laeticia yagize johnny hallyday yadusizenanditse amagambo ntayizeraariko noneho ukuriumugabo wanjye ntabwo akiri kumwe natwe ibitaro arwariyemo paris hospital bivuga hallyday watangiye muzika kandi apfuye yateguraga alubumu nshya ndetse kuzenguruka ahantu hose hallyday yagurishe miliyoni zirenga ijana z’imizingo albumu mbere y’uko yitaba imana celine dion yagize avuga rupfu rw’uyu muhanzi abinyujije rubuga twa twitter yagize ndabaye cyane kumva amakuru avuga johnny hallyday yitabye imana yari umuntu udasanzwe muzika nifatanyije n’umuryango abamukunda ndetse miliyoni z’abafana bamukundagatuzamukumbura gusa ntabwo tuzigera tumwibagirwa amwe mateka y’icyamamare johnny hallyday johnny hallyday yavukiye bufaransa mujyi paris itariki kamena avukira i paris bufaransa yamamaye izina jean-philippe smet ku myaka y’amavuko yashakanye n’umuhanzi witwa sylvie vartanmu myaka bombi bafatwaga nk’abantu b’icyitegererezo rukundo uyu yafatwaga nk’umuhanzi wagurishije alubumu nyinshi isi kuko bitaramo yagurishije miliyoni z’indirimbo isi nyakwigendera avuka lon smet nyina witwa huguette clerc witabye imana izina ry’ubuhanzi yarihawe n’umugabo nyirasenge witwa lee ketcham umu dj ahitwa caf de paris johnny hallyday yatangiriye kuririmba muri nibwo johnny hallyday yatangiye kuba icyamamare anashyira hanze umuzingoalbum mbere yise aisse les filles’ werurwe yashyize muzingo hanze yise let’s twist again’ agurisha amamiliyoni y’amakopi johnny hallyday yashakanye n’abagore bamwe bana harimo david laura smet n’abandiyatangiye kujya bitaro yanditswe niyomugabomuhabura

title: uko u burundi uganda byafashije kayumba nyamwasa kurema umutwe gisirikare rdc
content: abo bantu biganjemo abanyarwanda bayobowe rtd maj habib mudathiru bakurikiranyweho ubufatanyacyaha kwinjira mutwe w’ingabo utari ingabo zemewe n’igihugu ubugambanyi cyaha kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho kugirana umubano n’izindi nzego leta mahanga hagambiriwe gushoza intambara kurema umutwe w’abagizi nabi ibyaha bashinjwa n’ubushinjacyaha bigaragaza neza uruhare ibihugu by’u burundi uganda byagize ishingwa ry’umutwe gisirikare ushamikiye ihuriro p rigizwe n’amashyaka atemewe rwanda rnc fdu inkingi pdp imanzi ps imberakuri amahoro people’s congress ibyo ubushinjacyaha bwagaragaje bihuye n’ibyatangajwe n’impuguke loni mpera z’umwaka ushize zasohoraga raporo igaragaza repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo hari umutwe w’inyeshyamba kayumba nyamwasa ugamije guhungabanya umutekano rwanda iyo raporo yavugaga kayumba nyamwasa afite umutwe w’inyeshyamba zikorera misozi fizi uvira kivu y’amajyepfo uwo mutwe ugizwe n’abagera uyobowe shaka nyamusaraba wahoze ayoboye inyeshyamba gomino ukaba ukoresha intwaro ziturutse burundi n’ubundi bufasha bavana uganda kayumba yafashijwe gushinga umutwe w’inyeshyamba umushinjacyaha yavuze rtd major habib mudathiru yahunze u rwanda akajya uganda agezeyo ahurirayo n’uwitwa maj robert higiro wahoze ngabo z’u rwanda akaba umwe bagize rnc amugira inama gushaka ibyangombwa by’impunzi kugira abone umutekano ngo ibyangombwa yarabishatse manyanga arabibona ajyanwa kuba nkambi y’impunzi gace arua higiro yaje kugaruka guhura mudathiru amubwira yavuganye kayumba nyamwasa uyobora rnc akamubwira bagiye kubaka igisirikare ndetse bamaze kubona ibirindiro rdc higiro yafashe mudathiru amuhuza capt bagumya apollo muramu kayumba nyamwasa yamuhuje kandi n’uwitwa sunday charles raporo loni yagaragaje washakiraga abarwanyi umutwe kayumba i bujumbura yazanye sibo charles wahoze capt rdf bamaze kunoza umugambi sibo charles mudathiru batorotse inkambi bagera i mbarara bahita bafashwa n’urwego rw’iperereza uganda bagere i burundi banyuze tanzania bafashijwe capt johnson ukorera urwego rushinzwe ubutasi gisirikare uganda cmi wabashyize modoka afite n’imbunda bagera mupaka tanzania banyuze kikagati berekeje i bujumbura barindiwe n’abayobozi gisirikare burundi muvugane bikeya kuko ibyinshi twarabirangije ngo yababwiye bahabwa imbunda n’amasasu bakerekwa inzira gucishamo abasirikare bato b’abanyarwanda i burundi n’inzira kunyuzamo abarwayi igihe badashoboye kuvurirwa nkambi ni nako byagenze kuko kanya gato bahuye colonel ignace sibomana major bertin kumwe colonel nyamusaraba umunyamulenge uyobora umutwe witwara gisirikare ngomino wahawe kuyobora ingabo kayumba mu kiganiro bagiranye bemeranyije imyitozo p igizwe ahanini n’abanyarwanda bazajya bakora imyitozo biyitiriye ngomino col nyamusaraba gihe bazaba babaye benshi bakazabona kujya nkambi nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe nama ibaye colonel sibomana maj bertin bahaye imodoka n’uburinzi igikundi major mudathiru n’abasirikare bato kumwe babageza kiyaga
