title: rdc muzito wahoze minisitiri w’intebe yasabye congo gutera u rwanda ikarwegukana
content: muri repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo rdc adolphe muzito wahoze minisitiri w’intebe w’iki gihugu akaba umuhuzabikorwa w’ihuriro ry’amashyaka atavuga rumwe leta gihugu ryitwa lamuka yatunguranye ahamagarira igihugu cye gushoza intambara k’u rwanda nk’uko inkuru dukesha urubuga radiyo mpuzamahanga y’abafaransa rfi ibivuga muzito yabitangaje mbere tariki ukuboza murwa mukuru i kinshasa yakoraga ikiganiro cye mbere n’itangazamakuru nk’umuhuzabikorwa lamuka yashinjaga u rwanda kuba inyuma y’ibikorwa by’umutekano muke burasirazuba bw’iki gihugu gusa mvugo ntiyahuriweho n’abandi bayobozi lamukaadolphe muzito yabaye minisitiri w’intebe congo hagati ku adolphe muzito gushyira imbaraga ngabo ziri butumwa bw’umuryango w’abibumbye monusco ntibitanga igisubizo kirambye kugarura amahoro burasirazuba congo ahubwo akaba asaba hashyirwaho ingamba zikaze yagize gukemura ikibazo hagomba gushozwa intambara k’u rwanda niba dushaka kugenzura uburasirazuba repubulika u rwanda rugomba guterwa kugira intambara ibe hakenewe igisirikare hakenewe ubuyobozi bukomeye n’amikoro ahagije tukigarurira u rwanda nyuma u rwanda tukarwomeka congoadolphe muzito avuga ashize amanga u rwanda rwivanga politike congo kinshasa uganda ariko gihamya y’ibyo avuga muri kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyamaze amasaha abiri adolphe muzito yanasobanuye yifuza umuryango w’ubukungu w’ibihugu biyiga bigari cepgl wagakwiye gukora kurushaho rwego kwirinda amakimbirane hagati y’abanyamuryango bityo kwitabaza intambara ntibibe bikenewe muzito iyo mvuga gutera u rwanda bivuga hari bizaba ngombwa bikora hagati ibintu bitagiye buryo ntabwo intego ubwayo gusa gitekerezo adolphe muzito ntabwo agihuriyeho n’abandi bayobozi lamuka urugero mose katumbi jean pierre bemba bahise bashyira hanze itangazo ryo kwitandukanya mugaragaro bavuga muzito avuga icyifuzo gihishe byinshi bibi ndetse kirimo kuremereza ibintu gukabya bityo bagasaba muzito kwivuguruza rwego kwirinda gutatira lamuka iharanira uku kutavuga rumwe lamuka kuje gihe abayobozi bayo biteguraga kujya i beni rwego kugaragariza abahatuye ubufatanye ku ruhande leta y’u rwanda umunyamabanga mukuru minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga olivier nduhungirehe yanenze imvugo y’uyu munyapolitike agaragaza bwenge buyirimo butumwa yanyujije rukuta rwe twitter agira umunsi adolphe muzito azagarura amahoro gace kitwa ’ntekerezo nzima raison’ n’umunsi azigarurira ubutaka bwitwa ’ubwonko cerveau’ bizaba intambwe ikomeyeubutumwa olivier nduhungirehe bunnyega amagambo muzito

title: ikipe y’ u rwanda amavubi izakina na benin kuwa ukwakira
content: uyu mukino uzaba itariki ukwakira gihe ikipe y’u rwanda yamaze kumenya n’ubwo yatsinda mukino itazajya mikino nyuma guhatanira igikombe ikipe y’igihugu benin iramutse itsinze yazashyirwa makipe yitwaye neza afite umwanya kabiri ikaba yazashobora kujya mikino nyuma muri tsinda ririmo andi makipe abiri u burundi ivory coast ivory coast yamaze gufata umwanya mbere bidasubirwaho u burundi burwanira umwanya kabiri benin ikipe y’u rwanda ikaba ijyanwe benin gushaka ishema ry’ u rwanda kugarurira ikizere abanyarwanda kuko mikino itatu yakinnye marushanwa yatsinzwe imikino ine itsinda umukino umwe wonyine abakinnyi cumi n’umunani amavubi azifashisha gushakisha intsinzi benin batangajwe n’umutoza eric nshimiyimana ndoli jean claudejean luc ndayishimiyeeric gasanaismail nshutimagarangabo albertndaka fredysibomana husseinkalisa maoharuna niyonzimasina jeromemugiraneza jean baptistecharles ntibinganaandrew buterairanzi jean claudeuzamukunda eliaskagere medyjacques tuyisengeolivier karekezi twizeye basore b’ u rwanda bazatsinda mukino bakaduhesha agaciro nk’abanyarwanda mutijima abu bernard

title: fanaf irakangurira abatanga ubwishingizi rwanda gushora imari bikorwa by’iterambere
content: mu biganiro yagiranye minisitiri w’intebe w’u rwanda gatatu tariki protais ayangma ayang yatangaje amasosiyete y’ubwishingizi akwiye kugira uruhare iterambere ry’igihugu kuko guverinoma y’u rwanda iyafasha gukora neza ayang yagize abanyamakompanyi bakwiye gukoresha umutungo wabo kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu uhagarariye ishyirahamawe nyarwanda ry’amasosiyete y’ubwishingizi assar marc rugenera yatangaje leta yabemereye inkunga irenzeho kugira ibikorwa byabo bikomeze bijye imbere yavuze nubwo u rwanda rukiri inyuma bijyanye n’ubwishingizi afite icyizere ariko abanyarwanda bagenda basobanurirwa bazarushaho byumva cote d’ivoire cameroun nibyo bihugu bihagaze neza bwishingizi afurika congo-brazzaville iza isonga bigo byinshi by’ubwishingizi byeguriwe abikorera u rwanda rugeze isoko ry’ubwishingizi gihe ibihugu byateye imbere bigeze ubwishingizi binyabiziga nibwo buri hejuru cyane rwanda kubera itegeko leta risaba ababitunze kubifatira ubwishingizi inama ihuje amasosiyete y’ubwishingizi afrika yibumbiye mpuzamashyirahamwe nyafurika y’uburenganzira bwishingizi fanaf iteraniye i kigali tariki - fanaf ihuriwemo n’ibigo by’ubwishingizi ikaba ifite icyicaro senegal emmanuel n hitimana

content: zimwe ntego z’iyi gahunda zijyanye n’icyerekezo urwanda rwihaye harimo gufasha imiryango itishoboye kubasha kugira icyororo gahunda kurwanya ubukene n’indwara zituruka kumirire mibi kwongera umusaruro uturuka kumatungo nk’amata n’ibiyakomokaho nk’inyama gufasha abanyarwanda kubona ifumbire ndetse kwagura umubano muco mwiza kugabirana inka mubanyarwanda gahunda gira inka munyarwanda igizwe n’ibyiciro bibiri byogira inka ngabirano gira inka nguzanyo muri gahunda gira inka ngabirano imiryago icyennye izajya ihabwa inka kubuntu hanyuma izagenda yororoka nayo izagende yoroza abaturanyi bityo bityo gahunda gira inka nguzanyo hazafashwa umuryango wujuje ibisabwa kuzahabwa inguzanyo kugirango ubashe kugura inka kworora bisabwa harimo kuba harateguye ibiraro bijyanye n’ubworozi kijyambere kubauyihabwa afite imirima y’ubwatsi buzatunga inka kugeza gahunda yageze batangiye kuragizanya kworoza abandi kuziturirana abana baranywa amata twavuga nko mukarere kamonyi ntara y’amajyepfo rwamagana ntara y’uburasira zuba kuwa ukwakira imiryango igera yahawe inka igabiwe n’abandi banyarwandaubusanzwe hateganijwe kworozwa imiryango igera ikennye kurusha indi gihugu hose kugeza hakaba hamaze kworozwa imiryango marie jose ikibasumba

title: perezida kagame yashyize myanya abayobozi batandukanye
content: ashingiye biteganywa n’itegeko nshinga repubulika y’u rwanda ryo ryavuguruwe cyane cyane ngingo zaryo iya n’iya gicurasi perezida repuburika y’u rwanda paul kagame yashyizeho abayobozi batandukanye abashyizwe myanya moses rugema washyizwe rwego ambasaderi hanyuma agirwa umuyobozi mukuru ushizwe porotokole leta perezidansi repubulika ambasaderi jacques kabale yagizwe ambasaderi wihariye ushinzwe gukurikirana ibikorwa kwishyira hamwe kw’afurika theophile mbonera yagizwe umuyamabanga uhoraho minisiteri y’ubutabera clementine mukeka yagizwe umunyamabanga uhoraho minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga n’ubutwererane minaffet patrick karera yagizwe umunyamabanga uhoraho minisiteri y’ibidukikije dr regis hitimana yagizwe umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe ibigenerwa abishingizi kigo cy’ubwiteganyirize rwanda rssb juliet kabera yagizwe umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo gishinzwe kurengera ibidukikije rwanda rema valerie nyirahabineza yagizwe perezida komisiyo y’igihugu gusezerera gusubiza buzima busanzwe abari abasirikare rdrc ambasaderi guillaume kavaruganda yagizwe umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe u burayi amerika n’imiryango mpuzamahanga minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga n’ubutwererane minaffet shakilla umutoni kazimbaya yagizwe umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe afurika minaffet phillip karenzi yagizwe umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe aziya pasifika minaffet sheila mutavu mutimbo yagizwe umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe dipolomasi y’ubukungu n’ubutwererane minaffet juan haguma yagizwe umujyanama minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga n’ubutwererane minaffet darius rutaganira yagizwe umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe imirimo rusange muhaburarw

title: agasaro wavugaga atwite inda bruce melodie yarabyaye yita izina ry’uyu muhanzi utamwemera

title: nyamasheke ifite umwihariko jenoside yakorewe abatutsi

content: bunani jean claude wagaragaje igikorwa cy’ubutwari akemera gushyira ubuzima bwe kaga atabara umwana ugiye gutwarwa n’umuvu ruhurura nyabugogo yamaze guhindurirwa ubuzima n’umuryango kuko title: uburwayi umutwe indwara nk’izindi kandi buravurwa
content: mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru kabiri tariki ukwakira dr kayiteshonga yvonne ukuriye ishami rishinzwe iby’ubuzima mutwe minisiteri y’ubuzima yagaragaje intera urwanda rumaze gutera mubijyanye guteza imbere ubuzima umutwe ugereranije n’ibindi bihugu karere hakaba harimo politiki nshya kwegereza abanyarwanda ubuvuzi bujyanye n’indwara umutwe kuburyo nibura byazagera kurwego rw’ibigo nderabuzima kuko kugeza hari abaganga b’ubuvuzi bw’uburwayi umutwe rwego rw’akarere gusa hashyizweho kandi serivisi yakira ikanasuzuma abafite ibibazo by’uburwayi umutwe yunganira ibitaro by’indera hatanzwe ibitabo bifasha abunganira ibikorwa by’ubuzima habayeho gufatanya n’izindi nzego leta guhangana niki kibazo igihe bibaye ngombwa nko gihe cy’inkiko gacaca gufatanya komisiyo ishinzwe gusezerera gusubiza mubuzima busanzwe ingabo zavuye kurugeroyasobanuye kandi uburwayi umutwe uburwayi nk’ubundi ndetse hari n’ubushobora kuvurwa bugakira ikibazo cy’uburwayi mumutwe rwanda kigenda gifata intera umwaka utashye nkuko imibare y’abitabira servise z’ubu buvuzi ibigaragaza mwaka umubare w’abagannye buvuzi abantu mwaka mwaka bamaze kugera umwaka ushize abagannye serivisi uretse kuba u rwanda rwarahuye jenoside ndetse n’ingaruka zayo zimwe muzindi mpamvu zitera kuzamuka kw’iyi mibare abanyarwanda bamaze gukangukira kwitabira gahunda z’ubuvuzi cyane cyane kuko banafite ubwisungane kwivuza ikindi imyumvire igenda ihinduka kuko ubundi wasangaga abafite burwayi barafungiranwaga bagahezwa bagahishwa cyangwa bakavurizwa mubavuzi gihanga mubapfumu bumwe buvuzi buhabwa abafite burwayi harimo imiti gufashwa buryo bw’ibiganiro hamwe kubafasha kwongera gusubira buzima busanzwe buryo butatu hari ushobora kubuhabwa bwose hari n’ushobora guhabwa bumwe cyakora uburyo gusubizwa buzima busanzwe bakaba babuhuriraho nubwo ariko hari ibyakozwe nibiteganywa gukorwa inzitizi ziracyahari izagarutsweho nk’ikibazo cy’imyumvire itari myiza ndwara mumutwe abantu bagitekereza uzirwaye atakiri umuntu muzima wagira akamaro bityo agahabwa akato imyumvire nimwe ijyana n’umuco ndetse n’imyizerere benshi bazita amarozi bagahitamo kugana abapfumu cyangwa hakaba abazifata nk’amadayimoni bakaguma nsengero ntibavuzwe ikindi umubare w’inzobere buvuzi ukiri muto rwanda mu butumwa bwatanzwe harimo kumva ikibazo cy’uburwayi umutwe icya buri wese kandi uwahuye nabwo akitabwaho mumuryango hakabaho guhindura imyumvire ndwara hakorwa ubukangurambaga buhagije kugira imikoranire hagati ministeri y’ubuzima n’abavuzi gihanga kuko usanga abafite burwayi abenshi ariho babanza bigatuma bagera kubuvuzi nyabwo batinze ikindi nabagize ibyago kuzirwara bakwiye gufashwa bakanitabwaho muryango nyarwanda kuko uburwayi umutwe nabwo uburwayi nkubundi ndetse nuwahuye nabwo title: umupfakazi w’igihangange kobe bryant yavuze rupfu umugabo
content: vanessa bryant gatatu yavuze nshuro mbere rupfu rw’umugabo kobe bryant n’umukobwa gianna bishwe n’impanuka kajugujugu umuryango ushegeshwe burundu n’ibi byago vanessa bryant gatatu yavuze nshuro mbere rupfu rw’umugabo kobe bryant n’umukobwa gianna bishwe n’impanuka kajugujugu umuryango ushegeshwe burundu n’ibi byago vanessa nibwo yashyingiranywe kobe butumwa yashyize instagram yagaragaje agahinda afite atangira avuga yabuze amagambo abivugamo yanditse dushenguwe bikomeye kubura bitunguranye umugabo wanjye kobe umubyeyi igitangaza bana n’umukobwa wanjye mwiza gianna umukobwa umunyagikundiro akaba umuhanga bitangaje bavandimwe natalia bianka capri ibi yabitangaje nyuma y’iminsi umugabo bryant n’umukobwa w’imyaka bapfiriye mpanuka sikorsky s- yabereye misozi majyaruguru los angeles iyi mpanuka yahitanye abandi bantu iyi kajugujugu igiye bryant’s mamba sports academy gianna bagomba gukina irushanwa basketball vanessa yakomeje agira sinabona amagambo asobanura agahinda mfite aka kanya yahise ahindura ifoto instagram ashyiraho iya bryant gianna nkomezwa namenye mujyanye mwakundanaga twari twagize umugisha kubana namwe twizera tuzabana iteka ariko mudukuwemo hakiri kare vanessa kobe bryant bahuye mbere vanessa afite imyaka gihe hari ifatwa ry’amashusho yamurikiyemo imideli yiga mashuri yisumbuye basezeranye gushinga urugo bashyingiranwa nyuma y’amezi yakurikiyeho bari bafitanye abana bane natalia w’imyaka giana ufite imyaka bianka w’imyaka capri w’amezi ababyeyi kobe ntabwo bamutahiye ubukwe kuko yashyingiranywe n’umunyamerika w’umuzungu gushyingiranwa n’ umunyafurika uba amerika muri kobe yashyinjwe gusambanyiriza umukobwa w’imyaka hoteli kiganiro n’abanyamakuru vanessa yicaye iruhande bryant kobe rwego guhamya bakundana bryant kobe icyamamare mukino w’intoki basketball leta zunze ubumwe amerika izwi nba’ yitabye imana cyumweru aguye mpanuka yindege yafashwe n’inkongi y’umuriro igeze gace calabasas mujyi los angeles

title: lionel messi yakuyeho agahigo cristiano ronaldo amaranye iminsi
content: nyuma gukuraho uduhigo dutandukanye la ligalionel messi yatangiye kwigaranzura uduhigo cristiano ronaldo afite yakuyeho agahigo ke k’umukinnyi watsinze ibitego byinshi makipe atari ay’ibihugu ibitego messi yaraye atsinze ikipe valladolid la liga byatumye aca agahigo kuba umukinnyi umaze gutsinda ibitego byinshi ikipe itari iy’igihugu yagize ibitego gihe ronaldo afite ibitego ibi bitego messi yabitsinze mikino gihe cristiano ronaldo afite yatsinze mikino ibi bivuze messi amurusha ibitego mikino mike kuko ronaldo yabitsinze mikino myinshi cyane amurushaho imikino messi ugifite imbaraga nyinshi myaka ashobora kuzegukana ballon d’or ukuboza mwaka kuko imibare y’ibitego akomeje gutsinda itangaje messi yaraye yujuje inshuro atsinda coup franc mukinokuko yaraye ayitsinze ikipe valladolid banyagiye ibitego - birimo by’uyu mwami ruhago nta kipe n’imwe isi irusha lionel messi kwinjiza coup franc myaka ishize kuko amaze kwinjiza gihe abakinnyi juventus ubateranyije bamaze kwinjiza as roma psg lyon messi akomeje gushimangira umwami ruhago

title: bishop rugagi arasaba inkunga y’amasengesho itangazamakuru
content: umuyobozi mukuru w’itorero redeemed gospel church rwanda bishop rugagi innocent aremeza bihe bikomeye kandi bibi bitamworoheye kuburyo ageze n’aho asaba abantu kumusengera muri gihe bishop rugagi ntiyorohewe n’abamukwena nyuma y’aho hagiye hatangazwa yahanuriye umukobwa witwa umunyana shanitah azaba nyampinga w’u rwanda bizakurangira atamubaye ariko k’ubw’amahirwe yegukana umwanya w’igisonga cy’uwabaye nyampinga aganiro n’itangazamakuru gashyantare bishop rugagi nibwo yafashe umwanya kwisobanura gusubiza ibibazo bitandukanye bimaze iminsi bimuvugwaho birimo gufungirwa urusengero icy’ubuhanuzi bwe bucyemangwa ndetse n’ibindi bitandukanye bishobora kuba bimusiga isura itari nziza ruhando rw’abandi bishop aha rugagi yagize ndi bigeragezo bikomeye nkeneye inkunga y’amasengesho kandi nanjye nkomeje gusenga kandi unsengere kubyerekeranye n’ubuhanuzi bwe akora aha yibanze k’ubuhanuzi yavuzweho yakoreye umukobwa washakaga kwegukana ikamba nyampingayarahiye yeruye mubyukuri atamuhanuriye yegukane iryo kamba ahubwo yamusabiye umugisha rugagi yagize atitariki gashyantare nibwo nahamagaye umukobwa witwa shanitah shanitah umwana wanjye aririmba angels korali itorero abacunguwe papa umujyanama rusengero niwe wansabye nsengere umukobwa irushanwa nyampinga w’u rwanda mu by’ukuri njyewe nakoze ukumusabira umugisha ntabwo ukumuhanurirayakomeje avuga akunda gushyigikira abanyarwanda bafite impano bacyeneye kuzigaragazaarinabwo yatanze urugero alpha rwirangira wigeze kwegukana igihembo task project gihe kenya kandi yamushyigikiye yagize mba numva nashyigikira umunyarwanda wese ufite impano runaka kandi agashaka kuyigaragaza nahamagaye belinda shanitah ndanabasengera bombi ariko ntabwo nigeze mbahanurira urabona imana iba yampaye buhanuzi mba title: u rwanda rwiyemeje kuzamura ubwikorezi bw’indege
content: nzahabwanimana yafunguraga inama y’iminsi ibiri mugaragaro yiga bijyanye n’ubwikorezi gucunga umutekano ndege yagize guverinoma yihaye intego kwita bwikozi bw’indege kandi izakomeza gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa kuzamura imikorere y’uru rwego iyi nama kubera i kigali yatangiye kuwa mbere tariki ukwakira yitabiriwe n’abakozi bakora nzego zijyanye n’ubwikorezi bw’indege rwanda yateguwe n’urwego mpuzamahanga ry’indege gisivile ruhuza ibihugu afurika nyanja y’abahinde icao-afi bufatanye leta y’u rwanda nzahabwanimana yavuze ubwikorezi bw’indege ingenzi gihugu nk’u rwanda kidakora nyanja yibukije u rwanda igihugu kigendwa naba mukerarugendo benshi kandi ubukerarugendo bukaba butanga umusanzu kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu kugeza mukerarugendo barenga bakoresha ikirere kuza gihugu bukerarugendo mu rwanda hakorera ibigo bitandukanye bikora ubwikorezi kirere nk’ikigo cy’u rwanda gutwara abantu n’ibintu ndege rwandair ndetse hakorera n’ibigo bitwara abantu n’ibintu kirere klm brussels airlinesmu mpera z’uku kwezi kanama rwandair yazanye mbere mugabane w’afurika indege mbere zihanitse bwoko boeing - umunyamakuru kigali today

title: video mwiseneza josiane yavuze iby’imodoka akazi ke tv kwiga amerika n’ibindi
content: miss mwiseneza josiane wamamaye cyane marushanwa miss rwanda bikanamuhesha kubona ikamba miss popularity nk’umukobwa ukunzwe kurusha abandi bahatanaga yahishuye byinshi byabaye nyuma y’amarushanwa miss rwanda ndetse anasubiza ibibazo bitandukanye bijyanye n’ibyagiye bimuvugwaho bitandukanye miss mwiseneza josiane wamamaye cyane marushanwa miss rwanda bikanamuhesha kubona ikamba miss popularity nk’umukobwa ukunzwe kurusha abandi bahatanaga yahishuye byinshi byabaye nyuma y’amarushanwa miss rwanda ndetse anasubiza ibibazo bitandukanye bijyanye n’ibyagiye bimuvugwaho bitandukanye mu kiganiro kirekire cy’amajwi n’amashusho video yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ukwezi mwiseneza josiane yakuyeho urujijo bimaze iminsi bimuvugwaho kimwe mukobwa yanyomoje iby’itike y’imodoka yakwirakwijwe mbuga nkoranyambaga igaragaza mwiseneza josiane yahise atega imodoka agataha iwabo i karongi nyamara amarushanwa yaba ntiyigeze anasubira iwabo burengerazuba mwiseneza josiane yahishuye yavaga marushanwa miss rwanda muryango bamutunguye buryo byamurenze kwihangana bikanga akarira byose ariko byabereye musaza arimo kuba kugeza n’ubu reba video asobanura ibyo iwabo bamukoreye hano muri kiganiro kandi mwiseneza josiane yavuze by’akazi yemerewe knc nyiri tv asobanura ibyagiye bivugwa ako kazi yaba yarakanze atari ukuri ahubwo ashimangira minsi micye abakunzi bazasobanukirwa neza ibijyanye n’aka kazi yemerewe azajya gukora televiziyo reba video mwiseneza asobanura iby’akazi azakora kuri tv hano miss mwiseneza josiane yanagarutse by’imodoka yemerewe n’umunyamideli w’umunyarwandakazi uba i burayi avuga bamaze kuvugana igihe izaba yamugezeho ndetse aboneraho kunyomoza amakuru yakwirakwijwe avuga modoka yaba yarasimbujwe ibindi bintu reba asobanura iby’imodoka ye hano mu bijyanye n’ibyo ateganya bijyanye n’umushinga mwiseneza josiane yanahishuye hari amarushanwa y’isiganwa ry’amagare arimo gutegura afatanyije n’itsinda ry’urubyiruko ruharanira impinduka iryo siganwa rizaba rigenewe abana b’abakobwa bikaba biteganyijwe rizaba uku kwezi gashyantare azaryifashisha gukora ubukangurambaga kurwanya imirire mibi bana n’uburyo kuyirwanya ukoresheje ubushobozi budahambaye aba barimo gufatanya mwiseneza josiane gutegura amarushanwa mwiseneza josiane avuga ibijyanye n’iri siganwa ry’amagare birimo gutegurwa anashaka abafatanyabikorwa barimo abikorera n’inzego bwite leta akaba anakangurira abantu kuzitabira marushanwa azatangirwamo ubutumwa bw’ingirakamaro mibereho myiza y’abaturage reba video mwiseneza asobanura iby’isiganwa ry’amagare yateguye hano muri kiganiro mwiseneza josiane yanagarutse bintu bitandukanye birimo ibyavuzwe yaba agiye kwiga amerika ndetse n’amakuru y’uko hari ibikorwa yitegura kujyamo bihugu bitandukanye hanze yagarutse by’amarushanwa miss rwanda ikamba nimwiza meghan yegukanye ibijyanye n’uburyo yamamaye n’aho byaturutse avuga muryango bamufata by’umwihariko umubyeyi ndetse n’ibindi bitandukanye reba video mwiseneza asobanura ibyo kujya hanze n’ibindi byinshi hano

title: ubukungu bw’isi bwitezweho kuzamuka kigero
content: muri raporo izwi global economic prospects yashyizwe hanze gatatu banki y’isi ivuga izamuka ry’ubukungu bihugu byateye imbere rizaganyukaho kubera kugabanyuka kw’ibikorerwa nganda gihe bihugu biri gutera imbere n’ibiri nzira y’amajyambere ubukungu buzazamukaho visi perezida ushinzwe izamuka ry’ubukungu n’imari banki y’isi ceyla pazarbasioglu yahamagariye abakora igenamigambi bihugu bitandukanye gukora amavugurura hakiri kare azahangana zimwe mbogamizi zishobora kuzitira izamuka ry’ubukungu yagize mu gihe izamuka ry’ubukungu bihugu biri gutera imbere n’ibiri nzira y’amayambere rizakomeza kuba rito abafata ibyemezo bakwiriye gufatirana mahirwe bagakora amavugurura azatuma habaho kuzamuka k’ubukungu nabyo bizagira uruhare kugabanyuka k’ubukene ceyla pazarbasioglu yavuze hakenewe uburyo bworohereza ubucuruzi bihugu iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko uburyo gucunga amadeni ibihugu bifite n’uburyo kongera ibikorerwa bihugu imbere ibihugu bikomeye leta zunze ubumwe amerika ubukungu bwabyo biteganyijwe buzagabanyukaho ahanini bitewe n’ingaruka z’ibyemezo kongeza imisoro bicuruzwa biva bushinwa kuba hakiri urwikekwe kuko ntawe uzi bigana mu bihugu bikoresha amayero ubukungu buzazamukaho kubera ibibazo biri mikorere y’inganda hashingiwe turere afurika munsi y’ubutayu sahara ubukungu bwayo byitezwe buzazamukaho mwaka kubera icyizere abashoramari bafitiye bimwe bihugu bikomeye ako karere izamuka ry’ibiciro peteroli naryo biteganyijwe rizabigiramo uruhare kuko ibihugu biyicukura bizinjiza menshi n’umusaruro w’ubuhinzi ukaba witezweho kugenda neza mu bihugu afurika y’epfo biteganyijwe ubukungu buzazamukaho nigeria buzazamukaho angola buzamukeho muri kenya biteganyijwe ubukungu buzazamukaho muri aziya pacifique ubukungu bwitezweho kuzamuka kigero burayi aziya hagati buzaguma amerika y’amajyepfo buzazamuka gihe burasirazuba hagati afurika y’amajyaruguru ubukungu buzazamukaho raporo banki y’isi igaragaza aziya y’amajyepfo ubukungu buzazamuka kigero

title: itariki y’ubukwe zari hassan n’umukunzi king bae yamenyekanye
content: amakuru acicikana mbugankoranyambaga ayavuga umuherwekazi umunyafurikakazi ufite inkomoko uganda zari hassan yatangaje agiye gukora ubukwe munsi witiriwe nerson mandela umunsi witiriwe uwahoze perezida afurika y’epfo nerson mandela usanzwe wizihizwa tariki nyakanga buri mwaka munsi w’amavuko nerson mandelabityo zari hassan niho azakora ubukwe n’umukunzi uyu mubyeyi w’abana yabitangaje yakiraga umuhanzikazi w’umunyakenya akothee wakoregiye urugendo afurika y’epfo atibyemewe ngiye kuzakora ubukwe munsi witiriwe nerson mandelaibi bizaba ibintu byiza kandi ndatekereza umunsi umwe afurika izagira abaperezida batanu nerson mandela hashize ukwezi kurenga zari hassan akundana n’umunyafurika y’epfo w’umunyapolitike ndetse uba muby’ubucuruzi afite kompanyi y’ubwubatsi yasimbuje diamond platnumz ubukwe zari hassana n’umukunzi prince micky mill uzwi king bae buteganyijwe kuba tariki nyakanga munsi mukuru witiriwe nerson mandela ni gihe umuhanzi diamond platnumz bafitanye n’abana aherutse guca amarenga azakora ubukwe n’umukunzi mushya tanasha donna tariki kanama uwuzabutaha azishyura ibihumbi by’amashilingi tanzania yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: banze kureka gucuruza agataro kuko kabatunze
content: abo bacuruzi boherejwe isko nyabisindu ariko banze kurijyamo kuko bakiriya bahaba umwe bacuruzi witwa uwimana jeanne avuga yaranguye kugirango yunguke atunge umuryango yagize aho kwicwa n’inzara nzicwa n’inkoni yakomeje avuga atareka gucuruza agataro kuko ariko kamutunze kuri asanga ubuyobozi bubarenganya kuko bacururiza hanze bagurirwa bikaba bigaragaza abacururiza isoko nabo bahora basaba bantu bakurwa hanze yaryo batabasha guhaza isoko ubuyobozi bw’umurenge nyamabuye buvuga butazihanganira akajagari nk’ako mujyi ariko bakaba barimo kwiga neza byakorwa muturage uhutajwe iyo utembereya mujyi muhanga ugenda uhura n’abantu bikoreye ibicuruzwa by’ubwoko butandukanye ibiribwa n’imyenda bagenda bagurisha baturage batuye duce twa gahogo kibirigi ruvumera n’ahandi ku basanzwe batuye mujyi ubwa mbere byadutse bikaba bituruka kubuzwa gucururiza hanze y’isoko muhanga ahubwo bacuruzi bakoherezwa isoko riri ahitwa i nyabisindu aho bacuruzi bagaragara muhanda uva kaburimbo ujya isoko winjiriye nyubako yitwa lumina muhanda wamabuye imbere bdc muhanga muhanda ugana radio huguka usanga bacuruzi batanditse ibicuruzwa byabo nako bafite ababacungira local defences ziza biruke ernest kalinganire

title: minisitiri ndagijimana yatanze icyizere imvura nyinshi ngaruka izagira kwihaza biribwa
content: minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi dr ndagijimana uzziel yatangaje nubwo igihembwe mbere cy’ihinga cyibasiwe n’imvura idasanzwe guverinoma y’u rwanda yafashe ingamba zifatika zizatuma ikomeza kwihaza biribwa igipimo cy’ihindagurika ry’ibiciro by’ibiribwa giherutse gutangazwa n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ibarurishamibare rwanda nisr cyerekanye ukuboza ibiciro mijyi byiyongereyeho kwezi ugereranyije ukuboza muri raporo cyatangaje bimwe byatumye ibiciro byiyongeraho kwezi byatewe n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye byazamutseho n’ibiciro by’ibinyobwa bisembuye n’itabi byazamutseho umuyobozi mukuru nisr yusuf murangwa yavugiye nama y’igihugu y’umushyikirano yabaye ukuboza hari impamvu ebyiri zishobora gusobanura isano hagati y’izamuka ry’ubukungu rwanda buri kigero mwaka n’ibiciro byazamutse isoko gihe yavuze byatewe n’uko ugushyingo n’ukuboza akenshi umusaruro ugabanuka kandi haguye imvura nyinshi ikangiza ibihingwa indi mpamvu ikomeye usanga abantu bahanze amaso umusaruro w’ubuhinzi bitaretse n’ubwiyongere bw’abaturage bubigiramo uruhare mu ntangiriro z’umwaka imvura yakomeje kugwa ndetse ikigo cy’igihugu cy’iteganyagihe meteo rwanda cyagiye giteguza abaturage kuba maso cyane birinda ibijyanye n’ibiza kubera imvura nyinshi hari impungenge ishobora kugira ingaruka ibura ry’ibiribwa bigatuma bikomeza guhenda isoko minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi dr ndagijimana uzziel mutarama yabwiye itangazamakuru hashyizwe imbaraga bijyanye kwita musaruro w’ubuhinzi buryo mpungenge zikwiye kubaho yagize turi guhura n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe bitewe n’imvura idasanzwe ishobora kugira ingaruka musaruro kwihaza biribwa igenzura guverinoma rigaragaza tuzabona umusaruro mwiza gihembwe mbere cy’ubuhinzi’’ yakomeje avuga bihingwa by’ibanze birimo ibigori ibishyimbo n’ibindi hitezwe umusaruro mwiza kandi mwinshi ugereranyije n’uwabonetse ati imvura yaje mutarama gashyantare gihe cy’isarura imbogamizi ariko guverinoma yafashe ingamba kubika neza umusaruro kugabanya ingano y’uwangirika’’ muri mwaka guverinoma y’u rwanda yashyize ingengo y’imari ihagije kuzamura uburyo kubika umusaruro nko gushyiraho ubuhunikiro bwumisha ikoranabuhanga rikoresha imashini zumisha zishobora kwimukanwa mobile dryers mu ngengo y’imari y’uyu mwaka ubuhinzi bwongereweho miliyari zirimo miliyari frw zashyizwe gutunganya umusaruro kugira ntuzongere kwangirika andi mafaranga yashyizwe gutunganya ifumbire n’imbuto kugira biboneke bwinshi minisitiri dr ndagijimana yagize turiteguye umusaruro umeze neza nta kibazo cy’ibura ry’ibiryo’’ ku bijyanye n’ibiciro minisitiri dr ndagijimana yavuze umwaka watangiye biri hasi ariko mpera zawo bikazamuka ati mu ukuboza ibiciro byagiye hasi kandi twizeye mutarama bizakomeza kugabanuka bitewe n’umusaruro uhari dufite imibare myiza twejeje igabanuka ry’ibiciro’’ nisr igaragaza ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa by’imbere gihugu byazamutseho ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize ugereranyije n’ukwezi gushize gihe ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa bitumizwa mahanga byazamutseho ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize ugereranyije n’ukwezi gushize naho ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa by’umwimerere fresh products bihingwa gihugu nk’ibishyimbo imboga n’ibindi byazamutseho ugereranyije n’umwaka ushize ugereranyije n’ukwezi gushize imibare rwego rw’igihugu igaragaza ubuso bwahinzweho gihembwe gishize bungana hegitari ibihumbi gihugu hose mwaka hateganywa guhingwa hegitari ibihumbi wongeyeho by’ubuso bwahujwe buhingwaho n’ubwakuwe nzuri burasirazuba bungana

title: imikorere y’utwuma twambikwa abagororwa tugasimbura gereza
content: mu rwanda kuko mezi atatu ashize gusa abagororwa biyongereyeho abarenga gereza hirya hino gihugu ndetse ingengo y’imari urwego rw’igihugu rw’amagereza rukoresha imaze kugera miliyari frw amenshi akoreshwa biribwa bisobanuye gihe abagororwa bake mafaranga ashobora kwifashishwa zindi nzego z’iterambere rusange ry’abaturage kimwe byitezweho kugabanya ubucucike gereza ugukoresha inzogera zambikwa abahamwe n’ibyaha bagahabwa ahantu runaka badakwiye kurenga aka kuma kazwi ankle monitorsurveillance lectronique’ gakoreshwa n’inzego z’ubutabera hari umuntu ukekwaho icyaha cyangwa cyaramuhamye bashaka atarenga ahantu runaka kuko kaba gafite ikoranabuhanga rigahuza n’izo nzego uwakambitswe arenze bamubujije karasakuza kagatanga amakuru nzego zibishinzwe zikabimenya zikamufata muri nyakanga mwaka minisitiri w’ubutabera akaba n’intumwa nkuru leta busingye johnston yabwiye abadepite ako kuma gashobora kwambarwa mbere cyangwa nyuma y’uko umuntu ahamwa n’ibyaha kazafasha kugabanya abafungwa ati itegeko riri gukorwa rizanagena uburyo gukoresha akuma kifashisha ikoranabuhanga kagenzura abanyabyaha bahamijwe igifungo cyangwa abafunguwe batarangije igihano ariko bakigenzurwa gashobora kwambarwa mbere cyangwa nyuma y’uko ahamwa n’ibyaha yavuze buryo buzatuma hongerwa imbaraga bikorwa kugorora gutegura abagororwa gusubizwa muryango nonese buryo bwitezwe gutangira gukoreshwa rwanda minsi imbere bukora bute n’iki bushimwa cyangwa bunengwa imibare yerekana abantu babarirwa barambitswe aka kuma mu mubare warenze abantu ibihumbi ni ukuvuga inyongera myaka gusa benshi basanga aka kuma keza kuko uretse kugabanya ubucucike magereza gatuma umuntu aguma sosiyete agakomeza kubana n’umuryango gusa rundi ruhande ikoranabuhanga ryako ntabwo rikora neza buryo gashobora kugira ingaruka wakambitswe amateka yerekana igitekerezo gukora aka kuma cyazanywe n’itsinda ry’abashakashatsi kaminuza harvard gashyirwa ukuguru guhurira n’ikirenge sarah faye hanna w’imyaka leta texas yambitswe aka kuma gihano cy’agateganyo cy’imyaka itatu yakatiwe nyuma guhamwa n’icyaha gutunga ibiyobyabwenge avuga akuma ke gafite ingano nk’iy’ipaki y’isigara kaka icyatsi igihe amerekezo yako ahari n’umutuku gihe kabuze amerekezo bikabaho kenshi bushake yabigizemo aka kuma gafite ikoranabuhanga gps’ ryemerera abakurikiranyweho ibyaha runaka kubonwa hose n’ababishinzwe uwambiswe aka kuma ahabwa ahantu runaka atagomba kurenga yabirengaho kagatangira kuvuga cyangwa kakaba yanajwigira rwego kwibutsa ukambaye yarenze yabwiwe imbibi z’aho umugororwa wambitswe akuma atagomba kurenga zishobora kongerwa bitewe n’ibyo yumvikanye n’inzego z’ubutabera gakoresha umurongo radio ufasha gutanga amakuru bagenzuzi iyo aka kuma gakuwemo cyangwa kagakubaganywa ubuyobozi buhita bubibona ukambaye agatabwa yombi hanna avuga aka kuma kabuze ikoranabuhanga gps bimusaba kuzenguruka arishakisha kugeza rigarutse yishyura amadolari kugatunga aka kuma kandi bisaba ukambaye agashyira muriro byibuze amasaha abiri buri munsi kugira kabashe gukora iyo bitagenze gutyo byereka abakurikirana umugororwa yavuye murongo akaba yatangira gukurikiranwa gakozwe buryo ntacyo amazi agatwara bisobanuye uwakambitswe yakogana aka kuma gashobora gukora nabi mu gihe bibayeho uhamagara abayobozi ukabamenyesha kugira utagwa bibazo gushinjwa kugakuraho tumwe kandi tugira uburyo title: amagare uwizeyimana agiye gukinira ikipe lowestratesca canada
content: uwari umukinnyi w’ikipe benediction y’i rubavu gusiganwa magare uwizeyimana bonaventure yamaze kwerekeza ikipe y’ababigize umwuga lowestratesca canada uyu musore w’imyaka wegukanye shampiyona y’igihugu umwaka ushize amaze iminsi yitwara neza dore marushanwa rwanda cycling cup aherutse kwegukana intera yitiriwe kwibuka yavaga karere ruhango igasorezwa i karongi nk’uko urubuga rw’iyi kipe lowestratesca cycling team rwabitangaje umuyobozi mukuru frdrick gates yatangaje uwizeyimana bonaventure agomba gusanga abandi bakinnyi ahitwa outaouais mujyi qubec agafatanya kwitegura dore bazahita bitabira irushanwa grand prix de saguenay isiganwa rizaba tariki kamena uwizeyimana bonaventure wegukanye shampiyona y’igihugu umukinnyi lowestratesca canada uwizeyimana agiye lowestratesca avuye ikipe benediction yagarutse nyuma y’umwaka akinira ikipe dimension data for qhubeka ikipe kabiri mwaka frdrick gates yagize ubwo nari ndi rwanda gushyingo nifuje mukinnyi ni umukinnyi mwiza ubasha kuzamuka kandi akanafatana murongo sprint yakinnye amarushanwa menshi mpuzamahanga mbese afite ubunararibonye buhagije ndizera azagira uruhare runini kwitwara neza kw’ikipe yacu frdrick gates yakomeje avuga kuza uwizeyimana guhuriranye n’igenda edward greene wagiye ikipe mugabane w’u burayi uyu muyobozi avuga kuba uweziyimana agiye gukina ikipe bizatuma umubano n’abakunzi b’umukino w’amagare rwanda title: abanyarwanda batuye canada bibutse abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: igikorwa kwibuka kitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo canada n’izindi nshuti uyu muhango watangijwe n’urugendo walk to remember rwatangiriye nteko ishingamategeko canada rugera biro by’umujyi ottawa ahabereye imihango kwibuka nyuma y’indirimbo zubahiriza ibihugu byombi hakurikiyeho umunota kwibuka inzirikarengane zishwe jenoside padiri callixte kabalisa wayoboye isengesho yasabiye abahuye n’ibibazo binyuranye harimo abafashwe ngufu asaba imana gukomeza impfubyi n’abapfakazi n’abandi bagize ibibazo bikomeye uhagarariye u rwanda canada edda mukabagwiza perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’abacitse kw’icumu rizwi kw’izina humura alain ntwali bagaragaje bibuka amateka jenoside yabaye rwanda bagamije gufata ingamba ibyabaye ntibizongere kuba ukundi nk’uko itangazo ambasade y’u rwanda canada ribivuga berekanye umuhango ukorwa ugamije kwibuka ariko abantu bakanatekereza uburyo gufasha abacitse icumu bagarutse nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka twigire mateka twubaka ejo hazaza bavuga genoside yakorewe abatutsi mateka y’ubu n’ejo hazaza itazibagirana mu muhango kwibuka kandi hatanzwe ibiganiro bibiri l’historique de l’impunit des crimes haineux au rwanda et les signes avant-coureurs du gnocide contre les tutsis cyatanzwe bwana richard nsanzabaganwa les mots qui tuent cyatanzwe prof philippe basabose nsanzabaganwa yerekanye ubwicanyi bwagiye buba ariko ubutegetsi ntibuhane abakoze ibyaha kwica aha yavuze uduce tunyuranye ubwoko bw’abatutsi bwagiye bwicwa yerekanye kwica byagiye bishyigikirwa n’ubutegetsi kurengera abatutsi babaga bibasiwe prof basabose yerekanye amagambo yagiye akoreshwa rwanda yagize uruhare ishyirwa bikorwa ry’ubwicanyi yakoze isesengura ry’ijambo ryavuzwe leon mugesera i kabaya yakanguriye abanyamuryango mrnd abereka umwanzi wabo umututsi n’abahutu mashyaka ataravugaga rumwe mrnd gahunda ziteganijwe zijyanye kwibuka zizagera kwezi gatanu zirimo amasengesho ikiriyo n’ibiganiro bizatangwa taliki mata abanyarwanda content: esperance mukamugemana umupfakazi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mwaka w’ muri jenoside yabuze abana babiri ndetse se ubabyara mukamugema yiciwe n’abaturanyi yafataga nk’inshuti magara z’umuryango jenoside ikirangira ntiyabashaga kwihanganira baturanyi bamwiciye igihe cyose nabonaga nakekaga banyiciye numvaga ikintu cy’urwango kizamutse jye kuko nahitaga nibuka abanjye bishe aha stephane ngirinshuti umwe bagize uruhare bwicanyi gihe jenoside murenge mbazi avuga jenoside ikirangira mbere y’uko ajya gereza yahoraga afite ubwoba bw’ibyo yakoze agira nabonaga nahemukiye nkumva ubwoba bwinshi ngahorana urwikekwe buryo nabonaga buri wese nkumva afite gahunda kumbaza nakoze ariko nkigera gereza nigishijwe ijambo ry’imana nemere kwihana gusaba imbabazi none numva narabohowe aba baturage murenge mbazi batangaza mbere jenoside babanye neza buryo ntawakekaga hari uwakwica nk’uko byabaye jenocide ngirinshuti avuga kugirango yice abaturanyi byatewe n’ubuyobozi bubi twabanaga neza duhana inka tugasabana umunyu ariko ubuyobozi bubi bwatubibyemo urwango kugeza twishe abavandimwe ngirinshuti bamwe bagenzi bagize uruhare jenoside nyuma gusaba imbabazi abaturanyi biciye imiryango basigaye babana mahoro babifashijwemo komisiyo y’ubutabera n’amahoro kiliziya gatolika iyi komisiyo yababumbiye ishyirahamwe rimwe ryitwa ubwubatsi bw’amahoro rigizwe n’abacitse icumu jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ndetse n’abagize uruhare jenoside pracide uwimana umuhuzabikorwa w’iyi komisiyo rwego butare avuga guhuza bantu bitari byoroshye uwimana guhuza bantu byari bigoye kuko abantu bagaragaraga nk’abantu batandukanye kuko baramaze kwicamo ibice ariko mwaka w’ twabashije kubashyira hamwe bubake amahoro si henshi rwanda abishe n’abiciwe babashije kwibumbira ishyirahamwe bagafashanya buzima buri munsi aba murenge mbazi bafashanya gikorwa cy’ubudehe bahingirana cyangwa bagafasha abakene babarimo gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: ibyaranze iminota nyuma y’ubuzima george floyd wishwe n’umuporisi umeze nk’inyamaswa reba hano
content: ubuzima busa n’ubwahagaze leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika kubera imyigaragambyo kwamagana urupfu rw’umunyamerika w’umugabo ufite inkomoko afurika wapfiriye maboko polisi george floyd ufite imyaka y’amavuko yapfuye nyuma gutabwa yombi polisi hanze y’iduka ryo mujyi minneapolis leta minnesota amashusho agaragaza gutabwa yombi kwe itariki y’uku gatanu yerekana umupolisi w’umuzungu derek chauvin amashusho n’amatangazo yatanzwe n’abategetsi dore tuzi kugeza byatangiriye kivugwa inoti mpimbano y’amadolari ikirego kijyanye n’iyo noti cyatanzwe mugoroba itariki y’ukwezi gatanu bwana floyd yaguraga ipaki y’itabi ry’isigara cigarettes iduka ryitwa cup foods ricuruza imboga mu kwibwira inoti amaze guhabwa y’amadolari mpimbano umukozi iryo duka yahise atanga ikirego polisi bwana floyd amaze imyaka myinshi mujyi minneapolis nyuma kwimuka iwabo ivuko mujyi houston leta texas hari hashize igihe akora ’bouncer’ gucunga umutekano nzu z’ibitaramo mujyi ariko kimwe n’abanyamerika bandi mike abumayyaleh nyir’iryo duka yabibwiye televiziyo nbc amerika ariko nyir’iduka ntabwo kazi munsi uwo mukozi w’urubyiruko gutanga kirego noti atashize amakenga yakoze amabwiriza y’akazi asanzwe ry’isigara ariko ntabwo ashaka kubikora nkuko nyandiko ikubiyemo kiganiro kijyanye gutanga ikirego ikomeza ibivuga mukozi iduka avuga mugabo agaragara nk’uwasinze kandi ntiyibashije nyuma gato y’uko title: ubwicanyi bukorerwa abanyamulenge bugereranywa jenoside
content: abaturage bwoko bw’abanyamulenge bagera biciwe gitero cy’abitwaje intwaro ubu bwoko burashinja leta kuba ntacyo biyibwiye bakabona bwicanyi ntaho butandukaniye jenoside abanyamulenge bavuga baterwa n’abantu bafite bahuriye n’imitwe y’iterabwoba yatojwe gisirikare ngo baza bafite intwaro bagatwika bakica abaturage bamwe bagahungira mashyamba kurinda amagara ngo abenshi bicwa malariya cyangwa bakarumwa n’inzoka ziba mashyamba nyuma y’ubu bwicanyi bumaze igihe bubakorerwa batangiye gushinga imitwe y’ubwirinzi ariko abayigize bamenyekanye bahigwa cyane uyu mwanzuro kwirwanaho bawufashe kamena alexis byicaza umuyobozi w’ishyaka innovative forces for union of congolese democracy ubara makuru avuga bwicanyi bukorerwa abanyamurenge jenoside igamije kubatsemba bavuga bakunze guterwa n’aba mai mai ndetse n’abagize umutwe red tabura urwanya ubutegetsi bw’uburundi iyi mitwe ibiri ishinjwa igitero giherutse kugabwa i minembwe ’mulenge’ abasaga bakahasiga ubuzima ubwoko bw’abanyamulenge buba repubulika demukarasi congo ntara kivu y’amagepfo mupaka uhana imbi n’u rwanda n’ u burundi gace ’mulenge’ kari misozi uvira bafite ururimi bavuga rwabitiriwe rujya gusa n’ikirundi n’ikinyarwanda bagira kandi umwami wabo bwite

title: minisitiri biruta asanga uganda ifite ubushake ibibazo byayo n’u rwanda byakemuka cyumweru kimwe
content: kuwa gatanu tariki gashyantare nibwo inama yabereye i gatuna ihuje abayobozi b’u rwanda uganda angola repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo yahaye uganda ukwezi kumwe kugenzura ibirego repubulika y’u rwanda bikorwa bibera butaka bwayo by’imitwe ibangamiye guverinoma y’u rwanda byaba ukuri uganda igafata ingamba zose kubihagarika kwirinda byakongera kubaho nyuma hakabaho ibiganiro gufungura imipaka mu kiganiro majuscule propos televiziyo y’u rwanda cyavugaga bibazo by’u rwanda uganda cyatambutse cyumweru minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga dr vincent biruta yabajijwe cyizere cy’uko uganda yaba izubahiriza yasabwe kwezi kumwe yahawe asubiza ikibazo atari igihe kubikemura ahubwo ikibazo ubushake politiki yavuze u rwanda rusaba byumvikana kandi ibintu bitatwara icyumweru kimwe kugira bikemuke uganda iramutse ifite ubushake kubikemura ati njye ntekereza haba ubushake politiki bitajyaga gusaba iminsi kubera u rwanda rusaba birumvikana dufite abanyarwanda bafashwe gereza dusaba barekurwa turasaba gufata abanyarwanda kubatoteza buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bihagarara turasaba ibikorwa gushyigikira imitwe irwanya u rwanda bihagarara ndatekereza itari inakenewe ibintu abantu bakora cyumweru kimwe uganda bibazo by’ubukungu ndetse banki nkuru y’icyo gihugu iherutse kwerurira abagize inteko ishinga amategeko yaguye gihombo miliyoni z’amadorali amerika myaka ishize abasesenguzi basanga uganda ikeneye cyane umupaka ufungurwa nubwo n’abanyarwanda bawukeneye ku ruhande rumwe bisa nk’aho museveni yizeye inama iheruka isiga iwufunguye nkuko n’ubutumwa yanditse twitter bibugaragaza nyuma gato y’iyo nama yanditse mfitiye impuhwe abaturage uganda n’ab’u rwanda bagizweho ingaruka n’ifungwa ry’umupaka gatuna ndabasaza kwihangana gihe turi gushaka igisubizo kirambye nizeye ukuri kuzagaragara kubera guverinoma nrm ishyaka riri butegetsi ihagaze my sympathies go out to the citizens of uganda and rwanda that have been affected the closure of the katuna border i call upon you to patient as pursue a lasting solution i am very optimistic that the truth will come out because the nrm government stands for the truth pictwittercombtmktk yoweri k museveni kagutamuseveni february dr vincent biruta nama yabereye i gatuna yavuze abahuza bateguye gahunda irimo n’ikimenyetso kwambuka umupaka ariko abakuru b’ibihugu baza kuyihindura nyuma nabwo ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyakuwemo hagasomwa itangazo birashoboka ariho icyizere museveni afite cyari gishingiye ati ndakeka nyandiko twitter yaranditswe inama irimo cyangwa itararangira wenda bikozwe n’ushinzwe konti twitter umujyanama perezida kagame dr jean paul kimonyo yavuze museveni ashobora kuzubahiriza yasabwe kubera igitutu ariho cyerekeye ubukungu uganda buri kuzahara ati turebye ibintu bihagaze perezida museveni gitutu gikomeye bisa nk’aho museveni yatekerezaga inama yabaye gatanu izafungura umupaka ariko si byagenze kuri hari igitutu ruhande rw’ubukungu nubwo n’abanyarwanda bawukeneye umupaka dr kimonyo asanga uganda yaratunguwe n’uburyo u rwanda rwitwaye bijyanye n’ifungwa ry’umupaka itangira gufata ibyemezo bitandukanye ati ikibazo gitangira uganda yaravuze u rwanda ruze rupfukame ariko ntibyashobotse ntabwo museveni yakuyeho pasiporo charlotte mukankusi ushinzwe dipolomasi mutwe w’iterabwoba rnc washinzwe kayumba nyamwasa ntabwo busa batangiye kurekura bamwe bafunze ndatekereza azakora asabwa bikenewe umupaka ufungurwa nkuko yabivuze hashize imyaka itatu hari ubwumvikane buke hagati y’ibihugu byombi u rwanda rushinja uganda gukorana gukingira ikibaba ibikorwa by’imitwe igamije kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano birimo iby’imitwe rnc fdlr rud urunana n’indi hari gufata gufunga abanyarwanda buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bagakorerwa iyicarubozo ndetse kubangamira ubucuruzi bwarwo intambwe imaze guterwa kuzahura umubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi irimo kurekura abaturage bafunzwe buri ruhande gusinya amasezerano guhererekanya abanyabyaha ibyo u rwanda rusaba uganda kimwe u rwanda rwari rwasabye mbere y’inama kane y’i gatuma gutesha agaciro pasiporo yahawe charlotte mukankusi rnc nayo yakoreshaga ngendo ze cyarubahirijwe u rwanda kandi rwari rwasabye uganda kohereza abantu bagize uruhare bitero kinigi mwaka ushize byahitanye abantu abandi bagakomereka ku gatatu hari babiri boherejwe nubwo hari abandi bataroherezwa u rwanda rukomeje gusaba uganda gukurikirana ibikorwa n’ikusanywa ry’inkunga ihabwa imitwe guhungabanya u rwanda bikorwa n’abarimo prossy bonabaana sula nuwamanya dr rukundo rugali emerithe gahongayire emmanuel mutarambirwa byose bigashyigikirwa rnc binyuze muryango utari uwa leta self-worth initiative mu bandi rusaba kohererezwa rud urunana yagabye igitero kinigi uretse sous lieutenant selemani kabayija private fidle nzabonimpa bagejejwe rwanda hari mugwaneza eric capt nshimiye uzwi governor wayoboye igitero kinigi u rwanda kandi rusaba uganda gukurikirana abayobozi bakorana rnc rud urunana barimo umunyamabanga leta philemon mateke brig gen abel kandiho uyobora cmi brig gen fred karara col sike asiimwe major fred mushambo col kaka bagyenda n’abandi bayobozi bagira uruhare bikorwa

title: covid minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu irashima abantu bakomeje kugoboka bagenzi
content: mu gihe leta y’u rwanda ikomeje kugoboka abagizweho ingaruka n’icyorezo koronavirusi minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu irashima abantu b’ingeri zinyuranye bakomeje kugoboka bagenzi bikomeye bafasha kubona amafunguro imirimo yabaye ihagaze kubera ingamba kwirinda icyorezo kugoboka abatishoboye bisanzwe kimwe leta y’u rwanda ishyira imbere ndetse ikabinyuza gahunda zitandukanye muri gihe isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo covid- perezida repubulika paul kagame yahumurije abaturage abizeza leta itazabatererana ku munsi kabiri leta itangiye guha amafunguro imiryango itarashoboye gukomeza imirimo isanzwe ikora kubera ingamba kwirinda koronavirusi abaturage bagiye bishyira hamwe hakurikijwe amikoro bakusanya ibikenewe babisaranganya abaturage abo midugudu kabuhunde vision murenge kinyinya karere gasabo bavuze bikorwa ikimenyetso kigaragaza leta yita baturage uwajenesa marine yagize ubundi nakoraga imirimo ijyana n’ububumbyi kugira mbone kurya ariko yarahagaze sinabonaga kurya ariko iminsi igiye gukomeza yisunike nkaba nshimira abanteye inkunga’’ mu murenge gikomero ho abaturage bahawe inkunga y’ibiribwa bagenewe leta ibunganira minsi batakijya kwirwanaho gakimbagira joseph ’’nari mfite umushinga gukora amasabune ariko kubera ukuntu transiporo yahindutse ntabwo nkibona njya nyabugogo gushakayo ibikoresho bivuze icyari kintunze cyahagaze iyi nkunga irashimishije kuko leta iba yatwibutse ikabona dukwiye gukomezanya n’abandi buzima dushimiye leta n’umukuru w’igihugu udutekerezaho cyane’’ mu gahunda guhangana n’icyorezo covid- kandi urugaga rw’abatumiza n’abadandaza ibikomoka peteroli bunganiye ministeri y’ubuzima bayigemnnera inkunga ingana miliyoni zisaga z’amafaranga y’u rwanda azifashishwa n’ibinyabiziga bikoreshwa n’iyo minisiteri mutaganda eric akuriye urwo rugaga ’’twasabye minisiteri nkunga y’amavuta twabemereye bashobora kuza kuyakoresha guhera mbere ibinyabiziga minisiteri bizajya bikoresha cartes cyangwa vauchers’’ umunyamabanga leta minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu nyirarukundo ignatienne ashimira abagize uruhare gikorwa akavuga mijyi yunganira kigali ho byamaze gutegurwa ati ’’iki gikorwa twakibonyemo ubwitange n’imbaraga zikomeye hari abikorera bitanze n’abafite ibikoresho by’isuku abahinzi b’umuceri batanze umuceri mwishi ndetse n’amadini ariko tubasaba bikorerwa hamwe bikarangira none ariko yindi mijyi yunganira kigali ho barimo kwitegura’’ nta barura ryimbitswe ryakozwe hamenyekane umubare nyakuri w’abagomba guhabwa nkunga mujyi kigali cyane gikorwa cy’ubufasha cyaje gitunguranye ariko umunyamabanga leta minaloc agenekereje avuga abagomba gufashwe hagati by’abatuye umujyi kigali denis fabrice nsengumuremyi muhaburarw

title: afurika isoko ryiza bacuruzi n’abashoramari b’abashinwa
content: ibiro ntangazamakuru by’abashinwa xinhua byanditse inkuru ivuga umucuruzi witwa wang li avuga icya mbere atekereza avuze afurika ubucuruzi business kuko afurika haba amahirwe menshi bucuruzi ndetse n’ipiganwa ry’abacuruzi benshi rihari wang li si mushinwa wenyine uvuga ashobora kuza gushaka isoko afurika kuko e hari abashinwa benshi batangiye kuzana ibicuruzwa byabo afurika wang jinrong uhagarariye abacuruzi b’i shanghai bushinwa avuga afurika haba abakiriya benshi akomeza avuga isoko ry’afurika riruta kure iryo amerika ndetse n’uburayi kuko iryo afurika mupaka rigira bicuruzwa bituruka mahanga wang jinrong yemera afurika uhasanga ibikoresho bituruka bushinwa ariko ugasanga bidafite uburambe ngo bituma bamwe banyafurika banenga ibikoresho bituruka bushinwa mu gitabo cyashyizwe ahagaragara mwaka kivuga buhahirane bw’afrika n’ubushinwa bavuga mwaka abashinwa bashoye imari irenga miliyari icyenda z’amadorali afurika ugereranyije frws norbert niyizurugero

title: umufaransa gianadda christus regnat bishimiwe gitaramo bahuriyemo i kigali amafoto
content: iki gitaramo cyabereye kigali conference and exhibition village camp kigalimu ijoro ryo gatandatu tariki ukwkaira cyitabiriwe rwego hejuru n’ab’ingeri zitandukanye barimo abana urubyiruko abakuru abakecuru n’abasaza abanyamahanga bashimishijwe kwihera ijisho umuziki kera wanyuraga amatwi n’imitima benshi ngoboka cyriaque uyoboye gitaramo niwe wabanje kujya rubyiniro ashyira abantu mwuka w’umuziki w’umwimerere uyu mugabo ntabwo yamaze igihe kinini rubyiniro wenyine kuko yahise ahamagara abacuranzi ndetse n’abandi baririmbyi korali christus regnat batambuka gake gake baza byicaro byabo imbere iyi korali imaze kuririmba indirimbo yahamagaye umukobwa witwa samantha amufasha kubwira abantu ibigwi christus regnat n’ibindi byerekeye igitaramo abaririmbyi bahise bakomeza baririmba indirimbo eshanu bahereye yitwa kumbaya’ y’itsinda peter paul mary yitwa christus regnat’ ivuga ibyiza byayo n’izindi zivanzemo iz’ikinyarwanda jean claude gianadda wakurikiyeho yishimirwa ndirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo trouver dans ma vie ta prsence’ qu’il est formidable d’aimer’ marie tendresse dans nos vies’ magnificat’ n’izindi nyinshi uyu muhanzi gufashwa korali christus regnat yasozaga kuririmba indirimbo yakomerwaga amashyi y’urufaya ubona abitabiriye gitaramo banyuzwe n’umuziki yageze afata gitari yanditseho amazina ayongera birungo by’umuziki christus regnat uryoheye amatwi buryo buhambaye iki gitaramo christus regnat cyari kigamije gukusanya inkunga gufasha ikigo cyita bana bafite ubumuga babarizwa centre inshuti zacu i gahanga’ murenge gahanga karere kicukiro mu bitanze harimo jean claude gianadda watanze sheki y’amayero gufasha centre inshuti zacu kuko ukwemera gukwiye guherekezwa n’ibikorwa igitaramo gihumuje musenyeri antoine kambanda yahawe ijambo ashimira jean claude gianadda ndetse anibutsa abantu iby’ukwezi kudasanzwe kw’iyogezabutumwa ati wakoze jean claude gianadda kuba waje gitaramo n’abandi ndabashimira cyane kuba mwaje ni umugisha n’ibyishimo bikomeye sinzi mubizi turi kwezi kudasanzwe kw’iyogezabutumwa isi uburyo kwizihiza imyaka y’ibaruwa ikomeye yanditswe papa benedigito atangaza kandi atuma intumwa kujya isi yanavuze gikorwa cyiza gufasha cyari byatumye gitaramo gitekerezwa cyane kuko umuntu abana n’ubumuga akwiriye gushyigikirwa ati muzi gitaramo kigamije igikorwa cy’urukundo bariya bana bafite ubumuga iyo umuntu adafite amaguru abayafite tuba dufite inshingano kumugeza ashaka kujya adafite amaboko abayafite tuba dufite inshingano kuyamubera na bariya bana badafite amahirwe kubona ibyangombwa by’ubuzima twebwe bireba jean claude gianadda nk’umushyitsi mukuru gitaramo niwe wihariye igihe kinini kuririmba uyu musaza wanyuze benshi yavutse bufaransa afite imyaka yabaye umwarimu siyansi n’umuyobozi w’ishuri koleji saint bruno i marseille bufaransa kugeza uyu muhanzi w’umunyabigwi yashyize hanze album mbere yafatanyaga kuririmba kwigisha ku myaka y’amavuko yasezeye umwuga w’ubwarimu afata inzira kuririmba nk’ubutumwa bwe bw’ibanze kiliziya gatolika jean claude gianadda nk’umuririmbyi yakoze indirimbo nyinshi cyane zikubiye album zirenga ni abahanzi bake isi bafite aka gahigo yaririmbye indirimbo zirimo tiens ma lampe allume’ jsus me voici devant toi’ trouver dans ma vie ta prsence’ n’izindi yashyize hanze album qu’il est formidable d’aimer’ prs de toi marie’ n’izindi yashinze umuryango witwa association jeunesse et culture saint-bruno’ intego nyamukuru zawo zigabanyije bice bibiri birimo kwibanda guteza imbere indirimbo zisingiza imana mu buzima busanzwe afasha abababaye haba gihugu cye kavukire n’ahandi isi korali christus regnat yamutumiye yashinzwe ivukira centre christus i remera mujyi kigali kuva ibarizwa paruwasi yitiriwe umwamikazi w’amahoro regina pacis i remera ubu ifite imizingo itandatu y’indirimbo zabo buryo bw’amajwi gihe imaze gukora ibitaramo bikomeye bine amafoto niyonzima mose

title: abahanzi basuye urwibutso jenoside ntarama n’urwa nyamata
content: abahanzi batorewe gukomeza cyikiro kabiri bitabiriye urwo rugendo usibye knowless bubiligi kwitabira gahunda zijyanye kwibuka nk’uko umujyanama manager abitangaza abo bahanzi babanje gusura urwibutso ntarama basobanuriwe amateka yaho ndetse n’iyicwarubozo ryahabereye basobanuriwe ukuntu mbere jenoside abatutsi bahigwaga ariko uwabaga yahungiye kiriziya ntacyo yabaga ibyo byatumye jenoside benshi bahungira kiriziya bizeye gukira nk’uko byagendaga mbere ariko siko byagenze kuko bamaze kwirundiramo interahamwe zabasanzemo zibica urw’agashinyaguro abatutsi bahungiye kiriziya central ntarama babanje kwihagararaho ariko bigeze itariki nibwo abasirikare n’interahamwe baje banakoresha n’ibisasu kuburyo haguye abagera mu rwibutso ntarama hari imibiri y’abatutsi bazize jenoside kandi hagaragara bimwe bikoresho byifashishwa rugo baje bitwaje cyangwa se bahunganye kuko batekerezaga igihe kizagera bagasubira mungo zabo hagaragara kandi n’imyenda biteye agahinda buri munyarwanda wese ava akagera yagombye kugira ntibizongere ukundi nyangezi freddy umwe baherekeje abahanzi akaba uhagarariye bralirwa gikorwa yagize kwibuka igikorwa buri wese ku ruhande rwacu bralirwa igikorwa twubaha cyane uretse guteza imbere abahanzi tugomba kubigisha amateka bralirwa yubatse inzibutso ebyiri jenoside zishyinguwemo abakozi bakoraga bralirwa bazize jenoside gisenyi kigali bralirwa kandi ikorana n’urwibutso gisozi rwego kugira busitani bwarwo hahore hasukuye ikindi abana b’imfuzi ababyeyi bishwe jenoside bakoraga bralirwa bishyurirwa amafaranga y’ishuri mashuri mato kugera secondaire ariko hari gahunda gutangira kubishyurira kaminuza ku rwibutso nyamata ahantu hafite amateka yihariye nk’uko abahanzi babisobanuriwe niho ha mbere haguye abatutsi benshi cyane gihugu abatutsi baguye hano nyamata barashinyaguriwe bitavugwa nyamata ituwe n’abatutsi barakuwe turere dutandukanye tw’amajyaruguru gisenyi ruhengeri rwego kugira bapfe kuko hari ishyamba habagamo inyamaswa nyinshi ndetse n’amasazi yateraga indwara tsetse hapfiriye benshi gihe mu mwaka habaye ubwicanyi bumeze nk’aho byari igeragezwa jenoside buhitana abatutsi bagera kandi ntawigeze ahanirwa ukwicwa kw’abo batutsi hari umuzungu w’umutariyanikazi utuye witwaga tonia locatelli bamwishe tariki bamuziza yababwiraga adashyigikiye iyicwa ry’abatutsi bahatuye buryo ndetse yaranatangiye kubatabariza miryango mpuzamahanga mu mwaka w’ haguye abatutsi barenga hakaba hashyinguye abagera muri bahashyinguye harimo umubyeyi witwaga mukandori annonciata wishwe abanje gufatwa ngufu n’interahamwe z’abagabo nyuma bamujomba igisongo gitsina kirakomeza gitunguka mutwe uwo ashyinguwe ukwe isanduku wenyine rwego kugira harusheho kugaragazwa ubugome bw’indengakamere bwakorewe mubyeyinyuma gusobanurirwa byinshi kwirebera n’amaso abahanzi bagize babivugaho ntakirutimana danny uzwi izina danny nanone yagize hari ikiyongereyeho kuko ubwa mbere nsuye nyamata hiyongereye mateka narinzi nk’uko jenoside yagizwe uruhare n’abahanzi ndateganya gukora indirimbo irimo ubutumwa ubutumwa natanga kubagezweho jenoside ukwihangana gukurikiza gahunda z’icyunamo kudaheranwa n’agahinda tukiyubaka ikivi cy’abacu tuzacyusa kandi ibyabaye ntibizongere buri muhanzi cyangwa se itsinda bagize bavuga kubyo bamaze kubwirwa ndetse kwirebera n’amaso dore magambo make ubutumwa bwatanzwe n’abahanzi nyuma gusura urwibutso ntarama n’urwa nyamata riderman yagize igihe kirageze dutange ubutumwa bwibaka banyarwanda king james ngiye kurushaho gutanga ubutumwa bwunga abanyarwanda ndirimbo zanjye bull dog abahanzi batanze ubutumwa bwanganisha abanyarwanda bakwiye kubiryozwa dream boys ijwi platini iti umuhanzi indorerwamo rubanda duharanire gusiga isi nziza kurusha twayisanze just family ijwi jimmy iti dukwiye guhindura amateka y’umuziki tukirinda ubutumwa busenya emmy yagize ibyo mbonye birandenze dukwiye gukora bwabaga kugira bitazongera young grace atinjye nari muto mbyumva mateka ariko abafana banjye n’abanyarwanda rusange nabakangurira kunga ubumwe bagakundana bakaba ubumwe jay polly iyo mbonye ibintu nkibi birandenga abakoze bashyiraga bikorwa ibitekerezo by’abategetsi babi twe twongere ingufu gushyira bikorwa iby’abayobozi beza badusaba danny dukwiye guharanira bitongera kubaho ukundi umuyobozi mukuru east african promotors yasobanuye impamvu bazanye bahanzi gusura inzibutso magambo ukugira batazakora batazanatekereza n’umunsi rimwe kuba bakora ibikorwa nk’ibi bashyigikira cyangwa bakaririmba ibikorwa nk’ibi kuko byatugejeje ahantu nakwita habi cyane ndasaba urubyiruko rusange igikorwa cyabaye rwanda cy’ubwicanyi bumeze gutya bw’indengakamere kitabaho ukundi marie clemence cyiza uwimanimpaye

title: insinga munsi y’inyanja ni nde ugenga isoko mpuzamigabane rihuriye miyoboro murandasi
content: ubu umuntu yitegereje hirya hino cyangwa buzima buri munsi duhoramo usanga buri wese yihereranye n’igikoresho cye cy’ikoranabuhanga agikoresha ibintu bitandukanye bamwe uzasanga bakunda guhugira mbuga nkoranyambaga abandi bitabira inama hakoreshejwe uburyo bw’iyakure abandi bakorera akazi i muhira byose babikesha murandasi kugira makuru dukenera kohereza cyangwa kwakira atugereho bisaba abakenera serivise murandasi kandi zikenera ibikorwaremezo ingero zoroshye kumvikana harimo iminara ibyogajuru n’ibindi ariko munsi turibanda nsinga ziri munsi y’inyanja zidufasha guhererekana makuru murandasi kuva virginia amerika kugeza bilbao espagne hari urutsinga rwitwa marea ruhuje bihugu runyura nyanja atlantic uru rutsinga rumaze kuvugwa rufite uburebure kirometero rukaba rwashyizweho n’ibigo microsoft ndetse facebook uyu mugozi ufite ubushobozi kohereza amakuru angana terabits isegonda bisobanuye uru rutsinga rufasha gikorwa guhererekanya amakuru angana by’amakuru ahererekanywa murandasi isi uru rutsinga rufite imbaraga kurusha izindi zose zica munsi y’inyanja insinga nkizi zatangiye kugaraga isi guhererekanya amakuru ahagana mwaka zakoreshwaga isoko ry’imari n’imigabane i burayi urutsinga mbere rwabayeho rwahuje cap gris-nez bufaransa douvres bwongwereza mu mwaka mazi magari y’inyanja y’atlantic hashyizwemo urutsinga mbere rwahuzaga ireland terre-neuve amerika kuva hagiye hashyirwa izindi nsinga nyinshi mazi buryo mwaka mazi y’inyanja ziri isi harimo insinga zifite uburebure kirometero izi nsinga rwanda kimwe isi zizwi fibre optiqueoptical fiber kugira bijyanye n’ihererekanwa ry’amakuru rigenzurwe kandi ryitabweho hashyizweho umuryango witwaga union tlgraphique internationale mwaka nyuma uza kwitwa international telecommunications union izi nsinga ngano zazo ziba zifite umubyimba nk’uw’umusatsi w’umuntu ibizikikiza zibirinda kwangirika bituma ziba nini mu buryo zikozemo bituma amafi manini nyanja atazirya nubwo bitazibuza guhura n’ibindi byonnyi nk’imitingito ese nde ugenga soko rihagaze agera miriyari z’amadorari y’amerika uyu munsi insinga zingana kirometero zizengurutse isi turusheho kugira serivisi nziza murandasi ubu burebure bukubye umuzenguruko w’isi inshuro izi nsinga zitwara y’amakuru dukoresha murandasi dore atwarwa n’ibyogajuru ese zigengwa nde izi nsinga ziri munsi y’inyanja inyinshi zigenzurwa alcatel submarine networks asn ikaba sosiyete y’abafaransa te subcom ikaba sosiyete y’abanyamerika ntitwakwirengagiza sosiyete y’abayapani yitwa nec uko imyaka iza hari izindi sosiyeti zitabira soko twavuga huwai title: abasenateri bazahagararira intara n’umujyi kigali sena y’u rwanda bamenyekanye
content: mu turere twose gihugu hazindukiye amatora y’abakandida biyamamarije kwinjira nteko ishinga amategeko umutwe sena bagomba guhagararira intaraifasi n’umujyi kigali ni amatora yabaye mbere nzeri ntara y’uburasirazuba hatowe abasenateri batatuamajyepfo hatorwa batatu uburengerazuba batatuamajyaruguru babiri ndetse n’umujyi kigali hatorwa umusenateri umwe urutonde rw’abakandida senateri batowe n’intara cyangwa ifasi bazaba bahagarariye ntara sena amajyepfo umuhire adrieuwera plagie nkurunziza innocent uburengerazuba mureshyankwano marie rosehavugimana emmanuel dushimimana lambert uburasirazuba nsengiyumva fulgencebideri john mupenzi georges amajyaruguru nyinawamwiza laetitia habineza faustin umujyi kigalintidendereza william nyuma y’aba basenateri batorewe guhagararira intara hasigaye abandi basenateri babiri bazahagararira kaminuza bagizwe n’umwe uhagarariye iza leta ndetse n’undi uhagarariye kaminuza zigenga haziyongeraho kandi abasenateri umunani bazashyirwaho perezida repubulika ariko abanza gutanga bane abandi bane bakazaza nyuma y’umwaka ihuriro ry’imitwe politiki ryo ryohereza abasenateri bane ariko rikabanza gutanga babiri abandi babiri rikabatanga nyuma y’umwaka chief editormuhaburarw

title: uganda yarekuye bamwe banyarwanda yafashe kuwa mbere

title: perezida kagame yagaragaje ibyishimo yatewe n’uko kigali arena yuzuye abafana ibihumbi kandi bishyuye
content: perezida kagame yavuze yashimishijwe kubona inyubako yakira imikino rwanda kigali arena yuzuye abafana kandi binjiye bishyuye ahita yibaza impamvu hatubatswe iyakira ibihumbi cyangwa ibihumbi bityo bitewe n’ubwo bwitabire bw’abantu byerejanye bifuzaga barebera imikino kandi batuje umukuru w’igihugu ibi yabigarutseho yagezaga ijambo bitabiriye inama igamije kwiga iterambere ry’umukino basketball afurika yabereye leta zunze ubumwe amerika ihuriranye n’inteko rusange y’umuryango w’abibumbye kuba nshuro atangaza yatunguwe kubona kigali arena yuzuye abafana mikino iheruka muri nama hari harimo bamwe bakinnyi bakomeye basketball bakina cyangwa bahoze bakina shampiyona mbere isi mukino leta zunze ubumwe amerika harimo umunye-congo ariko ufite ubwenegihugu bw’u bubiligi didier ilunga-mbenga wakiniye new york knicks golden state warriors los angeles lakers harimo kandi bismack biyombo ukinira charlotte hornets ukomoka rdc dikembe mutombo wakiniye houston rockets ukomoka rdc n’abandi usibye kandi bakinnyiiyi nama yitabiriwe kandi perezida toronto raptors masai ujiri ndetse n’umuyobozi nba adam silver perezida kagame yabwiye bakinnyi abahoze bakina n’abandi bafite bahuriye n’umukino basketball mwanya muto afite yagombaga kubaganiriza kuko byari ngombwa umukuru w’igihugu yavuze rwanda huzuye kigali arena ndetse yubatswe hagamijwe guha amahirwe abakiri bato bakunda umukino basketball kugira babone batera imbere ati nta buryo bwiza nashoboraga gutekereza butari ukubaka nyubako bwabo mu by’ukuri kuyubaka byatwaye amezi atandatu abantu bagera gihumbi bikorwa kuyubaka abanyarwanda abandi abahanga baturutse hanze ikijyanye n’amafaranga ntabwo aricyo cy’ingenzi buri gihe ubonera amafaranga washyizeho umutima perezida kagame yavuze minsi ishize amakipe meza u rwanda rufite mukino basketball yavugaga reg bbc patriots bbc yakinnye umukino nyuma hanyuma kigali arena ikuzura kandi abantu bishyuye ati ubwo nabonaga kigali arena ifite ubushobozi kwakira abantu ibihumbi yuzuye nahise ntangira kwibaza nti kuki tutubatse arena yakira abantu ibihumbi kuki tutubatse iyakira ibihumbi urabibona abantu banyotewe kandi mvuga tubona rwanda biri rugero hejuru ahandi ujya bindi bihugu afurika ukabona uburyo urubyiruko rushaka kugaragaza rushoboye buryo butandukanye umukino uheruka kuzuza kigali arena uwahuje reb bbc patriots bbc zombi zahuriraga mukino gatandatu nyuma iganisha gikombe waje kurangira patriots itsinze hakinwe uwa karindwi nawo irawutsinda yegukana igikombe mu guharanira iterambere ry’umukino basketball afurika hari ibikorwa byinshi byamaze kwemezwa birimo shampiyona nba’ afurika izitwa nba africa league’ igakinwa n’ibihugu bitandatu birimo u rwanda iri rushanwa rizitabirwa n’amakipe aturutse mugabane afurika rizatangira werurwe muhaburarw

title: ibiribwa bitumizwa karere biri bituma ifaranga ry’u rwanda rikomeza guta agaciro
content: mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kabiri nyuma kugeza raporo y’ingengo y’imari yakoreshejwe umwaka ushize imbere y’inama y’abaminisitiri john rwangombwa yavuze ibituruka hanze bikomeza gutuma ibintu rwanda bizamba asubiza ikibazo abajijwe bantu benshi bakomeza kwibaza uburyo litiro lisansi hagabanutseho amafaranga ariko ibiciro bigakomeza kuzamuka yasubije n’ubwo lisansi yagabanyutse ariko ifaranga ryo ritigeze rireka guta agaciro ati ibiribwa bitumizwa hanze nko kenya bigira uruhare izamuka ry’ibiciro guta agaciro kw’ifaranga ryacu kuko nabyo biba byaguzwe mafaranga atagifite agaciro yagaragaje ingero z’uburyo u rwanda rufite ifaranga rikigerageza kugira agaciro karere n’ubwo umwaka ushize guta agaciro ifaranga ry’u rwanda byari uku kwezi bikaba bigeze nyuma y’u rwanda kenya nicyo gihugu kigerageza aka karere kuko ifaranga ryacyo ryataye agaciro kugeza hejuru muri kiganiro kizajya kibaho buri gihe minisitiri w’imari amaze gushyikiriza raporo inama y’abaminisitiri rwangombwa yasobanuye u rwanda rwabonye amafaranga angana miliyari ugereranyije miliyari rwabonye mwaka kuba mafaranga yariyongeryeho byaturutse bikorerwa imbere gihugu byatanze amafaranga y’u rwanda miliyari zingana y’inyungu miliyari z’ayaturutse hanze zingana by’inyungu emmanuel hitimana

content: ikigo cy’igihugu cy’iterambere rdb gifite gukurikiranira parike y’akagera nshingano cyamaze kohereza parike ikipe y’abaganga bashinzwe ubuzima bw’inyamaswa kugira basuzume icyateye urupfu rw’izo nzovu ubuyobozi parike y’akagera burakeka nzovu zaba zarapfuye tariki ariko bakavuga batabizi neza kuko amakuru nya azatangwa n’abo baganga b’inzobere boherejwe rdb kuba parike y’akagera itarazitirwa biracyateye impungenge haba baturage baturanye parike ndetse nyamaswa parike ubwazo mu ijoro tariki rishyira iya inzovu zatorotse parike zirara rutoki rw’uwitwa shingiro innocent murenge ndego zirarwona kugeza buryo gutanga indishyi bonewe n’inyamaswa parike buraboneka kubera ikigega kigomba kuzajya gitanga indishyi bangirijwe ibyabo kitaremezwa n’iteka minisitiri w’intebe hafashwe gahunda buri wese wonewe n’inyamaswa parike abarurirwa yonewe n’ubuyobozi parike bufatanye n’ubuyobozi bw’inzego z’ibanze agasabwa gutegereza igihe kigega kizashyirirwaho uwakomerekejwe n’inyamaswa parike avuzwa rdb kugeza akize gihe uwishwe n’inyamaswa parike umuryango uhabwa amafaranga ibihumbi gufasha umuryango kumushyingura yaba yaguye bitaro rdb ikaba yishingira n’amafaranga y’ibitaro cyprien m ngendahimana

title: nishimwe wambaye nomero wambitswe ikamba miss rwanda
content: nishimwe naomie wambaye nomero rushanwa wambitswe ikamba miss rwanda atsinze bagenzi bahatanye asimbura nimwiza meghan uryambaye mwaka nishimwe wambitswe kamba aserukiye umujyi kigali agomba gushyira bikorwa umushinga ujyanye kurwanya kanseri y’ibere rwanda wamuhesheje amanota kwegukana ikamba nyuma gutoranywa bakobwa bajya cyiciro nyuma nishimwe naomie yambitswe ikamba miss rwanda nyuma y’inkuru zamuvuzweho ashobora kuba yaraje irushanwa ashyigikiwe n’umwe baterankunga bakomeye b’irushanwa ndetse bishyira igitutu kigo hamwe n’abategura irushanwa mbere guhitamo utoranywamo miss rwanda ndetse n’ibisonga bye habanje gutoranywa abakobwa bahatana cyiciro nyuma hagendewe bunararibonye bw’akanama nkemurampaka nyuma kumva ibisubizo byatanzwe n’aba bakobwa bibazo bitandukanye babazwaga buri mukobwa yabazwaga ikibazo kimwe gusa akagisubiza minota hagati y’ibiri n’itatu nishimwe naomie no umutesi denise no ingabire gaudence no umwiza phionah no mutegwantebe chanice no irasubiza alliance no teta ndenga nicole no musana teta hense no umuratwa anitha no akaliza hope no ni batowemo nyampinga hamwe n’ibisonga bye bitabujije bandi icyenda basigaye bashoboraga gutoranywamo miss popularity cyangwa umukobwa uzi kwifotoza kimwe nyampinga w’umurage aba batoranyijwe babazwaga bijyanye n’imishinga n’uburyo bazayishyira bikorwa nishimwe agiye kumara umwaka ahembwa ibihumbi by’amanyarwanda buri kwezi ahabwe imodoka nshya bwoko suzuki suift n’amavuta yayo azahabwa umwaka wose akoresha imisatsi n’inzara anambikwa imyenda y’ibirori buntu gihe akeneye amakanzu azahabwa serivisi banki umwaka wose ahabwe ubwishingizi kwivuza umwaka wose gusohokera resitora umwaka wose kimwe kuryama cyumba hoteli yabakiriye mwiherero azarihirwa ikiruhuko mujyi dubai n’itike y’indege anishyurirwe ibijyanye n’urwo rugendo byose n’ibindi byinshi bitandukanye birimo guhabwa imyenda siporo igihe ayikeneye gihe cy’umwaka wose igisonga mbere umwiza phiona wahembwe frw gihe umutesi denise yagizwe igisonga kabiri yahembwe frw bombi bakazahabwa icyumba hoteli umunsi umwe buri kwezi gihe cy’amezi atandatu kumwe n’umuryango wabo irasubiza alliance yahawe ikamba ry’uwakunzwe benshi miss popularity anahembwa frw iphone plus gb ndetse anahabwe guhamagara gukoresha interineti buntu gihe cy’umwaka azamarana kamba nishimwe naomi kandi yahawe ikamba ry’umukobwa uzi kwifotoza miss photogenic umukobwa wifotoza akaberwa n’amafoto yagenewe igihembo frw teta ndenga nicole yambitswe ikamba nyampinga w’umurage miss heritage umwiza phiona yagizwe nyampinga wabanye neza bagenzi miss title: harateganywa ubushakashatsi dukingirizo tuberanye n’ingimbi
content: ibi bimwe byavugiwe kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kane tariki akaba ikiganiro cyateguwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima ishami rishinzwe kurwanya sida iki kiganiro kikaba cyari kigamije kumenyekanisha ibizigirwa nama y’igihugu ngarukamwaka kurwanya icyorezo sida bana izabera i kigali tariki kugeza ugushyingo mwaka ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima rwanda biomedical center rbc kivuga nubwo gahunda gukwirakwiza udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye igifite ingorane kutumvikanwaho bitazatuma gahunda idashoboka dr anita asiimwe umuyobozi mukuru wungirije rbc avuga kubera imyaka y’abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye ibarirwa hagati gahunda gukwirakwiza udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye niyemerwa hazabaho ubushakashatsi bw’udukingirizo tuberanye n’abo banyeshuri dr anita asiimwe agira hazabaho ubushakashatsi bwihuse hagamijwe kumenya udukingirizo turi isoko dutoya cyangwa tunini bana ubu hari ubushakashatsi dufite bwakozwe minisiteri y’ubuzima buvuga hari abavuga udukingirizo duhari isoko ry’u rwanda tudafite impumuro nziza n’ibi tuzabyigaho hazanwe udukingirizo dufite impumuro zidatuma hari abanga gukoresha udukingirizo ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita muryango un family naryo rivuga u rwanda nirwemeza ikwirakwiza ry’udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye rugomba gukora ubushakashatsi dukingirizo tuberanye n’abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye dr landry tsigain akorera un family avuga kumenya udukingirizo tungana kuko hari udukingirizo dushobora kuba tunini bamwe utundi tukaba duto bandi yatanze urugero bihugu by’afurika y’amajyepfo kuko higeze kuza udukingirizo tunini bagabo ubushakashatsi bwakozwe minisiteri y’ubuzima mwaka buzima bw’imyororokere y’ingimbi n’abangavu bugaragaza abakobwa batangira gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina myaka abahungu bagatangira myaka inzego z’ubuvuzi zivuga kuba hari abakobwa batwara inda mashuri yisumbuye ikimenyetso cy’uko hadafashwe ingamba zikomeye habaho ubwiyongere bw’ubwandu sida mashuri yisumbuye rubyiruko rusange jean baptiste micomyiza

title: umujyi kigali niwo wahagaritse bitunguranye igitaramo cecile kayirebwa n’icya adrien misigaro
content: kuri cyumweru tariki werurwe nibwo hari hateganyijwe ibitaramo bibiri icyateguwe n’umuramyi adrien misigaro cyiswe each one reach one n’icyiswe ikirenga bahanzi cyari cyateguwe rwego gushimira cecile kayirebwa nk’umuhanzi wateje imbere umuziki nyarwanda byombi bikaba byasubitswe rwego kwirinda coronavirus kuri cyumweru tariki werurwe nibwo hari hateganyijwe ibitaramo bibiri icyateguwe n’umuramyi adrien misigaro cyiswe each one reach one n’icyiswe ikirenga bahanzi cyari cyateguwe rwego gushimira cecile kayirebwa nk’umuhanzi wateje imbere umuziki nyarwanda byombi bikaba byasubitswe rwego kwirinda coronavirus ibi bitaramo byahagaritswe n’ubuyobozi bw’umujyi kigali buryo gukaza ingamba gukumira icyorezo covid- hakaba hafashwe umwanzuro ibitaramo byose kimwe n’ibindi birori bihuza abantu benshi bibaye bihagaritswe nk’uko itangazo ubuyobozi bwawo bwashyize twitter gicamunsi ribivuga umujyi kigali wagize uti dushingiye butumwa nyakubahwa minisitiri w’intebe bujyanye n’icyorezo koronavirusi covid- bwasohotse tariki werurwe bugamije gukangurira buri wese gukumira cyorezo ngingo ivuga inzego z’ubuzima n’izindi nzego leta zizakomeza kubagezaho ingamba zijyanye gukomeza gukumira guhangana n’iki cyorezo umujyi kigali uramenyesha abantu ibitaramo by’imyidagaduro n’ibindi birori bihuza abantu benshi imyidagaduro imurikagurisha imurikabikorwa umutambagiro n’ibindi bisubitswe guhera tariki werurwe kugeza igihe irindi tangazo rizasohokera ryo kubisubukura itangazo rikomeza rivuga abari bahawe impushya n’umujyi kigali nabo basabwe kubahiriza ibiri tangazo rwego gukumira cyorezoibi bisobanuye neza bahawe uburenganzira harimo n’abateguye bitaramo bibiri byari biteganyijwe mugoroba umujyi kigali usoza ukangurira abantu kwitwararika gukurikiza amabwiriza bahabwa rwego kwirinda cyorezo cyagera rwanda iri tangazo rije ryiyongera butumwa bwari bwacicikanye mbuga nkoranyambaga butanzwe adrien misigaro buvuga igitaramo cyari bubere intare conference arena werurwe saa kumi gihuje abaramyi b’abahanzi adrien misigaro gentil misigaro israel mbonyi n’abandi bashyitsi gisubitswe bityo abateguraga ingendo zikiganamo bazihagaritse kuko havutse ikibazo gitunguranye uyu muhanzi yakomeje avuga gahunda ziri bukurikire ziri butangazwe masaha imbere cyakora asaba abaguze amatike kuba bayabitse ikindi gitaramo cyiswe ikirenga bahanzi’ cyari cyatumiwemo umuhanzikazi cecile kayirebwa rwego kumushimira ruhare yagize iterambere ry’umuziki rwanda cyari kubera ihema ry’ahazwi camp kigali nacyo ntikikibaye kubera mpamvu ibi bitaramo byombi byasubitswe

title: mbatembereze i strasbourg umujyi ubumbatiye amateka y’abafaransa n’abadage amafoto
content: ni umujyi uhana imbibi n’u budage ndetse ubitse amateka menshi hagati y’ibi bihugu byombi uherereye gace alsace ntabwo umujyi utuwe cyane kuko buso kilometero kare ibarura ryo rigaragaza utuwe n’abaturage ufatwa nk’umurwa mukuru w’u burayi kubera ariwo ubarizwamo ibikorwa by’inama y’ubujyanama bw’u burayi urukiko rw’u burayi rw’uburenganzira muntu inteko ishinga amategeko y’u burayi n’ibindi ni umujyi kandi ubarizwamo ibikorwa byinshi bibungabungwa unesco nk’umutungo kamere w’isi muri harimo cathdrale notre-dame de strasbourg n’agace gakundwa mukerarugendo kazwi kitwa petite france ni agace karimo imigezi myinshi ndetse myaka hambere kakundaga kubamo abarobyi cyane magingo gace gasurwa cyane strasbourg imiterere yako igaragaza imyubakire bufaransa kera kinyejana nayo mpamvu unesco yahisemo kugashyira duce tubungabunzwe kubera amateka yako naho cathdrale notre-dame de strasbourg igizwe n’inyubako zigaragaza amateka kera y’abaromani ndetse igaragazwa nk’urugero rwiza kwerekana amateka hambere dore myaka yabaye inzu mbere ndende isi ireshya metero uyu munsi kiliziya nsengero esheshatu ndende mateka y’isi ndetse yihariye agahigo kuba ariyo mbere ndende mateka y’isi yubatswe hagati y’ikinyejana gatanu n’icya umusizi victor hugo n’umudage goethe umwanditsi bakunze kuyigereranya n’igiti cy’imana bashaka kuvuga uburebure bwayo bitewe n’uko iteye ahantu hose hari umusozi mujyi uwugiyeho bituma umuntu abasha kuyibona neza ku bantu bakunda gutembera bihera amaso ibyiza bitatse isi umujyi mwiza cyane mu habaga inama nato barack obama chancelier w’u budage angela merkel bakoze urugendo rw’amateka n’amaguru bava strasbourg bagera kehl banyuze kiraro passerelle des deux rives cyubatswe nk’ikimenyetso cy’ubumwe burayi nta passport bisaba muntu ushaka gukora uru rugendo nk’urwabo ugera budage gace rhine alsace agace strasbourg kazwi ho kugira umuvinyo uryoheye ijigo ndetse n’inzoga nyinshi zituruka baturanyi b’abadage mu masaha y’ijoro usanga notre-dame hari abantu benshi gacupa bungurana ibitekerezo umujyi strasbourg guhera uyoborwa roland ries nyuma kuba umwarimu kaminuza strasbourg n’umusenateri aka karere imyaka icyenda amafoto karirima a ngarambe

title: jean paul samputu nama mpuzamahanga i beirut
content: iyo nama ikaba ifite intego kwereka isi rusange ntawe ukwiye guheranwa n’amateka ahubwo mateka akwiye kumusigira isomo samputu yarayitumiwemo nk’intumwa y’amahoro y’umuryango w’abibumbye akaba yaratanze ikiganiro nk’umunyarwanda wababariye abamugiriye nabi aha akaba yaranerekanye abanyarwanda bageze kubabarirana usibye kuba yaratanze ikiganiro nama anaririmba zimwe ndirimbo ze zivuga bumwe n’ubwiyunge nk’uko bigaragara rubuga interineti wwwhealingwoundsofhistoryorg abari nama baganira nsanganyamatsiko igira iti healing the wounds of history addressing the roots of violence ugenekereje kinyarwanda nko kuvuga gukiza ibikomere by’amateka ugaragaza invano y’akarengane umuhanzi jean paul samputu niwe nyafurika wenyine nama ikindi usibye kuba aririmba indirimbo zitandukanye zahawe ibihembo azwiho kuba yarazengurutse isi nk’intumwa y’umuco nyarwanda aho ndirimbo ze zishingiye njyana gakondo y’umuco nyarwanda atanga ubutumwa bw’amahoro n’ubwiyunge iyo nama yitabiriye ikaba yaratangiye gatanu tariki ikazarangira cyumweru tariki norbert niyizurugero
