title: gen nyamvumba yakiriwe tshisekedi ruzinduko yagiriye rdc
content: ku gatanu tariki gicurasi umugaba w’ingabo z’u rwanda gen patrick nyamvumba yakiriwe n’umukuru repubulika iharanira demukarasi congo amushimira ubufatanye gahati y’ibisirikare by’ibi bihugu gen nyamvumba uherekejwe mugenzi gihugu cy’abaturanyi yagize twaje hano gushimira umukuru w’igihugu imbaraga yashyize gisirikare cy’iki gihugu fardc n’imikoranire hagati y’ibisirikare byombi ikindi kandi ukumugezaho intashyo perezida w’u rwanda mugenzi lt gen celestin mbala munsense yunzemo turi abaturanyi kandi nk’abaturanyi tugomba kunoza imikoranire yacu tukongera isano hagati yacu nk’ingabo yongeyeho bagomba kumenya umutekano w’abaturage b’ibihugu byombi bagahangana n’ibibazo by’umutekano muke kugira habeho iterambere actualitecd- u rwanda rdc byiyemeje gusiga amateka atari meza y’amakimbirane yabiranze nk’ubwo onu yashinjaga u rwanda gufasha ingabo zahungabanyaga umutekano rdc m ariko ntirubyemere kuko bimenyetso byari bihari kuva perezida felix tshisekedi yagera butegetsi umubano w’u rwanda rdc wageze ntera ishimishije tshisekedi yasuye u rwanda ajya rwibutso rw’abazize jenoside kigali gisozi yunamira nzirakarengane u rwanda rdc kandi byafunguye ingendo z’indege rwandair kigali-kinshasa zikorwa inshuro eshatu cyumweru kandi hari gahunda kuzongera

title: antoine griezmann yamaze kwerekeza fc barcelona atletico igiye kugana inkiko
content: ikipe fc barcelone yamaze kwemeza yaguze rutahizamu mpuzamahanga w’umufaransa antoine griezmann wakiniraga atletico madrid iyi kipe y’i catalan yavuze yishyuye amasezerano griezmann asigaranye atletico yatanze miliyoni z’amayero gusa ruhande atltico madrid yavuze mafaranga make ndetse yiteguye kwitabaza inkikofc barcelone yatangaje yamaze gusinyisha antoine griezmann antoine griezmann afite amasezerano atletico madrid ageza kamena amafaranga yashyizweho ikipe yakwifuza kumugura miliyoni z’amayero ubu fc barcelone yatangaje igiciro gishya ikipe izifuza kumugura miliyoni z’amayero uyu mugabo wavukiye i mcon yatangiye gukina ruhago nk’uwabigize umwuga ikipe real sociedad yayikiniye imikino atsinda ibitego mbere kwerekeza murwa mukuru i madrid ikipe atletico yaje kwamamarira cyane atangiye gutozwa diego simeoneantoine griezmann amaze imyaka ikabakaba itanu atletico madrid antoine griezmann yafashije atletico madrid kugera mukino nyuma uefa champions league ndetse aza mwanya ballon d’or mwaka gihe kandi yanatsindiwe mukino nyuma w’igikombe cy’uburayi euro hamwe n’ikipe y’u bufaransa batsinzwe portugal hamwe atletico madrid yatsinze ibitego atanga imipira yavuyemo ibitego mikino yayikiniye mu gikombe cy’isi umwe bakinnyi b’inkingi mwamba bafashije ubufaransa kwegukana gikombe ndetse yanatowe nk’umukinnyi w’umukino mukino nyuma batsinzemo croitie life is all about second chances la vida tiene segundas oportunidades la vida t segones oportunitats antogriezmann a post shared fc barcelona fcbarcelona on jul at am pdt mu butumwa bwe mbere bwanyujijwe mbuga nkoranyambaga fc barcelone antoine griezmann yagize nkiri muto data yanyigishije gariyamoshi ihita inshuro gusa guhera igihe kirageze ngere ntego y’icyerekezo gishya inzira zacu birangiye zihuye nzarwanirira amabara barca n’umwete wanjye wose ni igihe cyacu ni inzira yacu muri bara byitezwe mufaransa azakorana inyabutatu ikaze y’ubusatirizi hamwe lionel messi luis suarez gihe ibya neymar bitarasobanuka neza griezmann kandi ashobora guhurira bene wabo b’abafaransa kipe barimo samuel umtiti clment lenglet jean-clair todibo ousmane dembl gihe baramuka bahagumye antoine griezmann yitezweho gufatanya messi suarez bagakaza ubusatirizi barca grizou nkuko bamwe nshuti ze bamwita ntabwo yigeze agaragara rimwe myitozo atletico yatangiye cyumweru gishize ashishikajwe kwihutisha gurwa rye ndetse hagiye havugwa umwuka mubi hagati y’amakipe yombi bijyanye kumvikana igurwa ry’uyu mukinnyi nyuma yaho fc barcelone itangaje yamaze kugura griezmann gatanu atltico madrid nayo yahise itangaza itangiye inzira kurengera inyungu zayo kipe y’i madrid ivuga mukinnyi yasheshe amasezerano buryo bubogamye yirengagije uruhande rumwe iyi kipe ivuga mufaransa barca bumvikanye mbere tariki nyakanga kandi gihe amafaranga gusohoka atletico miliyoni z’amayero kuba bityo kipe bita colchonero ikaba ivuga amafaranga yishyuwe barca make kugira irekure mukinnyi bafitanye amasezerano azageza

title: rgb yahagurukiye ibibazo biri itorero inkuru nziza byazamuwe n’umuvugizi waryo
content: nyuma kujya hanze kw’amashusho y’umuvugizi w’itorero inkuru nziza rwanda pasiteri ngaboyisonga theoneste kwikinisha bikaza guteza impaka ndende n’umwuka mubi itorerobikagera n’aho abakirisitu batangiye gucikamo ibiceurwego rw’igihugu rw’imiyoborere rgb rwatangaje rugiye kwinjira kibazo cy’iri torero rwego guhosha gufasha torero gukemura ibibazo biririmo nyuma kujya hanze kw’amashusho y’umuvugizi w’itorero inkuru nziza rwanda pasiteri ngaboyisonga theoneste kwikinisha bikaza guteza impaka ndende n’umwuka mubi itorerobikagera n’aho abakirisitu batangiye gucikamo ibiceurwego rw’igihugu rw’imiyoborere rgb rwatangaje rugiye kwinjira kibazo cy’iri torero rwego guhosha gufasha torero gukemura ibibazo biririmo ibi bije nyuma y’inkuru yatambutse kinyamakuru ukwezicom cyumweru tariki ukwakira yavugaga iby’ubushyamirane n’umwuka mubi bayoboke n’abayobozi b’itorero inkuru nziza rwanda bivugwa byakuruwe n’amashusho yagiye hanze mutarama agaragaza umuvugizi w’iri torero kwikinisha ibintu bamwe bavuga aribyo byateje impaka kutumvikana torero byakunze kuvugwa torero bamwe pasiteri bayoborana n’uyu theoneste bagiye bamusaba yatanga ubusobanuro bw’aya mashusho y’urukozasoni ndetse agasaba imbabazi intama ayoboye abakirisitu torero bw’icyasha yasize itorero gusa bamwe pasiteri bavuga muyobozi yikomye cyane uwagiye azamura kibazo wese ndetse bamwe akabakura buyobozi abandi akabimurira kure y’imiryango ahanini bapfuye kuba bamusabye ubusobanuro bw’iyo video nk’uko bisobanurwa nkuru kanda hano usome iyi nkuru bombori bombori itorero inkuru nziza umuvugizi waryo wagaragaye yikinisha ntiyorohewe urwego rw’igihugu rw’imiyoborere rgb narwo rufite nshingano amatorero n’amadini rwanda rwavuze hagiye gusuzumwa neza inkomoko y’ibibazo biri torero ndetse byaba ngombwa hakitabazwa amategeko gihe inzira z’ibiganiro n’ubujyanama zizaba zidatanze umuti nk’uko byasobanuwe mutabazi theodore umuyobozi rgb ushinzwe imitwe politike itari iya leta kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ukwezicom yagize nk’uko amategeko abitegenya gihe havutse ukutumvikana ngingo runaka inzego zicarana n’akanama nkemurampaka bakabifatira umwanzuro gusa habayeho ukutumvikana hari ibyemezo bishobora gufatwa biba ngombwa twe rgb tureba byimbitse kibazo gishamikiye ibyemezo binyuze mubyo amategeko ateganya hari n’ubwo wasanga mwuka mubi ushingiye bibazo birimo kutumvikana mitungo cyangwa n’ibindi bishobora kuba bibyihishe inyuma nabyo tugiye gusuzuma kandi mbijeje vuba bizaba byabonewe umuti mutabazi theodore yavuze kibazo basanzwe baracyumvishe ndetse banasabye ubuyobozi bw’iri torero kwikemurira ibibazo binyuze biganuiro hagati yanaboneyeho gusaba ubuyobozzi bw’iri torero kudaha urwaho abakirisitu bagirane amakimbirane biturutse itorero yanavuze amatorero n’amadini agira uruhare runini kubaka umuryango nyarwanda nayo mpamvu leta idakwiye kubatererana by’umwihariko gihe haba havutse ibibazo kutumvikana nk’ibi biri itorero inkuru nziza mutabazi theodore umuyobozi rgb ushinzwe imitwe politike itari iya leta

title: akajagari mwuga w’ubushoferi kagiye gucika
content: mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru kabiri tariki ugushyingo minisitiri ushinzwe iby’ingendo minisiteri y’ibikorwaremezo dr alex nzahabwanimana yavuzeko mategeko azarengera uburenganzira bw’abagenzi iyi nyigo ikubiyemo amategeko azagenga umwuga yarangijwe kwigwa hasigaye kuzayishyikiriza inama y’abaminisitiri iyemeze minisitiri yavuze umwuga w’ubushoferi ugomba kugendera mategeko utazajya winjirwamo buri wese y’umva abyishakiye yavuze birababajeje kubona hari umuntu ubyuka kubera yashonje agafata imodoka akayishyira muhanda ashaka igihumbi kimwe cyangwa bibiri kurya ubikoze abangamiye wawundi wiyemeje kubujyira umwuga ntitugomba kubyemera muri kiganiro dr nzahabwanimana yahakanye gahunda minisiteri ifite guca imodoka ntoya mini bus mujyi ahubwo minisiteri ifite gahunda gukangurira abashoramari kwinjiza imodoka zigezweho abantu bakunze aya mategeko agenga umwuga w’ubushoferi azaba anareba abakora umwuga w’ubushoferi mazi minisiteri nzahabwanimana yavuze nzira y’amazi hakirangwa akajagari gakabije usanga abantu bumva umwuga ugomba gukorwa buri wese ubishatse yavuzeko abatwara abantu mazi nabo bagomba kuzubahiriza amabwiriza akubiye nyigo eric muvara

title: museveni yanze gukorana indirimbo chris brown ahitamo kanye west lionel litchie
content: perezida uganda yoweri kaguta museveni arashaka kugaruka muziki agakorana indirimbo n’abahanzi bakomeye ruhando mpuzamahanga don balaam baruhagara ureberera inyungu z’uyu muhanzi museveni yabwiye ikinyamakuru blizz uganda yanze kuzakorana chris brown bitewe uburyo bw’imirimbire butamunyura ubu turi gukorana kanye west ndetse lionel litchie twashakaga gukorana chris brown ariko muzehe yarabyanze kubera adakunda umuziki n’uburyo awuririmbamo balaam repubulika iharanira demukarasi congo igihugu kimaze igihe kinini gifite umuziki ukunzwe mugabane balaam kumvisha museveni uburyo byiza gukorana indirimbo n’umuhanzi kanda bongo man gihugu kugaruka muziki museveni ukugira yongere yigarurire imitima y’abaturage uganda cyane abakunzi b’umuziki umuziki ntwaro depite robert kyagulanyi bobi wine utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi uganda yifashishije akurura imitima y’urubyiruko rwinshi gihugu gihe amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu azaba bombi bakaba baremeje guhatana mu mbere y’amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu museveni yasohoye indirimbo yise ’ye ngoma’ iyo yakoze yayise ’penkoni’ izi ndirimbo zombi zumvikanamo amagambo ’you want another rap’ muri uganda umuziki politiki birajyana kuko uruhande abahanzi jose chameleone bobi wine babogamiyemo ruzana n’abandi bantu benshi ni byagenze kenya umudepite charles njagua kanyi uzwi jaguar muziki yabonye mwaka awukesha abayoboke muziki

title: mineduc igiye gushyiraho sitati nshya igenga abarimu
content: ubwo yatangazaga ibyavuye manota y’abanyeshuri barangije amashuri abanza n’ay’icyiciro rusange umunyamabanga leta minisiteri y’uburezi olivier rwamukwaya yavuze kuba abanyeshuri baratsinze harimo n’umuhate mwarimu bityo akaba agomba gushimirwa minisiteri y’uburezi ivuga abarimu bagiye guhabwa sitati nshya ibagenga bitandukanye n’uko bafatwaga nk’abandi bakozi leta bigahura n’uko umwuga wabo wihariye mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye kane cyicaro minisiteri y’uburezi umunyamabanga leta minisiteri olivier rwamukwaya yavuze hakomeje gutekerezwa ibyatuma abarimu barushaho gukora umwuga wabo bawishimiye yagize igishya giteganyijwe twizera gihe gito kiba cyashyizwe n’ahagaragara sitati yihariye y’abarimu ni kimwe bizabafasha kubona ibyatuma bitabwaho buryo bwihariye kubera n’umwuga wabo wihariye kugeza abarimu bahabwaga byose byashingiraga sitati igenga abakozi leta rusange rwamukwaya yakomeje agira bitewe n’umwihariko w’umwuga wabo minisiteri y’uburezi ifatanyije ministeri y’abakozi leta twarangije umushinga sitati yihariye y’abarimu izifashishwa kugira bazajya bagenerwa byihariye bijyanye n’umwuga wabo aha avugamo nko kuba abarimu bazajya bazamurwa ntera intambike cyangwa ngazi ibintu ubusanzwe bitajyaga bibahorwamukwaya yakomeje agira icyo gihe umwarimu azajya azamurwa ntera n’umushahara uzajya ugenda wiyongera bikurikije n’igihe amaze kazi buryo n’iyo yaba umwarimu ashobora kubona umushahara uruta uw’umuyobozi w’ishuri rwamukwaya yakomeje agira ikindi guhera mwaka tugiye kujya tubaha agahimbazamusyi ubundi kagenerwa buri mukozi wese leta wesheje neza imihigo ibi byarateganyijwe buryo nyuma kureba neza besheje imihigo abarimu bazajya babarirwa agahimbazamusyi minisiteri y’uburezi ivuga izakomeza gushyigikira koperative mwarimu sacco ariko abarimu bakanashishikarizwa gukoresha mahirwe kuko nubwo guverinoma ishyiramo amafaranga abarimu batarakangukira kuyibyaza umusaruro ku kijyanye n’iguriro ry’abarimu rwamukwaya yavuze hamaze gufatwa umurongo abarimu ubwabo bazakoresha inguzanyo koperative umwalimu sacco akaba bayitangiriza nk’uko bakora imishinga yindi ibabyarira inyungu ibi bitandukanye n’amasoko guverinoma ishyiriraho abasirikare n’abapolisi ahubwo azaba ahantu mwarimu ashobora kwerekana ikarita bakamuha ibicuruzwa gihe umushahara utaraboneka cyangwa agahabwa akeneye giciro kiri munsi y’icy’undi utari umunyamuryango amaduka nk’aya hari yamaze gutangizwa majyepfo majyaruguru nko karere musanze n’ubwo bitaragera hose mineduc isanganywe gahunda girinka mwarimu buri murezi wakoze neza agatsindisha isomo yigisha hakaba hari gahunda korohereza abarimu kubona mudasobwa binyuze umwalimu sacco amafaranga akagenda akatwa mushahara w’umukozi buri kweziyanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: ibintu ushobora gusura mu rwanda ukuyeho gusura ingagi
content: gusura pariki nyungwe irimo amako menshi y’inkende gusura pariki y’ akagera kujya kurira ibirunga mu rwanda habarizwa umusozi gatanu murermure afurikacyangwa gukora siporo y’amagare misozi y’u rwanda gusura ingoro y’ umwami i nyanza gusura ibyiza by’umuco nyarwanda karere musanze ntara y’amajyaruguru kigo ndangamuco iby’ iwacu gusura urwibutso jenocide ahantu hatandukanye urwibutso kigali urwibutso rw’ i murambi urwibutso rw’i nyanza kicukiro n’ urwibutso rw’i ntarama gusura ibiyaga bitandukanye n’ibihakorerwa cyane cyane ikiyaga kivu gukora siporo nyinshi zikorerwa biyaga binini zikaba zakorerwa kiyaga kivu kuruhukira kiyaga muhazi kilometer uvuye i kigali gusura gutembera umujyi kigali kumenya amateka yawo ukoresheje imodoka bisi gusura pariki nyungwe cyane cyane amasumo y’amazi ndetse n’indabo z’amoko menshi zihaboneka

title: muhanga inyama zikomeje guhenda
content: mukamudenge umwe bazindukiye isoko ry’inyama mujyi muhanga tariki aje kugura kurya yitwaje akadobo gato kavuyemo isabune omo atwayemo inyama zigera ndiba gihe avuga ahahiye umuryango mugari agira wahaha izirenze ikilo ukazabonahe amafaranga yazo ndajyana singombwa bazihaga erega mayi aka kongeye kuba akaboga k’abifashije vedaste mpagaritswenimanaushinzwe ubuhinzi n’ubworozi karere muhanga avuga ibura ry’inyama ikibazo gihangayikishije kubera borozo bajya bakunda korora inka z’inyama agira abaturage benshi usanga biyororera inka z’amata baturage bafata icyemezo korora inka z’inyama kandi hagize ubigira umushinga yakunguka cyane mupenzi umubazi akaba n’umucuruzi w’imyama avuga imyama bacuruza ziba zirimo amoko atandukanye bitewe n’ubushobozi buri umwe wese avuga hari imyama z’inka ikiro kigura amafaranga y’u rwanda izindi zikaba inyama nda hari izindi zitwa iroti zigura amafaranga benshi bavuga zirya umugabo zigasiba mupenzi avuga ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ikiro cy’inyama make zaguraga amafaranga y’u rwanda mpagaritswenimana avuga batangiye gushishikariza abaturage korora n’amatungo magufi kuko byafasha kugabanya ikibazo cy’inyama kigaragara aka karere gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: itorero inyamibwa ryakumbuje abanyarwanda batuye kenya umuco wabo
content: iri torero rimenyerewe bikorwa by’imbyino n’amakinamico gakondo nyarwanda ryagiye gihugu kenya gikorwa cy’iserukiramuco gakondo nyafurika ryatangiye tariki kugeza kuya ukwakira kaminuza yitiriwe kenyatta i nairobi iri serukiramuco ryari rifite insanganyamatsiko igira ira iti dushyire hamwe dukunde umuco kuko niwo shingiro ry’amahoro umuyobozi w’itorero flugence kwizera avuga basigiye urukumbuzi rukomeye abanyarwanda benshi batuye nairobi ndetse nkengero zayo cyane kuko baje kureba torero benshi kwizera agira abantu barishimye cyane kuko hariya benshi bakunda umuco nyarwanda abanyarwanda bahatuye baje benshi barishima birenze kandi wabonaga bafite urukumbuzi rw’umuco wabo iri torero rikaba ryarabyinnye nyuma munsi cyumweru umunsi witabiriwe cyane n’abanyarwanda batuye gihugu kenyakugirango torero ribashe kwitabira serukiramuco ryabifashishijwemo n’ubuyobozi kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: amagare twafatanyije nk’ikipe mpamvu natsinze-nsengimana

title: abahanzi basuye urwibutso jenoside ntarama n’urwa nyamata
content: abahanzi batorewe gukomeza cyikiro kabiri bitabiriye urwo rugendo usibye knowless bubiligi kwitabira gahunda zijyanye kwibuka nk’uko umujyanama manager abitangaza abo bahanzi babanje gusura urwibutso ntarama basobanuriwe amateka yaho ndetse n’iyicwarubozo ryahabereye basobanuriwe ukuntu mbere jenoside abatutsi bahigwaga ariko uwabaga yahungiye kiriziya ntacyo yabaga ibyo byatumye jenoside benshi bahungira kiriziya bizeye gukira nk’uko byagendaga mbere ariko siko byagenze kuko bamaze kwirundiramo interahamwe zabasanzemo zibica urw’agashinyaguro abatutsi bahungiye kiriziya central ntarama babanje kwihagararaho ariko bigeze itariki nibwo abasirikare n’interahamwe baje banakoresha n’ibisasu kuburyo haguye abagera mu rwibutso ntarama hari imibiri y’abatutsi bazize jenoside kandi hagaragara bimwe bikoresho byifashishwa rugo baje bitwaje cyangwa se bahunganye kuko batekerezaga igihe kizagera bagasubira mungo zabo hagaragara kandi n’imyenda biteye agahinda buri munyarwanda wese ava akagera yagombye kugira ntibizongere ukundi nyangezi freddy umwe baherekeje abahanzi akaba uhagarariye bralirwa gikorwa yagize kwibuka igikorwa buri wese ku ruhande rwacu bralirwa igikorwa twubaha cyane uretse guteza imbere abahanzi tugomba kubigisha amateka bralirwa yubatse inzibutso ebyiri jenoside zishyinguwemo abakozi bakoraga bralirwa bazize jenoside gisenyi kigali bralirwa kandi ikorana n’urwibutso gisozi rwego kugira busitani bwarwo hahore hasukuye ikindi abana b’imfuzi ababyeyi bishwe jenoside bakoraga bralirwa bishyurirwa amafaranga y’ishuri mashuri mato kugera secondaire ariko hari gahunda gutangira kubishyurira kaminuza ku rwibutso nyamata ahantu hafite amateka yihariye nk’uko abahanzi babisobanuriwe niho ha mbere haguye abatutsi benshi cyane gihugu abatutsi baguye hano nyamata barashinyaguriwe bitavugwa nyamata ituwe n’abatutsi barakuwe turere dutandukanye tw’amajyaruguru gisenyi ruhengeri rwego kugira bapfe kuko hari ishyamba habagamo inyamaswa nyinshi ndetse n’amasazi yateraga indwara tsetse hapfiriye benshi gihe mu mwaka habaye ubwicanyi bumeze nk’aho byari igeragezwa jenoside buhitana abatutsi bagera kandi ntawigeze ahanirwa ukwicwa kw’abo batutsi hari umuzungu w’umutariyanikazi utuye witwaga tonia locatelli bamwishe tariki bamuziza yababwiraga adashyigikiye iyicwa ry’abatutsi bahatuye buryo ndetse yaranatangiye kubatabariza miryango mpuzamahanga mu mwaka w’ haguye abatutsi barenga hakaba hashyinguye abagera muri bahashyinguye harimo umubyeyi witwaga mukandori annonciata wishwe abanje gufatwa ngufu n’interahamwe z’abagabo nyuma bamujomba igisongo gitsina kirakomeza gitunguka mutwe uwo ashyinguwe ukwe isanduku wenyine rwego kugira harusheho kugaragazwa ubugome bw’indengakamere bwakorewe mubyeyinyuma gusobanurirwa byinshi kwirebera n’amaso abahanzi bagize babivugaho ntakirutimana danny uzwi izina danny nanone yagize hari ikiyongereyeho kuko ubwa mbere nsuye nyamata hiyongereye mateka narinzi nk’uko jenoside yagizwe uruhare n’abahanzi ndateganya gukora indirimbo irimo ubutumwa ubutumwa natanga kubagezweho jenoside ukwihangana gukurikiza gahunda z’icyunamo kudaheranwa n’agahinda tukiyubaka ikivi cy’abacu tuzacyusa kandi ibyabaye ntibizongere buri muhanzi cyangwa se itsinda bagize bavuga kubyo bamaze kubwirwa ndetse kwirebera n’amaso dore magambo make ubutumwa bwatanzwe n’abahanzi nyuma gusura urwibutso ntarama n’urwa nyamata riderman yagize igihe kirageze dutange ubutumwa bwibaka banyarwanda king james ngiye kurushaho gutanga ubutumwa bwunga abanyarwanda ndirimbo zanjye bull dog abahanzi batanze ubutumwa bwanganisha tukirinda ubutumwa busenya emmy yagize ibyo mbonye birandenze dukwiye gukora bwabaga kugira bitazongera young grace atinjye nari muto mbyumva mateka ariko abafana banjye n’abanyarwanda rusange title: umwaka uzarangira abanyamuryango b’imirenge sacco batakibwa amafaranga yabo-prof harelimana jean bosco umuyobozi rca
content: ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere amakoperative rca kiravuga umwaka uzarangira abanyamuryango b’imirenge sacco batakibwa amafaranga amafaranga yibwa abanyamuryango b’imirenge sacco gihugu rimwe rimwe bikozwe n’abayobozi bayo mbogamizi yakomeje kugarukwaho abanyamuryango bahura nazo dore hatangizwa gahunda y’umurenge sacco mwaka washiraga hatumvikanye amajwi y’abatabaza basubizwe amafaranga bibwe bene koperative urugero n’urwabo sacco murenge rugerero karere rubavu mwaka batakaga bibwe amafaranga agera miliyoni bigatuma batabona babikuza babikije ibi bibazo by’ubujura ahanini ubuyobozi bw’imirenge sacco bahuriza kibazo kuba zidakoresha ikoranabuhanga kimwe n’ibindi bigo by’imari ukurikije ibivugwa n’ubuyobozi bw’ikigo gishinzwe guteza imbere amakoperative rca ibibazo nk’ibi bishingiye mikorere mibi service zitihuse bishobora kutumvikana nyuma y’umwaka nyuma yuko imirenge sacco gihugu hose zizaba zikoresha ikoranabuhanga nk’uko byashumangiwe prof harelimana jean bosco umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere amakoperative ikigo rca kivuga ikubitiro gahunda y’ikoranabuhanga mirenge sacco yatangiriye mirenge sacco rutunga gasabogisenyi rubavu nuwa kanombe ni ikoranabuhanga rizemerera umunyamuryango kubitsa kubikuza hose gihugu bitamusabye kujya kukicaro cyaho yibarurijeho ikindi kandi amakuru azajya abikwa buryo bwizewe mudasobwa bitandukanye kuyabika mpapuro gusa ikigo rca kivuga gahunda imaze amezi yigwaho bikozwe bufatanye bw’inzego leta zirimo minisiteri y’imari n’igenamigambibakaba bizeye umwaka imirenge sacco gihugu izaba ikoresha koranabuhanga mu nama y’igihugu y’umushyikirano habaruwe milliyari z’amanyarwanda zibwe koperative sacco gusa mwaka millliari nizo zagarujwe ikoranabuhanga nubwo ridashobora kuziba title: abarundi nkambi y’impunzi uganda batawe yombi bashinjwa kuba intasi z’u rwanda
content: abarundi bane babarizwa nkambi y’impunzi nakivale uganda batawe yombi abandi babiri baratoroka bashinjwa kuba intasi z’u rwanda ikinyamakuru sos mdias burundi cyanditse kane tariki werurwe ahagana saa tanu gitondo abapolisi uganda bateye ahantu hari hari itsinda ry’urubyiruko rw’impunzi z’abarundi imbere nkambi nakivale ibarizwamo abantu batandukanye bihugu karere afurika y’uburasirazuba ababonye biba bavuga urwo rubyiruko rwari ruri kuganiraga bisanzwe kintu kimwe kiruhangayikishije nyuma bagatungurwa kubona batangiye gufatwa n’abapolisi n’abakozi b’inzego z’ubutasi uganda bane bafatiwe abandi babiri baratoroka nyuma bakiriye amakuru avuga bakomeje gukurikiranwa kandi bagacungwa n’abapolisi bambaye imyenda gisivili gitondo abasore babiri bahunze ntibongeye kugaruka kuryama iwabo kuko ijoro ryo munsi abapolisi bongeye kugaruka kubahiga batunguranye amakuru aturuka nkambi nakivale avuga abahagarariye impunzi babimenyesheje abaharanira uburenganzira muntu burundi buhungiro babasaba gukurikiranira kibazo andi makuru avuga urwo rubyiruko rwatawe yombi n’abapolisi bafatanije n’izindi mpunzi zifite ubwenegihugu bw’u rwanda uru rubyiruko ntiruzi impamvu rwakurikiranywe ariko hari amakuru avuga hari abantu bifatanyije polisi kugira bashotore abantu guta yombi mu minsi mike ishize musore w’impunzi w’umurundi yatawe yombi akorerwa iyicarubozo mbere kujyanwa ahantu hataramenyekana kugeza impunzi zivuga akekwaho kunekera u rwanda nyuma gutabwa yombi ubwoba bwabaye bwinshi by’umwihariko rubyiruko ruri nkambi bamwe ntibakirara macumbi impunzi z’abarundi z’i nakivale zirasaba guverinoma uganda n’ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita mpunzi unhcr kubungabunga umutekano wazo cyane zihangayikishijwe hari abantu bafite imigambi mibi bashaka kwinjiza bagenzi bibazo bitabareba mbere gutangira guta yombi impunzi inzego z’umutekano uganda zimaze igihe kinini zifata abanyarwanda bagakorerwa iyicarubozo ndetse bamwe bikabaviramo ibibazo bikomeye ahanini abatotezwa abanga gukorana n’imitwe y’iterabwoba rnc kayumba nyamwasa fdlr igizwe n’abasize bakoze jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ifite umugambi guhungabanya umutekano w’u rwanda

title: musenyeri mbanda yatorewe kuyobora itorero ry’angilikani rwanda
content: kuri gatatu tariki mutarama abepisikopi b’itorero angilikani rwanda batoye dr laurent mbanda kuyobora itorero anglicani rwanda asimbura archbishop rwaje onesphore wagiye kiruhuko cy’izabukuru kuri gatatu tariki mutarama abepisikopi b’itorero angilikani rwanda batoye dr laurent mbanda kuyobora itorero anglicani rwanda asimbura archbishop rwaje onesphore wagiye kiruhuko cy’izabukuru dr mbanda yatowe n’inama y’abepiskopi angilikani yateraniye i kigali katederali yitiriwe mutagatifu sitefano iherereye kiyovu musenyeri dr laurent mbanda watorewe kuyobora angilikani rwanda yayoboye diyosezi shyira kugeza werurwe umwaka ushize akaba yarasimbuwe musenyeri samuel mugisha mugiraneza wakomereje agejeje dr mbanda w’imyaka y’amavuko yavukiye rwanda ariko aza gukurira gihugu cy’uburundi yahunganye n’ababyeyi aza kuhigira amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye dr mbanda yamenyekanye cyane bikorwa gufasha abana guteza imbere uburezi yashyize imbaraga burezi yayoboraga diyosezi shyira buryo myaka ikabakaba yahamaze yasize hashinzwe ibigo by’amashuri y’abana b’incuke mbanda kandi arera abana b’imfubyi bishop dr mbanda ugiye kwitwa archbishop yakoze compassion international nk’umukozi nyuma aza kuba umuyobozi wungirije yanabaye nama y’ubuyobozi bw’icyahoze kie ndetse agenda ahabwa inshingano zitandukanye bigo binyuranye hano rwanda

title: kanseri y’ibere ifata abagore n’abakobwa hari abayitiranya n’indwara y’ifumbi bikarangira ibahitanye
content: abaturage bavuga kuba bakitiranya kanseri n’izindi ndwara ntabayibasobanurira babagerahorbc nayo yemeranya n’ibyo abaturage bavugabityo hari ikigiye gukorwaabigeze kurwara kanseri bavuga n’imibare igaragaza mwaka mavuriro rwanda hakiriwe abarwayi kanseri ariko abenshi ntabwo bagize umuhate kugera muganga kuko imibare y’umuryango w’abibumbye yagaragaje hari hakwiye kwakirwa abarwayi abaganga bamusuzumyenaho ubundi twari tuzi indi ndwara usibye twayimenye nyuma yisuzumishije avuga kera umuryango w’umuntu wabaga urwaye indwara nk’izo abaturanyi bawo babaga bagowe kuko babashinjaga aribo bamuroze atiuburwayi nk’ubwo kera bwamaraga abantu abarozi bagatangira gukekwaubwo banyiri umuntu bakavuga barandogeye umuntu wanjye baramuroze ahubwo ugasanga birirwa bamwahirira ibyatsi umugore witwa tumukunde marie golete utuye mudugudu ayobora ndetse baturanyeyamaranye indwara kanseri y’ibere imyaka iza kumuhitana mu myaka ibiri mbere tumukunde yamaze arwaye kanseri azi arwaye ifumbi ibere ibere bakajya bamuha imiti kinyarwandagusa nyuma yaje kumenya ariyo ajya bitaro chuk barikuraho ayingeneye atimbere yivuzaga nk’uburwayi busanzwe bakamupima rimwe akavuga ifumbi ariko yaje kubura amatike amufasha kugera bitaro igenda imuzahaza muri chuk bakimara kumukuraho iryo berekanseri yahise yimukira kwaha k’ukuboko kw’iburyo kwegeranye naryo ndetse kwaha haracitsemo igisebe dufite penjyewe numva hakorwa ubukangurambaga umuntu akajya yisuzumisha hakiri kare akamenya indwara afite rbc nayo yemeranya n’ibyo abaturage bavugabityo hari ikigiye gukorwa dr marc hagenimana umuganga kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima rbc gashami k’indwara kanserinawe yemera umubare muto w’abarwaye kanseri bakirwa mavurirouterwa n’uko abaturage batarasobanukirwa neza indwara kanseri atini title: allain jupp avuga atahakanye jenoside ahubwo yayemeye kuba
content: jupp avuga mwaka w’ butumwa bw’inteko ishinga amategeko yasobanuye yakoresheje ijambo jenoside kuya gicurasi nama y’abagize akanama k’abaminisitiri b’u burayi yabereye i buruseli bubiligi ikinyamakuru survie dukesha nkuru gitangaza alain jupp yaba yaratangaje nyuma y’uko uwari umunyamabanga mukuru loni gihe boutros boutros ghali yatangaje ibiri kuba rwanda atari ubwicanyi busanzwe ahubwo jenoside iki kinyamakuru gikomeza gitangaza minisitiri jupp yaba yaratangaje gihe jenoside rwanda igeze hagati ikorwa kandi n’igihe cyari gishize kikaba cyari gihe gikomeye cyane kuko aricyo cyishwemo abantu benshi aha bakaba bibaza bitaba ugusubiza ubwenge gihe igihe cyarenze prise de conscience tardive aha bavuga guverinoma y’u bufaransa rwanda gihe jenoside iriho itegurwa kandi ntacyo yakoze ibe yahagarika ubwicanyi bwatangiye tariki mata survie ikomeza ivuga gihe jenoside yakorerwaga abatutsi iriho kuba itariki mata jupp minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u bufaransa hamwe l’lyse ingoro perezida w’u bufaransa bakiriye jrme bicamumpaka minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u rwanda gihe jenoside ndetse jean-bosco barayagwiza umurwanashyaka w’ishyaka cdr aha bakaba bavuga icyiswe opration turquoise yazanywe n’ingabo z’abafaransa itariki kamena yafashije abari bamaze gukora jenoside guhungira cyahoze cyitwa zare akaba repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo muri babashije guhungishwa n’abafaransa havugwamo thodore sindikubwabo umukuru w’u rwanda gihe jenoside ndetse jrme bicamumpaka umaze amezi abiri yakiriwe jupp mu gihe cy’uruzinduko mbere perezida kagame yagiriye bufaransa kwezi gushize jupp yatangaje adashobora guhindura imyumvire jenoside raporo yitiriwe mucyo’ kubera izina ry’uwari umuyobozi w’iyo komisiyo mucyo jean de dieu yerekana alain jupp yagize uruhare bikorwa bitandukanye muri harimo kuba yarakoranye atizigamye guverinoma yakoraga jenoside iyo raporo kandi ivuga kuba tariki mata alain jupp yarakiriye jrme bicamumpaka jean bosco barayagwiza guverinoma y’abatabazi ikibazo gikomeye kuko umuryango mpuzamahanga warafashe icyemezo guha akato guverinoma ndetse u bubiligi leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika bakaba bamaze kubigaragaza bima viza bagabo inkuru dukesha igihecom

content: ibi umuvugizi w’ingabo yabitangaje nyuma yaho abasirikare babiri b’u rwanda ukwakira masaha n’ijoro biciwe ntara darfur umuvugizi w’ingabo z’u rwanda avuga basirikare mubikorwa by’irondo baza kugwa mugico cy’inyeshyamba n’ubu zitari zamenyekana koroneli joseph nzabamwita agira abagizi nabi bateze abasirikare bacu barabarasa habaho imirwano mirwano hapfa abasirikare bacu babiri abasirikare bacu mukwivuna umwanzi bica umusirikare umwe n’umubiri n’ibikoresho afite turabifata ariko none hakomeretse abasirikare bacu bane barimo kuvurirwa i khartoum yemeza aka gace hiciwe abasirikare b’u rwanda mubutumwa bw’umuryango w’abibumbye hari inyeshyamba zitandukanye zirimo n’aba janjaweed bakomeje kwibasira abaturage b’intara darfur hari kandi ingabo leta sudani u rwanda ruvuga rudashobora gucibwa intege n’ibikorwa nk’ibi byibasira ingabo mpuzamahangakoloneli nzabamwita yagize icyambere twagiye butumwa tuzi neza ukwitanga abana b’u rwanda baritanze kugira dushobore kurengera n’ubuzima bw’abandi kandi twitanga n’ubuzima bwacu nicyo mbereubuyobozi bw’ingabo z’u rwanda zikaba zihanganisha imiryango y’abasirikare baguye muntara darfur leta y’u rwanda yamaganye mugaragaro igitero cyahitanye abasirikare babiri b’u rwanda n’umupolisi senegal itangazo minisiteri y’ingabo yashyize ahagaragara nyuma y’iraswa ryabo kuri loni yohereje itsinda rishinzwe gukora iperereza ryimbitse gitero abagikoze n’icyo bagamije mu ntara darfur habarizwa abasirikare b’u rwanda bagera egide kayiranga

title: masudi djuma yavuze icyamugoye bugesera fc apr fc yarushije rayon sports karekezi olivier
content: shampiyona ishize yasojwe imburagije bugesera fc mwanya munani n’amanota mikino masudi watangiye kuyitoza ugushyingo mwanya n’amanota umunani mikino umunani yabwiye tv abakinnyi yahasanze batari bajyanye n’imikorere bityo bikica akazi ati naje nsanga mbere mbere ikipe hasi itandukanye bukavu dawa navuyemo yaguze amazina bitandukanye n’ibyo nakora kuko nagura abakinnyi bato benshi bazi gukina noneho ugashyiraho abamenyereye bake babafasha ni masudi akora simvuze abandi bugesera sibyo yakoze yaguze abakinnyi benshi bamenyereye abakinnyi bato bakina bake yakomeje avuga aricyo cyabaye ikibazo hakinwaga imikino myinshi yegeranye kuko abakinnyi bakuze barananirwaga kandi aribo bagomba gushingirwaho buri gihe ati rimwe uratsinda ugasanga umukino hagati cyumweru uratsindwa kuko benshi bazi gukina bandi bafite amazina kandi uba usabwa ubasubizamo niyo mpamvu wasangaga bugesera itsinda umukino munsi ejo igatsindwa masudi yavuze bugesera fc ifite abafana beza bakunda ikipe ndetse bayobozi yakoranye nabo uw’iyi kipe gahigi jean claude wumvikana kurusha apr fc yagombaga gutwara igikombe masudi djuma wakiniye apr fc rayon sports ndetse by’umwihariko akaba yaratwaranye igikombe shampiyona n’igikombe cy’amahoro rayon sports yavuze kipe y’ingabo yarushije umukeba wayo abakinnyi batanu yayitwaye bigatuma ikina umukino mwiza kuyirusha ati reka mpere apr fc kuko niyo nakiniye mbere baguze neza abantu narababwiye abakinnyi apr yakuye rayon sports izatwara igikombe kuko umupira rayon sports yakinaga apr ikina rayon sports ihindure imikorere bashyire hamwe kuko hamwe bameze neza rayon sports apr itinya yizeye karekezi olivier ashobora gufasha kiyovu sports asabwe kugira avuga karekezi olivier bakinannye witezwe shampiyona y’u rwanda mwaka utaha w’imikino azatoza kiyovu masudi yavuze nubwo atahiriwe rayon sports yizeye ikipe mumena bizakunda ati ni umuntu twakinannye umupira apr bintu byinshi mubwira amahirwe masa’ kuko umupira rwanda arawuzi ni umunyarwanda yabaye rwanda wenda ntiyagize amahirwe rayon sports ariko akora neza akaba afite ikipe nziza azakora kiyovu sports muri bugesera fc masudi djuma w’imyaka aherutse gusimbuzwa mbarushimana abdu watozaga as muhanga

title: haribazwa umubano hagati the ben priscilla ugamije reba amafoto
content: nyuma y’aho umuhanzikazi priscilla atangaje the ben bahurije hamwe igitekerezo gukorana indirimbo ndetse buri umwe akacyakira neza bagatangaza batangiye imishinga gukora ndirimbo ibahuza nayo mbere bagiye gukorana ifoto bombi mazi yashyizwe ahagaragara the ben ikomeje guca ibintu mbuga nkoranyambaga ngiyo ifoto yatunguye benshi bakoresha urubuga instagram the ben abicishije rukuta rwe instagram yashyizeho ifoto kumwe priscilla foto ibagaragaza myambaro year yateye benshi kwibaza kuvuga byinshi bitandukanye yagize priscilla amaze kugera rwego buri muhanzi wese yakwifuza gukorana kuko urebye uburyo akoresha ijwi rye ndetse n’imiririmbire byerekana amaze kugera rwego rwiza uretse n’ibyo kandi benshi bakunzi bacu bagiye babidusaba twakorana indirimbo niyo mpamvu turimo gutegura ikintu kizashimisha abanyarwanda bakunda muzika nyarwanda aha the ben priscilla sitidio

title: inzu corneille iragurishwa cyamunara kubera kutishyura imisoro
content: ikinyamakuru canada cyitwa journal de qubec cyatangaje revenu canada yagwatiriye inzu corneille i lorraine majyaruguru y’umujyi montral iyo inzu kugurishwa cyamunara ifite agaciro k’amadorali y’amerika amafaranga y’u rwanda arenga miliyoni magana atatu minisiteri canada ishinzwe imisoro ivuga corneille agomba kwishyura amadorali y’amerika frws harimo n’inyungu kugira hubahirizwe itegeko rigenga imisoro gihugu corneille yatangarije journal de qubec amateka y’ibyo byose aturuka bibazo by’amafaranga amaranye igihe bituruka kibazo yagiranye n’inzu imutunganyiriza umuziki yagize ndi bibazo nk’abandi bahanzi sinashoboraga gukora nshyiye ahagaragara indirimbo kubera kibazo cyatumye umutungo wanjye uhungabana corneille akomeza avuga afitanye ibibazo minisiteri ebyiri canada zishinzwe iby’imisoro ariko iya kabiri ariyo revenu qubec ntabwo yigeze ibikurikirana nk’uko revenu canada yabigenje yagize ikibazo nagiranye n’inzu intunganyiriza umuziki cyanteje igihombo gikomeye ariko ubungubu tumeranye neza buryo nizera ngiye bibazo corneille avuga minsi imbere azatangira kugurisha qubec album izina ryayo ntirizwi iriho indirimbo ze iyo album akaba yarayikoreye bufaransa mwaka norbert niyizurugero

title: ikawa n’icyayi ibihingwa bifitiye runini u rwanda
content: nk’uko ntakirutimana corneille umuyobozi mukuru wungurije ushinzwe kuzamura umusaruro w’ibyoherezwa mahanga rwanda kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe kwita byoherezwa mahanga naeb abitangaza bihingwa nibyo byinjiza amadevize menshi ugereranije n’ibindi byoherezwa mahanga bivuye rwanda ibi bihingwa kandi bigirira akamaro kanini umuhinzi wabyo kuko bimuzanira amafaranga kugeza umuhinzi w’icyayi ahabwa amafaranga ijana kiro cy’amababi y’icyayi kigero cy’ubwiza kiri hagati naho cyayi kiri bwiza kugeza umuhinzi ahabwa amafaranga kiro ariko hari n’inganda zimwe zishobora kuyarenza muri mwaka igiciro cy’ikawa cyavuye mafaranga kiro cy’ibitumbwe kigera mafaranga ibi bikaba biterwa n’uko igiciro cy’ikawa cyagiye kizamuka masoko mpuzamahanga amafaranga avuye bihingwa afasha abahinzi kongera umusaruro ndetse kwikenura kuko umuhinzi aguriwe giciro cyiza agira umwete kongera umusaruro kugira yeze byinshibimwe bihugu kawa ikunze kugurishwamo harimo leta zunze ubumwe z’amarikaubuyapani ndetse bimwe bihugu by’iburayi icyayi gikunze kubona amasoko bihugu by’abayisiramu iby’abarabu ndetse bimwe bihugu by’iburayi nk’uko corneille aritangaza abanyarwanda ntibitabira cyane kunywa icyayi n’ikawa avuga abanyanyarwanda bakwiriye kuba isoko ry’ibyo beza ntibatege amasoko banyamahanga gusa umwaka ushize umusaruro w’icyayi woherejwe hanze urenga toni zinjije akayabo kagera miliyoni z’amadorari y’amerika umusaruro kawa woherejwe hanze ugera toni zinjije miliyoni z’amadorari y’amerika corneille avuga bihingwa bifasha cyane igihugu kuko bituma ubukungu bw’igihugu kuzamuka ndetse bigatuma u rwanda rugira ijambo rwego mpuzamahanga aya madevize kandi afasha u rwanda kugura ibicuruzwa rukura hanze rudahenzwe avuga u rwanda rweza umusaruro muke ugereranyije n’ibihugu duturanye ariko icyari n’ikawa by’u rwanda bifite uburyohe kurusha bihugu nk’uko ntakirutimana corneille yabidutangarije ikawa zihingwa gihugu hose ariko zibanze cyane ntara y’amajyepfo ndetse n’iy’iburengerazuba kuko ariho hari ubuso bunini bw’iki gihingwa icyayi kibanze ahanini ntara y’uburengerazuba misozi miremire y’isunzu congo nil ndetse n’iy’amajyepfo y’u rwanda cyane turere twa nyaruguru nyamagabe mu ntara y’iburengerazuba hari inganda esheshatu hakaba hanateganywa kubakwa izindi nganda eshatu rwego kuzamura ubwiza bw’umusaruro w’icyayi mu ntara y’amajyaruguru hari inganda z’icyayi mulindi gicumbi sorwathe karere rulindo mu rwego kongera umusaruro uturuka bihingwa ndetse n’ibindi byoherezwa mahanga imboga imbuto n’ibireti harateganywa kongerwa ubuso bihingwaho gihugu hose urugero ntara y’amajyepfo n’iy’iburengerazuba hegitali ziziyongera hegitali zisanzwe cyayi hari ubutaka gishwati bugera hegitali bugahingwaho icyayi ikawa hakazongerwaho hegitali zahingwaga iyi gahunda ikazakorwa mwaka - abaturage bakaba basabwa kuzitabira guhinga bihingwa rwego kurushaho kwizamura kuzamura umusaruro w’ibyoherezwa mahanga rusange imboga imbuto ndetse n’ibireti nabyo bizongererwa ubuso ndetse cyane ntara y’amajyaruguru ndetse ntara y’uburengerazuba bw’amajyaruguru safari viateur

title: u rwanda rwasinye amasezerano azafasha abasaga ibihumbi gutunga inzu i kinyinya
content: guverinoma y’u rwanda yasinyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye n’ikigega banki y’isi cy’imari gitera inkunga imishinga y’ishoramari ifc agamije kurufasha kubaka inzu ziciriritse i kinyinya mujyi kigali aya masezerano yashyizweho umukono kabiri muhango wahuriranye n’itangizwa ry’inama y’iterambere ry’ubukungu afurika dff yitabiriwe n’abantu barenga uyu mushinga uzashyirwa bikorwa bufatanye ifc ikigo cy’igihugu cy’ubwiteganyirize rwanda rssb banki itsura amajyambere y’u rwanda brd n’ikigo cy’abashinwa kizobereye bwubatsi broad homes industrial international co ltd biteganyijwe uzasozwa huzuye inyubako zirimo guturamo n’izigenewe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi kinyinya uyu mushinga uzungukiramo abagera uzatwara asaga miliyoni akabakaba miliyari frw visi perezida ushinzwe itumanaho n’imikoranire ifc karin finkelston yavuze abikorera bafite uruhare kunoza imiturire mijyi afurika yagize ifc ishyigikira imishinga igamije kwagura uburyo bw’imiturire kwegereza abaturage afurika inzu nziza kandi ziciriritse mu myaka ishize ikigega mpuzamahanga gitsura amajyambere ida n’igitanga ingwate miga ifc byatanze miliyari ishoramari ry’abikoreraminisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi dr uzziel ndagijimana yatangaje imiturire ikirimo icyuho kinini ariko hari ingamba zafashwe ati muri gahunda guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi harimo iyihariye kunoza imiturire kigali mijyi iyunganira dufitanye ubufatanye banki y’isi hari imishinga ibiri igiye gutangira irimo uwa kinyinya tumaze gusinya amasezerano y’ibanze turateganya gushyiraho ikigega cyihariye giteza imbere imiturire mijyi kizatangirana miliyoni azakoreshwa gufasha abifuza inzu inyigo yakozwe n’umujyi kigali minisitiri y’ibikorwa remezo n’umuryango w’abibumbye yagaragaje hazaba hari icyuho cy’inzu bazikeneye imibare igaragaza buri mwaka hubakwa iziri hagati gutuzamo abaturage gihe ikibazo cy’imiturire cyakemuka hubatswe nibura mu ukuboza banki y’isi yemeye gutanga miliyari kurandura ubukene bukabije afurika yagenewe miliyari banki y’isi iheruka guha u rwanda miliyoni azashorwa bikorwa remezo birimo imihanda ireshya n’ibilometero izubakwa mijyi itandatu yunganira kigaliagace kinyinya kagenewe inzu guturamo zigezweho inkuru igihe

title: police hc yihariye ibikombe byose bikinirwa rwanda mwaka
content: iyi mikino ikinwa buri mwaka rwego guha agaciro intwari z’u rwanda gutangiza mugaragaro umwaka w’umukino handball yitabiriwe n’amakipe atandatu y’abagabo n’abiri y’abagore police handball yatwaye igikombe cyitiriwe intwari imaze gutsinda mukino nyuma ecole secondaire de kigoma ibitego ecole secondaire kigoma ikipe nshya shampiyona handball ariko yatunguye benshi yageraga mukino nyuma ndetse police hc ikayitsinda bigoranye ecole secondaire kigoma ruhango igizwe ahanini n’abakinnyi bahoze gs saint joseph nyamasheke itsinda rimwe kaminuza y’u rwanda apr iba izamuka igera mukino nyuma irindi tsinda ryari rigizwe police gs de la salle kie iki gikombe cyari cyaratwawe apr umwaka ushize ariko mwaka ntiyanabashije kugera mukino nyuma mu rwego rw’abagore apapeki cyuru yatwaye igikombe nyuma gutsinda kie yaragitwaye umwaka ushize mikino ibiri yahuje makipe bitewe n’uko bagore hitabiriye amakipe abiri gusa byabaye ngombwa akina umukino ubanza n’uwo kwishyura apapeki itsinda kie imikino yombi umukino ubanza wabaye gatandatu apapeki yatsinze ibitego kwishyura itsinda ibitego police hc bagabo apepeki cyuru bagore zakunze kwiharira ibikombe byakiniwe rwanda mwaka ushize police yatwaye igikombe shampiyona itwara igikombe cy’u rwanda none inatwaye icyitiriwe intwari mu mwaka kandi nabwo mbere mateka yayo police hc yaserukiye u rwanda i dares salaam tanzania mikino y’amakipe yabaye mbere iwayo makipe karare afurika hagati n’iburasirazuba itahukana umwanya kane biteganyijwe shampiyona handball y’uyu mwaka izatangira byumweru bibiri biri imbere theoneste nisingizwe

title: tour du rwanda kigali-rubavu ikipe y’u rwanda yabaye iya mbere
content: kwitwara neza kw’ikipe karisimbi byaturutse bakinnyi bakoresheje imbaraga nyinshi gasore hategeka waje mwanya kabiri ruhumuriza abraham waje mwanya gatatu mu kiciro cyabanje ruhumuriza yaje mwanya ku mukinnyi giti cye umunyamerika joseph rosskopf ukinira team type waje mwanya mbere yawusimbuyeho mugenzi kiel reijnen waje mwanya kane muri rusange kugeza tour of rwanda iyobowe n’umunyamerika rosskopf joseph ukinira team type amaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda akurikiwe hategeka gasore karisimbi umaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda mwanya gatatu haza ruhumuriza abraham karisimbi umaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda adrien niyonshuri watangiye yitwara neza yasubiye inyuma ho gato kuko mwanya akaba amaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda ku rutonde rw’uko amakipe akurikirana ikipe karisimbi y’u rwanda mwanya mbere igice kane cy’iri siganwa cyabaye munsi abasiganwa bahagurutse i rubavu berekeza i muhanga bakaza gusiganwa intera ireshya n’ibirometero ejo bazahaguruka i muhanga bajya i huye gice gatanu theoneste nisingizwe

title: banki y’isi yemeje umushinga miliyoni uzahuriza imipaka y’u rwanda-drc-uganda bucuruzi
content: kuri mbere ubuyobozi banki y’isi bwemeje inkunga miliyoni z’amadolari amerika agiye gushyigikira umushinga koroshya ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka karere k’ibiyaga bigari cyane cyane u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo drc ugandabanki y’isi ivuga mushinga wiswe great lakes trade facilitation project uzafasha abacuruzi bambukiranya imipaka n’imiryango bagera bihumbi bakabona ibibatunga bihagije akazi ndetse bigateza imbere imibereho y’abatuye akarere rusange mu itangazo banki y’isi yasohoye yavuze mushinga uzatera ingabo bitugu cyane cyane abacuruzi biganjemo abakora ubucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse n’abagore ni umushinga kandi uzafasha guteza imbere amasoko yegereye imipaka kandi biteze imbere urujya n’uruza rw’abantu ibicuruzwa serivise ndetse bifashe inzego leta zegereye zegereye imipaka kurushaho kwagura kunoza serivise zitanga makhtar diop umuyobozi banki y’isi wungirije ishami afurika yavuze ibihugu by’u rwanda drc uganda biri mushinga bisangiye imbogamizi bucuruzi bityo kuzikemura hagomba kubaho uburyo bukomatanyije kubikemura umushinga great lakes trade facilitation uje usa n’uwuzuza umuyobozi banki y’isi jim yong kim yemeye ruzinduko rw’akazi bihugu by’u rwanda drc uganda mwaka rwego gushyigikira amahoro umutekano n’iterambere karere ngo hatoranyijwe umushinga w’ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka kuko basanze ushobora guteza imbere abaturage ukabahuza n’amasoko y’akarere kandi ukarushaho gushimangira ubuhahirane aha banki y’isi itanga urugero mupaka muto petite barrire uhuza gisenyi rwanda goma drc munsi hatambuka baturage hagati y’ibihumbi bajya kurangura cyangwa gushaka abaguzi anabel gonzalez umuyobozi mukuru banki y’isi ushinzwe ubucuruzi asanga mushinga mushya uzazana ituze karere kuko uzateza imbere imibereho y’abaturiye imipaka ukoroshya ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka ndetse ugakomeza ubwisanzure bukungu binyuze guhuza ibikorwa remezo politile n’imikorere amafaranga yateganyirijwe mushinga azakoreshwa kubaka ibikorwa remezo n’ibikoresho bizafasha kunoza kurinda urujya n’uruza rw’abantu n’ibintu n’ibinyabiziga by’ubucuruzi byambukiranya imipaka ngo hazanazamurwa umutekano w’abacuruzi bato bubakirwa inzira zabo zihariye amatara camera ndetse n’inzu z’ububiko bufite umutekano bazajya babikamo ibicuruzwa byabo banki y’isi ikizera guteza imbere ibikorwa remezo kuvugurura imikorere mipaka bizafasha abacuruzi bato cyane cyane abagore bakunze kwibasirwa n’ihohoterwa ifatwa ngufu kwakwa ruswa y’igitsina ngufu indatwanet

title: ingendo zahagaritswe mujyi kamembe abaturage bategekwa kuguma
content: mu masaha saa yine n’igice nibwo bamwe baturage mujyi kamembe basabwe n’inzego z’umutekano gusubira zabo rwego gukomeza kwirinda icyorezo covoid- gikomeje gufata indi ntera rusizi duce turi kubonekamo ubwandu bwinshi bw’abarwayi coronavirus kuko minsi ine ishize aka karere hagaragaye abantu banduye covid- abaganiriye igihe bemeje babwiwe muntu ugomba rugo ndetse ibikorwa byose bifungwa uretse ahagurirwa ibiribwa ahacururizwa imiti ndetse n’amavuriro umwe yagize habanje kuza imodoka igenda itanga ubutumwa abaturage basubira zabo ubu ndatashye nari ndi mujyi kamembe isoko bavuga tugomba gusubira rugo hagasigara abacuruza ibiribwa gusa hanze hagiye gukora farumasi gusa twe bishobotse z’uku kwezi kamena twasubira kazi undi abashinzwe umutekano baje badusanga maduka batubwira dukurikize gahunda guma rugo’’ icyemezo gushyira umujyi rusizi gahunda guma rugo gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri cyafashwe kamena nabwo cyatangiye kubahirizwa cyashyizweho umukono minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu prof shyaka anastase serivisi zemerewe gukomeza gukora n’izakumiriwe mu bindi bice byose by’akarere rusizi harakomeza kubahirizwa amabwiriza kwirinda coronavirus nk’uko biteganywa n’ibyemezo by’inama y’abaminisitiri kamena inzego zibishinzwe zirakomeza kugenzura hari n’ahandi hashobora gushyirwa guma rugo gihe bibaye ngombwa inzego z’ibanze n’iz’umutekano zirasabwa gukurikirana ishyirwa bikorwa ry’aya mabwiriza abaturage basabwe gukomeza kuguma rugo kubahiriza amabwiriza kwirinda coronavirus yatanzwe n’inzego z’ubuzima kandi ugaragayeho ibimenyetso cyangwa ubonye ubifite agahamagara

title: ibinini ibuprofen byatangiye kugeragezwa kuvura coronavirus
content: itsinda ry’abaganga bitaro by’i londres bizera muti usanzwe ukoreshwa kugabanya ububabare wakwifashishwa gufasha abantu barwaye coronavirus bafite ibibazo by’ubuhumekero bizera muti ihendutse iboneka isoko ushobora gufasha abarwayi buryo batashyirwa mashini zibongerera umwuka mu bushakashatsi bwabo abazabukorerwaho barwaye bazahabwa muti bawufatanye n’ubufasha basanzwe bahabwa n’ibitaro ubushakashatsi bwakorewe nyamaswa bwagaragaje muti ushobora gufasha bijyanye n’ibibazo by’ubuhumekero kimwe bibazo abarwaye coronavirus bahura nabyo prof mitul mehta wigisha king’s college london yavuze bakeneye gukora igerageza kugira babone ibimenyetso nyabyo bihura n’ibyo bakeka ikoreshwa ry’uyu muti ubwo cyorezo cyadukaga isi hari impungenge umuti ibuprofen ushobora kugira ingaruka buzima bw’abantu bafite ibimenyetso by’iki cyorezominisitiri w’ubuzima bufaransa oliver veran yigeze kuvuga gukoresha muti byakongera ibibazo muntu urwaye cyorezo ahubwo byarutwa gukoresha paracetamol nyuma abahanga baje kwemeza paracetamol ishobora kwifashishwa kuvura ibimenyetso coronavirus harimo nko kugabanya umuriro ndetse yanafasha abarwaye ibicurane

title: inkotanyi zirimo gutsindwa- amagambo nyandiko musenyeri mbonyintege
content: nyuma gusoma inyandiko ibanziriza hari umusomyi wanyandikiye ubutumwa bugufi ambwira atekereza nanditse ibi mbitekerejeho nsanga harimo ubugome butagira izina ariko harimo n’ubugwari nta nyenzi zigeze zitera zigere cyanika bufundu nyamagabe y’ubu andre nkeramugaba perefe gikongoro yamariye abatutsi abaroha migezi mwogo rukarara mbirurume yambajije ikibazo ariko yibaza utekereza umukecuru cyangwa umusaza w’iyo bweyeye gikundamvura i makwaza n’ahandi bishwe wagize bazi inkotanyi cyangwa habyarimana buryo babizira hejuru y’ubugome n’ubugwari harimo n’ubuswa ntagereranywa sans qualification kwica abatutsi rwanda n’abandi mutavuga rumwe ukumva watsinze uragamba birenze ubuswa hari ikindi kiri inyuma yabwo colonel barthazar ndengeyinka wahoze ngabo habyarimana far akaba rdf yahunganye ikibazo cyamuzonze hari abasirikare babiri bambwiye bihe bitandukanye ndengeyinka yajyaga yibaza ijwi riranguruye impamvu ingabo far zatsinzwe kandi zari nyinshi kandi zifite intwaro nyinshi n’umubare munini w’abasirikare interahamwe ndetse n’abaturage babashyigikiye niyo mpamvu nabyise igwingira ry’imitekerereze n’imyumvire harya byakwitwa ubundi wakwirara baturage batazi intambara ukabica witwa rugamba bikitwa koko umubare sinzi icyari mubare gatandatu itegurwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi hari ibinyamakuru bitatu bifite nimero ibyo binyamakuru kangura no ukuboza cyamamaye kubera amategeko cumi y’abahutu n’igice mbere cy’imbwirwaruhame anastase makuza ubushize nakomoje ijambo anastase makuza gifaransa yise appel pathetique aggression-suicide de terroristes tutsi ikindi kinyamakuru cyasohotse kwezi urumuri kristu urk no noheli ikindi isibo no cyasohohotse itariki mutarama bivuga cyari y’ibyo bindi bibiri icyo binyamakuru bihuriyeho byarimo imvugo y’urwango n’ubwo abanditsi bayo batandukanye kangura yayoborwaga hassan ngeze w’umuyisilamu akaba yarabaye umunyamakuru avuye kazi kudoda inkweto gisenyi umwanditsi mukuru w’urumuri kristu padiri smaragde mbonyintege musenyeri diyosezi kabgayi yandika nimero yigishaga iseminari nkuru nyakibanda yanaje kubera umuyobozi mukuru wayo naho isibo ikayoborwa sixbert musangamfura wize amateka kaminuza y’u rwanda akaba asigaye mutwe w’abajenosideri fdu-inkingi rimwe rimwe akanagaragara mutwe w’iterabwoba rwanda national congress rnc iby’ikinyamakuru kangura simbitindaho kuko ibyacyo byavuzweho kenshi kandi henshi ndagaruka igwingira ryakwiriye banyapolitiki rikagera bitwa bihaye imana kandi barize kuva parmehutu kugera mrnd jenoside isibo y’urwango rumuri kristu mu mazina mabi y’urwango yiswe inkotanyi n’abatutsi biswe harimo inyenzi gusa ribi nk’inyangarwanda ni ijambo riri mbwirwaruhame n’inyandiko nyinshi z’abatoza jenoside ari makuza juvenal habyarimana hassan ngeze cdr uwiswe inyangarwanda biba birenze kwitwa umwanzi kwanga u rwanda igihugu rusanga birimo kwanga abarurimo n’ibirugize birumvikana kwica uwiswe inyangarwanda igikorwa gukunda igihugu ku rupapuro mbere rw’urumuri kristu no hari ifoto papa jean paul ii afite isuka y’umujyojyo kuboko kwe kw’iburyo imbere hari umwana w’umukobwa wambaye ikanzu yiganjemo ibara ry’umutuku yambaye n’agatambaro kavanzemo umweru n’umuhondo ijosi uwo mukobwa ufite mikoro asa nkaho hari ijambo amaze kubwira papa inyuma papa hari hahagaze musenyeri thadeyo nsengiyumva diyosezi kabgayi mu nsi y’iyo foto rupapuro mbere hari amagambo umusanzu w’ubumwe n’amahoro icyatumye bahitamo foto n’ayo magambo usanga ntaho bihuriye n’ubutumwa kiliziya iyo wibutse indirimbo simon bikindi aririmba bene sebahinzi’ birashoboka papa yabonye mubatizo politiki cyangwa se bikaba ibya ndirimbo umurimo uguhinga ibindi amahirwe leta juvenal habyarimana yamamaje rwego kugwingiza abanyarwanda igisobanuro cy’amagambo umusanzu w’ubumwe n’amahoro rupapuro mbere rw’icyo kinyamakuru urumuri kristu urk ugisanga ijambo ry’ibanze ryanditswe musenyeri mbonyintege urup - umwanditsi w’iryo jambo ry’ibanze yanditse papa ukubutse ruzinduko rwanda bamuhaye impano y’isuka yagaragaje ruhame kumwe n’abanyarwanda cyane cyane ntambara twatejwe n’abanzi b’amahoro inkotanyi kwitwa abanzi b’amahoro urk nizera atari ibya papa ibya musenyeri mbonyintege kuko akomeza agira ikindi noneho kiranga ishira ry’uyu mwaka n’amateka y’u rwanda ahora azirikana intambara ukwakira twatejwe n’inyangarwanda zaje ziva i bugande agakomeza agira ubu twandika inkotanyi zirimo gutsindwa twizere zirimo izima umwiryane n’icyunamo byari bitwugarije ukwakira noneho ntibigishobotse ubona n’iyo inkotanyi azita inyenzi kuzita inyangarwanda nizera ukuri yakubonye akamenya inyangarwanda nyazo uko guhindura inkotanyi abanyamahanga ingengabitekerezo yararitse mitwe benshi buryo leon mugesera aburana akivuga abanyamahanga bateye u rwanda kuba yarise inkotanyi inyangarwanda rwego guhakwa guhakirizwa cyane hari abyemera uwabisomaga ntiyabyibagirwa ku rupapuro rw’icyo kinyamakuru urk hari ifoto y’umupadiri ufashe gahanga k’umugore upfukamye imbere mu nsi y’iyo foto handitse umusaseridoti intumwa y’imana bantu icyo bisobanuye n’urwo rwango kwita abandi inyangarwanda bwari ubutumwa bw’imana bantu b’abanyarwanda kuko umusaseridoti wabwanditse atari n’umusaseridoti usanzwe ahubwo umusaseridoti utegura abandi kuzaba abasaseridoti nkuko anastase makuza byamuzinduye akajya kubwira amahanga ubwicanyi bwavuzwe rwanda atari ibinyoma musenyeri mbonyintege yanditse ahamya ibyavugwaga rwanda ibinyoma nkunda ukuntu mbonyintege yishyira butegetsi bw’u rwanda inkotanyi zanengaga avuga abateye batazanye intwaro z’imbunda gusa baduteje n’amahanga cyane bakoresha itaramakuru n’itumanaho wakumva urusaku rw’amasasu n’induru z’amaradiyo n’ibihuha bicicikana hirya hino byose kandi bihangitse u rwanda musenyeri mbonyintege arongera akabishimangira umwanzi abategerejeho umwiryane kubera yabuze aturuka ikaba imvugo yakoreshejwe cyane n’ikinani n’abambari ari bitaga kugwa mutego w’umwanzi asingiza politiki y’ikinyoma y’ ubumwe n’amahoro yabafashije gutsinda umwanzi bigatuma umwanzi ataducamo icyuho akadufatanya n’amacakubiri urabisoma ukibaza u rwanda igihugu kitarimo ivangurabwoko ryemewe ni ijambo ry’ibanze ubona ryanditswe n’umuntu wacengewemo n’indirimbo mrnd umugambi umwe banyarwanda amahoro n’ubumwe n’amajyambere ta ra ra ra ra ra rarara kuko abisubiramo kenshi uburyo ataka agasingiza habyarimana bituma wumva gihe yandika umubaza uti yezu habyarimana umwiza nde guhitamo byari kumunanira isibo n’urk byari korari usoma mbonyintege yandikaga ukabigereranya n’ibyo musangamfura yanditse ndetse n’ibyanditswe n’abasenyeri gatolika ugasanga nk’abaririmbyi bitoje neza indirimbo ibyo mbonyintege yanditse musangamfura arabivuga isibo no urup nyandiko yise umututsi gihe cy’inkotanyi agira inyangarwanda zaje zifuza twasubiranamo zigomba kuba zarumiwe kuko zasanze dukomeye bumwe bwacu ubumwe bwatumye dufatanya kuzirwanya urebye abasenyeri gatolika rwanda banditse mabaruwa abiri boherereje abakirisitu mpera nazo ntaho zitanira n’imbwirwaruhame z’ikinani ibitekerezo biri rumwe mabaruwa musenyeri mbonyintege yaruhaye umwanya mu nyandiko musenyeri mbonyintege agira abepiskopi gatolika rwandiko boherereje abakirisitu ugushyingo batanze umuganda w’amahoro n’ubumwe bana b’u rwanda bagaye abateye u rwanda bagaya n’abemeye kuba ibyitso byabo mbese mrnd yacu nziza sugira usagambe rwanda’ ibaruwa y’abasenyeri ukuboza mwaka yakoreshaga imvugo nk’iya kangura ko abateye gashakabuhake bashaka kugarura ubwami kandi bwaranzwe n’abarenga by’abaturage kinyamateka y’inama y’abepiskopi rwanda yarushanwaga kangura n’isibo kubiba urwango imwe nyandiko zasohotse kinyamateka igira iti ubwo gihake yongeye kugariza u rwanda inkotanyi zikaba zitugera amajanja gapariti kacu kandi fondateri wako title: justin bieber avuga indwara iterwa n’uburondwe ariyo yatumye atakiboneka
content: uyu muhanzi w’icyamamare canada yavuze yararwaye indwara yitwa lyme iterwa n’uburondwe buba byatsi uyu mugabo w’imyaka yanditse instagram myaka micye ishize imukomereye kandi yanayirwayemo indi ndwaya iterwa virus yavuze yabonye ibyavuzwe mbuga nkoranyambaga afite ibibazo bikomoka gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge ni nyuma y’ifoto yamugaragaje amerewe nabi anafite ibibazo ruhu lyme indwara iterwa bacteria ikwirakwizwa n’ubwoko bunyuranye bw’ibirondwe iyi ndwara irangwa kugira ibiheri ruhu kuribwa ngingo kugira umunaniro ukabije abantu bamwe bavuze justin bieber aboneka nk’uwarembejwe n’ikiyobyabwenge kitwa ’meth’ methamphetamine bieber yanditse instagram abavuga batazi narwaye indwara lyme bieber wamenyekanye ndirimbo ’sorry’ ’baby’ yavuze miti kandi byinshi bizatangazwa mashusho mbarankuru buzima bwe izatangazwa vuba yabwiye miliyoni z’abamukurikira instagram nzagaruka nkomeye kurusha ikindi gihe cyose mbere umugore hailey bieber yavuganiye umugabo anegura abamunenga avuga batazi ubukana bw’indwara lyme ati mushakashake mumenye ndwara iyi ndwara iterwa n’uburondwe ntabwo abantu bayanduzanya ni indwara ivurwa gufata neza imiti antibiotics yanduzwa n’udukoko two bwoko bw’uburondwe tuba byatsi birebire niyomugabo albert

title: huye abanyamuryango fpr bagaragaje impungenge batewe n’ikiryabarezi
content: imikino y’amahirwe izwi izina ry’ikiryabarezi zimwe mpungenge zagaragajwe n’inteko rusange rpf inkotanyi karere huye yateranye cyumweru taliki nyakanga banyamuryango bakaba baragaragaje mukino ukomeje guteza ibibazo miryango ndetse ukaba ukunze kugaragaramo abana batarageza myaka y’amavuko iyi nteko ngarukamwaka isanzwe iba rwego kungurana ibitekerezo bagamije kurebera hamwe bakoze mwaka ushize gutegura ibizakorwa umwaka ukurikiyeho mu mwanya kungurana ibitekerezo umwe mubanyamuryango yagaragaje atuye n’ahandi agenda anyura abona ikiryabarezi giteza amakimbirane z’abashakanye ndetse kigateza n’umutekano mucye hamwe hamwe kuko abagikina batishimiye uburyo kibatwara amafaranga yagize ndifuza nteko itasozwa hatavuzwe kiryabarezi kuko giteye impungenge usanga abana bato bajya kugikina kiri guteza ibibazo kuko uratuma umwana isabune ugasanga ahise yigira kiryabarezi hari n’abana banga kujya ishuri bakahirirwa akimara gutanga gitekerezo abanyamuryango fpr inkotanyi bateraniye cyumba cy’inama batangiye kuvugana umwe umunyamakuru igihe yabashije kumva bavugaga bifuza ibiryabarezi byacibwa burundu kuko bibabangamira mu bitekerezo byatanzwe kibazo inteko rusange fpr inkotanyi karere huye yagifasheho umwanzuro yemeza n’ubwo ikiryabarezi cyemewe n’amategeko kandi banyira bakaba bafite ibyangombwa gukorera rwanda kitagomba kurengera gikore buryo budakurikije amategeko hagaragajwe kandi hari abagore cyangwa abagabo bajya mukino bagataha amafaranga bayamaze bigatuma bashyamirana n’abo bashakanye bigateza ikibazo rugo kayiranga muzuka eugene umuyobozi w’akarere huye akaba n’umuyobozi fpr-inkotanyi aka karere aganira n’itangazamakuru yagaragaje ikiryabarezi gikora buryo budakurikije amategeko babihagurukiye kuko hari n’ibimaze gufungwa yagize mu rwanda twemera imikino y’amahirwe ikora gihugu cyacu ariko ntabwo twemera ikora idakurikije amategeko hagaragajwe ikibazo cy’abana babyitabira kandi ntabwo byemewe ndetse hari n’aho byavuzwe biteza umutekano mucye dufite ingero nk’eshatu z’aho twasangaga abana bahari batagiye ishuri banyirabyo twabasabye babihagaritse kugira babanze banoze umutekano wabyo muzuka yakomeje asobanura abanyamuryango fpr inkotanyi karere huye bufatanye n’ubuyobozi biyemeje kuba ijisho rubanda bakareba ibiryabarezi bidakora buryo bukurikije amategeko banyirabyo bagahwiturwa byaba ngombwa bikanafungwa muri nteko rusange rpf inkotanyi karere huye abanyamuryango bishimiye biyemeje kugeraho umwaka ushize byashyizwe bikorwa kigero cyiza ariko bibukiranya bagomba gukomeza iterambere kuko igihugu kigifite byinshi gukora by’umwihariko biyemeje gukomeza ubukangurambaga baturage bugamijwe kubakundisha gahunda leta kuzamura imibereho myiza y’abanyarwanda nko kubashishikariza gutanga mituweli gukora ubuhinzi kijyambere n’ibindi bikorwa by’iterambere ndetse kwicungira umutekanosrcigihe kayiranga muzuka eugene umuyobozi w’akarere huye akaba n’umuyobozi fpr-inkotanyi aka karere yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: gakenke inkeragutabara n’abafasha barahuguwe mateka
content: kubakira byiza mateka y’u rwanda kugira uruhare kubungabunga umutekano hatangwa amakuru gihe muntu wese wahungabanya umutekano bimwe byagarutsweho mahugurwa yateguwe komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe agenewe inkeragutabara n’abafasha yabereye biro by’akarere gakenke ukwakira afungura mahugurwa umuyobozi komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe abahoze rugamba ntara y’amajyaruguru madamu niyonteze clemence yasabye abitabiriye mahugurwa kuyakurikirana neza kuko ingirakamaro mibereho n’abaturanyi yakomeje avuga mahugurwa agamije guhugura cyane cyane abagore b’inkeragutabara bagahugukirwa gahunda leta dore batigeze bahugurwa bagaruka rwababyaye ndetse kumenya ibibazo bafite bwana safali wilson watanze ikiganiro mateka y’u rwanda mahugurwa yasobanuriye abitariye amahugurwa imvano y’amateka yateye jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yavuze abazungu banditse kandi bakigisha amateka y’u rwanda bayagoreka nkana kugira bacemo ibice abanyarwanda babashe kubategeka bise cyongereza divide and rule by’umwihariko ababiligi banditse amateka y’abanyarwanda bagendeye mateka y’amacakubiri gihugu cyabo hagati y’abafurama flamands n’abawaru wallons dore iwabo byacikaga hagati yayo moko uretse bakoroni safali yakomeje avuga natwe ubwacu twabigizemo uruhare cyane cyane ubutegetsi butandukanye bwagiye busimburana bwahembereye macukubiri kugeza abanyarwanda barangajwe imbere n’ubutegetsi bubi bamburaga ubuzima abavandimwe basaga miliyoni asobanura ikigenderewe kwiga amateka yavuze kubaka ejo hazaza bwana safali yagize kumenya amateka yacu bidufasha kwirinda amabi jenoside tukubakira mateka meza bidufasha kandi kumenya twatsinzwe n’aho twatsinze nk’abanyarwanda ni byiza kwiga amateka kuko ushaka kwiyibagiza amateka ashaka kuyasubiramo ibyo bigamije kubaka ejo hazaza h’igihugu cyacu kizira amacakubiri n’ingengabiterezo jenoside umutekano isoko y’iterambere lt muhozi charles ubarizwa batayo ikorera karere gakenke watanze ikiganiro mutekano yavuze iterambere u rwanda rwagezeho rurikesha umutekano niyo mpamvu tugomba kuwubungabunga kugira tutazasubira inyuma yibukije abitariye amahugurwa batagomba kwirara bagomba gutanga amakuru gihe muntu wese ushobora kuhungabanya umutekano koloneli karegeya claudien komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe witandukanyije fdlr yabasabye gukangurira abavandimwe ndetse n’inshuti zabo zikiri mashyamba kongo gutahuka bagafatanya n’abandi banyarwanda kubaka igihugu cyabo kandi abizeza kuzabafasha kubagezaho butumwa izo nkeragutabara zitandukanyije fdlr zinjijwe gahunda zitandukanye z’iterambere barihirwa amashuri y’imyuga barubakiwe bavanwa nyakatsi ndetse baninjizwa gahunda gira inka mushimiyimana jeannette umwe mubakurikiranye mahugurwa avuga mahugurwa yayungukiyemo byinshi yavuze yasobanukiwe imvano jenoside amateka yagoretswe akaba agiye gufata iya mbere akayarwanya avuga amateka y’ukuri kandi agomba kubaka igihugu cy’u rwanda ayo mahugurwa yitabiriwe n’inkeragutabara hamwe n’abafasha basaga baturutse turere twa rulindo gakenke batahutse bava mashyamba repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo guhera kugeza mwaka turimo nshimiyimana leonard

title: basketball kipe izajya irenza abanyamahanga babiri kibuga shampiyona
content: iryo tegeko n’ubusanzwe ryari ririho ariko ugasanga amakipe amwe n’amwe ataryubahiriza ariko shampiyona y’uyu mwaka ikipe itazabyubahiriza izafatirwa ibihani nk’uko twabitangarijwe n’umunyamabanga mukuru ferwaba richard mutabazi mutabazi yagize mu nama twakoze twagarutse cyane mategeko agenga abakinnyi b’abanyamahanga rwanda twasanze byiza twakemerera abanyamahanga babiri gusa aribo bazajya bajya rupapuro rw’umukino w’umunsi rwego kongerera abanyarwanda umwanya gukina ikindi cyibanzweho bijyanye n’abakinnyi b’abanyamahanga umunyamahanga uzaba amaze imyaka itanu akina shampiyona y’u rwanda yindi kipe hanze y’u rwanda arakinamo azajya yemererwa gukina nk’umunyarwanda abakinnyi b’abanyamahanga bakinira ikipe y’igihugu barahawe pasiporo nyarwanda nabo bazajya bakina shampiyona bitwa abanyarwanda ishyirahamwe ry’umukino basketball rwanda ryakunze gutungwa agatoki rikunze kwemera gukinisha abakinnyi benshi b’abanyamahanga ndetse benshi bagashyirwa ikipe y’igihugu nyuma kubona musaruro urambye byatanze ikipe y’igihugu ferwaba bufatanye minisiteri siporo yatangije gahunda guha amahirwe abakinnyi b’abanyarwanda bahereye bana hashyizweho ikipe y’igihugu y’abatarengeje imyaka ndetse hari gahunda gushinga ibigo hirya hino turere bizajya bikusanyirizwamo abana bafite impano basketball abatoza bakabafasha kuzamuka theoneste nisingizwe

title: nyamasheke umusaza w’imyaka yafatanwe imiti magendu
content: marekabiri joseph w’imyaka y’amavuko utuye mudugudu kamarebe akagari mariba murenge nyabitekeri akarere nyamasheke maboko polisi sitasiyo shangi nyuma gufatanwa imiti n’inshinge yakoreshaga avura abaturage anayibacuruza buryo magendu abaturage bavuga atari ubwa mbere afatanwa imiti nk’iyi akanabifungirwa myaka ishize yigeze kuyifatanwa arafungwa ariko ntiyabiretse ahubwo yakomeje kuyicuruza baturage kuyibavurisha umwe baturage b’aka kagari aganira bwizacom yagize dutekereza atari wenyine ukora bintu nubwo ukunda gufatwa ariko kubera ntaho yize kuvura akaba ntaho abika miti hizewe n’ubuziranenge bwayo bukaba ikibazo nshinge tukaba tutakwizera rumwe ruba rugenewe umuntu umwe gusa cyangwa uruguye ingese ashobora kurujugunya ibindi bikoresho muganga afite twibaza abibika tugasanga ubuyobozi bukwiye guca migirire hakiri kare’’ umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’akagari mariba uwamahoro jean claude yemeje makuru avuga bayakuye bamwe baturage bayabahaye barabikurikirana gitondo ukwakira bagiye kumusaka bayimusangana cyumba araramo ati byavugwaga n’abaturage yatangaga ibinini binyuranye birimo yita ibya malariya iby’umutwe n’ibindi agatera inshinge kandi si ubwa mbere ayifatanywa nk’uko abyiyemerera nk’ubuyobozi biduteye impungenge kuko bishobora gutera ibindi bibazo baturage bacu kubyerekeranye n’ibyari byatangiye guhihwiswa yaba yanatangaga n’imiti gukura mo inda ubuyobozi bwabihakanye buvuga byamuvuzweho mugaragaro yemera imiti gukuramo inda itarimo umuyobozi w’aka karere wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage mukamana claudette yavuze akarere kahagurukiye kurwanya ubucuruzi magendu bwose cyane cyane ubw’iyi miti n’inshinge kuko byangiza ubuzima bw’abaturage ubucuruzi bw’imiti n’inshinge magendu bukunze kuvugwa karere rusizi cyane cyane mirenge ikora mupaka n’ umujyi bukavu rdc abaturage bagasabwa gutanga mituweli bakivuza neza buryo bwizewe kwirukira bakora magendu uyu murenge nyabitekeri usanzwe uza myanya nyuma gutanga mituweli bamwe baturage bagakeka hari byaba bihuriye n’ubu buvuzi magendu caption idattachment alignalignnone width abaturage bavuga atari ubwa mbere musaza afatanwe imiti magenducaption

title: zari hassan akomeje gusimburanwaho n’abagabo bashaka kubana noneho hagezweho umunyamakuru ukomeye tanzania
content: maulid kitenge umunyamakuru ukomeye tanzania wakoze bitangazamakuru bikomeye radio oneitv ndetse efmyiyongereye rutonde rw’abagabo bashaka gusimbura diamond mutima zarinan hassanibi byemezwa neza n’amafoto munyamakuru yashyize ahagaragara kumwe n’uyu muherwekazi rugo rwe afurika y’epfo maulid kitenge azwi cyane itangazamakuru ryo tanzania akorera radio ikomeye efm zikurikirwa cyane uyu amaze iminsi yerekana hagati zari hari ikintu kidasanzwe ndetse aheruka kwerura bakundana kandi bafite gahunda kurushinga uyu maulid kitenge aje nyuma y’undi musore witwa ringtone apoko uririmba indirimbo zihimbaza imana kenya wavuzwe buryo bukomeye kubera uburyo yiziritse mugore ashaka bakundana ariko bikarangira byanze ibya ringtone apoko byakajije umurego tariki gicurasi yumvaga zari kiganiro kiss fm kenya akamusangayo amushyiriye imodoka nshya range rover yamuguriye yagerayo agasanga yamaze kugenda icyo gihe zari yiyamye musore ndetse amubwira modoka akeneye kuko izihenze zose yazigurira’ nubwo zari yavuze atazi muhanzi ndetse atamwifuza gato ringtone apoko yongeye kwerura ashimangira azava izima amwegukanye akamugira umugore akamwibagiza gahinda yatewe diamond ikinyamakuru amani tanzania cyasohoye indi nkuru yavugishije benshi umunyamakuru kitenge aje agaragaza ibimenyetso hari urukundo hagati zari ndetse bazarushinga maulid kitenge kandi aherutse kujya afurika y’epfo gusura zari mbere y’uko ajyayo hari inkuru zasakajwe tanzania zemeza munyamakuru yaterese zari akamutera utwatsi nyuma kujya afurika y’epfo nabwo byatangajwe yagiye kwinginga zari inshuti zari yashimangiye munyamakuru atifuzwa gato muryango w’uyu mugore uganda ndetse abavandimwe bifuza yasubirana diamond mu kunyomoza iby’uko yaba yarabenzwe zari kitenge yagiye ashyira hanze amafoto amugaragaza bihe byiza n’uyu mugore haba iwe rugo afurika y’epfo tubari basangira yanabwiye ikinyamakuru amani abo bantu bakwirakwiza impuha zari yanyanze ndetse nahagaritse kumushaka ababeshyi icyo mvuga ndi gupanga ubukwe ndetse niteguye gutanga inkwano muryango ibyerekeye urukundo zari kitenge mugore ntarabivugaho gusa hari amafoto y’uruhererekane bombi yagiye ajya mbuga nkoranyambaga basangira ibihe byiza maulid kitenge yashyize hanze amafoto amugaragaza rugo zari afurika y’epfokitenge yagiye ashyira hanze amafoto amugaragaza bihe byiza n’uyu mugore haba iwe rugo afurika y’epfo muhaburarw
