title: umufasha perezida jeannette kagame arashimira abanyarwanda
content: madamu jeannette kagame yagaragarije abagiraneza abanyarwanda bamye bafite umuco kugira ubuntu bituma imiryango y’abagiraneza ikorana neza n’u rwanda ibi bimwe yavugiye nama y’iminsi yaberaga i kigali yahuzaga abagiraneza philanthropists bafasha afurika yitezweho kuvamo ubufasha butandukanye leta y’u rwanda madamu jeannette kagame washinze umuryango imbuto foundation yatanze ingero z’uko u rwanda rwateye intambwe gihe gito nyuma jenoside yakorewe abatutsi n’uko byashobotse abanyarwanda batere imbere yagaragaje kandi uburyo afurika ubwayo ibamo abagiraneza kuri twe tubyita ubuntu’ bisobanuye kugaragaza ubushobozi bw’umuntu kwemera ubwa mugenzi kwita kwita bandi buryo guhana agaciro mu rwanda ubuntu buri muco wacu kuko bakurambere bacu byari bimenyerewe abanyarwanda babaga batunze bagabiraga inka abaturanyi badatunze kugira bahere borora bihaze tubyita kuremera’ yakomeje agira munsi gahunda leta z’iterambere ry’ubukungu girinka’ zatumye abantu miliyoni bava bukene gihe cy’imyaka itanu gusa madamu kagame yasobanuye umuco y’ubuntu watumye ashinga umuryango imbuto foundation watangiye witwa pacfa ufite intego kurinda kwita miryango hirindwa virusi itera sida yagize twatangiye ibikorwa by’ubugiraneza twibanda kurwanya icyorezo sida dufasha kubaka ubuzima bw’abagore cyane cyane barimo abandujwe ngufu gihe jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yasoje asaba habaho ubufatanye burushijeho hagati guverinoma afurika n’ibigo imiryango ndetse n’abantu giti cyabo kugira hakurweho ibibazo bikunze kugaragara bikorwa by’ubugiraneza umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’abagiraneza isi global philanthropy forum jane wales avuga ubugiraneza budasaba kuba umuntu afite amafaranga menshi ahubwo bisaba kuba ubukora afite ubumuntu ndetse n’imitekerereze iteye imbere yagize amafaranga yonyine ntahagije kugira ukore ugirire neza abagukeneye ariko amafaranga ingenzi kugira ugirire abandi ineza kandi ubugiraneza buba bugamije gushaka ibisubizo bibazo runaka jane avuga minsi ibiri asanga ibyaganiriweho byaratanze umusaruro cyane kuko yabonye koko afurika ishoboye kugira izigobotore ibibazo irimo abasaga baturutse miryango y’abagiraneza bateraniye nama barimo abafasha abanyeshuri afurika kwiga bihugu by’u burayi amerika n’ahandi bakaba ihuriro bise african philanthropistsbamwe bagiraneza ahanini abikorera bafite ubukungu buhambaye afurika hanze yayo yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: ibiciro ngendo bishobora kudahinduka
content: gatarayiha avuga nubwo ibiciro peteroli byagiye bizamuka atari n’ibiciro by’ingendo byazamutse bivuze kuba byagabanutse atari n’ibiciro by’ingendo bihita bigabanuka yongeyeho rura izagerageza guhura n’abashinzwe gutwara abantu barimo abafite ibinyabiziga kugira barebe icyakorwa kuva minisitere y’ubucuruzi n’inganda yashyira ahagaragara itangazo rivuga ibiciro by’ibikomoka peteroli bigabanutseho amafaranga abanyarwanda benshi batangiye kwibaza n’ibiciro by’ingendo bitari buze kugabanuka kuva tariki litiro lisansi mazutu yavuye mafaranga mujyi kigali igera mafaranga ibiciro by’ingendo biheruka kuzamurwa nzeri litiro mazutu yavaga mafaranga n’iya lisansi ikava mafaranga bikajya mafaranga icyo gihe ibiciro by’ingendo mujyi kigali byiyongereyeho amafaranga ntara bibarirwa mafaranga kirometero icyo gihe impamvu yatanzwe cyane kuzamura ibiciro litiro lisansi mazutu byari byarenze amafaranga sylidio sebuharara

title: ebola mugi goma
content: minisiteri y’ubuzima repubulika iharanira demukarasi congo yemeje icyorezo ebola cyageze mugi goma wegereye gisenyi rwanda ni umuuntu umwe uvugwaho ndwara mugi ibiro ntaramakuru by’abanyamerika associated press bitangaza umupasiteri wabaga mugi butembo kuva cyorezo cyagera gihugu burasirazuba bwacyo hamaze gupfa abantu bagera ubuvuzi bwacyo bukomwa nkokora n’ibibazo by’umutekano muke ukunze guterwa n’inyeshyamba zitwaje intwaro zigaba ibitero ahavurirwa n’ahapimirwa ebola umubare w’abarwayi ebola wiyongera iminsi itambuka ugabanya ikizere cy’uko yarandurwa vuba bigatuma congokinshasa isaba ubufasha bwisumbuye ibihugu bituranye congo nk’u rwanda uganda byabonye ngombwa kuba maso cyane bishyiraho ingamba kurinda ndwara itarageramo bifite ishingiro kuko byagaragaye hadafashwe ingamba zikakaye ndwara ndwara yakwadukira bihugu bituranyi muri uganda yagezemo ariko amakuru vuba yaturutse minisiteri y’ubuzima yavuze yamaze kurandurwayo goma umugi uherereye burasirazuba congo burengerazuba bw’ u rwanda uhanye imbibi n’umugi rubavu wahoze witwa gisenyi ni umugi utuwe n’abantu barenga miliyoni ugahahirwamo cyane n’abanyecongo ndetse n’abanyarwanda ibihe by’i goma bimwe n’ibyo rwanda

title: nyamashekebishimiye ibyiza bakomeje kugezwaho nyuma kureka ibyangiza ishyamba nyungwe
content: ibi babigarutseho gatandatu nyuma y’igikorwa gusiganwa maguru cyabereye ishyamba nyungwe cyateguwe bufatanye bw’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere rdb akarere nyamasheke ndetse n’abikorera mbere wasangaga abaturiye pariki nyungwe batunzwe guhiga inyamanswa gutwika amakara gutema ibiti shyamba kuri siko bikimeze kuko batangiye kwitabwaho bakubakirwa ibikorwa remezo biva musaruro w’amafaranga ava bukerarugendo amakoperative agatezwa imbere ubuzima bwarahindutse kuburyo bafata iya mbere guhashya rushimusi ntirenganya sylver yagize kugira utijandika bikorwa kwangiza ishyamba hari ibikorwa bigomba kuguhuza birimo kubona imyidagaduro nk’iyi kandi urabona cyatumye tunezerwa kandi abakora ubucuruzi bacuruje n’abafite ibikorwa by’umuco bungutse uyu umwanya gukangurira abantu kubungabunga ibidukikije munganyinka esther iki gikorwa kiza cyaje gikenewe kubera abakerarugendo baje batugana gihugu cyacu tubona bidususurutsa mbere twarashimutaga ariko ibikorwa nk’ibi biradufasha cyane bikaduhuza nkanjye nkora ubukorikori bushingiye mateka umuyobozi w’akarere nyamasheke mukamasabo apollonie yavuze gikorwa kibafasha kwerekana ibyiza nyungwe kandi kikaba igikorwa gushishikariza abaturage kureka ubushimusi ati gikorwa giha isura nziza abaturage bacu turi kubereka igikorwa gishobora kuzana abashoramari karere kacu bituma n’umuturage wacu avuga nyamanswa izana umushoramari akinjiza amadovize bigatuma adashobora kuyigirira nabi cyangwa abe yayica ibi nabyo biri gutuma abaturage babona nyamanswa zibafitiye akamaro abasiganwe biganjemo abanyamahanga n’abanyarwanda bahagurukiye kitabi karere nyamagabe abandi baturuka pindura hagati nyungwe abandi bava kamiranzovu biruka n’amaguru basoreza marembo asohoka pariki nyungwe karere nyamasheke abasoganywe bambitswe imidari kuko rushanwa ryari rigamije gukora siporo rwego kugira ubuzima bwiza kwerekana ibyiza nyungwe gushishikariza abaturiye pariki kuyibungabunga

title: ntabwo nabaye umubyeyi mubi’ perezida kagame avuga yitaye bana b’ ingagi yise izina
content: perezida kagame yasabye abaturage repubulika demukarasi kongo uganda n’ u rwanda baturiye pariki y’ ibirunga uruhare rwabo kwita ngagi pariki kugira amafaranga ava bukerarugendo gusura ngagi akomeze gufasha baturage iterambere perezida kagame yasabye abaturage repubulika demukarasi kongo uganda n’ u rwanda baturiye pariki y’ ibirunga uruhare rwabo kwita ngagi pariki kugira amafaranga ava bukerarugendo gusura ngagi akomeze gufasha baturage iterambere yabivugiye muhango kwita izina abana b’ ingagi wabereye karere musanze majyaruguru y’ u rwanda nzeri muri muhango ubaye nshuro perezida kagame yavuze myaka ishize ubwe yise izina abana b’ ingagi b’ impanga kandi yakomeje kubitaho ndetse umwe akaba umutware w’ umuryango yagize mu myaka ishize nagize amahirwe ubwanjye kwita izina abana b’ ingabi b’ impanga nk’ mwabyumvise ntabwo nabaye umubyeyi mubi nabiseho nishyuye amafaranga y’ ishuri kandi gihe nakoze nshoboye kandi byarashobokaga dutumanaho kuko aka gace hari internete wifi umwe bana yabaye ingenzi muryango sliverback izina ry’ silverback ibyishimo mu minsi ishize leta y’ u rwanda yahaye bamwe baturage b’ akarere musanze nyabihu rubavu inka rwego kubashimira uruhare bagira kubungabunga pariki y’ ibirunga kubafasha kwiteza imbere perezida kagame yibukije abaturage baturiye pariki by’ amafaranga ava bukerarugendo akoreshwa bikorwa bibateza imbere umukuru w’ igihugu yasabye abaturage ubufatanye kwita pariki avuga buzatuma u rwanda rugira inshuti nyinshi perezida kagame yashimiye abise ingagi amazina munsi anashimira abarinda pariki y’ ibirunga ndetse n’ ikigo cy’ igihugu cy’ iterambere rdb kireberera pariki rwanda abise amazina abana b’ ingagi munsi barimo umusore karere karongi wahanze umuhanda km yise umwana w’ ingani nimugwire’ meddy meddy umwe bantu bise amazina abana b’ ingagi yise akaba yamwise inkoramutima’ uyu muhanzi w’ umunyarwanda ariko ubarizwa leta zunze ubumwe amerika afite indirimbo yakunzwe cyane yitwa inkoramutima’ umuhanzi w’ umunyamerika neyo umwe bise izina abana b’ ingagi akaba uwe akaba yamwise biracyaza’ niringiyimana emmanuel wahanze umuhanda km yise izina umuhanzi amerika neyo yifatanyije n’ abanyarwanda muhango kwita izina abana b’ ingagi

title: covidbamwe bakoresha batangiye gusubika amasezerano y’akazi bakozi
content: icyorezo covid gikomeje kujegeza isi rwego rw’ ubukungu kubera ingamba zafashwe guhangana nacyo cyatangiye kugira ingaruka bamwe bakozi cyane cyane b’ibigo byigenga rwanda byiganjemo iby’ ubucuruzisosiyete itwara abantu kbs zahagaritse abakozi by’agateganyo kubera ibihombo bituruka cyorezo covid ku ikubitiro cyorezo cyiza rwanda tariki werurwe amabwiriza minisiteri y’ubuzima yasabye abantu kirinda bakaraba intoki kandi birinda kwegerana ariko bagakomeza akazi kabo bisanzwe nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe tariki werurwe hasohotse amabwiriza minisitiri w’intebe asaba ureste imirimo n’ y’ibikorwa by’ibanzeindi mirimo ihagarara bishoboka abantu bagakorera bifashishije ikoranabuhanga icyo gihe abakozi benshi biganjemo mahoteli bar restaurant bamwe batangiye gusa babuze imirimo kuko hanshi gihugu bucuruzi bwarahagaze hiyongereyeho n’abakozi bakora rwego gutwara abantu n’ ibintu nabo bagiye bamaze imizi isaga bicaye iwabo kimwe n’abandi banyarwanda ariko kubera imiterere y’akazi kabo bakaba basashobora kugakora bifashishije ikoranabuhanga uretse kandi hari n’abandi nzego zitandukanye bagiye kumara icya kabiri cy’ukwezi badakora kubera icyorezo covid kandi bakeneye guhembwa kugira babeho ibi kimwe ihuriro rikomeye nyir’ubucuruzi bafite gihe byanatumye ibigo bimwe bitangira guhagarika kazi bamwe bakozi babyo mu minsi ishize ikigo gitwara abagenzi kbs kizwi cyane mujyi kigali cyari cyasubitse anasezerano y’abakozi basaga none amakuru agera valuenews dukesha nkuru cyamaze guhagarika abandi bakozi ahfi biganjemo abashoferi n’abakanishi gihe cy’amezi atatu ntabwo valuenews yabashije kuvugana n’ubuyobozi kbs kibazo ariko amabaruwa yashyikirijwe abakozi agaragaza neza impamvu ukubera igihombo yatewe n’icyorezo coronavirus si sosiyete yonyine kandi kuko amwe mahoteli akomeye ndetse resitora n’utubari bamaze guhagarika abakozi ndetse hakaba bamwe babasezerera burundu buryo bunyuranije n’amategeko hari n’ ibigo by’ amashuri byamaze gutangaza bitewe n’ ibibazo by’ ubukungu butifashe neza bihe bibaye bihagaritse by’agateganyo akazi byakoraga amategeko ateganya bihe nk’ibi itegeko ry’umurimo nimero ryo ngingo yaryo riteganywa impamvu esheshatu zishobora gutuma habaho gusubika amasezerano y’ akazi izo igihe habayeho guhagarika umurimo cyangwa gufunga ikigo hakurikijwe ibiteganywa n’iri tegeko igihe umukozi ahagaritswe nk’igihano rwego rw’akazi gihe cy’iminsi umunani y’akazi idahemberwaigihe umukozi ahanishijwe igihano cy’igifungo kitarengeje amezi atandatu cyangwa afunzwe by’agateganyo gihe kitarenze amezi atandatu igihe ikigo gihagaritse imirimo yacyo by’igihe gito bitewe n’impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa tekinikiigihe habayeho guhagarika umukozi ukorwaho iperereza rwego rw’akazi ndetse n’ igihe hari impamvu ndakumirwa zituma imirimo y’ikigo ihagarara cas de force majeure nabyo biri kuba minsi kubera icyorzo corona virusi ingingo y’ tegeko ivuga gihe habayeho isubikwa ry’amasezerano y’umurimo gihe gito kubera impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa iza tekiniki umukozi ntashobora gushyirwa gihe kudakora mpamvu z’imirimo mike inshuro cyangwanyinshi gihe kirenze iminsi mirongo cyenda mwaka umwe iyo igihe birenze iminsi bifatwa nk’aho umukozi yasezerewe kazi agahabwa impererekeza ziteganywa n’iri tegeko umukoresha nyuma kubigaragariza abahagarariye abakozi kigo ashobora gusezerera umukozi umwe cyangwa benshi bitewe guhuza imirimo isa kuvanaho cyangwa kuvugurura imikorere y’ikigo kubera impamvu z’ubukungu cyangwa guhindura ikoranabuhanga ryakoreshwaga hagamijwe kugira ikigo kirusheho guhigana kandi akabimenyesha nyandiko umugenzuzi w’umurimo ubifitiye ububasha iyo umukoresha asezereye umukozi umwe cyangwa benshi kubera impamvu z’ ubukungu cyangwa tekiniki ashyira rutonde abakozi bateganywa gusezererwa hakurikijwe ubushobozi murimo amashuri uburambe kigo n’umubare w’abantu bemewe n’amategeko buri mukozi atunze

title: abarundi barenga bambuka umupaka w’u rwanda buri munsi
content: umuvugizi w’ibiro by’abinjira n’abasohoka rwanda sebutege ange aratangaza mupaka nemba hari urujya n’uruza rw’abarundi baturiye umupaka buri munsi baza rwanda sebutege avuga minsi izanzwe abarundi bambuka hagati n’igihumbi kuwa kabiri kuwa gatanu ndetse kuwa gatandatu kucyumweru hambuka n’abari hejuru y’igihumbi yagize kuri minsi haba habaye amasoko bakaza kuyarema kuwa gatandatu kucyumweru abenshi baje birori bitandukanye biba byabereye rwanda n’ubukwe n’ibindi ntarabaganyi ananias umurundi avuga abarundi baza rwanda guhaha bakunda kugura ibitokiibigoriibirayi ibijumba n’imyumbati abanjira benshi baturuka misozi bishisha murehe rwibikara rwintonga bavuga ubuzima bwabo babukesha igihugu cy’u rwanda kuko i wabo hakunzwe kurangwa n’inzara yibasiye igihugu cy’u burundi bigatuma hari n’abasuhuka bahungira rwanda nukuba maso kuko hari sekibi mu kagali nemba umurenge rweru mupaka w’u rwanda n’u burundi hari abavuga hari abarundi baza bafite ibindi bibagenza bitari byiza ndayishimiye simon umurundi ukunda kuza guhahira rwanda cyane yavuze igihugu cy’u rwanda kibafatiye runini bityo ntawagihungabanya bareba ati hari bene wacu b’abarundi bagera batanu bamaze gushyikirizwa inzego z’umutekano rwanda kubera guhungabanya umutekano w’abanyarwanda umwe barundi waganiye kigalitodaycom ntarabaganyi ananias yasobanura inka baziba bakazibagira gihuru inyama zikajya kugurishwa masoko abagenzi nabo bakamburwa utwabo mu misozi yegereye mupaka abaturage baza guhaha rwanda bagiye misozi y’iwabo bashaka inyangamugayo zizajya zikurikiranira abashobora guteza umutekano muke gihugu cy’amahahiro kugira bazajye babihanira ubwabo uyu mupaka nemba ukaba waratangiye gukoreshwa cyane nyuma y’ikorwa ry’umuhanda kaburimo uturuka kicukiro ugera mupaka w’u rwanda n’u burundi egide kayiranga

title: abaterankunga n’abategura amarushanwa y’ubwiza barashinjwa gusambanya abakobwa bayitabira
content: senateri ana theresia risa navarro hontiveros-baraquel philippines yasabye inteko ishinga amategeko gihugu hagomba kubaho igenzura ryimbitse kibazo cy’ihohoterwa rishingiye gitsina ryakorewe abakobwa bitabiriye irushanwa miss earth ahanini batunga agatoki abaritegura n’abaterankunga baryo mbere tariki ugushyingohontiveros ayobora komisiyo sena ishinzwe iby’uburenganzira bw’ikiremwamuntu imibanire y’imiryango abana n’uburinganire yavuze rimwe ihohoterwa by’umwihariko irishingiye gitsina rigomba kwihanganirwa yabanje kuvuga gushaka gukoresha abakobwa imibonano mpuzabitsina gahato hantu hamwe bifite umwanya by’umwihariko avuga agahomamunwa kubyumva marushanwa y’ubwiza kandi ariyo yakabaye azamura igitsinagore arongera avuga yatunguwe n’ibyo yumvise biba miss earth nk’uko rappler ducyesha nkuru ikomeza ibitangaza ati natunguwe kubona hari amaraporo menshi yagiye atangwa avuga abakobwa bamwe miss earth basabwe kuryamana n’umuterankunga ariko abaterankunga ndetse n’abategura irushanwa bagakomeza gukora ibikorwa bijyanye n’irushanwa ntacyo bikanga ibi byanyeretse kudaha agaciro abakobwa bahatana ndetse kutita kibazo cyari kimaze igihe kivugwa yakomeje ibi ntabwo twakemera bigenda gutya gusa hakenewe by’ukuri kureba icyabaye byaba ngombwa ubutaha hagashyirwaho uburyo kurinda abategarugori ihohoterwa nta mukobwa n’umwe ukwiriye kuba igitambo tutitaye gihugu yaturutsemo rapplercom yakomeje itangaza abakobwa barimo uwari uhagarariye canada miss earth jaime vandenberg umwongerezakazi abbey-anne gyles-brown emma mae sheedy uhagarariye guam rushanwa baherutse kuzamura title: nyamashekeabaholandi bahagaritse amafaranga bageneye gukora imihanda
content: dr ndabamenye tlsphore avuga kudindira kw’iriya mihanda kwatewe n’abakora inyingo bazanyemo kwifuza inama njyanama y’akarere nyamasheke iherutse guterana yagaragaje hari amafaranga agera miliyari miliyoni yagombaga gutangwa n’abaholandi ngengo y’imari y’akarere agakora imihanda ariko akaba ataraje kubera ukwifuza kw’abakora inyigo ibi byabaye gihe abaturage aka karere bakomeje gutaka ikibazo cy’imihanda mibi ibaheza bwigunge n’ubukene bukabije nk’uko byashimangiwe perezida w’inama njyanama y’aka karere dr ndabamenye tlsphore ariya mafaranga yagombaga gukora imihanda ihuza abaturage hirya hino igafasha koroshya imigenderanire n’ubuhahirane hagati y’aba baturageicyakora abakoze inyigo y’isoko batse miliyari miliyoni baholandi basanga ukwifuza gushaka indonke zikabije kandi mafaranga arenze bateganyije bituma bayihorera abaturage bahomba batyo yagize atikutabona ariya mafaranga byatewe n’abakoze inyigo kubaka iriya mihanda bashatse kwifuza bituma umuterankunga yanga kurekura yatugeneyekuko bashakaga amafaranga menshi adahuye n’ubushobozi bw’umuterankunga ariko igishimishije amasezerano dufitanye azageza bishoboka nihadashyirwamo kwifuza bagasaba amafaranga abaterankunga bafite tuzayabona ngengo y’imari y’umwaka utaha avuga abakora inyigo z’amasoko bazanyemo kwifuza hari ibipfa kuko hari abaza bashyizemo ibiciro biri hejuru cyane hari nk’aho basanga bavuga ibizatwara miliyoni wareba ibikoresho bavuga bazakoresha wareba n’uko bazawukora ugasanga miliyoni zawukora kandi bikagenda neza icyakora inyigo itaha ikaba igomba kuzayagabanya byanze bikunze kugira asohokeibi kandi byagize n’ingaruka ngengo y’imari kuko bagombaga gukoresha miliyari miliyoni bakaba bamaze kubona miliyari miliyoni gusa amwe yasigaye akaba yaraheze baterankunga batayarekura harimo n’ariya miliyari miliyoni iyi mihanda yareshyaga n’ibilometero hategerejwe abazaza bazanye ibiciro bihuye n’amafaranga y’umuterankunga ikazabona gukorwa dr ndabamenye yagize atiamafaranga asohoka ajyanye n’ibigiye gukorwa ariko badutera inkunga hari badusaba tubanza gukora cyane cyane ibijyanye kureba inyigo y’ibijyanye n’amasoko abazikora bakagaragaza bizatwara amafaranga hejuru cyane kandi hari abaterankunga bagennye babona azabikora uku gushaka indonke zirenze bigatuma batayatanga abaturage mirenge cyato rangiro kanjongo karambi baheze bwigunge kubera imihanda mibi basaba leta gukumira abashaka indonke byagenewe guteza imbere rubanda rimwe rimwe ugasanga banabavukije amahirwe nkuko byabagendekeye srcimvaho yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: mu masaha macye itorero inyamibwa rirakora igitaramo gikomeye inkera i rwanda
content: iki gitaramo giteganyijwe cyumweru tariki kibere ihema rinini ryahahoze hitwa camp kigali kcev kigali cultural exhibition village munyaneza landry umuyobozi witorero inyamibwa yatangaje biteguye cyane gitaramo bise inkera i rwanda kwinjira ukwishyura itike yibihumbi bitanu frw myanya isanzwe ibihumbi icumi frw myanya yicyubahiro ndetse hanateguwe ameza afite imyanya ihwanye namafaranga yu rwanda ibihumbi ijana mirongo itanu frw kugeza amatike yatangiye kugurishwa amatike kuboneka simba super market gishushu kicukiro kimironko wayasanga kandi camilia tea house chic kisimenti utc ahandi wayakura sawa city super market i nyabugogo station engin kanogo ahateganye carwash aho wagura itike incamake yamateka yitorero inyamibwa itorero inyamibwa ryatangiye mwaka ritangijwe nabanyeshuri babaga aerg kaminuza nkuru yu rwanda rifite intego kwimakaza umuco nyarwanda abarigize baje gusanga bashobora kubyaza umusaruro ubuhanga bafite kwimakaza umuco ndirimbo mbyino batangiye kujya ahabona barakundwa none bamaze kuba ubukombe iri torero ryatangiye gutera imbere buhoro buhoro kubera kugira ibikorwa byiza ritangira gukorana kaminuza bikorwa byayo bitandukanye kugeza ryatangiye gusa nk’aho ryo kaminuza nako ryagiye ryaguka cyane mubare w’abanyamuryango kugeza inyamibwa zigizwe n’ibyiciro by’abanyamuryango habarirwamo bamwe bariciyemo kera mirimo yubuzima busanzwe ndetse n’abakiri ngamba ariko bakaba bahurira bikorwa bitandukanye bibahuza abanyamuryango bakiri ngamba bagera abafite indi mirimo bakagera ndetse banarenga ubu itorero risigaye ribamo abanyamuryango kaminuza zitandukanye kuko kaminuza yahurijwe hamwe bituma naryo risigaye ribarizwa kigali ariko huye hose rikaba rihafite icyicaro itorero inyamibwa rigiye gukorera i kigali igitaramo gikomeye nyuma yibindi binyuranye baherutse gukorera i burayi bihugu bitandukanye nku bufaransa u bubiligi espagne bagaragaje ibyiza bihatswe numuco nyarwanda ndetse bakumbuza benshi u rwanda muhamirizo nimbyino gakondo cyane cyane abanyarwanda bihugu itorero inyamibwa ryari i burayi ryari ryitabiriye iserukiramuco ryiswe iry’amajyepfo festival du sud ryabaye taliki kamena kugeza taliki kanama ryitabiriwe namatorero atandukanye migabane hagamijwe guhuriza hamwe imico kuyiha agaciro iserukiramuco festival du sud ryo mwaka naryo itorero inyamibwa rikubutsemo ryari ryitabiriwe nibihugu content: gatarayiha avuga nubwo ibiciro peteroli byagiye bizamuka atari n’ibiciro by’ingendo byazamutse bivuze kuba byagabanutse atari n’ibiciro by’ingendo bihita bigabanuka yongeyeho rura izagerageza guhura n’abashinzwe gutwara abantu barimo abafite ibinyabiziga kugira barebe icyakorwa kuva minisitere y’ubucuruzi n’inganda yashyira ahagaragara itangazo rivuga ibiciro by’ibikomoka peteroli bigabanutseho amafaranga abanyarwanda benshi batangiye kwibaza n’ibiciro by’ingendo bitari buze kugabanuka kuva tariki litiro lisansi mazutu yavuye mafaranga mujyi kigali igera mafaranga ibiciro by’ingendo biheruka kuzamurwa nzeri litiro mazutu yavaga mafaranga n’iya lisansi ikava mafaranga bikajya mafaranga icyo gihe ibiciro by’ingendo mujyi kigali byiyongereyeho amafaranga ntara bibarirwa mafaranga kirometero icyo gihe impamvu yatanzwe cyane kuzamura ibiciro litiro lisansi mazutu byari byarenze amafaranga sylidio sebuharara

title: imfubyi jenoside zirasaba kurushaho kwegerwa
content: nubwo u rwanda rufite rugeze guhangana n’ingaruka jenoside abana bagizwe imfubyi baracyakeneye inama urukundo gusurwa kwitabwaho kuko abakagombye kubibaha batagihari nk’uko byatangajwe n’uhagarariye ibuka karere rubavu kabanda innocent kabanda yasabye abanyarubavu kwita bana ndetse n’abapfakazi kabanda yongeyeho ubupfura batojwe butabemerera kwangana mpamvu biteguye gutanga imbabazi babiciye babishaka yagize ntabwo tuzizirika muntu watwiciye uzashaka imbabazi azatwegere tuzazimuha uyu munsi kwibuka tariki wabimburiwe n’urugendo ruva murenge rugerero rujya rwibutso rw’uwo murenge wanaranzwe n’indirimbo z’abana barokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bibumbiye itsinda ryitwa imanzi’ ubuhamya gushyira indabo rwibutso rugerero ku isaha saa sita abanyarubavu bunamiye inzirakarengane iminota itatu hanyuma bakurikirana radiyo ijambo nyakubahwa perezida repubulika yavugiye sitade amahoro mujyi kigali umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheikh bahame hassan yashimiye abaturage b’ako karere kuba bitabiriye gahunda benshi anabasaba kuzitabira gahunda z’icyumweru cy’icyunamo zizaba zirimo ibiganiro yongeyeho kwegera abacitse icumu ingenzi bagahumurizwa urwibutso rugerero rushyinguyemo imibiri y’abatutsi gusoza icyumweru cy’icyunamo karere rubavu bikazabera murenge mudende tariki mata kugeza imibare yavuye bushakashatsi bwakozwe ibuka yerekana abazize jenoside bangana rwanda hose pascaline umulisa

title: u bwongereza inshuti z’u rwanda zirimo abakinnyi arsenal bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda kwibuka
content: ambasaderi w’u rwanda bwongereza yamina karitanyi yavuze kwibuka nshuro ambasade y’u rwanda bwongereza yahurije hamwe abakozi bayo abanyarwanda gihugu n’inshuti z’u rwanda abayobozi guverinoma n’abadipolomate mata hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu buryo busanzwe bagombaga guhurira paruwasi st marylebone mujyi londres gusubiza icyubahiro abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi gufata mugongo abayirokotse ariko ntibyashobotse kubera icyorezo covid- ambasade yasabye abantu kwenyegeza urumuri rw’icyizere zabo gufata umunota kwibuka umunota kwibuka wakurikiwe gusangizanya ubutumwa bw’icyizere kwibuka nshuro mu butumwa bwe ambasaderi yamina karitanyi yasabye abantu gukora cyane gukomeza kubaka amateka meza ubutumwa amabsaderi bwibanze kurwanya abahakana guteza imbere ubutabera bwanagarutsweho linda melvern umwanditsi akaba n’umunyamakuru ukora inkuru zicukumbuye wasabye abantu barwanya guhakana kwagaragara ariho hose umuyobozi ushinzwe amasomo ishuri ryitwa harrow dr michael gray yavuze guhakana uburyo bukomeye bw’abashaka gupfukirana ukuri rev canon dr stephen evans uyobora paruwasi st marylebone wakunze kwitabira gahunda kwibuka i londres yongeye gushimangira hakenewe kubaka umuryango sosiyete igihugu n’isi bitagira iheza umunyamabanga mukuru w’umuryango w’ibihugu bikoresha ururimi ry’icyongereza commonwealth patricia scotland yashimye imbaraga n’agaciro’ by’uko abanyarwanda bishyize hamwe rwego kwimakaza ubumwe n’ubwiyunge kwiyubaka depite andrew mitchell washinze umushinga umubano’ yavuze hakiri gukora bwongereza kugeza abakoze jenoside imbere y’ubutabera bishimangirwa n’umwanditsi akaba n’umunyamakuru andrew wallis wavuze batazihanganira kutagira abantu bakora guceceka bakoze ibyaha jenoside hatanzwe ubutumwa bwihanganisha abanyarwanda burimo ubw’abakinnyi arsenal barimo david luiz reiss nelson pablo mari alexandre lacazette bashimangiye bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda luiz wanasuye urwibutso jenoside kigali gisozi n’umuryango umwaka ushize binyuze gahunda visit rwanda u rwanda rufitanye n’ikipe yavuze izina ry’ikipe agira turi umuryango umuyobozi wungirije w’umuryango urumuri w’abacitse icumu bwongereza chantal uwamahoro yavuze kurokoka abyumvamo umukoro n’inshinganozirimo kwibuka kuba ijwi ry’abazize jenoside abadipolomate abayobozi guverinoma y’u bwongereza n’abandi banyacyubahiro bakoresheje twitter bagaragaza ubutumwa kwifatanya n’abanyarwanda barimo ambasaderi israel bwongereza mark regev depite lisa nandy bwongereza lord jack mcconnell cosse

title: abahanzi basuye urwibutso jenoside ntarama n’urwa nyamata
content: abahanzi batorewe gukomeza cyikiro kabiri bitabiriye urwo rugendo usibye knowless bubiligi kwitabira gahunda zijyanye kwibuka nk’uko umujyanama manager abitangaza abo bahanzi babanje gusura urwibutso ntarama basobanuriwe amateka yaho ndetse n’iyicwarubozo ryahabereye basobanuriwe ukuntu mbere jenoside abatutsi bahigwaga ariko uwabaga yahungiye kiriziya ntacyo yabaga ibyo byatumye jenoside benshi bahungira kiriziya bizeye gukira nk’uko byagendaga mbere ariko siko byagenze kuko bamaze kwirundiramo interahamwe zabasanzemo zibica urw’agashinyaguro abatutsi bahungiye kiriziya central ntarama babanje kwihagararaho ariko bigeze itariki nibwo abasirikare n’interahamwe baje banakoresha n’ibisasu kuburyo haguye abagera mu rwibutso ntarama hari imibiri y’abatutsi bazize jenoside kandi hagaragara bimwe bikoresho byifashishwa rugo baje bitwaje cyangwa se bahunganye kuko batekerezaga igihe kizagera bagasubira mungo zabo hagaragara kandi n’imyenda biteye agahinda buri munyarwanda wese ava akagera yagombye kugira ntibizongere ukundi nyangezi freddy umwe baherekeje abahanzi akaba uhagarariye bralirwa gikorwa yagize kwibuka igikorwa buri wese ku ruhande rwacu bralirwa igikorwa twubaha cyane uretse guteza imbere abahanzi tugomba kubigisha amateka bralirwa yubatse inzibutso ebyiri jenoside zishyinguwemo abakozi bakoraga bralirwa bazize jenoside gisenyi kigali bralirwa kandi ikorana n’urwibutso gisozi rwego kugira busitani bwarwo hahore hasukuye ikindi abana b’imfuzi ababyeyi bishwe jenoside bakoraga bralirwa bishyurirwa amafaranga y’ishuri mashuri mato kugera secondaire ariko hari gahunda gutangira kubishyurira kaminuza ku rwibutso nyamata ahantu hafite amateka yihariye nk’uko abahanzi babisobanuriwe niho ha mbere haguye abatutsi benshi cyane gihugu abatutsi baguye hano nyamata barashinyaguriwe bitavugwa nyamata ituwe n’abatutsi barakuwe turere dutandukanye tw’amajyaruguru gisenyi ruhengeri rwego kugira bapfe kuko hari ishyamba habagamo inyamaswa nyinshi ndetse n’amasazi yateraga indwara tsetse hapfiriye benshi gihe mu mwaka habaye ubwicanyi bumeze nk’aho byari igeragezwa jenoside buhitana abatutsi bagera kandi ntawigeze ahanirwa ukwicwa kw’abo batutsi hari title: abantu barindwi barimo ab’i rusizi bakoze ingendo zambuka imipaka basanzwemo coronavirus
content: minisiteri y’ubuzima itangazo ryayo ryo mbere yatangaje abarwayi bashya bakoze ingendo zambukiranya imipaka cyane cyane i rusizi bashyizwe kato’’ ku gicurasi nibwo karere rusizi hagaragaye abantu batanu banduye coronavirus barimo abacuruzi abashoferi n’umumotari umwe ibi byanatumye ingendo hagati y’intara n’umujyi kigali n’izikorwa moto zitwara abagenzi zikomeza gusubikwa minisitiri w’ubuzima dr ngamije yatangaje mwanzuro waturutse bwandu bushya bwagaragaye karere rusizi biba ngombwa habanza kunozwa ingamba gukumira bwakwira hose ati hari ikibazo cy’ubwandu bantu bamwe harimo abagenzi baturuka hanze hari abava karere kacu bihugu duturanye hari n’abavuye hanze baturutse kure bihugu bitandukanye cyane barwayi bagaragaye karere rusizi bituma hafatwa ingamba kugira ingendo hagati y’intara n’umujyi kigali n’intara moto zitwara abantu byose bisubikwa kugira tubanze tunoze neza amakuru yadutangarije hanyuma hafatwe n’ingamba zatuma turinda ubuzima bw’abanyarwanda kuri karere rusizi hafashwe ingamba gufata abacyekwaho gucuruza magendu bagahurizwa hamwe ndetse n’abashoferi batwara amakamyo yambuka umupaka rwego kwirinda ikwirakwira coronavirus kuva umurwayi mbere covid- iterwa n’agakoko gashya coronavirus agaragaye rwanda werurwe hamaze kuboneka banduye bipimo bimaze gufatwa barayikize gihe bitabwaho n’abaganga umwe yitabye imana minisiteri y’ubuzima yatangaje umurwayi witabye imana umushoferi w’imyaka utuye gihugu cy’abaturanyi wahisemo gutaha rwanda nyuma kuremba yitaweho n’abaganga kigo cyagenewe kuvura coronavirus ariko yaje gupfa azize kwangirika imyanya y’ubuhumekero kugeza muti n’urukingo coronavirus biraboneka hakoreshwa uburyo kuvura ibimenyetso by’iki cyorezo gusa kugeza umubiri w’umuntu wubatse ubudahangarwa virus igashira ityo maraso ibimenyetso coronavirus birimo inkorora ibicurane guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro yandura binyuze matembabuzi aturuka myanya y’ubuhumekero abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza leta hitabwa cyane cyane gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru gihe umuntu avuye rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi

content: abo barwanyi bateye utwo duce bitwaje imbunda barasa abantu bahuye kuvangura ibyo byatumye abaturage bahunga ingo zabo berekeza gace busurungi nk’uko umuyobozi w’agace katoyi yabitangarije nama yateranye tariki ihuje abakuru b’imidugudu y’akarere masisi bitero byahitanye abasivile barenga ati tariki bishe abantu batanu umugabo n’abana bane i bitoyi abantu i kibati bashyingurwa kuwa mbere i kibua mudugudu kilina nyakisosi bishe abantu banarasa abandi umudepite ukomoka karere masisi witwa robert selinga yasabye hakorwa iperereza bwicanyi buvugwa kugira hamenyekane ukuri umuyobozi w’akarere masisi avuga yababajwe n’ubwo bwicanyi agasaba abayobozi kongo-kinshasa kohereza abasirikare ako gace gihe gitoya gishoboka rwego gucunga umutekano w’abaturage ubwo bwicanyi bwakajije umurego kubera ibitero fdlr yateye mitwe yiyemeje kubarwanya ifatanyije n’abaturage nk’uko radio okapi ibitangaza nshimiyimana leonard

title: rulindo abatuye akagali gasiza basuye urwibutso kigali
content: tariki mata bamwe baturage kagali gasiza umurenge bushoki akarere rulindo basuye urwibutso kigali bigire mateka mabi yaranze u rwanda gihe jenoside yakorewe abatutsi uru rwibutso ruruhukiyemo imibiri yabatutsi biciwe mujyi kigali nkengero zayo basaga ibihumbi abaturage bakagari gasiza bagera akaba aribo barusuye bahagarariye bagenzi byiciro bitandukanye birimo amadini namatorero abikorera ndetse nurubyiruko nyuma kurusura bice byarwo byose bavuze hari amateka mashya bahakuye ndetse nisomo kuko bahaboneye batajyaga babibona nzibutso ziherereye karere rulindo dusabimana beatrice umwe basuye uru rwibutso kigali yagize nabonye amateka akomeye ngeraho ngira ubwoba nabonye ubwicanyi bwakozwe jenoside buteye ubwoba ndetse nibikoresho byifashishijwe nari ntarabibona birimo ubuhiri imyambi amasuka akomeza avuga yabonye byamuteye ubwoba agiye gusubira inyuma ariko akikomeza yasoje asaba nzibutso zuturere hajya hashyirwaho ibimenyetso amafoto namashusho gakwaya tuyisenge rica wasuye uru rwibutso akanavuga ataribwo mbere arusura kuko jenoside yabaga atuye muhima akaba yarokokeye nubwo atuye karere rulindo yavuze umuryango wose ariho uruhukiye yavuze uru rwibutso rwerekana amateka jenoside utangira ureba ingengabitekerezo yatangiye abakuru nabato bahigwagwa jenoside yagenze nuburyo abishwe bubashywe uru rwibutso akomeza avuga nubwo asura cyane uru rwibutso igishya yabonye abantu bamaze kwiyubaka pasiteri mbanzabigwi theoneste itorero adepr gasiza yavuze barushijeho gusobanukirwa neza amateka ajyanye jenoside yakorewe abatutsi avuga rimwe rimwe bajyaga batinya kubivuga nsengero ariko akaba intambwe nziza noneho kujya bagira ubutumwa batanga nsengero kugirango ibyabaye ntibizasubire ukundi yanavuze inzibutso ziri turere nazo zakagombye kugira abantu bahoraho bereka amateka abaje bahagana nkuko yabibonye gisozi guhora zifunze perezida ibuka kano kagali gasiza mukamana laurance ashimira ubuyobozi bwabateguriye gikorwa gusura urwibutso akaba anashimangira biza mibanire myiza nubuyobozi bigatsindagira ubumwe nubwiyunge baturage kamali jean de dieu umuyobozi wakagali gasiza yavuze gutekereza gikorwa byari uburyo kugirango abaturage bamenye amateka yaranze jenoside yakorewe abatutsi akaba yakomeje avuga byifuzo bye abaturage bakagali gasiza bazasura uru rwibutso kuko hari byinshi bahungukira bijyanye namateka yaranze jenoside

content: umuyobozi w’akarere rulindo kangwagye justus yavuze bitari bikwiye abarokotse jenoside aribo batanga ubuhamya bonyine kandi hari n’abandi banyarwanda babibonye ndetse batanahigwaga yagize ntiwishe kandi ntabwo wahigwaga ndetse ukuze ushobora gutanga ubuhamya ndetse ukabutanga neza kurusha bariya bana bafite imyaka itandatu jenoside ibi byanasabwe n’umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’intara y’amajyaruguru kabagamba deogratias wibukije icyunamo atari icy’igice cy’imwe cy’abanyarwanda ahubwo icy’abanyarwanda nubwo kuba n’abataracitse icumu kuzatanga ubuhamya bitoroshye bizeye kuzabigeraho kuko hari igihe gihagije kandi biyemeje bakigeraho nk’uko ubuyobozi bw’akarere rulindo yabyemeje jean noel mugabo

content: umuhanzi uririmba indirimbo zahimbiwe imana niyukuri t dudu ukomoka burundi yageze rwanda aje gushyigikira dinah uwera kumurika album mbere yise ’nshuti’ dudu yageze kibuga mpuzamahanga kigali i kanombe gitondo gatanu tariki kanama ahagana isaha saa kumi n’ebyiri n’igice mugitondo ku kibuga cy’indege yakiriwe dinah ndetse bamwe bagize urugero media group gufasha dinah gutegura igitaramo azamurikiramo album mbere mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru dudu yavuze ashimishijwe n’intambwe dinah amaze gutera ndetse atewe ishema kuza kumushyigikira dudu yagize ni ishimwe dinah ageze ntambwenje kumushyigikira kumurika album mbere kuko njye natangiye kera inshingano yanjye gusunika abandi nshoboye ntabwo dufite ubushobozi bwinshi ariko tugeza dushyikira abandi kugira bazamuke twumve izindi ndirimbo nyinshi twumve izindi mpano nyinshi uko abantu batandukanye niko bagira ibintu bitandukanye kandi biryoshye

title: arusha callixte nzabonimana arasabirwa igihano gufungwa burundu
content: umushinjacyaha w’uru rukiko paul ngarua yasabiye nzabonimana igihano gufungwa burundu buri cyaha jenoside aregwa byaha byose akurikiranyweho n’uru rukiko nzabonimana wize ibijyanye n’ubutaka kaminuza bufaransa ashinjwa kuba bateguye bagaashyira bikorwa akanategeka ubwicanyi bw’abatutsi ndetse kwica abataravugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwariho ashinjwa kandi kuba yarakanguriye agashishikariza abaturage perefegitura zitandukanye gutsemba abatusi kuba yaratanze intwaro nzabonimana wafatiwe gihugu tanzania kwezi kabiri ahakana ibyaha byose aregwa yabwiye urukiko yarahungiye ambasade y’u bufaransa jenoside yatangiraga ariko umushinjacyaha yahakanye ukwiregura kwe avuga abantu barahungiye ambasade bafite uburenganzira gusohoka igihe cyose babyifurije gutanga ibindi bimenyetso biteganyijwe kurangira gatanu abacamanza bakazahita bajya mwiherero gusuzuma ibyatangajwe mpande zombi uru rubanza rwatangiye kwezi cyenda mu kwezi gushize uru rukiko rwari rwakatiye igihano cy’imyaka abandi bahoze minisitiri babiri kubera uruhare bagize jenoside ariko rufungura n’abandi babiri nyuma kubura ibimenyetso bibahama urukiko ictr rwashizweho nyuma jenoside rwanda rwego gukurikirana abantu b’ingenzi bagize uruhare jenoside yakorewe abatusi abantu barenga miliyoni bayiguyemo gihe cy’iminsi emmanuel hitimana

title: centre afurikaumuyobozi w’ishami polisi onu yasuye abapolisi b’u rwanda butumwa bw’amahoroamafoto
content: ku gicamunsi kane tariki nzeri nibwo maj gen lus carrilho umuyobozi w’ishami polisi muryango w’abibumbye onu kumwe brig gen ossama el moghazy umuyobozi wungirije w’intumwa z’umuryango w’abibumbye ziri butumwa bw’umuryango w’abibumbye kugarura amahoro kubumbatira umutekano gihugu repubulika santrafurika munisca basuye abapolisi b’u rwanda butumwa bw’amahoro gihugu aba bayobozi kandi kumwe colonel martin faye umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe ibikorwa polisi ntumwa z’umuryango w’abibumbye zishinzwe kubungabunga kugarura amahoro gihugu repubulika santrafurika minusca uru ruzinduko rw’icyumweru kimwe muyobozi agiriye gihugu rwatangiye mbere tariki nzeri agamije guhura n’abayobozi bakuru b’intumwa z’umuryango w’abibumbye zirimo kubungabunga amahoro gihugu ndetse gusura abayobozi b’amashami agize minusca maj gen luis carrilho ijambo rye yashimiye abapolisi b’u rwanda butumwa kugarura amahoro repubulika santrafurika avuga ubunyamwuga bwabo n’umuhate bibaranga bituma babasha kuzuza neza inshingano bahawe yagize gukora cyane kwitanga ndetse n’umuhate biranga abapolisi b’u rwanda butumwa gihugu kubashimira mufite uruhare runini kubumbatira amahoro n’umutekano w’abaturage gihugu nzi neza ireme ry’umurimo mukora kandi mbikuye mutima ndabizeza abapolisi b’u rwanda ntagereranywa butumwa bw’umuryango w’abibumbye twishimiye ukuntu mwatwakiriye nkambi yanyu yakomeje asaba abapolisi b’u rwanda gukomeza ubunyamwuga ndetse n’ubushobozi bubaranga kurwanya ihohotera rishingiye gitsina rwego gukomeza guhesha isura nziza u rwanda ndetse n’umuryango w’abibumbye rusange maj gen lus carrilho n’abari bamuherekeje basuraga abapolisi b’u rwanda bakiriwe senior superintendent of police ssp alex fata umuyobozi w’ itsinda ry’abapolisi b’u rwanda bashinzwe kurinda abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu repubulika santrafurika ab’umuryango w’abibumbye ndetse n’abandi banyacyubahiro basura gihugu mu ijambo rye ssp alex fata yagarutse kazi n’inshingano z’umutwe ayoboye kurinda abayobozi bakuru n’abandi banyacyubahiro gihugu yashimiye umuyobozi w’ishami polisi muryango w’abibumbye kuba yafashe umwanya agasura abapolisi b’u rwanda avuga ikimenyetso gikomeye muryango ugaragariza abapolisi b’u rwanda butumwa kubungabunga amahoro santrafurika yagize turashimira ubuyobozi bw’umuryango w’abibumbye ndetse n’ubuyobozi bw’umutwe ushinzwe kugarura amahoro gihuguminusca uru ruzinduko rurashimangira inkunga n’ubufatanye mudahwema kutugaragariza kugira tubashe kuzuza neza inshingano zatuzanye gihugu ssp alex fata yakomeje ashimangira bufatanye nk’abapolisi b’u rwanda bubatera imbaraga gukomeza gukora neza akazi bashinzwe u rwanda rwatangiye kohereza abapolisi kazi kubungabungabunga umutekano gihugu repubulika santrafurika mwaka kuri rufiteyo amatsinda atatu hari abiri ashinzwe gucunga umutekano hakaba umutwe ushinzwe kurinda abayobozi bakuru b’iki gihugu ndetse n’abo muryango w’abibumbye hakaba n’itsinda ry’abapolisi bajya butumwa bw’amahoro bw’umuryango w’abibumbye buryo bwihariye

title: ibitekerezo moses guhangana n’ingaruka covid- bucuruzi
content: moses turahirwa yishimira yambitse perezida paul kagame kuba by’abakiriya bahoraho byatumye badashegeshwa cyane covid-mu myaka ishije abinyujije nzu y’imideli moshions bahuguye abarenga moses turahirwa washinze inzu y’imideli moshions atangaza gihe kuguma rugo hirindwa icyorezo covid- ubucuruzi bwe kimwe n’abandi busa bwahungabanye icyakora bakabifashwa kuba barizigamiye bihe byatambutse turahirwa yatangarije umuseke icyorezo covid- cyazanye impinduka nyinshi bucuruzi ati mu gihe covid- sinavuga abantu benshi bashishikajwe kugura imyenda dukora kuko abantu ntabwo bavaga nzu abenshi bagura imyenda bigendanye n’uko bafite ibirori cyangwa bagiye kwambara imyenda bitewe n’aho bagiye yakomeje avuga ikoranabuhanga ryabafashije kwegerana n’abakiriya babagana kiriya gihe kuguma rugo hirindwa icyorezo covid- ati ijana by’abakiriya batugana abahoraho muri harimo abayobozi b’igihugu nzego zitandukanye n’abakiriya bandi ikoranabuhanga dusanzwe turikoresha bucuruzi bwacu by’umwihariko kwegerana n’abakiriya bacu turikoresha turimo kwamamaza ibikorwa byacu biciye mbuga nkoranyambaga ubu turikubaka uburyo kujya ducuruza imyenda dukora rubuga rwacu ni ibintu dutekereza mezi abiri bizaba birangiye gukorwa buryo wabasha kugura ibicuruzwa byacu waba hose isi yakomeje avuga isomo yakuye bihe covid- by’umwihariko nk’umucuruzi uguhora witeguye kuko hashobora kuza ibishobora kugukura bucuruzi gihe gito zimwe ntego moshions bagezeho harimo kuba bafite abakiriya bahoraho kandi benshi bagera turahirwa icyo bivuze kuba dufite abakiriya biganjemo abayobozi b’igihugu nzego zitandukanye bitwereka ibikorwa byacu bishyigikiwe kandi byishimirwa n’izo nzego burya binadufasha gukora cyane ndetse tukarushaho gukorana ubushishozi imyambaro yacu turahirwa uvuga ubuhanzi rwanda buri gutera imbere cyane atangaza ahawe ubushobozi afite yahindura ati mpahwe amahirwe kugira nahindura buhanzi ntekereza nashyira imbaraga gushishikariza urubyiruko gukurikira impano zabo ngashyiraho gahunda gukurikirana mpano numva byafasha abakiri bato kumenya impano zabo kare muri moshions bamaze guhugura bijyanye n’ubudozi guhanga imyambaro abagera turahirwa yemeza myaka ishize yageze nzozi yahoraga arota atangiye kwinjira bijyanye guhanga imideli ati muri myaka nambitse abantu batandukanye barimo perezida paul kagame n’umufasha mme jeanette kagame nambitse abayobozi nzego zitandukanye ndetse nambitse n’ibyamamare sonia rolland wabaye nyampinga w’u bufaransa umukinnyi firimi w’umunyarwanda nshuti gatwa n’abandi benshi turahirwa kandi asanga abantu batari bakwiye kurebera made in rwanda ishusho kuko ifite amashami menshi ariko cyane bijyanye n’imyambarire harimo ingeri nyinshi hari abakora imyenda yambarwa n’abafite ubushobozi buke ariko nanone hari abakora imyenda yambarwa n’abafite ubushobozi bwinshi bityo asanga buri munyarwanda wese afite ikiciro yisangamo robert kayihuraumusekerw

title: rwarutabura yabanje kwisegura mushuti rutamu rayon sport igiye gukora
content: ku munsi gatanu azam premier league rwanda umukino utegenyijye gatandatu sunrise fc rayon sport umwe mikino yavugishije benshi ubusanzwe ntiwagakwiye kuba umukino uru rwego ariko biri kuko makipe anganya amanota rwarutabura umufana mukuru kibuga rayon yatangaje agiye kubabaza sunrise bikaba byanamuteye kubanza kwisegura mushuti rutamu kuko araza gusangira amarira sunrise sunrise irikubarizwa maboko y’akarere nyagatare mwaka w’imikino watangira ikipe yazanye amatwara ifite abakinnyi b’abanyanigeriya biyongera mutoza mwene wabo binyuze mutoza si ugusuzugura apr rayon sport ariko nayo igikombe cy’uyu mwaka iragishaka ikindi cyazamuriye kipe izia umunyamakuru rutamu ejoe ukunda kugaragara asingiza kipe sunrise fc ikipe yazanye amatwara uyumwaka shampiyona rayon sport nk’ibisanzwe ikipe ihora itangira umwaka ishaka igikombe yamaze kwerekana bishoboka cyane iyi nayo ifite abanyamahanga tutabura kuvuga barusha bigaragara abakinnyi rwanda mcamara kwizera pierrot nahimana shassir mugheni fabrice rayon sport nk’ibisanzwe ikipe itangira buri mwaka ishaka igikombe aya makipe anganya amanota amaze gukinirwa gusa rayon sport iza imbere sunrise kubera umubare w’ibitego zizigamye micro muhaburarw rwarutabura yagize rayon sport ikipe y’imana fabrice nk’umunyarwanda wavukiye i gikondo agiye kubona ibyangombwa by’ubunyarwanda ubona n’umucunguzi wacu sedrick yaje sunrise match yararangiye - bayijyana mazi bayijyama mwobo bayishyira kuzimu ndabaturitsa ahubwo ndabwira mushuti wange rutamu yihangane turi inshuti ariko si ukumwanya kundi twe nti turi ikipe y’akarere tuzahoraho ndaturitsa pafuu

title: sacco mayange intangarugero karere bugesera
content: ibi umuyobozi w’akarere akaba yarabitangaje kuwa kabiri tariki ukwakira nyuma gusoza amahugurwa y’abakozi sacco y’umurenge mayange ati sacco z’iyindi mirenge zikwiye kwigira kugira nazo zibashe kwiteza imbere nako ziteza imbere abazigana iyi koperative kubitsa kuguriza y’umurenge mayange niyo abaturage bahanze amaso kuko izabafasha kugira imbere hazaza heza kubafasha kugera majyambere arambye umuyobozi sacco mayange habinshuti aimable atangaza batazategereza imyaka itatu y’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe amakorative rwanda cooperative agency rca bahawe kugira babashe kwiyubaka yagize turasaba abakozi bacu bahabwa amahugurwa nk’aya ahoraho cyane cyane ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga kugira babashe gucunga neza umutungo w’abanyamuryango bacu sacco mayange ifite abanyamuryango bagera matsinda bafite ubwizigame bugera mafaranga miliyoni ndetse n’amakonte akora neza umukozi banki nkuru y’igihugu bnr nsabimana gerard yemereye abakozi b’iyo sacco amahugurwa ahoraraho cyane cyane mucungamari n’ushinzwe inguzanyo aya mahugurwa akaba yaramaze iminsi ibiri akaba yarateguwe millennium villages project mvp bufatanye banki nkuru y’igihugu bnr n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe amakoperative rca umurenge sacco watangijwe rwanda mugaragaro kwezi k’ukwakira mwaka gihugu hose kuva koperative kubitsa kugurizanya zitangiye izigera zimaze kubona ibyangombwa banki nkuru y’igihugu bizemerera gutanga inguzanyo nk’uko bisabwa zigomba kuba zifite umutungo miliyoni nibura iyo ugeze turere dutandukanye tw’igihugu usanga abaturage benshi bamaze gusobanukirwa ibijyanye kwizigamira ubushakashatsi bwakozwe minisiteri y’imari n’igenemigambi mwaka bugaragaza gusa by’abanyarwanda aribo bakorana n’ibigo by’imari badakorana nabyo gihe abagera aribo bazigama amafaranga buryo gakondo nk’ibimina n’ibindi egide kayiranga

title: nyamagabe imbere kiliziya habonetse imibiri irenga y’ abishwe jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: mu murenge cyanika karere nyamagabe hamaze kuboneka imibiri y’ abatutsi bishwe jenoside yakorewe abatutsi igikorwa gushakisha indi mibiri kirakomeje hanitabajwe imashini ihinga mu murenge cyanika karere nyamagabe hamaze kuboneka imibiri y’ abatutsi bishwe jenoside yakorewe abatutsi igikorwa gushakisha indi mibiri kirakomeje hanitabajwe imashini ihinga iyi mibiri yabonetse imbere kiliziya cyanika abaturage bakeka abiyaye imana kiliziya bashobora kuba bafite amakuru mibiri ihari ntibayatange umunyabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge cyanika mudahunga yatangarije ukwezi umubiri mbere imaze kuboneka wabonetse tariki nzeri makuru ubuyobozi bwahawe n’ umukobwa w’ imyaka wakoraga isambu padiri mudahunga avuga bakimara kubona makuru bahise bajyanayo komite ibuka basanga koko imibiri y’ abishwe jenoside bamaze kubona imibiri barahagaritse bakomeza munsi babona nyuma bategura kuzahakorera umuganda rusange umuganda rusange usoza ukwezi wabaye tariki nzeri habonetse imibiri kuri wambere tariki hari gukoreshwa imashini ihinga mu masaha saa sita twavuganaga gitifu mudahunga yavuze bamaze kubona mubiri umwe kanamugire venuste uhagarariye ibuka murenge cyanika yabwiye ukwezi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi hari abatutsi bahungiye kiliziya cyanika ati uwavagamo wese yahitaga yicirwa ngaho kuko hari bariyeri ubuyobozi bwatumyeho abireze bakemera icyaha baze bafashe abari gushakisha mibiri kumenya iherereye kanamugire ubutumwa nabwira abantu tunari kumwe n’ imyaka ishize hadatangwa amakuru kugira tubone mibiri ishyingurwe rwibutso nk’ twari tumaze kubahamagara abireze bakemera icyaha hano murenge nibaduhe amakuru kindi tubashakaho iyi mibiri yabonetse gice cy’ ubutaka buhingwa buryo bikekwa uretse mukobwa wayibonye agatanga amakuru bishoboka hari abandi babiyonye bagaceceka imwe mibiri yabonetse mibyare ibiri y’ insina buryo bitumvikana ukuntu umuntu wacuye agiye gutera nsina atabonye mibiri ntabwo biradushobokera kuvugana kiliziya gatolika rwanda igire ivuga makuru avuga abapadiri barahishe amakuru mibiri nibidushobokera tukavugana tuzabitangaza jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yakoranywe ubugome bw’ indengakamere ihitana abatutsi barenga miliyoni minsi

title: inama y’abaminisitiri yibanze ishoramari
content: muri nama y’abaminisitiri niho hemejwe raporo y’ishyirwa bikorwa gahunda kugabanya ibitumizwa mahanga isaba ingamba zafashwe urwo rwego zakwihutishwa u rwanda kimwe n’ibindi bihugu byinshi afurika ndetse n’ibindi bikiri nzira y’amajyambere usanga ibyinjira gihugu biba biruta ibisohoka hanze y’igihugu abaminisitiri bagejejweho raporo igaragaza ingamba zafashwe kugira u rwanda rukomeze kuza isonga bihugu byorohereza ubucuruzi n’ishoramari nk’uko byagaragarajwe raporo yakozwe banki y’isi bagejejweho kandi raporo y’aho imirimo kubaka uruganda rutunganya umusaruro w’imyumbati kinazi karere ruhango igeze isaba imirimo isigaye yihutishwa kugira uruganda rutangire gutunganya imyumbati aha inama y’abaminisitiri yagejejweho raporo kibazo cy’amata yabuze isoko ntara y’iburasirazuba isaba ingamba zafashwe rwego kubonera isoko ry’amata y’aborozi zakwihutishwa iyi nama yasuzumye kandi yemeza raporo igaragaza gahunda kubaka umuryango w’ibihugu afurika y’i burasirazuba ndetse n’inyungu u rwanda rukura muryango gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: nyamirambo umukobwa yabuze amafaranga kwishyura umumotari amuvanamo inkweto amafoto

title: amb nduhungirehe yatangaje ibihugu eac bigiye guhabwa ibikoresho n’imodoka gupima koronavirusi
content: umunyamabanga leta minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga ushinzwe ibikorwa by’umuryango w’afurika y’iburasirazuba amb nduhungirehe olivier yatangaje rwego kurushaho guhangana n’ikumira ry’icyorezo coronavirus cyakoma nkokora ubucuruzi muryango buri gihugu kigiye guhabwa ibikoresho gupima cyorezo birimo n’ibigendanwa modoka yabitangaje kiganiro bucuruzi bukorerwa muryango hahamijwe kureba abacuruzi n’ibyo batwara bihugu binyamuryango bitakomwa nkokora n’icyorezo cyangwa abacuruzi bakaba bamwe bagikwirakwiza igihe batapimwe neza cyangwa bumve ingamba kukirinda amb nduhungirehe yavuze buri gihugu gisanzwe gifite ibikoresho gupima ariko hari n’ibindi bigiye guhabwa kurushaho kwirinda gukwirakwiza cyorezo cyane bibiri bitandatu bitaratangazwa byagezemo koronavirusi ati ubundi buri gihugu hari ibikoresho gifite ndetse hari n’inkunga y’amahanga yagiye iza afurika hari biriya bikoresho by’uriya mushinwa jack ma alibaba yohereje bihugu byose by’afurika birimo n’ibihugu by’uyu muryango eac hanyuma hakaba n’ibikoresho byahawe muryango inkunga y’amahanga cyane cyane inkunga y’abadage hari ibikoresho gupima buri gihugu byatanzwe hanyuma hakaba n’ibindi buri gihugu nabyo bigiye kongera guhabwa buri gihugu ukuvuga buri gihugu kizaba gifite gupimisha yakomeje avuga hazakurikiraho guhabwa ibikoresho byitwa mobile ati ni laboratwari ngendanwa zizahabwa buri gihugu ngira u rwanda u burundi sudani y’amajyepfo bazaba bafite laboratwari hanyuma tanzania kenya uganda bafite abaturage benshi bazaba bafite laboratwari zigendanwa ebyiri ibyo byose inkunga y’amahanga umuryango w’afurika y’iburasirazuba eac ariko bikiyongera bikoresho ibihugu bisanzwe bifite ndetse byanakuye nkunga y’amahanga

title: kenya perezida kenyatta yiyemeje guhagarika imigenzo gusiramura abakobwa
content: kenya igihugu cyari kikirangwa n’umuco gakondo gukeba bimwe bice byimyanya ndangagitsina yabagore izwi nkisiramurwa ryigitsina gore female genital mutilation fgm n’ubwo hashyizweho itegeko riwurwanya ntibyahagaze perezida kenya akaba yiyemeje guhagarika mugenzo mu gihe manda uhuru kenyatta kuyobora kenya izarangira mwaka kenyatta avuga yifuza guhagarika umugenzo gusiramura abakobwa mbere y’uko manda igera iherezo ibi yabitangaje abinyujije rubuga twitter rw’ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu bashimangiye ijambo yavugiye canada yitiriwe ’’women deliver kabiri tariki kamena yavuze yizeye guhagarika umugenzo gukeba ibice bimwe by’imyanya myibarukiro y’abakobwa ikorwa kenya kuva mwaka amategeko kenya ntiyemera mugenzo ariko biracyakorwa perezida uhuru ntiyasobanuye uburyo azahanganamo n’abagikora migenzo kugira icike burundu yiyemeje kandi gufasha kugira ubusumbane hagati y’abagabo n’abagore bucike cyane cyane bijyanye n’ubutabera abagore basaga nk’abadahabwa agaciro kamwe n’abagabo kuri konti twita yagize twifuza igihugu kimenya abagore bashoboye nk’abagabo turashaka kuborohereza tukabaha uburyo gukora ayo magambo agaragara twitter hari benshi bahise bagira bayavugaho jeremiah kipainoi asubiza perezida kenyata yanditse urugamba kurwanya ikebwa ntirworoshye nk’uko ubivuga kuva mwaka itegeko rirwanya mugenzo rigiyeho imbogamizi nyamukuru yakomeje ishyirwa bikorwa ryaryo wowe ubishinzwe ukaba urwo rugamba wararurekeye amashyirahamwe bakora kugira akomeze kubaho uwitwa pc kemei ishyirahamwe ryitwa adventure youth group ayg ryiyemeje kurwanya mugenzo gihugu yanditse ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya umugenzo gukeba abakobwa mafaranga akwiye gihabwa abantu batari bake barapfuye bazize ikebwa mwaka gusa kandi abagize leta yawe babakingira ikibaba none ngeso uzayirwanya gute nyakubahwa jyewe ndibaza wavuze kugira unezeze abarimo barakumva ariko atari ushaka kuvuga ishyirahamwe ryitwa too many ryo bwongereza ryiyemeje kurwanya mugenzo rivuga umugore umwe title: icyizere gicye ruganda rwimyidagaduro nyuma coronavirus
content: imyidagaduro gisobanuro cyoroshye ukwizihirwa kwabantu bahuriye hamwe bakanywa bakarya bakabyina ndetse bakanasusurutswa ucyumva gisobanuro kwidagaduro ukibuka coronavirus yandura inaherekanwa uhita wibaza bizamera inyarwanda yaganiriye n’abasanzwe babarizwa ruganda rw’imyidagaduro umunsi munsi bavuga batekereza hazaza h’uru ruganda gentil gideon ntirenganya umunyamakuru kigali today mboni ze ejo hazaza huruganda rwimyidagaduro ntabwo heza ati ruzaba rwarazahaye cyane kuko abahanzi bamwe batangiye kwishakira utundi turimo twamaboko bakora ruzaba rukennye cyane abahanzi bazagorwa production’ bityo ruzasubira inyuma cyane icyizere gicye gentil gideon gishingira kuba nizindi nzengo zose zubukungu zarashegeshwe kimwe gentil eddy nsabimana the new times arabona umwijima gusubira inyuma gukabije ruganda rwimyidagaduro atanga urugero rwibyo aherutse kubona ati ntabwo navuga izina rye gusa mperutse kumenya amakuru yabantu bihuje bateranyiriza amafaranga umwe dj bakomeye abashe kubona amafaranga kwishyura inzu akomeza ejo hazaza myidagaduro ntabwo heza leta yareba uburyo ifasha kino gice nkuko nahandi hose bikorwa ni uruganda rutanga imirimo ariko rwazahaye bizagorana rweguka rusubire murongo biteye agahinda cedrick shimwayezu akora ibiganiro byimyidagaduro radio television isango star kimwe nabo bakora bimwe icyizere gicye ruganda rw’imyidagaduro ati mbona hazabaho gusubira inyuma kubera imyidagaduro ibaho igihe nubundi bukungu bumeze neza bityo bigafasha ibigo byubucuruzi gushoramo amafaranga ntagushidikanya uruganda rwimyidagaduro ruzasubira inyuma gusa mbona bitazatinda remmy lubega umwe bashoramari bakomeye bashyize imitungo myidagaduro abinyujije gutegura ibitaramo ngaruka kwezi kigali jazz junction n’ibindi nawe asanga ejo hazaza himyidagaduro rwanda hazagorana ati n’ubu bibi bizakomeza kuba bibi urebye ibitaramo biba abantu bahurira ahantu hamwe abantu bazakomeza kugira bwoba karemano nta nama ziba nta bukwe mbese imirimo ijyanye kwidagadura yarazahaye ariko reka tugumane icyizere ibintu bizongera kuba byiza turaba dushaka ubundi buryo dukoramo twinjize lubega agira inama abafata imyanzuro gutekereza ruganda rw’imyidagaduro ati ubu imyidagaduro ikenewe kurusha mbere kandi nayo umuti uvura abantu agahinda kwiheba kugira ubwoba abantu bagasubirana icyizere muhoza nina ubarizwa itsinda charly nina afite impugenge zivanze nicyizere ati nta kidashoboka gusa bizafata igihe abantu bashire ubwoba bongere kwitabira ibitaramo uwiringiyimana jean nepo ashyira amafaranga ikarita bus gare giporoso umukunzi wimyidagaduro afite abyumva ati urumva koko byakongera koroha duhurira parikingi stade uzi ukuntu batubwiye coronavirus yandura dukumbuye kubyinana nabahanzi bacu ariko bizagorana bamwe ibyishimo byacu biba hariya gusa turacyafite ubwoba nadia umutimucyeye akunda gusohoka aracyafite ubwoba gusa asanga maherezo ati ese amaherezo azaba he sinjya numva radio sinjya ndeba television imiziki mishya title: abanyarwanda danmark bibutse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: abatuye danmark mata nibwo bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo muhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga bitewe n’ibihe isi irimo guhangana coronavirus ni umuhango watumiwemo ambasaderi w’u rwanda sude n’ibihugu scandinavie nkulikiyinka christine umuyobozi paruwasi remera itorero angilikani rev past dr antoine rutayisire n’umunyamakuru karirima ngarambe aimable uhagarariye igihe mugabane w’u burayi umuyobozi w’umuryango nyarwanda karere jylland fyn denmark jackline hansen wayoboye umuhango kwibuka nshuro jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yashimiye abitabiriye muhango anashimangira wabaye hifashishijwe internet kubera ingamba zakajijwe kwirinda ikwirakwira coronavirus ambasaderi nkulikiyinka ijambo rye yashimye abateguye umuhango kwibuka nshuro jenoside yakorewe abatutsi n’abifatanyije yihanganishije abanyarwanda bihe hibukwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi avuga dukwiye kuzirikana kwibuka kugira jenoside ntizongere kubaho ukundi’ ambasaderi nkulikiyinka yasabye abanyarwanda gukomeza gushyira hamwe gushyigikira iterambere ry’igihugu cyabibarutse aricyo u rwanda abawitabiriye basangijwe ruhare rw’amadini ndetse n’urw’itangazamakuru gihe jenoside yakorewe abatutsi pasiteri rutayisire watanze ikiganiro ruhare rw’amadini yahereye mateka kera y’u rwanda asobanura inkomoko y’amoko n’ivangura ryagejeje jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu butumwa bwe yakomoje gihe cy’abakoloni n’itangizwa ry’amadini rwanda binyuze bitwaga abamisiyoneri amadini yafatwaga nk’ubuhungiro benshi hiciwe abatutsi benshi bahahungiye bakeka bahakirira ariko bahaburira ubuzima yasobanuye ivangura ryakozwe repubulika mbere rirakomeza repubulika kabiri rev rutayisire yasobanuye nubwo amadini yagize uruhare jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ariko nyuma yatanze umusanzu komora imitima gutanga icyizere cy’ahazaza kubera ubuyobozi bwiza u rwanda rufite rutayisire yatanze kiganiro nk’uwavukiye rwanda arukuriramo anarwigiramo yagize jenoside iba nari mpari nza guhonoka ibyo mvuga si inkuru ahubwo nabayemo twese nk’abanyarwanda dufite impamvu gushima imana yaturinze dufite inshingano kureba ibyabaye bidakwiye kuzaba ukundi’’ ikindi kiganiro cyatanzwe cyibanze ruhare rw’itangazamakuru n’uburyo ryakoreshejwe nk’intwaro y’icengezamatwara kubiba urwango rwagejeje jenoside umunyamakuru karirima yavuze ibinyamakuru birimo icyitwa kangura cyandikaga ubutumwa bubi butandukanya abanyarwanda yasobanuye radio rtlm yakoreshejwe gushishikariza abahutu b’interahamwe kwica abatutsi yakomeje hari benshi rungano rwanjye twabanye mateka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi tunayatangamo ubuhamya kugira bitazavugwa atabaye si inkuru mbarirano radio rtlm twumvaga yatangazaga abakuriye radio rutwitsi twari tubazi bakoraga bazi benyegeza umuriro bashakishe abatutsi bihishe bicwe’’ yasabye urubyiruko gusigasira ibyagezweho kuko byatwaye imbaraga n’ubwitange bwinshi kugira igihugu kibe kigeze kiri abitabiriye umuhango kwibuka banasangijwe ubuhamya eric ilunga warokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yasobanuye jenoside yamugizeho ingaruka mbi hamwe n’umuryango yashimye ubuyobozi ambasade budahwema kubaba mu butumwa bwe yasabye urubyiruko gushyira hamwe rugakomeza gufatanya n’abanyarwanda kubaka igihugu mu gihe ibikorwa kwibuka bizamara iminsi haracyatangwa ubutumwa bunyuze biganiro bijyanye kwibuka binyuze mbuga nkoranyambaga biteganyijwe mata umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa komisiyo y’igihugu ishinzwe kurwanya jenoside cnlg dr bizimana jean damascne azaganiriza abatuye bihugu scandinavie atanga ikiganiro mateka jenoside cyanatumiwemo ambasaderi w’u rwanda sude n’ibihugu scandinavie nkulikiyinka christine n’abandi batumirwa

title: ikipe y’u rwanda yasezerewe beach volleyball
content: muri mikino ikinwa n’abakinnyi babiri babiri buri gihugu gihagararirwa n’amakipe abiri buri kipe ikina imikino ibiri ibiri u rwanda rwari ruhagarariwe emilienne uwineza hakizimana judith bagize ikipe mbere hamwe mutatsimpundu denise nzayisenga charlotte mu mikino ine yahuje amakipe y’u rwanda n’aya afurika y’epfo u rwanda rwasabwaga gutsinda nibura imikino itatu ine kugira rwizere gukomeza cyiciro gikurikiyeho ariko ntibyakunze kuko afurika y’epfo kugeza mwanya kabiri afurika yatsinze imikino itatu ine bakinnye n’u rwanda emilienne uwineza umukinnyi w’ikipe mbere y’u rwanda yavuze gutsindwa byatewe n’uko afurika y’epfo ibarusha inararibonye yagize afurika y’epfo yaturushije kubera bamenyereye cyane amarushanwa buryo usanga bazi amayeri menshi gusa n’ubwo badutsinze natwe twageragaje kugaragaza ubuhanga bwacu kandi nk’uko byagaragaraga badutsindaga ariko dufite amanota menshi ibyo buvuze hari urwego rwiza natwe tugezeho gutsindwa afurika y’epfo bivuze u rwanda ruvuye ruhando guhatanira itike kuzakina imikino olympique ndetse n’igikombe cy’isi ariko christian hatuminana ushinzwe tekinike ishyirahamwe ry’umukino volleyball rwanda yadutangarije u rwanda rugifite amahirwe kwegukana umwanya mwiza rushanwa hatumimana avuga afurika y’epfo n’ibirwa maurice ariyo makipe ahabwa amahirwe kwegukana umwanya mbere kuko amateka y’ayo makipe yombi ndetse n’uko bakinnye kane bigaragaza isonga iyi volleyball ikinirwa mucanga yitabiriwe n’amakipe u rwanda kenya rdc afurika y’epfo ibirwa maurice mozambique algeria hagendewe buhanga buri kipe iheruka kwitwara n’amanota yakuye mikino iheruka nama tekinike yabaye mbere y’iyi mikino hemejwe amakipe akomeye akina n’adakomeye nk’uko bisazwe bigenda marushanwa ibyo byatumye u rwanda rukina afurika y’epfo repubulika iharanira demukarasi congo ikina n’ibirwa maurice algeria ihura mozambique kenya yahise ikomeza cyiciro gikurikiyeho kuko maroc bagombaga gukina ititabiriye marushanwa ikipe y’ibirwa maurice mwanya mbere afurika kuko ariyo iheruka kwegukana umwanya mbere mikino nyafurika yebereye i mputo mozambique umwaka ushize ikaba ikurikirwa afurika y’epfo yabaye iya kabiri gihe iyi mikino irakomeza gatanu tariki hakinwa imikino cy’irangiza afurika y’epfo ikina n’ibirwa maurice byasezereye rdc mozambique yasezereye algeria irakina kenya gihe u rwanda ruzahatanira umwanya gatanu rukina algeria iyi mikino izasozwa gatandatu ikipe izaba yabaye iya mbere izahita ibona itike kuzakina imikino olympique izabera bwongereza nyakanga mwaka iya kabiri n’iya gatatu zikabona itike kuzakina igikombe cy’isi kizabera butaliyani umwaka utaha theoneste nisingizwe

title: nyamasheke abakobwa biga gsfak babangamiwe n’uburyo bararamo
content: hashize ibyumweru bibiri rwunge rw’amashuri frank adamson kibogora gsfak murenge kanjongo karere nyamasheke inkongi y’umuriro yibasiye inyubako abakobwa bagera bararagamo irashya irakongoka ntibagira kimwe barokora byarimo byose gice cyahiye bakobwa bakaba bavuga uburyo baryamamo buteye inkeke kuko barara batatu nk’uko umuyobozi w’iri shuri w’agateganyo uwihoreye boaz yabisobanuriye bwizacom shuri haberaga inama yaguye yahuje ubuyobozi bw’akarereubw’itorero mthodiste libre rwanda nyir’ishuri n’izindi nzego zose zirebwa n’uburezi aka karere hashakishwa icyakorwa nyubako yahiye isanwe cyangwa habe hakubakwa inshya n’abana bashumbushwe ibikoresho byabo byahangirikiye uburyo nyubako yagiye ishya mo bwabaye amayobera uyu muyobozi avuga habanje gushya igice kimwe mutarama mwaka ma saa yine z’amanywa abana bitegura kujya gusenga barakizimya bibwira birangiye mutarama masaha nk’ayo nanone abana bavuye gukina bagiye gusubira mashuri babona n’ubundi umwotsi mwinshi nyubakobagiye kubera basanga gushya barazimya bufatanye n’izindi nzego biba iby’ubusa irinda ikongoka igice cyayo haruguru n’ibyari mo byose yagize ati’’ kugeza kumenya icyayitwitse biracyatubereye amayobera ariko iperereza riracyakomezanatwe abana twabaye tubacumbikiye nzu nto zari zihari zirimo iyari ububiko bw’ibikoresho by’ishuri n’icyari icyumba cy’amasengeshoku buryo natwe tubona batarara nezaariko kundi twari kubigenza amasomo adahagarara’’ niyobyose anita wiga mwaka ashima ubuyobozi bw’itorero mthodiste libre rwanda uburyo bwahise bubatabara bukabaha ibikoresho by’ibanze kuko basigaranye imyenda bambaye ishuri gusa bakaba bagenda babona bimwe by’ibanze bakenera babashe kwiga neza agasaba ibyabo byose byangirikiye mo babyishyurwadore bivugwa n’ubuyobozi bw’ishuri bamaze kubarura ibikoresho by’abana by’agaciro k’arenga z’amanyarwanda byahangirikiye’’ ati’’ uburyo turara mo kibazo rwose kuko turara tubyiganaaho tumatora duto baduhaye dusasa hasi twumba duto cyane tutabigenewe usanga abana bararanye kamatora kamwe kwinyagambura ikibazo ntidusinzire neza tukifuza batwubakira vuba bakanadusubiza twatakarije iriya nyubako’’ ibi babyemeranywa ho nyiri ishurinyiricyubahiro musenyeri samuel kayinamura umwepisikopi w’iri torero rwanda avuga bikimara kuba itorero ryahise ritanga agera miliyoni kubagurira ibikoresho by’ibanze buri mwana akazasubizwa yahatakarije kuko byamaze kubarurwa bakaba banakomeje gufatanya n’izindi nzego zirimo ubuyobozi bw’akarere n’abakristo b’iri torero n’inzego z’imirimo zose zirikorera mo harebwe icyakorwa abana babonerwe inyubako nziza barara mo bitumen barusha ho kwiga nezan’abana akaba yarabahumurije anahumuriza ababyeyi imyigire ikomeje kibazo mbere y’uko nyubako ishya shuri ryavuzwe mo ibindi bikorwa nko kwiba ibendera ry’igihugu abaryibye bakaba barayoberanye kuba haragaragaye inyandiko z’ingengabitekerezo jenoside inshuro bwiherero bw’abakobwa abazanditse ntibamenyekane hari ababihuza n’uku gushya bakavuga hari ababa babyihishe inyuma nubwo hari habanje kuvugwa insinga z’amashanyarazi ubuyobozi bw’akarere n’ubw’iri torero bukavuga hategerezwa iperereza rizatangabakareka kubivuga ho byinshi caption idattachment alignalignnone width title: akarere rubavu karishimira ibikorwa by’amajyambere kagezeho
content: mu bikorwa byamuritswe harimo umuhanda uhuza imipaka yombi y’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo grande et petite barierre ukazatwara akayabo k’amafaranga akabakaba miliyoni ndetse n’ umuhanda pave ujya biro by’akarere watangiye gukorwa munsi umuyobozi w’akarere sheh bahame hassan yavuze akarere kabwiye rwiyemezamirimo imodoka zikora mihanda zitazasubirayo utugari tutazikoresheje dusane uduhanda tujya hasuwe kandi umusozi wimuweho imiryango kubera ikibazo cy’isuri yicaga abahatuye gihe cy’imvura uyu musozi murenge gisenyi guterwamo ibiti binyuranye bifata ubutaka hakazubakwamo uduhanda intebe n’ibitare kuruhukiramo mukerarugendo iki gikorwa kizatwara amafaranga miliyoni bavuye musozi ubuyobozi b’akarere rubavu bwasuye akagari karukogo umurenge rubavu birebera ibikorwa ndengera foundation uyu muryango wubatse amasoko y’amazi agemurira abaturage amazi meza ndetse n’ibitaro kijyambere umuyobozi w’akarere yasabye umuyobozi ndengera foundation gufatanya n’akarere bakareba masoko y’amazi yakwaguka abaturage benshi bakavomaho abayobozi banagejejwe ahari kubakwa amashanyarazi ako kagali jean berchmas bahige ukuriye ewsa rubavu yasobanuye mashanyarazi azagera baturage tugali twa byahi kanembwe karukogo ibarizwa mirenge rubavu cyanzarwe bahige yashimangiye mashanyarazi afite ingufu zihagije zizafasha abaturage kwivana bukene bahige yagize mushinga wizwe neza ibikoresho byose birahari igikorwa cyose gikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi kizahakora kirahari mpungenge hasuwe n’isoko ryo ako kagali ariko rizatangira gukorerwamo mutarama nyuma title: ihurizo ireme demokarasi afurika y’iburasizuba kubera amatora ateganyijwe
content: tanzania ni igihugu cyakunze kurangwa guhererekanya ubutegetsi mahoro guhera igihe cyaboneye ubwigenge ishyaka riri butegetsi chama cha mapinduzi riracyahabwa amahirwe kugumana ubutegetsi mu gihe hitegurwa amatora rusange azaba ukwakira abatavuga rumwe leta n’imiryango itegamiye leta bafite impungenge guverinoma perezida john pombe magufuli ishobora kubangamira ubwisanzure gutanga ibitekerezo the east african yatangaje guverinoma yakuyeho ibikorwa by’abatavuga rumwe leta bivuze bikorwa gukoresha inama bishoboka mashyaka atavuga rumwe leta hari abantu bafunzwe abanyamakuru bamwe baburirwa irengero abandi barafungwa nk’urugero rw’umunyamakuru eric kabendera cyangwa paul magotti impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira muntu uko kubangamira abatavuga rumwe leta kwatumye amashyaka atavuga rumwe leta yanga kwitabira amatora y’inzego z’ibanze yabaye ugushyingo umwaka ushize bituma ishyaka ccm riyatsinda kigero umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe leta tundu lissu aherutse kuvuga guhagarika ibikorwa y’abatavuga rumwe leta ikimenyetso amatora atazaba mucyo perezida magufuli yatowe afite intego kurwanya ruswa nubwo yatangije intambara baryi ruswa ashinjwa kubangamira demokarasi gihugu gupfukirana amajwi y’abamunenga kubibasira u burundi amatora atenganyijwe gicurasi mwaka gihe hakiri urujijo perezida pierre nkurunziza azongera kwiyamamaza nyuma manda gatatu yafashe igateza imvururu ikindi gihangayikishije ukumenya guverinoma ifite ubushobozi gutegura amatora anyuze mucyo kuko imiryango n’ibihugu byinshi byateraga inkunga gihugu byarayihagaritse bishinja nkurunziza guteza akaduruvayo gihugu nubwo nkurunziza yatangaje atazongera kwiyamamaza ababirebera bavuga ashobora kwisubiraho cyangwa agashyiraho umuntu azajya atagekeramo nta kimenyetso cyerekana nkurunziza agiye politiki y’u burundi gihe gashyantare umwaka ushize yimuye ibiro perezida akabijyana mujyi gitega avuka raporo y’umuryango w’abibumbye nzeri igaragaza cyizere cy’imigendekere myiza y’amatora burundi gihe hakiri perezida wigaragaza nk’igitangaza’ loni ivuga perezida wigwijeho ububasha bwose n’ishyaka rye cndd fdd n’ibyaha bishinjwa urubyiruko rw’ishyaka rye ruzwi nk’imbonerakure rushinjwa guhutaza uburenganzira bw’abaturage n’abatavuga rumwe leta icyakora minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u burundi ezechiel nibigira aherutse kubwira inteko rusange loni gihugu hari umwuka mwiza uzatuma amatora agenda neza somalia amatora somalia ingenzi cyane mutekano w’akarere iki igihugu kimaze igihe mvururu hashize imyaka perezida atorwa n’itsinda ry’abantu bake batoranyijwe kubera ubwoba bw’uko hateguwe amatora rusange abaturage bakitabira bishobora guteza imvururu n’umutekano muke mu matora hose abagize inteko ishinga amategeko perezida bagiye batorwa n’abantu babaga batoranyijwe bahagararire ubwoko buba gihugu n’uyu munsi haracyari impungenge amatora somalia koko azaba dore perezida aherutse yabereye parikingi y’ikibuga cy’indege ikibazo cy’umutwe w’iterabwoba al shabaab ndetse kuba abatavuga rumwe leta baherutse gushinja perezida mohamed abdullahi farmaajo gushaka kuguma butegetsi biteye impungenge mutekano w’amatora ateganyijwe guverinoma yatangaje yiteguye gukoresha amatora agaca mucyo kandi buri muturage wemerewe gutora agatora guverinoma yanavuze vuba izageza nteko ishinga amatora umushinga w’amatora kugira wemezwe icyakora gihugu cyiracyafite ikibazo kuvugurura itegeko nshinga nubwo itsinda ryahawe kurivugurura ryagejeje nteko umushinga w’itegeko haracyari imbogamizi iya mbere matora kamarampaka ashobora kuba hatarakemuka ikibazo cy’agace somaliland kifata nk’igihugu ukwacyo gihe somalia igafata nk’agace kayo mu bindi kandi ivugurura ry’itegeko nshinga rigomba kureba harimo umurwa mukuru ukwiriye kuba uburyo ubuyobozi leta zigize gihugu bukorana leta nkuru n’ibindi mu gihe ivugurura ry’itegeko nshinga ritaraba n’tegeko rigenga amatora ntirizashoboka kuko abantu ntibashobora gutangira kwiyandikisha hataraboneka itegeko rigenga amatora kandi naryo rigomba kugenwa n’itegeko nshinga indi mbogamizi umutekano muke igice kinini cy’igihugu kiracyari maboko y’umutwe al shabaab bivuze hantu al shabaab ifite amatora atazashoboka no murwa mukuru mogadishu umutekano waho ntiwizewe ibyo bigaragazwa n’uko tariki ukuboza imodoka itezemo igisasu yaturikiye abantu basakirwa murwa mukuru kigahitana abantu perezida farmaajo yavuze gitero icy’iterabwoba kandi kitazihanganirwa icyakora abatavuga rumwe bamushinja kubembekereza al shabaab kuko uduce leta yigaruriye guhera farmaajo yajyaga butegetsi duke ethiopia amatora ateganyijwe gicurasi mbere azaba abaye guhera minisitiri w’intebe wahawe n’igihembo cyitiriwe nobel dr abiy ahmed agiye butegetsi umwanzuro aherutse gufata gusesa amashyaka agize ihuriro eprdf ethiopian people’s revolutionary democratic front agashinga ishyaka pp watumye havuka impungenge n’umwuka mubi gihugu hari abadashyigikiye iryo shyaka pp kuko risa nk’irije guhanagura umuco n’umuhate bashyizeho bubaka amashyaka myaka ishize abatabyumva cyane mashyaka tigray peoples liberation front tplf n’igice cy’ishyaka oromo peoples democratic organisation opdo naryo abiy aturukamo rishobora kumurwanya agatsindwa amavugurura yakozwe dr abiy yazanye umucyo ethiopia yahoze ifatwa nk’igihugu kibangamira uburenganzira muntu ariko byanateje imvururu zishingiye turere zitewe n’abandi bantu bakomeye bafite inyota y’ubutegetsi guhera ethiopia yagiye ikora amatora gihe cyagenwe icyakora uretse rimwe higeze habaho amatora arimo guhangana kugaragara nkuko the east african yabitangaje

title: yatangiye gucuranga iningiri afite imyaka amaze kuzuza imyaka akiririmbira igiceri cy’ijanavideo
content: sibomana kabeni umugabo wubatse amaze kwamamara mujyi kigali kubera kuzenguruka asusurutsa abantu akoresheje igicurangisho cyitwa iningiri uyu mugabo akunze kugaragara masoko atandukanye n’ahantu haba hateraniye abantu benshi mujyi kigali agenda azenguruka ahantu henshi umubonye akamuhagarika amuha igiceri akamususurutsa azi gukirigita ningiri ndetse aracuranga benshi bakaryoherwa kanda hano ukurikirane ikiganiro kabeni avugako atuye mujyi kigali murenge kigali akarere nyarugenge ndetse yavukiye ahamyako yatangiye gucuranga iningiri afite imyaka akaba yarabikomoye kubabyeyi arikuzuza imyaka amaze avutse sibomana kabeni aririmba yibanda ndirimbo z’ubuzima busanzwe urukundo n’izishimangira gahunda leta y’u rwanda mukiganiro kabeni yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ibyamamarecom yavuzeko ababazwa kuba amaze imyaka myinshi acuranga iningiri ariko akaba abona ntacyo bimugezaho nubwo bimufasha kubona udufaranga duke tumufasha gutunga umuryango asaba abafite ubushobozi kuba bamufasha akazamura impano ndetse akayibyaza umusaruro ufatika yagize natangiye kucuranga iningiri mfite imyaka nujuje imyaka mbabaza nkiririmbira igiceri cy’ijana mfite impano nkeneye ubufasha nanjye mbashe gutera imbere

title: byumvuhore jean baptiste yageze rwanda
content: umuhanzi byumvuhore jean baptiste yageze rwanda aje gutaramira abanyarwanda gitaramo kizaba mpera z’ cyumweru umuhanzi byumvuhore jean baptiste yageze rwanda aje gutaramira abanyarwanda gitaramo kizaba mpera z’ cyumweru mu gitondo gatatu tariki kanama nibwo umuhanzi byumvuhore jean baptiste yasesekaye kibuga mpuzamahanga kigali biteganyijwe byumvuhore tariki kanama azaririmba gitaramo azahuriramo orechestre impala mavenge sudi iki gitaramo kizabera camp kigali iki gitaramo cyateguwe n’ umuryango hvp gatagara ufasha abafite ubumuga cyateguwe rwego kwizihiza imyaka ishize padiri fraipont ndagijimana washinze muryango avutse padiri fraipont yavutse tariki ukwakira yitaba imana afite imyaka byumvuhore yatumiwe nk’ umuntu warerewe hvp gatagara ahigira muzika aranahakora uyu muhanzi ufite indirimbo zidacuyuka zirimo fagitire aho hantu nihe abapariloma n’ izindi yaherukaga gutaramira rwanda mwaka

title: umuhanzi afata ikintu gisanzwe akagihinduramo ikintu gishya - uncle austin
content: mu kiganiro twgiranye bijyanye n’ibihangano bye n’ubutumwa atangamo uncle austin yavuze umuhanzi agiye kuririmba ataririmba ijambo abantu basanzwe barizi ahubwo agerageza kurihindura kugira abantu abantu babone ridasanzwe yagize njyewe nkora buryo buri ndirimbo yanjye igira nibura ijambo rimwe isigira abantu bakajya barikoresha terme buzima bwabo buri munsi ibi abidutangarije gihe ntagihe kinini gishize abantu bibaza ndirimbo ndagukunda nzapfa ejo yaba yarayihimbiye umukobwa by’umwihariko ibisobanuro yaduhaye ndirimbo yayihimbye ahereye magambo n’inshuti ze bakundaga gukoresha cyane ndagukunda mfe ejo akaba nako yatangiye ayita ariko nyuma aza kubihindura ati message nashakaga gutanga hano nacyo gisobanuro cy’iyi ndirimbo yanjye ugukunda umuntu kugeza ndunduro marie clemence cyiza uwimanimpaye

title: didier drogba yatanze ibitaro bye byifashishwe kuvura abarwaye coronavirus
content: didier drogba wahoze umukinnyi ukomeye munikipe chelsea yatanze ibitaro bye cote d’ivoire kuba hamwe hantu centre hakurikiranirwa abarwayi coronavirus byitezweho umubare wabo urushaho kwiyongera gihugu ibi bitaro biri mujyi abija abidjan byafunguwe kugeza ndwara y’icyorezo cyiswe covid- ikomeje gukwirakwira hirya hino afurika ndetse hakaba hari n’ubwoba bw’uko abapfa barushaho kwiyongera umuyobozi mujyi abija bwana vincent toh bi irie yashimiye drogba gikorwa kigaragaza gukunda igihugu yakoze yagize turashimira drogba mpano yatanzwe ifatwa nk’igikorwa gukunda igihugu ubwandu bw’iyi virus corona mbere cote d’ivoire bwagaragaye werurwe mwaka gihe hamaze kugaragara abagera banduye bakaba bamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo ubuvuzi mugabane afurika bukaba bukemangwa yaba buryo bw’ibikoresho ndetse n’ibikorwa remezo bidahagije kukuhangana n’icyi cyorezo gusa hakaba n’abavuga abandura mugabane batazaba benshi nk’ahandi bitewe n’ingama zafashwe mu bihugu byinshi afurika ingamba zikomeye zikaba zarafashwe rwego gukumira ikwirakwira covid- harimo gushyiraho ibihe bidasanzwe hahagarikwa igendo z’imodoka n’indege ndetse guhagarika ibikorwa byose bihuriza abantu hamwe n’andi mabwiriza nko gukaraba intoki
