content: kuri gatandatu tariki gicurasi hatangajwe umurwayi mbere wahitanywe n’icyorezo koronavirusi covid- rwanda minisiteri y’ubuzima ivuga uwapfuye umushoferi w’imyaka utuye gihugu cy’abaturanyi wahisemo gutaha rwanda nyuma kuremba yitaweho n’abaganga kigo cyagenewe ariko yaje gupfa azize kwangirika kw’imyanya y’ubuhumekero uwo murwayi yatangarijwe hamwe n’abarwayi bashya b’icyorezo covid- batahuwe bipimo byafashwe masaha ashize hataha abantu bakize neza bituma umubare w’abamaze gukira ugera bamaze gutahurwaho cyorezo rwanda minisiteri y’ubuzima ivuga umubare w’abakirimo kwitabwaho n’abaganga ugeze barwayi bamaze kuboneka bipimo byafashwe umurwayi mbere yatahurwa werurwe kugeza abarwayi bashya bahise bashyirwa kato bakihagera ndetse n’abakirwaye rusange bakomeje kuvurirwa ahabugenewe igikorwa gupima abantu buryo rusange gihugu kirakomeje bikaba bivugwa kugeza murwayi mushya uratahurwa aturutse baturarwanda hagati kuko abenshi bavuye mahanga cyangwa bashyizwe kato bahuye kugeza ntawurabikwa rwanda yishwe n’icyorezo covid- harabuea iminsi ibarirwa ntoki ikiciro k’ibindi bikorwa byahagaritswe bikomorerwe gihe kizaba gihindutse muri hazaba harimo ingendo moto bityo hamaze gupimwa abakotari barenga ndetse ngi bizakomeza gukorwa abaturarwanda barasabwa kurushaho kubahiriza amabwiriza kwirinda gusiga intera metero kwambara udupfukamunwa gukaraba intoki kenshi bakoresheje amazi meza n’isabune cyangwa arukoro yabugenewe imibare yatangajwe rwego mpuzamahanga yerekana afurika abamaze kwandura covid- bageze barimo bakize n’abandi bahitanywe abamaze kwandura isi bangana barimo abakize bapfuye muhaburarw

title: amerika yifatanyije n’abanyarwanda kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika tariki rigira riti twifatanyije n’abanyarwanda rusange n’abacitse icumu by’umwihariko ndetse n’abasizwe iheruheru jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda bihe by’umubabaro batewe kubura ababo mu rwego kwifatanya n’abanyarwanda gusubiza icyubahiro abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika ziratangaza zizakomeza gukorana neza n’u rwanda guteza imbere abanyarwanda baharanira ubwisanzure n’uburenganzira bw’abanyagihugu buramba ubutabera bugahabwa intebe buryo amahanga azabibona kandi akabyishimira nubwo abanyarwanda banyuze bihe bitoroshye leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika zinezezwa cyane n’uburyo abanyarwanda bakomeje kurangwa n’ubutwari bakivana bihe banyuzemo bagakura amaboko mifuka bagakora kandi bakaba bamaze kwiteza imbere nk’uko umuvugizi minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika yabivuze uwo muvugizi yongeyeho leta zunze ubumwe z’amelika zigira byinshi banyarwanda cyane cyane uburyo baharaniye kwivana bihe bikomeye nk’ibyo guharanira amahoro n’imbere heza ndetse n’imibereho myiza y’abana b’igihugu yuma gusohoka jenoside u rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe igaragara nzego zose haba buzima burezi buhinzi rwego kuzamura iterambere ry’igihugu n’imiyoborere myiza ibyo bigaragara buryo u rwanda ruhagaze neza mahoro n’umutekano kugeza n’aho abanyarwanda bageze rwego kubungabunga amahoro bindi bihugu kandi n’ubukungu bwarwo bukaba buhagaze neza nk’uko iryo tangazo rikomeza ribivuga muri iryo tangazo kandi leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika zivuga zishimira iterambere u rwanda rumaze kugeraho kandi n’imikoranire hagati y’ibihugu byombi igenda neza buryo bazakomeza gushyiramo imbaraga kwagura ibikorwa anne marie niwemwiza

title: umwanda gereza mageragere watangiye gutunganywa udatera indwara abayituriye
content: kuba gereza ikikijwe n’imirima n’inzu z’abaturage ndetse n’umugezi nyabarongo biri byatumye hatekerezwa uburyo kubyaza umusaruro amazi ayiturukamo hubatswe uburyo gutunganya amazi mabi ava bwiherero bikoni ndetse bwogero kugira ajye akoreshwa bindi bikorwa by’isuku kuhira imyaka kwisuka nyabarongo cyangwa mirima y’abaturage umuyobozi mukuru rema ruhamya collette yavuze bahisemo gutunganya myanda ituruka mazi butaka bw’iyi gereza kubera idatunganyijwe iba intandaro kwangiza ibidukikije gutera indwara abaturage yagize nk’uko mwabibonye gikorwa kigamije gutunganya imyanda ituruka mazi y’iyi gereza kubera twese tuzi imyanda igiye bidukikije nko mazi butaka idatunganyijwe ahanini ariyo iba intandaro kwangiza ibidukikije gutera indwara baturage umuyobozi rcs cgp rwigamba george yavuze gikorwa cyiza ndetse kizagira akamaro cyane kuko amazi y’umwanda yavaga gereza azatunganywa akongera agakoreshwa yagize bizagira akamaro cyane kurengera ibidukikije kubera umwanda uva gereza uwuretse ukamanuka wakabaye ukajya mugezi nyabarongo wakwangiza byinshi akamaro bizagira amazi y’umwanda yavaga agiye gutunganywa akavamo umwanda wose akongera agasubira gukoreshwa bikorwa birimo iby’ubuhinzi n’isuku kandi akaba atazagera baturage ayo mazi yatunganyijwe bisaba abanza gutekwa muntu wakenera kuyanywa yujuje ubuziranenge binateganyijwe gahunda gutunganya imyanda izagezwa zindi gereza n’ibindi bigo binini rwego kubungabunga ibidukikije

title: bugesera haravugwa ubujura bw’inka bukorwa n’abarundi
content: bucyanimpundu jeanne d’arc murenge kamabuye avuga ijoro ryo kuwa ugushyingo yibwe inka ebyiri bazicisha kiyaga cyohoha bazijyana i burundi ziza gufatirwa komine busoni burundi ibi kandi nako byagenze ntaganzwa jean claude utuye kagali nyakayaga murenge kamabuye avuga yibwe inka eshanu manywa y’ihangu bazikuye ishyamba gako zijyanwa i cyeza burundi azikurayo atanze amafaranga y’u rwanda ibihumbi sebushishi theoneste agira kwezi gushize nibwe inka manywa bazisanze ishamba gako bazirika abashumba bazo zaje gufatirwa i burundi ahitwa karuzi dusanga zimwe bazibaze tubasha kugarura izigera ishanu kugeza murenge kamabuye harabarurwa inka zigera z’abantu batanu zibwe gihe cy’amazi atatu icyo kibazo cy’ubujura kigaragara murenge rweru kwezi uwitwa ruzindana innocent kagali nemba yibwe inka eshatu ndahiro tito akibwa eshanu izi zose zafatiwe ahitwa kirundo i burundi mu murenge mayange kibazo cyaragaragaye kagali kibenga habamungu hibwe inka enye bazisanze rugo masaha saa nani z’ijoro umuyobozi w’akarere bugesera rwagaju louis avuga biganiro n’ubuyobozi bw’abaturanyi b’abarundi kandi abafatwa barabihanirwabamwe bemeza zibwa ariko bigizwemo uruhare n’abashumba bazo ubu bujura kandi bukunze kugaragara mirenge ngeruka kamabuye mayange rweru egide kayiranga

title: kizito mihigo yagiye iwabo i kibeho birori bisobanuye byinshi hantu avuka
content: nyuma y’amezi macye avuye gereza umuhanzi kizito mihigo akomeje ibitaramo byibanda by’umuziki w’indirimbo zihimbaza imana akaba yerekeje iwabo i kibeho ahabera ibirori bifite igisobanuro ubwe by’umwihariko ariko bikaba n’ibirori bikomeye hantu avuka karere nyaruguru nyuma y’amezi macye avuye gereza umuhanzi kizito mihigo akomeje ibitaramo byibanda by’umuziki w’indirimbo zihimbaza imana akaba yerekeje iwabo i kibeho ahabera ibirori bifite igisobanuro ubwe by’umwihariko ariko bikaba n’ibirori bikomeye hantu avuka karere nyaruguru kuri kabiri tariki ugushyingo nibwo kizito mihigo yageze i kibeho karere nyaruguru birori kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka ishize i kibeho habaye amabonekerwa ahabwa agaciro gakomeye cyane bakirisitu gatolika rwanda hirya hino isi kizito mihigo kandi mabonekerwa yabaye iwabo i kibeho amaze igihe gito avutse dore afite imyaka y’amavuko mu gitaramo aherutse gukorera i nyamirambo kizito mihigo yasobanuye agaciro ubwe amabonekerwa y’i kibeho ndetse n’ukuntu yishimira kuba yarabereye avuka i kibeho anaboneraho gutangaza azajya kwifatanya n’abandi masengesho n’igitaramo kwizihiza imyaka mabonekerwa abayeho kizito mihigo amaze kugera i kibeho kabiri abinyujije mbuga nkoranyambaga yagize kuri ugushyingo nageze iwacu i kibeho abakerarugendo b’iyobokamana ibihumbi n’ibihumbagiza bahuriye murwa w’umwamikazi bizihize isabukuru y’imyaka ishize bikiramariya abonekeye alphonsine mumureke ndaba mpari nshyiremo ikirungo nkore umuti nyuma y’amasaha macye muhanzi yatangiye gutaramira abitabiriye gitaramo kizito mihigo yataramiye ab’iwabo i kibeho n’abahageze baturutse hirya hino kuba birori bibaye mwaka kizito mihigo yizihizamo isabukuru y’imyaka nayo myaka ishize habaye mabonekerwa byiyongeraho kuba ubwa mbere muhanzi agiye gutaramira iwabo i kibeho yafungurwa bigatuma igitaramo gifite igisobanuro gikomeye muhanzi wagiye kwishimira ivuko amateka y’amabokenerwa y’i kibeho byinshi biyavugwaho kibeho umujyi muto uherereye karere nyaruguru majyepfo y’u rwanda ni ahantu hamenyekanye cyane igihe habaga amabonekerwa mwaka w’ akaba hari ishusho yezu rwego afurika ifite icyicaro i kibeho niyo shusho nini isi ifite uburebure metero esheshatu ipima ibiro maganacyenda mirongo itanu kg iyo shusho igaragara ahantu hatandatu isi kuko buri mugabane w’isi ufite ishusho nk’iyo umugabane w’afurika ishusho wagennye musozi nyarushishi uherereye murenge kibeho akarere nyaruguru ntara y’amajyepfo amateka y’ibonekerwa ry’i kibeho ku italiki ugushyingo mwaka w’i ishuri ryisumbuye ry’abakobwa ry’i kibeho habereye ibintu bidasanzwe ubwo hari ma saha nyuma saa sita abana barangije gufungura ariko bakiri hamwe cyumba cy’amafunguro alufonsina mumureke ugeze kigero cy’imyaka cumi n’itandatu yumva ijwi ryoroheje rimuhamagara kinyarwanda rigira riti mwana wanjye ubwo ahaguruka bwangu akurikira iryo jwi ridasanzwe kirongozi abona umugore ufite ubwiza buhebuje amuhagaze imbere yari yambaye umwambaro wera kandi yitwikirije umwenda w’ubururu mutwe ugakomeza ugana inyuma ibiganza bye byari bibumbiye gituza ariko intoki zireba hejuru nta nkweto yambaye alufonsina amubazanya igihunga agira uri nde uwo mugore amusubiza bwangu avuga ndi nyina jambo alufonsina ahagarara yemye nk’ufashwe n’umuriro w’amashanyarazi agumya kwitegereza mugore ariko kandi akanibaza uburyo nyina jambo yaje kirongozi cy’ishuri ryabo bikira mariya yongera kumubaza ni nde ukunda cyane alufonsina usanzwe umwana uvuka muryango w’abakristu kandi agerageza kuyoboka nzira asubiza adatindaganije nkunda imana bikira mariya wabyaye yezu mariya yumvise gisubizo asagwa n’ibyishimo abwira alufonsina nazanywe kugukomeza kuko numvise amasengesho yawe yongeraho ndifuza inshuti zawe zikomera kwemera kuko zitemera bihagije ubwo alufonsina yatangiye kuvuga amasengesho yoroheje nyina jambo azamuka ajya ejuru umwana agumya kwitegereza mubyeyi utagira asa arembera ibyo byamaze nk’iminota cumi n’itanu abageragezaga kumuvugisha cyangwa se kumunyeganyeza ntibagira bageraho kuko ameze nk’umuntu wafashwe n’ubujeni bukomeye cyane nta muntu n’umwe wemeye iby’ibonekerwa rye ahubwo bamwe batangiye gukeka yarwaye indwara idasanzwe dore avuka i kibungo abanyarwanda benshi bavugaga haba ibirozi byihariye bukeye bwaho ndwara yongera kumufatira cyumba abanyeshuri bararagamo ngo bikira mariya yamubonekeye atari umuzungu nk’uko bakunze kumubona mashusho ahubwo alufonsina avuga atashoboraga kumenya ibara ry’uruhu rwe icyo yemeza kimwe mubyeyi afite ubwiza butagereranywa nyuma y’ayo mabonekerwa y’ikubitiro buri gatandatu alufonsina yagumaga kubonekerwa n’uwo mubyeyi bamwe bakabifata nk’ukuri abandi bakavuga mwana yasaze ntibyari bimworoheye kugumya kuba ikigeragezo bandi bana dore agitangira umwaka mbere w’amashuri yisumbuye nyamara bigeragezo ntibyatumye acogora isengesho bigera n’aho abandi bana bajya bamuzanira amashapule abasabire umugisha mubyeyi ijuru nyuma alphonsine nyina jambo yaje kwiyereka abandi banyeshuri babiri igihe cyarageze alufonsina asaba bikira mariya yakwiyereka n’abandi bityo bakaboneraho ibimubaho atari yihangishaho indi mpamvu yamuteye gusaba mubyeyi ijuru kwiyereka n’abandi abantu bamubazaga utuntu twinshi abona habayeho n’igihe bana bararaga habamo ibintu bidasanzwe biteye ubwoba bituma ababikira bayoboraga iryo shuri bakoresha amazi y’umugisha y’i lurude kuko bumvaga ibikangaranya muntu byose bituruka sekibi ayo mazi amaze gushira byabaye ngombwa basaba alufonsina azasabe bikira mariya amazi y’umugisha w’i kibeho ibyo nabyo byateraga bamwe kwibaza byinshi alufonsina amaze kugeza icyifuzo cye bikira mariya kumwinginga aziyereke n’abandi bana bikira mariya yamutumye bagenzi ababwire basenge nibwo bamwe bazahabwa mpano taliki mutarama mwaka w’i nataliya mukamazimpaka abonekerwa bikira mariya cyumba abana baryamagamo nataliya afite umwihariko gukunda cyane bikira mariya buto bwe kandi akaba umwana utuje cyane yari ageze myaka cumi n’irindwi ngo bikira mariya yaje umugore mwiza cyane atari umuzungu cyangwa se umwirabura n’ubwo yamubonaga nk’umuntu usanzwe afite umubiri mwiza kandi worohereye cyane akimubonekera nataliya yaketse abonekewe n’umutagatifu ariko mugoroba wakurikiyeho bikira mariya amuhishurira izina rye ndi nyina jambo ku nshuro mbere nataliya yakekaga abonekewe n’umutagatifu bikira mariya yamuhamagaye agira nataliya mwana wanjye undi asubiza adatinze karame ubwo bikira mariya akomeza ikiganiro amubwira nimusenge nimusenge cyane kuko isi mbi mukunde cyane ijuru kurusha nsi kuko biyoyoka vuba cyane mu buzima bwawe uzagomba guhangana n’imibabaro myinshi kandi ikomeye nimukanguke kandi muve hasi mwitonde mugomba guha umwanya uhagije isengesho murasabwa kandi kugarukira imigenzo myiza y’urukundo kwitanga kwiyoroshya nimugarukire imana soko y’amazi y’ubuzima ayo magambo yavuzwe tariki mutarama asobanutse ariko kandi ateye n’ubwoba nataliya yayafashe nk’ubutumwa bukomeye ahawe bityo n’ubwo asanzwe umwana ukunda gusenga kwiyambaza bikira mariya noneho arushaho nataliya yabonekewe bikira mariya gihe cy’imyaka ibiri gusa nyuma amusezeraho uwa gatatu wabonye bikira mariya mariya kalara mukangango yatangiye kubona mubyeyi ijuru tariki mata ugereranije babiri bamubanjirije mariya kalara umukobwa w’inkumi w’imyaka makumyabiri n’umwe yakundaga amaraha kandi ntiyite bintu bijyana gusenga yemwe ndetse bageragezaga alufonsina cyane atanemera habe mba by’amabonekerwa nyamara bikira mariya amaze kumwiyereka yarahindutse buryo byatangaje abari basanzwe bamuzi yahawe ubutumwa kwamamaza ishapule y’ububabare bikira mariya mu mabonekerwa cumi n’atanu yagiriwe kugeza kwezi k’ukuboza mariya kalara yabwirwaga isi igenda nabi cyane u rwanda rugeze ahakomeye bityo abantu bakaba bagomba gusenga cyane guhinduka ngo uwa mbere magambo yahinduye mariya kalara ubwe ibonekerwa ry’i kibeho ritangira guteza ibibazo umwaka wakurikiye intangiriro y’ibonekerwa waranzwe n’ukwiyongera kudasanzwe kw’abavuga babonekerwa haba i kibeho cyangwa hirya hino rwanda bantu bagendaga bapfupfunuka nk’ibihumyo ibyo byatumaga abantu benshi bibaza iryo bonekerwa atari amarangamutima n’ihururu taliki ukwakira ukuvuga nyuma y’umwaka umwe gusa bene kubonekerwa bageze cumi bane nyuma y’imyaka ibiri mirongo itatu batatu bamwe bavuga babonekerwa bikira mariya yezu abandi bakemeza uretse yezu bikira mariya babona n’abatagatifu ntibyagarukiye ariko bamwe bihaye ubutumwa kuzerera maparuwasi hirya hino rwanda haduka n’abafata inzira bihugu bikikije u rwanda kure yarwo nk’i roma canada n’ahandi ibyo byakorwaga gihe abandi bajyaga kuba z’abayoboke kibeho badafite icyemezo cy’ubuyobozi kiliziya muri hadutse n’abagaragara i kibeho bazanywe gutaranga abayobozi kiliziya n’abategetsi abavuga bafite ubutumwa bwihariye yemwe hari n’uwatinyutse yemeza bikira mariya yamwemereye kumufotora ako kavuyo kivangaga bimenyetso bigaragaza i kibeho hari kubera ibintu bidasanzwe muri wavuga nko gushishikara isengesho gukora ingendo ntagatifu zigana i kibeho kwigomwa gusiba uguhinduka gufatika kw’abantu benshi n’inyota kwiyegurira imana benshi rubyiruko ntawabura kuvuga urugendo-mayobera voyage mystique alufonsina yakoze igihe cy’amasaha menshi tariki werurwe ndetse nataliya akarujyamo taliki ugushyingo mwaka muri ngendo babaga bameze nk’abapfuye rwose bagaruka mubiri bagasobanurira abandi beretswe bisa nk’ibyo kwemera benshi twita ijuru purigatori n’umuriro utazima bongeragaho uwabatwaraga yababwiraga bahitemo bashaka kuzajya nyuma y’ubu buzima ibyo bikaba bibafitiye akamaro cyane kumenya bagomba kwitwara bibazo byose bazahura si ibindi bimenyetso bikomeye nko gusiba kurya kunywa igihe kirekire abo bana babikoraga bakurikiranwa n’abaganga hamwe n’abandi basobanukiwe n’iby’ubuzima bakemeza bintu indengakamere iyo mvange y’ibisobanutse n’ibijijisha yateje ibibazo bitoroshye guhuzagurika rubanda dore kubera imbaga y’abantu bahururiraga i kibeho abenshi badakoresha ubushishozi bitari byoroheye ubuyobozi kiliziya y’u rwanda gufata icyemezo gikomeye byabaye ngombwa buyobozi bugenda gahoro gahoro kugeza cyemezo ndakuka cyatangajwe tariki kamena n’uwari umushumba diyosezi gikongoro nayo paruwasi kibeho ibarizwamo uko ubuyobozi kiliziya bwitwaye gihe cy’amabonekerwa amabonekerwa y’i kibeho yabaye mbere kiliziya y’u rwanda hari hamenyerewe kumvwa amabonekerwa yabereye i lurude i fatima n’ahandi birumvikana bintu byahuruje abantu benshi abanyamatsiko cyangwa se abemera igihe amabonekerwa y’i kibeho yatangiraga paruwasi kibeho diyosezi butare icyo gihe diyosezi yayoborwaga musenyeri yohani batisita gahamanyi wihutiye gushyiraho komisiyo ebyiri gukurikirana ibibera i kibeho izo komisiyo iy’abaganga n’iy’abahanga tewolojiya komisiyo y’abaganga yatangiye imirimo yayo tariki werurwe iy’abahanga tewolojiya itangira tariki gicurasi umubare w’abavugaga babonekerwaga watumye komisiyo zombi zihitamo abantu umunani b’ibanze zikurikirana bwitonzi bwinshi ibyo ariko ntibyavugaga bibagiwe n’abandi n’ubwo buri komisiyo yakoraga bwigenge n’ubwisanzure zombi zayoborwaga n’amabwiriza kiliziya arebana n’ibijyana n’amabonekerwa yaratangajwe papa pawulo vi imirimo y’izo komisiyo yatumye musenyeri gahamanyi atangaza amabaruwa gitumwa anyuranye kumenyesha rubanda rugomba kwitwara ibarwa mbere yanditswe tariki nyakanga iya kabiri tariki nyakanga hari n’iya kanama yemezaga i kibeho ahantu abakristu bashobora guhurira bagasenga bagataramira umubyeyi kandi bagahabwa n’amasakaramentu kiliziya musenyeri gahamanyi amaze kubona akavuyo kari kuvuka mabonekerwa n’akajagari biri guteza gihugu myemerere yafashe icyemezo gutangaza abantu bigira intumwa hirya hino isi n’abata iwabo bakajya kuba miryango y’abayoboke kibeho muntu n’umwe ubatuma bityo bakoraga bikaba muntu n’umwe buyobozi kiliziya wagombaga kubibazwa ibyo byatangajwe n’uwo mushumba ibaruwa gitumwa nyakanga ikindi ubuyobozi kiliziya bwakoze nyuma y’ubushishozi buhagije ugutangaza mugaragaro i kibeho hakomeza kubera amahuriro matagatifu icyo cyemezo gikomeye cyatangajwe musenyeri gahamanyi tariki kanama muri make byabaye nko kuvuga ibyariho bibera i kibeho bikorwa n’abakristu rwego guhimbaza imana gutaramira bikira mariya kiliziya ibishyigikiye ibi ariko ntibyavugaga amabonekerwa yemewe ariko ntambwe zaganaga iryo yemerwa taliki werurwe diyosezi butare yabyaye iya gikongoro guhera diyosezi nshya iyoborwa musenyeri misago agustini padiri mukuru seminari nkuru nyakibanda akaba n’umwe bagize komisiyo tewolojiya yakurikiranaga ibyaberaga i kibeho musenyeri misago azi neza iby’i kibeho koko kuko amaze gusohora igitabo gikomeye mabonekerwa muri gitabo misago yerekanaga ibyiza kibeho imaze kuzanira kiliziya y’i rwanda akanagagaza impungenge ziterwa n’abantu bihangishaho ariko mwanzuro yatangaga kuko atari byarebaga amaze kuba umushumba gikongoro buri wese yabonaga imirimo y’amakomisiyo igiye kwihutishwa hakanafatwa umwanzuro nyuma dore misago yahawe diyosezi gihe ubwe yemezaga amabonekerwa yarangiranye n’isezererwa alufonsina tariki ugushyingo icyemezo mbere musenyeri misago yafashe cyabaye gutangiza iyubakwa ry’ingoro yarasabwe bikira mariya i kibeho ibuye ry’ifatizo ryashyizweho tariki ugushyingo tariki ugushyingo musenyeri misago ataha by’agateganyo shapeli yafunguwe cyahoze icyumba abanyeshuri bararagamo nyine abanyeshuri batatu batangiriye amabonekerwa igikorwa rudasumbwa mabonekerwa y’i kibeho cyakozwe n’ubuyobozi diyosezi gikongoro icyabaye nkubiri guhimbaza yubile y’imyaka ibihumbi bibiri y’ubukristu n’iy’ijana u rwanda rumenye inkuru nziza icyo gikorwa kwemeza mugaragaro kandi buryo budasubirwaho bikira mariya yabonekeye abakobwa batatu ishuri ryisumbuye ry’i kibeho icyo cyemezo cyatangajwe tariki kamena katedarali gikongoro ubwo hari misa iyobowe musenyeri misago agusitini akikijwe n’intumwa papa rwanda hamwe bagenzi b’abepisikopi hari kandi abasaserdoti abihayimana n’imbaga y’abakristu baturutse imihanda guhera munsi ibonekerwa ry’i kibeho ryafashe intera idasubirwaho kuko kiliziya y’isi nayo yemeje rwanda bikira mariya yiyeretse abana batatu akaganira nabo kandi hagatangirwa ubutumwa bureba isi kuva ntangiriro y’isezerano rishya bemera bibiliya by’umwihariko abemera umubyeyi bikira mariya itariki kanama buri mwaka kiliziya gatorika yizihiza umunsi mukuru w’ijyanwa ijuru bikira mariya assumption agahebuzo cyane rwanda usanga abakirisitu b’imihanda bateraniye i kibeho basenga usanga kandi abakirisitu bagenda batoragura utubuye twaho hantu ndetse n’utwatsi ndetse bakavoma n’amazi iriba rito rihaba bakajyana iwabo bavuga ikintu cyose cy’i kibeho kiba gifite umugisha ibi byose abakirisitu babiterwa n’ukwemera kuzuye abandi bakajyayo kubera amatsiko bakaharonka ingabire y’ukwemera bitewe n’uko kwemera gutuma abajyayo bava modoka bageze nko birometero bagere i kibeho bakagenda n’amaguru ahasigaye baba bifuza kugera butaka butagatifu batuje bicishije bugufi kandi basenga muri gihe hantu kibeho holy land hakurura mukerarugendo benshi kandi batandukanye baturutse mpande zose z’isi niyo mpamvu leta y’u rwanda ibinyujije kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere rdb ifatanije minisiteri siporo n’umuco minispoc bahashyize hantu hagomba gutezwa imbere bitewe n’uko hakurura mukerarugendo

title: rayon sports umwe bayobozi bakuru yeguye
content: engerneste nsangabandi umunyamabanga w’akanama nkemurampaka rayon sports yeguye gicamunsi gatatu taliki gicurasi avugo yeguye kubera rayon sports gihe itari guha abafana ibyishimo kudaha ikizere abakikugiriye umwuka mubi hagati rayon n’abafatanyabikorwa n’ibindi eng nsangabandi avuga ikindi cyatumye cyatumye yegura komite abereye umunyamabanga atakizuza inshingano zayo bikwiye uyu mugabo yeguye gihe hari ukutumvikana hagati y’ubuyobozi rayon n’ubuyobozi bw’abafana ku kabiri taliki gicurasi o ubuyobozi bw’abafana bwandikiye perezida rayon sadate munyakazi bumusaba kwitaba komite y’abafana akabaha ubusobanuro ngingo zitandukanye harimo kubasobanurira ikipe ibanye n’abafatanyabikorwa ubuzima bw’ikipe rusange n’ibindi

title: amatariki y’ingenzi yaranze urugamba rw’inkotanyi guhagarika jenoside
content: ku itariki mbere ukwakira ingabo fpr inkotanyi -rwanda patriotic army rpa zatangije urugamba kubohora igihugu nyuma y’imyaka ine ngabo zari zigizwe ahanini n’urubyiruko zatangije urugamba guhagarika jenoside kubohora igihugu maboko y’abicanyi aya amwe matariki y’ingenzi yaranze urugamba guhagarika jenoside tariki mata ingabo rpa zagabye igetero ruhengeri n’i byumba zigamije guhagarika jenoside tariki mata umutwe mbere w’ingabo rpa wageze nteko ishingamategeko kimihurura uje gufasha batayo gatatu ihari bakomeze guhagarika jenoside tariki mata ingabo rpa zafashe komini murambi zasanze abatutsi basaga bamaze kwicwa tariki mata ingabo rpa zatangiye gutwa zari zarokoye duce twa byumba gahini tariki mata ingabo rpa yatabaye abari bahungiye stade amahoro tariki mata ingabo rpa zafashe umujyi rusumo tariki gicurasi bamwe barahunze bagarutse rwanda rpa imaze kubohora agace k’amajyepfo ashyira uburasirazuba tariki gicurasi ingabo rpa zakomeje kurokora abari bihishe hirya hino tariki gicurasi ingabo rpa zafashe akarere bugesera zikiza n’abasaga kiliziya ntarama tariki gicurasi ikoresheje radio muhabura fpr yabwiye abaturage uduce turimo umutekano tariki gicurasi fpr yakomeje kurokora abicwaga karere bugezera tariki gicurasi ingabo rpa zafashe ikibuga cy’indege kanombe n’ikigo gisirikare kanombe tariki gicurasi ingabo rpa zakomeje kurokora abicwaga ndetse zikomeza zigana i gitarama tariki gicurasi abanyamakuru mpuzamahanga baje i kigali duce twari twamaze kubohorwa rpa tariki kamena ingabo rpa zafashe umujyi kabgayi i gitarama ndetse zirokora benshi bahari tariki kamena abaturage duce nyanza ruhango basubiye zabo kuko ingabo rpa zari zamaze kuhafata tariki kamena ingabo rpa zafashe rucunchu ibirindiro bine gisirikare n’ikiraro musambira tariki kamena fpr yarokoye abantu bafashwe bugwate st famille nkengero zayo tariki kamena imirwano yarakomeje kigali fpr yakomeje yerekeza i butare kibuye guverinoma y’abicanyi ikomeza guhunga tariki kamena ingabo rpa zakomeje kubohora uduce dutandukanye ingabo zakoraga jenoside nazo zikomeza guhunga tariki kamena ingabo rpa zahurije hamwe uduce zari zafashe kigali abandi bakomeza iya butare tariki kamena ingabo rpa zigaruriye ibice bitandukanye kigali gitarama butare tariki nyakanga rpa yakomeje kuvura inkomere zacitse icumu ndetse n’abasirikare ngoro y’inteko ishingamategeko tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zakomeje kwigarurira ibice kigali n’ibindi bice majyepfo majyaruguru tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zafashe umujyi kigali butare iba ntambwe ikomeye guharika jenoside yakorewe abatutsi tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zarokoye ababikira barimo n’ababiligi babiri i butare tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zatangiye kugenzura umupaka w’u rwanda n’u burundi ndetse ziha inzira abagarukaga rwanda tariki nyakanga ikinyamakuru the new york times cyatangaje umujyi kigali urimo ituze ndetse abantu batangiye kuwugarukamo tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zafashe umujyi ruhengeri ibirindiro bikomeye by’abakoraga jenoside tariki nyakanga radio rwanda yongeye kumvikana ikoresheje ibikoresho radio muhabura tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zafashe umujyi gisenyi ndetse zirokora abicwaga tariki nyakanga ingabo rpa zatangaje imirwano ihagaze tariki nyakanga fpr yatangaje hashyizweho guverinoma y’ubumwe uwo munsi pasteur bizimungu yarahiriye kuba perezida gen maj paul kagame arahirira kuba visi perezida faustin twagiramungu arahirira kuba minisitiri w’intebe salongo richardmuhaburarw

title: umubare muke w’abaganga utuma batabona umwanya kwihugura
content: uyu munsi abaganga babigize umwuga rwanda bagera gihe mwaka w’ nubwo bwose umubare wiyongereye ariko ababagana nabo bariyongera ibi bituma abaganga batabona umwanya kwihugura akaba nayo mpamvu batagendana n’ubumenyi bugezweho ubwo mahugurwa yateguwe n’ikigo gikurikirana amahugurwa baganga cdp dr innocent gakwaya yatangarije abanyamakuru kuba bake gihugu bibabangamira kubona umwanya kwihugura yavuze rwanda usanga umuganga wabigize umwuga yandikiwe abarwayi barenga ibihumbi icumi dr gakwaya yemeza umuganga amaze imyaka igera itanu atihugura yarasigaye inyuma kuko siyansi y’ubuganga itera imbere bukeye gusa yemera bimeze hari intambwe yatewe ugereranyije n’ibihe byashize minisitiri w’ubuzima dr agnes binagwaho yatangaje minisiteri ayoboye ishyigikira abaganga babigize umwuga bihugura ndetse bakanakora ubushakashatsi kuko aricyo gituma intego bihaye buzima zigerwaho ati umuganga wese uzashaka kujya kwihugura hanze tuzamushyigikira buryo bw’inkunga kuko bituma natwe dukorera abaturage ibijyanye n’igihe tugezemo umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’abaganga rwanda rwanda medical association dr steven rulisa yatangaje ishyirahamwe ryabo riri muryango w’abaganga isi iryo shyirahamwe rifite inshingano gukurikirana imikorere buri munsi y’abaganga kumenya ikigero cy’ubumenyi bafite bakanabafasha kucyongera iri shyirahamwe ryatangiye rivuga inshingano buri muganga ukora mwuga kuba shyirahamwe kubera inyungu ze n’iz’abamugana umunyamakuru kigali today

title: ibigo bigera bishobora kutazongera gukorana leta

title: ingaruka guhora ugenzura telefoni y’uwo mwashakanye
content: muri gihe iterambere ikoranabuhanga ryaziye usanga hari ingaruka nyinshi rifite bashakanye cyane cyane gihe hari umwe bashakanye abikoresha rwego gucunga bashakanye amenye yirirwamo uzasanga hari bamwe bashakanye umwe ashyira telefoni hasi akaba arayifashe arebye abamuhamagaye n’ubutumwa bamwandikiye abandi bakareba ma emails n’ibindi nkuko madame charlotte umujyanama w’ingo yabitangarije agasaro magazine umwe bashakanye acunga telefoni cyangwa se email y’uwo bashakanye ruhushya yamuhaye cyangwa se akabikora nk’umuntu kwiba gihe bishobora kuzana ingaruka mbi rukundo rwanyu rimwe rimwe bikanazana ibibi mutari musanganywe dore zimwe ngaruka gutuma mwashakanye agushidikanyaho niba uhora urebe telefoni y’uwo mwashakanye cyangwa se email ze ibanga atangiye kubimenya bituma agushidikanyaho urugero mwashakanye ashyira telefone hasi cyangwa se ubutumwa bwaza ukihutira kubusoma nkaho ubwawe akomeza kukubona bizamutera kugushidikanyaho kandi abone utamwizera guhora mutongana mupfa ubusa akenshi uhora ucunga telefoni y’uwo mwashakanye ushobora kwibeshya bamuhamagara cyangwa se kubamwandikira ukaba wabitiranya n’abafite gahunda kuguca inyuma bigatuma uhubuka ukabibaza mwashakanye hari n’abahubuka bagahita bahamagara nimero babonye kugirango bakurikirane bamenye ukuri bibuza amahoro mwashakanye nubwo mwashakanye mwasezeranye kubana akaramata ariko ukwiye kumenya akeneye ubwisanzure bw’ibanze buzima bwe bwite kuba ataratumye umenya umubare w’ibanga cyangwa se akayiguha kubera mpamvu runaka wenda uze kumurebera email ntabwo bikwiye gutuma uhora uyikoresha nkaho iyawe igihe mwashakanye amenye umucunga bigeze bituma abura amahoro ugasanga amaze kuvugana n’umuntu agahita asiba nimero gihe ntacyo yikeka kuko aziko buze kubicunga nawe ubwawe ubura amahoro iyo mutwe wawe harimo guhora ucunga mwashakanye ubwawe bikubuza amahoro kandi ukomeza kubura amahoro kuko utizera mwashakanye niko n’uwo mwashakanye abura amahoro ugasanga akugabanirije icyizere bikazabageza rwego gucana inyuma kandi byaravuye kukutizerana igitangaje mwashakanye ashobora kuguca inyuma kuko yamenye umucunga cyane ntunabimenye akakwigira imitwe uko wabyitwaramo igihe umenye mwashakanye akungenzura cyane kumenya impamvu abikora hari abantu baremye buryo kugirira abandi icyizere biba bigoye abo uzasanga bafuha cyane kantu gato kakavamo intambara iby ahanini bamwe babiterwa n’amateka babayemo kuko hari ababa bafite ubwoba kungera kuba batereranwa nkuko wenda bigeze gutererenwa bakiri bato abigeze gucibwa inyuma kumureka akakugenzura abyifuza nubwo bibangama kumva k umuntu ahora akugenzura ariko none gihe ntacyo wikeka uramureka akakugenzura abyifuza agezeho akabona kimenyetso abona cy’ubwoba bw’uko ushobora kuba umuca inyuma agera agatuza gusa hari n’abo bidapfa gushira kubiganiraho n’uwo mwashakanye iyo abashakanye batizerana bigeze urwo rwego urugo rwanyu ruba rufite ibyago byinshi gusenyurwa kutizerana uramutse umenye mwashakanye akugenzura byiza mwabiganiraho hari wenda wasanga afite impamvu itari nayo ituma ahora akugenzura akibwira ariyo nzira nziza yakoresha kugucunga urugero wenda hari waba ukunda kuvugana cyane n’umukobwa mukorana umugore wawe akagira impugenge akumva hari andi mabanga mufitanye muri make igihe wizeye mwashakanye mpamvu kumubuza umutekano uhora umugenzura telefoni mbuga nkoranyambaga n’ahandi none kandi mwashakanye umwizera wituma agira ikibazo ujye kwitaba telefoni umuhunge ujye hanze cyangwa se bakoherereze ubutumwa uhite ubisiba mwese mukeneye kwizerana kugirango mwubake urugo rwiza

title: hagiye kuba iserukiramuco sinema nyarwanda gikristu
content: iri serukiramuco ryiswe rwanda christian film festival’’ rizaba rigamije guhesha agaciro sinema nyarwanda z’ivugabutumwa gospel films byumvikana serukiramuco filime itari urwo rwego izakirwa rwanda christian film festival yateguwe n’ikompanyi isanzwe ikora ibikorwa bijyanye sinema nyarwanda hano rwanda yitwa dreamland ltd yagiye igaragara ifasha urubyiruko cyane cyane kubijyanye gukora filime gikristu amwe mumafilime yakozwe bitewe inkunga dreamland ltd harimo the impact the power of the message yerekanwe hirya hino rwanda mugabane aziya gihugu cy’u buhinde abifuza kwiyandikisha serukiramuco rizanara ukwezi kose baziyandikisha biro dreamland ltd biri i gikondo merez cyangwa se bakaba bakiyandikishiriza centenary house etaje ua tv ikorera kwiyandikisha ukwitwaza copyright filime yawe fotokopi y’indangamuntu kwitwaza kopi copy eshatu filime yawe kwiyandikisha bizarangira tariki serukiramuco ryo rikazasozwa tariki serena hotel hazatangwa n’ibihembo marie clemence cyiza uwimanimpaye

title: toni z’ibisasu byarangije igihe zasenywe
content: muri rusange gikorwa kizakorwa byiciro bitatu muri kiciro hasenywe ibisasu bikoreshwa mbunda ziringaniye bimwe bisabu bikaba ibyari ntambara kwibohora ibindi byatoraguwe byari binyanyagiye muri rusange hateganyijwe kuzasenywa toni iki gikorwa kikaba gifatwa nk’intwambwe komeye bushake bw’u rwanda kurangiza ikibazo cy’intwaro aka karere misingo k emmanuel ahagarariye umuryango w’akarere k’ibiyaga bigari ushinzwe kurwanya intaro nto erasca mu muhango gutangiza gikorwa mugaragaro yatangaje u rwanda rukomeje kwerekana ubushake gukemura kibazo aka karere yabivuze magambo u rwanda ragaragaje ubushake kurangiza ikibazo cy’intwaro nto niyo mpamvu rwatoranyijwe kuzayobora igikorwa guca intwaro zikwirakwiye u baturage aka karere umugaba umugaba mukuru w’ingabo z’u rwanda zirwanira butaka lt general caesar kayizari yavuze u rwanda rufite gahunda gukuraho ikibazo cyose cyatuma butaka bwaryo hagaragara ikibazo cy’ibisasu ku bufatanye resca u rwanda rwiyemeje gusenya intwaro n’ibiturika bigera gokorwa kikazakorwa byiciro bitatu mu cyiciro mbere hakozwe guturitsa ibisasu icya kabiri kizaba ugusenya intwaro nto icya gatatu kibe gutunganya ubutaka bwakoreshejwe guturitsa bisasu guhera kugeza hamaze gusenywa intwaro zigera zirimo izarengeje igihe n’izakuwe baturage muri rusange hamaze gusenywa intwaro n’ibisasu birenga kuzeza

content: uwahoze umukozi w’ikigo cy’ubutasi cy’abanyamerika cia bill oxley kiruhuko cyizabukuru nyuma yuko abwiwe asigaje ibyumweru bikeya kubaho yatangaje abantu bagera yahitanye harimo numuhanzi wamamaye cyane njyana raggae bob marley urupfu bob marley rwashegeshe isi byumwihariko abakunzi binjyana raggae yarigaruriyemo imitima benshi hakomejwe kwibazwa ibyurupfu rwe ibinyoma bitambagira buri munsi byatezaga urujijo nigihirahiro rupfu rwiki cyamamare gusa hamaze kumenyekana nyirabayazana wurupfu bob marley oxley ufite imyaka yakoreye cia imyaka akora nkumutasi ushinzwe gukura nzira umuntu wese wafatwaga nkubangamiye ubutasi leta zunze ubumwe amerika nigihugu rusange yatojwe kuba mudahusha wumurashi karahabutaka afite ubunararibonye kwica buryo butandukanye nko kwangiza ubuzima bwabandi gukoresha uburozi guturitsa gutera abantu imiti ibatera cancer nibindi byaganishaga rupfu rwabagenderewe uyu mukambwe yavuze yagaragaye bikorwa simusiga byubwicanyi guhera kwezi gatatu munani akomeza avuga myaka bantu batatu bashinzwe kwica kurimbura abanya politiki babaga batungwa agatoki kwitambika inyungu leta zunze ubumwe amerika hirya hino gihugu isi rusange avuga bantu yibanzeho kwica bill oxley avuga yibandaga bantu bafite bahurira nabantu benshi nkabanyapolitiki abahanzi abanyamakuru nabandi oxley agaruka kuba yarishe bob marley yabanje kuvuga bantu yishe urupfu bob marley rwakomeje kumucira urubanza kuko yahoraga yumva yaramujijije ubusa kandi indirimo ze zakomeje kumushinja cyane kuko yaje kuzikunda cyane zikajya zinamufasha yagize abandi bantu nicaga numvaga ntacyo bimbwiye ariko bob marley yakomeje kungarukamo indirimbo ze zirankurura cyane kugeza numva nicuza yakomeje agira marley umugabo mwiza afite roho nziza nimpano itangaje muzika mbabazwa kuba ubuzima bwe twarabutwaye hakiri kare gusa kari akazi kandi rutonde rwabo twashakaga bill oxley yemeye wishe bob marley asobanura yabigenje bob icyamamare yigaruriye isi gihe gito yakoresheje intwaro yubutwari title: usa uwatse ubwenegihugu abeshya ava inda twagiramungu kamubayeho
content: umucamanza leta zunze ubumwe amerika yafashe icyemezo gutesha agaciro ubwenegihugu umunyarwanda witwa ngombwa gervais yarahawe nyuma kubeshya umuvandimwe faustin twagiramungu wigeze kuba minisitiri w’intebe akaba buhungiro muri mutarama mwaka nibwo gervais ngombwa yafashwe atangira gukurikiranwa n’ubutabera bwamushinjaga gusaba ubwenegihugu akoresheje ibinyoma n’amanyanga kwisanisha twagiramungu faustin uyu mugabo w’imyaka y’amavuko yahawe ubwenegihugu tariki ugushyingo n’umugore bamwe bana batangira kuba ahitwa cedar rapids nyuma gutahurwa urukiko rwategetse ibyangombwa byose afite nk’umwenegihugu agomba guhita abitanga bikaba birimo pasiporo ikarita y’itora n’ibindi byose bihabwa abaturage ubwo yasabaga bwenegihugu ngombwa yavugaga murumuna twagiramungu faustin minisitiri w’intebe rwanda nyuma jenoside yakorewe abatutsi akagaragaza muvandimwe yahise ahunga bityo gusubira rwanda bikaba byashyira ubuzima bwe kaga akaba yarabivugaga abeshya kuko atari murumuna twagiramungu by’ukuri nk’uko ikinyamakuru thegazette dukesha nkuru kibivuga hahise hatahurwa n’amakuru y’uko ngombwa yahoze umwe bayobozi b’ishyaka mdr - power akaba bashakishwa n’ubutabera bw’u rwanda kubera ibyaha jenoside ndetse hakaba harasohotse n’impapuro zisaba atabwa yombi uyu mugabo ariko ntiyahanishijwe kwamburwa ubwenegihugu gusa kuko agomba kumara imyaka gereza kandi akaba agifite n’ibindi byaha akurikiranyweho yakoreye ahitwa linn county hakaba hari yatezaga umutekano mucye akanateza inkongi y’umuriro yabaga

title: akarere rubavu karishimira ibikorwa by’amajyambere kagezeho
content: mu bikorwa byamuritswe harimo umuhanda uhuza imipaka yombi y’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo grande et petite barierre ukazatwara akayabo k’amafaranga akabakaba miliyoni ndetse n’ umuhanda pave ujya biro by’akarere watangiye gukorwa munsi umuyobozi w’akarere sheh bahame hassan yavuze akarere kabwiye rwiyemezamirimo imodoka zikora mihanda zitazasubirayo utugari tutazikoresheje dusane uduhanda tujya hasuwe kandi umusozi wimuweho imiryango kubera ikibazo cy’isuri yicaga abahatuye gihe cy’imvura uyu musozi murenge gisenyi guterwamo ibiti binyuranye bifata ubutaka hakazubakwamo uduhanda intebe n’ibitare kuruhukiramo mukerarugendo iki gikorwa kizatwara amafaranga miliyoni bavuye musozi ubuyobozi b’akarere rubavu bwasuye akagari karukogo umurenge rubavu birebera ibikorwa ndengera foundation uyu muryango wubatse amasoko y’amazi agemurira abaturage amazi meza ndetse n’ibitaro kijyambere umuyobozi w’akarere yasabye umuyobozi ndengera foundation gufatanya n’akarere bakareba masoko y’amazi yakwaguka abaturage benshi bakavomaho abayobozi banagejejwe ahari kubakwa amashanyarazi ako kagali jean berchmas bahige ukuriye ewsa rubavu yasobanuye mashanyarazi azagera baturage tugali twa byahi kanembwe karukogo ibarizwa mirenge rubavu cyanzarwe bahige yashimangiye mashanyarazi afite ingufu zihagije zizafasha abaturage kwivana bukene bahige yagize mushinga wizwe neza ibikoresho byose birahari igikorwa cyose gikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi kizahakora kirahari mpungenge hasuwe n’isoko ryo ako kagali ariko rizatangira gukorerwamo mutarama nyuma y’ubunani uru rugendo rwasorejwe isoko kijyambere ry’akarere rubavu riri kubakwa mujyi rwagati murenge gisenyi imirimo kubaka soko iracyari hasi ariko irimo kwihutishwa kugira rizatangire gukoreshwa aho riri isoko risanzwe rikorera hazazamurwa irindi gorofa hanubakwe imodoka zihagarara asoza gikorwa umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheh bahame hassan yibukije inshingano buri wese kurinda gukoresha neza ibikorwa remezo gihe bizaba byuzuye bahame yagize ibikorwa nk’ibi iby’umuturage turifuza buri wese agira uruhare kubibungabunga kubikoresha kuko uburenganzira bweumwe baturage utuye kagari karukogo seth mugema asanga amajyambere kwihuta abagana buryo yiteguye gutangiza umushinga iwabo cyaro nogosha imisatsi mujyi none kubera batuzaniye amashanyarazi ngiye kwimurira salon yanjye karukogo nk’uko byagaragaye akarere rubavu kari kwihutisha ibikorwa remezo bijyanye n’icyerekezo ariko cyane cyane hubakwa imihanda ariko inzira ikiri ndende akarere karateganya kuganira n’abafite amazu mujyi rwego title: ishavu ry’abanyarwanda ritubere umusingi kwiyubaka umuyobozi w’umurenge bwishyura
content: umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’umurenge bwishyura niyonsaba cyriaque wifatanyije n’abaturage b’imidugudu nyarurembo karutete yagize ishavu ry’abanyarwanda ritubere umusingi kwiyubaka aha niyonsaba yungaga nsanganyamatsiko yahariwe mwaka igira iti twigire mateka turusheho kubaka ejo hazaza niyonsaba yaboneyeho akanya kunenga politike yazanywe n’abazungu gushyamiranya abantu yatunze agatoki ababiligi baje rwanda bagasanga abanyarwanda babanye neza bagasiga barukongeje n’ikintu kigaragara barusigiye umuyobozi w’umurenge bwishyura yagize urugero nk’aha kibuye basize bubatse gereza yonyine nk’aho abanyakibuye bakeneye hatanzwe ubuhamya bw’umwe bacitse icumu kibuye mukangoga emelita ufite imyaka gusa igihe jenoside yabaga yari afite ikiniga kinshi ariko yabashije kuvuga make byamugendekeye yabisobanuye magambo ikintu ntazigera nibagirwa igihe papa yampamagaye arangije guteka inkono y’ibijumba nituze aduhe ifunguro nyuma namubajije impamvu atubwiye atyo ambwira bagiye kutwica kuva bahise badutera turatatanangenda nomongana ntazi ngana hashize akanya gato mbona iwacu barahatwitse narinihishe mbona interahamwe zizanye papa kumwe murumuna papa afite bibiliya barayimwaka barayica amanika amaboko hejuru agira mana bantu ubababarire ntibazi barimo gukora ako kanya bahita bamutema amaboko murumuna babatsinda ahonanjye bashatse kunyica inshuro nyinshi buryo nageze mera nk’ikinya nkajya mbabwira nabi nti nimukore mushakaibyambayeho birebire mbivuze bwakwira bugacyagusa ndashimira imana nkiriho nk’uko mukangoga yakomeje abitangamo ubuhamya mukangoga emelita yasigaye wenyine muryango w’abana nyina bamwishe atwite inda cyenda se n’abavandimwe barabamaze ubu umubyeyi w’abana babili umuhungu w’imyaka n’imfura y’umukobwa w’imyaka ubura umwaka umwe angane mama igihe jenoside yabaga nyuma y’ubuhamya mukangoga hatanzwe n’ikiganiro ruhare leta yagize jenoside umwe bacitse icumu watanze ikiganiro yasobanuye ukuntu abatutsi kibuye kimwe n’ahandi hose rwanda bagiye bahezwa gahunda leta y’icyo gihe umuntu akabaho atazi bucya kugeza igihe jenoside ibereye n’uwo bitaga inshuti n’umuturanyi arabahinduka umuhango wabimburiwe n’urugendo rwahereye rwibutso jenoside ruri iruhande rw’ahahoze sitade gatwaro mujyi kibuye kugera mudugudu nyarurembo ahabereye ibiganiro gukurikira ijambo ry’umukuru w’igihugu yahariye munsi radiyo televiziyo abari babashije gukusanya amafaranga ibihumbi gutera inkunga abacitse icumu mu rwego rw’akarere gutangiza icyunamo byabereye murenge mubuga umuyobozi w’akarere karongi kayumba bernard n’abandi bayobozi bagiye kwifatanya n’abandi kwibuka nshuro jenoside yakorewe abatutsi gasana marcellin

title: ubuzima bw’ubuhunzi butera umujinya ariko bugatera n’ishyaka - perezida kagame
content: kuri kane tariki gicurasi perezida repubulika y’u rwanda paul kagame yakiriye abanyeshuri basaga kaminuza wharton abaganiriza byinshi mateka y’u rwanda n’ubuzima bw’ubuhunzi yabayemo jenoside yabaye rwanda yatumye abantu benshi isi bamenya u rwanda kubera amabi yarubayemo ariko nyuma yayo amahanga noneho yagiye amenya gihugu cy’imisozi igihumbi kubera iterambere kwiyubaka bidasanzwe rwabashije kugeraho ubwiwe amateka y’u rwanda akabona n’aho ruri ararutangarira bikaba nako byagenze banyeshuri leta zunze ubumwe amerika bakiriwe perezida kagame perezida paul kagame yabasobanuriye uburyo amateka mabi y’u rwanda abanyarwanda bakuyemo isomo ryo kwiyubaka yagize abantu bishyize hamwe baravuga bati dushobora gukora ibihambaye nidutegura neza ahazaza hacu iby’ahashize tukabyirengagiza twiyumvishaga ndetse tugomba gushyira imbaraga iterambere kurushaho bitewe n’aho twari tuvuye ndetse n’aho twifuzaga kugera mu myaka ishize twabonye ibintu bibi abantu bafite ubushobozi gukora munsi nabwo ubona ibyiza bantu bashobora gukora agaruka buzima bubi yabayemo impunzi gihugu uganda perezida kagame yavuze ubuzima bw’ubuhunzi butera umujinya ariko nanone bugatera ishyaka yagize kuba impunzi bikubakamo umujinya ariko nanone bikakubakamo ishyaka ugashaka gusubira iwanyu urwane ubaza impamvu bagufata gutyo perezida kagame avuga byashoboka abanyarwanda bungukiye bihe bikomeye banyuzemo bakaba barabashije kubaka amateka mashya

title: perezida kagame yavuze intego atari ugutegura gusa abavuzi kabuhariwe
content: perezida w’ u rwanda paul kagame gatanu mutarama yafunguye mugaragaro kaminuza y’icyitegererezo buvuzi university of global health equity ughe umukuru w’igihugu yabwiye abafatanyabikorwa barimo partners in health abayobozi kaminuza n’abanyeshuri kugira abavuzi kabuhariwe atari ntego nyamukuru n’ubwo musingi ahubwo icy’ingenzi uguharanira bumenyi bushyirwa bikorwa kugeza ubuvuzi bwiza muturage avuga kamaro nyiri izina university of global health equity ughe yafunguye mugaragaro perezida kagame paul yabwiye abayifiteho uruhare bagomba gukomeza gushyira imbaraga bushakashatsi bugamije kureba abaturage bagezwaho ubuvuzi n’ubuzima bwiza kuko kaminuza irindi shoramari ryo rwego hejuru haba rwanda karere perezida kagame yagarutse by’umwihariko izina kaminuza ubwaryo avuga ryibutsa intego yayo igomba gushyirwa bikorwa nyungu z’abaturage perezida kagame yavuze intego atari ugutegura gusa abavuzi kabuhariwe n’ubwo musingi intego ukwigisha mbere byose abanyeshuri bagomba gushyira umuturage mbere byose kuko ibitaro bitavura indwara ahubwo bivura abantu buri wese rwego arimo perezida kagame yageze karere burera nyuma y’amasaha make avuye i davos busuwisi rundi ruzinduko rw’akazi kuko yageze i kigali saa mbili mugitondo agahita akomereza majyaruguru y’u rwanda yavuze cyari kumubuza kujyayo kuko igikorwa cyahabereye ingenzi cyane buzima bw’igihugu kubera akazi iriya kaminuza irimo gukora kandi izanakomeza gukora mpamvu yafashe n’umwanya gushimira ababigizemo uruhare iyi kaminuza yubatse murenge butaro karere burera kaminuza mpuzamahanga ariko izakenerwa by’umwihariko mugabane africa kuko wugarijwe n’indwara gipimo gihe abatanga serivisi z’ubuvuzi bangana gusa umuyobozi partner in health rwego mpuzamahanga bwana gary gottlieb akaba bayobozi bakuru university of global health equity ughe yavuze imisozi myiza burera ifite ubutaka bwera munsi yahindutse ikimenyetso cy’ubumenyi ntagereranywaahantu binyejana biri imbere hazajya havamo abakiri bato bazaba abayobozi abahanga n’abavuzi rwego rw’isi bafite intego kugeza abantu buzima bwiza yagize ni abantu bazakoresha imbaraga z’ubumenyi n’ubushobozi bukenewe kugeza batuye isi buzima bwiza kandi bityo ubutabera n’imibereho y’abatuye isi birusheho kubabera byiza nk’uko n’izina kaminuza ubwaryo ribivuga mu ikoranabuhanga video conference iwabo leta zunze ubumwe amerika umugore bill gates melinda gates yashimye cyane perezida kagame avuga ubuyobozi bwe intangarugero gushyigikira uburezi umuryango bill melinda gates umwe bafatanyabikorwa n’umuterankunga w’ingenzi leta y’u rwanda bikorwa kubaka iriya kaminuza ifite intego kugeza ubuzima buzira umuze ughe kaminuza yakira abanyeshuri rwanda n’abo bindi bihugu by’umwihariko rda ikazajya yakira n’abakomoka miryango itishoboye bazajya bafashwa kaminuza ubwayo yatangiye kubakwa kugeza ikaba ifite abanyeshuri rwanda hanze madamu binagwaho agnes wigeze kuba minisitiri w’ubuzima umuyobozi wungirije w’iriya kaminuza itanga amasomo bihumbi by’amadorari amerika mwaka biyishyurira ukuvuga ahwanye miliyoni zisaga z’amanyarwanda abafashwa kaminuza ubwayo bazajya batangirwa ibihumbi usd bitangire ibihumbi bine mu nyubako z’iyo title: brd yaje mwanya gatatu ma banki atsura amajyambere afrika
content: brd yaje mwanya gataatu n’amajwi ikurikiye african export and import bank misiri yaje mwanya mbere ifite amajwi ndetse ibile holdings ltd nigeria yaje mwanya n’amajwi umuyobozi mukuru brd jack kayonga avuga mwanya babonye uzatuma banki irushaho kugirirwa ikizere n’abayigana ikarushaho kugira isura nziza ruhando rw’andi ma banki umuyobozi mukuru brd yavuze banki itegura gahunda yayo ikurikije ibikubiye cyerekezo izakomeza gushora imari yayo buhinzi uburezi ubucuruzi hanze y’igihugu n’ubukerarugendo kayonga yagize duhisemo gutera inkunga umushinga w’ubuhinzi tuwutera inkunga byiciro byawo byose urugero nk’ikawa tuzitera inkunga ihingwa ryazo kuzitunganya ndetse kuzicuruza hanze y’igihugu banki y’u rwanda itsura amajyambere igeze mwanya gatatu afrika ivuye mwanya iriho umwaka ushize iyi banki ikora nk’iyigenga ifite inshingano guteza imbere abayigana ihuriro nyafurika rihuza ibigo n’amabanki bitsura amajyambere rigenzura ibijyanye n’imiyoborere ubukungu ndetse n’imikorere gutanga amanota bigo n’amabanki bitsura amajyambere ihuriro ry’uyu mwaka ryahuriye repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo ritanga amajwi bigo by’imari bigera ndetse n’amabanki jean noel mugabo

content: perezida ibuka jean pierre dusingizimana yabwiye ikinyamakuru newtimes ibuka yababajwe cyane n’icyemezo guhanaguraho icyaha bahoze abaminisitiri leta y’abatabazi ariko yizeye hazabaho kujuririra cyemezo turimo turagirana ibiganiro n’abashinjacyaha hano rwanda n’aba ictr kugirango turebe cyemezo kigana hanyuma turatekereza kuba twakora ibindi bikorwa nk’urugendo kwamagana cyemezo muri uru rubanza kandi urkiko rwakatiye abandi babiri bahoze abaminisitiri aribo mugenzi justin prosper mugiraneza buri wese yakatiwe imyaka y’igifungo aba bahamwe n’icyaha gutegura jenocide ndetse n’uruhare rwabo gukuraho uwahoze perefe butare jean-baptiste habyalimana hashingiwe magambo ahamagarira abantu kwica abandi bavuze kumwe thodore sindikubwabo bahamwe n’icyaha guhamagarira abantu gukora casmir bizimungu yavutse mwaka w’ komini nyamugari perefegitura ruhengeri bizimungu yabaye minisitiri w’ubuzima mata kugeza aza kongera guhabwa mwanya mata kugeza ahunze nyakanga yafatiwe kenya kuwa gashyantare bicamumpaka yagiye mdr ahabwa umwanya minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga kuwa mata yafatiwe cameruni kuwa mata inkuru dukesha the new times

title: rwanda singapore africa-nick aster
content: uyu munyamakuru avuga akigera kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga kigali yatunguwe cyane kubura bimwe mubyo yiteze ngo ubusanzwe ageze bihugu bikennye atungukira mbwa zizerera umwanda abana basabiriza abacururiza muhanda n’ibindi avuga kimwe yabashije guhita abona rwanda nick ahubwo yiboneye umujyi usukuye cyane imbere abantu bahugiye mirimo ndetse n’abashoramari b’abanyamahanga batari bake ikindi yahise abona imirimo y’ubwubatsi bice bitandukanye ndetse n’ibirango by’imiryango itegamiye leta myinshi yabibonaga henshi uyu munyamakuru avuga yiboneye ukuntu u rwanda rwavuye bihe bikomeye rukaba rufite umutekano n’ubukungu butera imbere gihe kitarenze imyaka nick ageraho yita u rwanda umutako w’afurika uyu munyamakuru avuga ubutegetsi perezida kagame bushima igihugu singapore ndetse bukifuza kugikurikiza iki gihugu gifite ubukungu bumaze kugera ahashimishije rwego rw’isi kandi nacyo myaka ishize cyarabarwaga nk’igihugu gikennye kuri singapore ahantu ushora imari ikunguka buryo abashoramari bazwi cyane isi bahafata nk’iwabo kubera guhorayo agira u rwanda ntirwaba narwo ruri kugera ikirenge mucya singapore uyu munyamakuru kandi avuga nkuru ze zitaha azagerageza gucukumbura ibijyanye n’ibanga u rwanda rikoresha rireshye abashoramari kuko azi neza bisaba kuvugisha ukuri gusesuye ndetse gukorera mucyo mwinshi avuga abayobozi baganiriye bamugaragarije gahunda zitandukanye leta zigamije kuzamura imibereho myiza y’abaturage avuga kandi yanisuriye umwe baturage batujwe nzu nshya ubundi akamutangariza n’ubwo amafaranga yinjiza akiri make gusa yishimiye inzu nshyashya umunyamakuru kigali today

title: mu mvura y’amahindu abaturage kenya bitabiriye misa papa francis
content: papa francis yasomeye misa abakirisitu babarirwa bihumbi magana kaminuza nairobi gitondo kane nyamara hari bamwe bahisemo gutaha misa itaratangira batinya umubyigano wabahitana nk’uko biherutse kugendekera abayisilamu i maka ubuyobozi kenya bwari bwatangaje misa iritabirwa n’abantu basaga miliyoni n’ibihumbi magana ane vatikani ikavuga iritabirwa nibura umwe bayobozi bitabiriye misa sarah ondiso yabwiye ap yageze yagombaga kubera saa kumi n’igice ariko agasubirayo misa itaratangirayasobanuye yategereje amasaha abiri murongo utava nyuma imbaga y’abari bategereje ikoherezwa yandi marembo hakaba akavuyo buryo n’abashinzwe umutekano babuze bakora ati byari biteguye nabi twese byatubabaje uretse umuvundo abashoboye kwinjira banyagiwe amasaha menshi bategereje misa papa itangira papa yanenze imitegurire y’iyi misa mu nyigisho papa francis yasabye rubanda kwirinda ikintu cyose cyatuma umwana utaravuka avutswa ubuzima ati duhamagariwe kwirinda imico ikurura ubwirasi bagabo igakomeretsa cyangwa ikandavuza abagore igashyira kaga ubuzima bw’umwana muziranenge utaravuka yabasabye gushinga ingo kandi bakirinda zasenyuka ati’ ukwemera dufite ijambo ry’imana kuduhamagarira gufasha imiryango nshingano ifite sosiyete kwemera umwana nk’umugisha si yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: gatsibo abaturage borojwe ihene kijyambere
content: abahawe ihene abatishoboye bafashijwe nyakatsi izi hene zizabafasha kwinjira buzima bushya kuko zizafasha abaturage kugira imibereho myiza harwanywa imirire mibi irimo bwaki abahawe itungo barasabwa kuzoroza abandi kugira abanyarwanda bafashanye kwihutisha iterambere n’imibereho myiza habarurema isaie umuyobozi w’akarere gatsibo wungirije ushinzwe imari n’ubukungu n’iterambere arasaba abaturage bahawe hene kuzifata neza birinda kuzigurisha kuko bazihawe kugira zibafashe guhindura ubuzima ibi yabivuze kubera hari abazihabwa bakumva izabo bakazigurisha biyibagije bagomba koroza abandi muri gihe leta ishyize imbere gahunda gukura abaturage bukene hitawe cyane gukemura ikibazo cy’imirire mibi gahunda izwi cyane minsi iya girinka munyarwanda ifasha abaturage kubona amata ndetse n’ifumbire sylidio sebuharara

title: inkomoko y’insigamugani ni bilindi
content: aba agereranyije iryo joro n’iry’umutasi cyilima rugwe witwaga bilindi yagenzemo ajya i bugesera gutata ubukwe nyanguge sagashya ahagana mwaka w’i icyo gihe cyirima rugwe umwami w’u rwanda nsoro bihembe umwami w’u bugesera bagiganiraga umukobwa w’umukonokazi witwaga nyanguge sagashya umwe ashaka kuba umurongora mugaragaro cyilima rugwe atanga nsoro kumurongora rwihishwa ijoro rimwe n’iryo yarongoweho nsoro mugaragaro niho hakomotse imihango y’ubukundwakare nyanguge yahize bakeba agira ndabaruta jye warongowe n’abami babiri ijoro rimwe bimuviramo impamvu yamutanije nsoro agacyurwa cyilima rugwe bakabyarana kigeli mukobanya uwo mugabo bilindi wakomotsweho n’iyi nsigamugani nyina umuhondogokazi ukomoka bikomangoma by’i bugesera ni umutasi cyilima rugwe wahoraga atata igihe ubukwe nsoro nyanguge buzabera kugira amutange kumurongora nk’uko indagu zari zabyemeje azabyara umwami w’u rwanda n’ubwo yasabwe nsoro akanamukwa cyilima agasubirayo agasaba agakwa mu gihe umunsi w’ubukwe umaze kumenyekana bilindi yaherekeje cyilima bajya bugesera gutaha ubukwe nk’abandi ariko umugambi nibamara gukora ibirori by’ubukwe cyilima akora ashoboye akarongora nyangunge mbere nsoro nuko cyilima amaze kurongora mukobwa nyanguge mpamvu z’imitsindo baziranyeho dore bombi bazi azavukaho igihangange cyilima yigarukira i rwanda ijoro ryose atinya hagira impamvu ituma bamenya yarongoye nyanguge rwihishwa agarukana bilindi baje kwihamba batazi bugere rwanda bikubitiyeho i bugesera ukagera i kigali cyilima rugwe atuye hari ishyamba ry’umutamenwa gusa bilindi azi inzira neza kuko yayicagamo kenshi ajya nyirarume b’abahondogo bugesera nuko bihereza iryo shyamba bararyogoga bagera i kigali gicuku nyuma gishyira urukerera abararirizi cyilima babakubise amaso baratangara bati iri joro bilindi cyilima bariturutse he abandi baricecekera mabanga bafitanye kuko rwanda muntu uzi cyilima yarongoye nyanguge rwihishwa nsoro wamusabye atabizi cyilima rugwe amaze kugaruka i rwanda nsoro asigarana nyanguge kuko wamurongoye mugaragaro kurongora cyilima wundi ukuzi uretse gusa bazi nyanguge yasabwe n’abo bami kandi bombi bagakwa byatangazaga rubanda bagira bati uriya mugabo sagashya wakiriye inkwano z’abami babiri azabigenza ate ubwo cyilima rugwe amaze kugaruka akajya atuma bilindi nyanguge akamwoherereza intashyo bilindi akagenda rwihishwa ijoro ryose kugeza igihe nyanguge yanganye nsoro bapfuye mihigo guhiga bakeba arabaruta yarongowe n’abami babiri ijoro rimwe cyilima amaze kumenya nyanguge yatanye nsoro ahera yohereza bilindi basare b’i bugesera kuko baziranye amuha n’amakoro y’amagumba y’ibimasa bazambutse nyanguge bitagoranye bilindi amaze gushyikiriza abasare ajyana amaturo sagashya amaze kugerayo avuga ubutumwa cyilima barabwemera biba gutebutsa kuko yarakoye bamaze gucutsa imisango agarukana nyanguge ijoro ryose ageze rwanda ahita abyarira mukobanya nyakabanda kigali cyilima yita umwana izina acyura nyina atyo nuko urwo rugendo bilindi majoro y’umwijima ajyana ubutumwa cyilima rugwe ruhinduka iciro ry’imigani ijoro ritashyemo umwijima mubi ryose urisohotsemo agana hanze yabura ava n’aho agana akiyamirira abwira asize nzu yemwe hanze hano hari ijoro bilindi

banking hall mujyi londres bwongereza umunyabibazo kurya mbuto mu ntangiro ncuti gatwa yabwiye ikinyamakuru independent bwongereza yakuriye buzima bukomeye n’abandi bavandimwe babiri bakarerwa nyina content: abayobozi b’ ibigo by’amashuri n’abarimu bavuga bashimishijwe n’uko abayobozi bakuru b’ u rwanda bafashe umwanzuro gukuraho umuco kwimura abanyeshuri barimo n’abatatsinze yamenyekanye title: iyi niyo nama igirwa umukobwa ushaka kwigarurira umugabo w’ abandi kuko basambana
content: iyi nkuru ishingiye mukobwa wasambagana n’ umusore bakundanaga musore akagwa mutego agahita ashaka umugore utari basambana ariko basambana akaba ashaka kwigarurira mugabo bagikorana ndetse bagikomeje gusambana mbere iyi nkuru ishingiye mukobwa wasambagana n’ umusore bakundanaga musore akagwa mutego agahita ashaka umugore utari basambana ariko basambana akaba ashaka kwigarurira mugabo bagikorana ndetse bagikomeje gusambana mbere mfite imyaka afite imyaka twahuye myaka ishize dukorana twembi turi ingaragu kandi twigenga ubuzima bwacu bwahoraga umunyenga njye n’ musore twari twaremeranyije tuzabana iteka ryose twiha igihe kubanza gushaka amafaranga tukiri kazi haje mukobwa kunda umukunzi wanjye uyu mukobwa naramubwiye andekere umukunzi arantuka ambwira umukunzi wanjye yigenga uyu mukobwa yakoze ashoboye atereka umukunzi wanjye akajya amwoherereza ubutuma umusore akabuca amazi ijoro rimwe umusore aza kwemerera mukobwa basohokana uyu mukobwa yasindishije umukunzi wanjye bararyamana hashize ibyumweru bike mukobwa ndatwite kandi tugomba gushyingirwana’ umuryango w’ umukobwa umuryango ukomeye wabishyushyemo umukunzi wanjye abura arenzaho yemera gushyingiranwa n’ mukobwa hashize ukwezi kumwe ubukwe bubaye mugore yabwiye umugabo yamubeshye atigeze atwita uyu mugabo ambwira yumva yareka mugore akansaga tugakomeza umushinga wacu ariko afite ubwoba umuryango w’ umukobwa wamugirira nabi’ njye twifuza twaba kumwe ariko harimo inzitizi nyinshi inama mukobwa agirwa n’ inzobere rukundo nk’ tubikesha ikinyamakuru the sun inzitizi mbere yabaye rukundo rwanyu ukutangira amakenga ntabwo mukobwa yasindishije umukunzi wawe joro byatangiriye magambo ntabwo umukunzi wawe bamunywesheje inzoga gahato ajya gusambana azi ikarita agiye gukina ariyo ariko yaremeye arayikina abishatse yareka mugore koko afite ubwoba muryango wamugirira nabi yabimenyesha polisi akabibwira umugore n’ umuryango w’ umugore kuki atabikora mureke wikomeza kumubera umugore kabiri muhe umwanya nashaka kwaka gatanya azayaka

content: umujyi butare mijyi imaze igihe kinini rwanda kandi ukaba n’umujyi ufite amateka akomeye rwanda uyu mujyi benshi bakunze kuvuga umujyi udakunze guhindura isura yahoranye kuko ukigaragaramo inyubako ngoma gikoroni aha umuyobozi w’aka karere eugene kayiranga muzuka avuga abibwira mujyi utajya uzamuka ugereranije n’indi rwanda bibeshya kuko mujyi ufite uduce turi kuzamurwamo inyubako agira umujyi wacu munini ntabwo abubaka bubaka muhanda mugari gusa ahubwo hari uduce nko i taba karubanda n’ahandi hazamuwe inyubako zigezweho kandi nyinshi ariko mayor muzuka avuga mujyi ukirangwamo inzu nyinshi kera zitajyanye n’igihe bakaba baratangiye gahunda kuzisenya hakubakwa izindibamwe nyiri inyubako banyuranye mujyi batangiye kuvugurura inyubako zabo nyamara izitari nke usanga zisenywa zikamara igihe kitari gito zitarubakwa aha mayor muzuka akaba avuga icyateye byose imyiteguro ibanza gukorwa nyiri inyubako babanje gushaka inguzanyo kugirango bazabashe kubaka amazu agezweho ku bufatanye n’abikorera hazubakwa inyubako z’amagorofa y’ubucuruzi kugera ziri byibuze bnr hotel ibis hotel faucon semuhungu misago aphrodis ecobank igiti cy’ubugingo zimwe nyubako zagaragarijwe ibishushanyo mbonera ziteganijwe kuba zarangiye kubakwa kwezi karindwi k’umwaka gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: bwa mbere mateka costa rica bemeye ubukwe bw’abahuje igitsina burataha barashyingirwa
content: mu gihugu costa rica habaye ubukwe mbere bw’abahuje igitsina nicyo gihugu mbere amerika hagati gihinduye amategeko akabibahera uburenganzira abagore babiri bakundana nibo babaye mbere bashyingiwe ibirori byabaye nyuma gato saa sita z’ijoro tegeko ryemewe kujya bikorwa alexandra quiros dunia araya nibo mbere bashyingiranywe bahuje igitsina costa rica ubukwe bwabo bwerekanywe televiziyo y’igihugu perezida carlos alvarado yavuze guhindura itegeko bivuze costa rica iha abakundana bahuje ibitsina uburenganzira bahoze bakwiriye yanditse rurimi rw’igisipanyole ubworoherane n’urukundo bikwiye kuba ibituranga bikadufasha gukomeza kubaka igihugu buri wese afitemo umwanya itegeko ryemerera abantu gushyingirwa gihugu rihindutse nyuma y’uko urukiko rw’itegeko nshinga rutangaje binyuranyije n’amategeko kubuza abahuje ibitsina gushyingirwa kandi kubabuza ivangura icyo gihe uru rukiko rwahaye inteko ishinga amategeko costa rica amezi guhindura itegeko enrique snchez umudepite mbere costa rica weruye akavuga aryamana n’abo bahuje igitsina yishimiye mpinduka n’abagize uruhare zigerweho yabwiye reuters ibyo baciyemo n’umuhate wabobifashije kubaka sosiyete itarimo imiryango y’ikiciro kabiri cyangwa abantu b’ikiciro kabiri imiryango yegamiye iyobokamana nkuko bbc dukesha nkuru ibitangaza yamaganye mpinduka abadepite barenga nabo bagerageje gutinza impinduka z’iryo tegeko mu bihugu byinshi afurika amategeko ntiyemerera abahuje ibitsina gushyingiranwa bimwe bihugu imibonano y’abahuje igitsina icyaha gihanwa n’amategeko amategeko rwanda ntabwo ahana imibonano mpuzabitsina y’abahuje igitsina ariko ntabwo anemera ishyingirwa ryabo kuko ashyingira umuntu w’igitsina gore n’uw’igitsina gabo gusa mu burundi amategeko ntiyemera gushyingira abahuje igitsina ndetse abakora imibonano mpuzabitsina bagihuje bashobora gufungwa hagati y’amezi atatu n’imyaka ibiri intyozacom

title: indwara kujojoba fistula n’ingaruka zayo buzima bw’uyirwaye
content: fistule cyangwa kujojoba indwara iterwa n’uko haba habayeho gukomereka gice ndangagitsina cy’umubyeyi gihe arimo kubyara ibyo bigaragara cyane babyeyi batabyarira muganga kandi bakeneye kubagwa bigatuma habaho inzira idasanzwe ihuza uruhago rw’inkari inzira y’inkari n’inkondo y’umura cyangwa inkondo y’umura n’urura runiri rusohora umusarani bigatuma umugore ahora asohora imyanda twakwita iba yayobye kuko inyura nkondo y’umura igasohokera gitsina rutangira mpamvu bayita kujojoba kugira ushobore kumenya bihagije iby’iyi ndwara twifashishije ibyatangajwe n’inzobere zitandukanye by’ubuzima mu kiganiro dr gedeon mulumba mukendi yagiranye n’agasarocom yavuze ikibazo cyiganje cyane bihugu biri nzira y’amajyambere muri bihugu usanga abagore benshi bagira ibibazo by’ihohoterwa kubyara bigoranye isuku nke abaganga batahuguwe bihagije n’ibindi ibi byose ibyangiza biriya bice by’umugore ubusanzwe bitajya byihanganira ikintu cyose giturutse hanze yagize umugore watinze nda ubyara umwana ufite umutwe munini cyangwa afite inkari zuzuye uruhago afite ibyago kwangirika kuko umwana atinda arwana gusohora umutwe aziba imitsi y’amaraso nzira z’inkari n’iyo nkondo y’umura cyangwa agatobora uruhago rw’inkari muganga gedeon avuga hari n’igihe urura runini narwo rutoboka cyangwa umwanya hagati y’inkondo y’umura n’ahanyura umusarane ugatanyuka bigatuma imyanda inyura nkondo y’umura iyi ndwara igira ingaruka nyinshi muntu uyirwaye kuko itinze kuvurwa itera ingaruka nyinshi nko guhagarara kw’imihango kugumbaha imibonano mpuzabitsina ntiba igishoboka kuko umubiri w’aho imyanda inyura hamera nk’ahumye buryo ikintu gikozeho ucika nk’urupapuro ishobora gutera cancer cg n’izindi infections zigira ingaruka mbi buzima bw’umuntu akenshi kubera umunuko uhora muntu urwaye ndwara babana baramunena agahezwa akiheza akenshi bene babyeyi bibaviramo gutabwa n’abo bashakanye bikagira n’ingaruka cyane buzima bwe mutwe dr gedeon akomeza atangariza agasarocom fistule akenshi ivurwa bitarenze igihe cy’amezi atatu uhereye igihe umugore yagiriye kibazo iyo kirenze biragorana kubera iriya myanya iba yarorohereye bigasaba ushaka indi kuyisimbuza kandi ntayibaho akomeza asobanura gihe ntacyo ushobora kumumarira uretse ubujyanama kugirango umuvure ihungabana yaratewe kwiheba ndetse kwiyanga kubera uburyo afatwa sosiyete abamo n’ubwo bimeze bityo ariko minisiteri y’ubuzima nayo ntiyicaye nk’uko dr anicet nzabonimpa umuhuzabikorwa gahunda kuboneza imbyaro minisante yabitangarije igihe u rwanda rwafashe ingamba guca burundu ndwara bakangurira abagore kubyarira muganga ministeri y’ubuzima kandi ifatanyije loni bafashe icyemezo kuvura ababyeyi bagaragayeho ndwara gihugu hose bwana cheikh fall ukuriye unfpa kiganiro yagiranye n’igihecom umuryango w’abibumbye ntuzahwema gushyigikira u rwanda nzira hoherezwa impuguke kuvura ndwara izahaza ababyeyi gusa ababyeyi nabo barasabwa kwitabira kwivuriza bigo nderabuzima nako bitabira kwipimisha igihe batwite anne-marie niwemwiza

title: minicom yahaswe ibibazo micungire mibi y’imari leta
content: radiyo rwanda yavuze kwisobanura abahagarariye minicom bavuze litiro miliyoni ebyiri essence babazwa zaburiwe irengero mwaka bikozwe petrorwanda abadepite bibajije impamvu kibazo kimaze imyaka kitarakemuka umunyamabanga uhoraho minicom emmanuel hategeka avuga bandikiye minisiteri y’imari bayisaba leta yakwemera gihombo cyatejwe petrorwanda minicom kandi irashinjwa gutanga amasoko buryo budasobanutse harimo n’aho yagiye asubirwamo kandi yaratanzwe hategeka yasobanuye minisiteri yahuye n’ikibazo kutagira abakozi bafite ubumenyi buhagije kazi kabo bityo ugasanga hari amasoko atangwa adateguwe neza bikaba ngombwa asubirwamo yavuze minisiteri itakaza abakozi beza inshuro nyinshi kubera umushahara muto minicom yanenzwe kutagira ububiko bw’inyandiko zakwifashishwa kugenzura umutungo umucungamari mukagihana lucie yavuze yazibikaga mudasobwa yavuze bubiko bwabonetse minicom kandi yabajijwe iby’imitangire y’akazi idasobanutse ndetse n’itangwa ry’imishahara miremire idateganywa minisiteri y’umurimo byarateje igihombo miliyoni hategeka yavuze bitakwiye kwitwa igihombo kuko bakozi bakenewe kugira barangize akazi kabo obadio biraro umugenzuzi mukuru w’imari leta yanenze ababazwa basubiza kuko akenshi badasubiza babajijwe komisiyo ishinzwe imicungire y’imari leta nteko ishingamategeko umutwe w’abadepite ikaba iteganya gutangaza ibyavuye bazwa mpera z’uyu mwaka emmanuel nshimiyimana

title: dore bimwe binyoma abasore bakunze kubeshya abakobwa
content: kuba nkuru tugiye kuvuga bimwe abasore bakunzwe kubeshya ntibivuze ihame ridakuka igihe cyose umusore abivuze abeshya nyamara bikunze kubwirwa abakobwa babeshywa umubare w’amafaranga akorera abasore benshi burya ngop ntibakunda kuvuga umubare nyawo w’amafaranga akorera ashobora kubwira umukobwa macye akorera kugira atamusaba impano z’umurengera cyangwa se akamubwira menshi mwiyemeraho cyane cyane abona ueo mukobwa afite amarere maremare gukunda abantu bafite amafaranga cyangwa se hari n’abasore biyemera gutyo gusa agahitamo kubeshya umukobwa bakundana byabaye rimwe ntibizongera iyi imvugo y’abasore b’abahehesi igihe bafashwe umufatanye n’undi mukobwa bintu runaka agahita yihutira kukubwira byamutunguye kandi ubwa mbere n’ubwa nyuma bitazongera nyamara ukuri umusore wishoye gushurashura bakobwa barenze umwe umubare munini uw’abatabireka sinzi impamvu twakundanaga akomeza kumpamagara ibi bishobora kubaho igihe umusore afite umukobwa mushya akundana ariko akaba yarakundanye atarigeze areka afite mbere akaba ahari hose bityo igihe wundi mbere ahamagaye umusore akabeshya mukobwa mushya mubano bagifitanye akazi kabaye kenshi munsi sinzi impamvu boss ashaka kunkoresha amasaha y’ikirenga ushobora kubora kuba ufite umukunzi uzi nyinshi gahunda ze z’akazi ndetse ukaba uzi neza bitajya bipfa gushoboka akora amasaha y’ikirenga ukajya kumva nk’umunsi mufitanye gahunda runaka akubwiye atakibonetse kubera akazi kandi bitari bisanzwe bibaho gihe ushobora gutangira kugira amakenga ataba ashaka gusubika gahunday awe zindi mpamvu mukunzi mfite iyo ukimenyana n’umusore mbere ashobora gushaka kugutereta kubera impamvu nyinshi zitandukianye ariko wowe ntuba wamenya ikimugenza abasore bagira ubutwari kuvugisha ukuri bafite umukunzi igihe bahuye n’undi mukobwa mwiza bake sinari nzi biri bukubabaze abasore bafite umukunzi bizeye neza abakunda bashobora gukora bishakiye bishobora kubabaza umukunzi wabo kubera bizeye neza bubababarire uraruta abandi bakobwa naba naramenye iki ikinyoma abasore benshi babeshya atari ukuri ahubwo ukugira wumve wishimye cyangwa kugira agusabe ashaka yabanje kugutegura mutwe wemere mananiza simukunda nkunda wowe iri ikosa rikunzwe gukorwa n’abakobwa gukunda umusore ukiri kumwe n’undi mukobwa abasore bakunda buryo bukomeye kurusha abakobwa afite umukobwa akunda kandi atatandukanye kukubwira uruta mukobwa ukukubeshya gusa ureke guhora uhangayitse ni inshuti yanjye bisanzwe kintu nakorana byashoboka umusore yakubwira akubwiza ukuri cyangwa se byashoboka yanakubeshya ukuri hari ababeshya umukobwa runaka inshuti isanzwe kandi nyamara bafitanye umubano wihariye ubangamiye urukundo rwanyu singamije kuryamana iyi nayo imvugo abasore bakunda gukoresha cyane cyane igihe babonye umukobwa yabavumbuye akamenya ikibagenza ukuryamana gusa akagerageza kwiregura salongo richard muhaburarw

content: mu cyahoze perefegitura gikongoro hakozwe urutonde ruriho amazina y’abatutsi bagombaga kwirukanwa kazi gusa n’abari batari baruriho basabwe kwibwiriza bakiyirukana kazi

title: inama y’abaminisitiri yibanze ishoramari
content: muri nama y’abaminisitiri niho hemejwe raporo y’ishyirwa bikorwa gahunda kugabanya ibitumizwa mahanga isaba ingamba zafashwe urwo rwego zakwihutishwa u rwanda kimwe n’ibindi bihugu byinshi afurika ndetse n’ibindi bikiri nzira y’amajyambere usanga ibyinjira gihugu biba biruta ibisohoka hanze y’igihugu abaminisitiri bagejejweho raporo igaragaza ingamba zafashwe kugira u rwanda rukomeze kuza isonga bihugu byorohereza ubucuruzi n’ishoramari nk’uko byagaragarajwe raporo yakozwe banki y’isi bagejejweho kandi raporo y’aho imirimo kubaka uruganda rutunganya umusaruro w’imyumbati kinazi karere ruhango igeze isaba imirimo isigaye yihutishwa kugira uruganda rutangire gutunganya imyumbati aha inama y’abaminisitiri yagejejweho raporo kibazo cy’amata yabuze isoko ntara y’iburasirazuba isaba ingamba zafashwe rwego kubonera isoko ry’amata y’aborozi zakwihutishwa iyi nama yasuzumye kandi yemeza raporo igaragaza gahunda kubaka umuryango w’ibihugu afurika y’i burasirazuba ndetse n’inyungu u rwanda rukura muryango gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: bamwe banyamakuru basanga itegeko ryo kubona amakuru ryarahinduye imyumvire y’abaturage
content: bamwe bakora umwuga w’itangazamakuru rwanda ndetse n’abaturage bavuga hari byinshi byahindutse myumvire bafite kubona amakuru kuyatanga ibi bakaba bavuga biterwa n’itegeko ryo kubona amakuru ryasinywe gashyantare rishyirwa igazeti leta werurwe n’uburyo rikurikiranwa kurishyira bikorwa n’urwego rw’umuvunyi urwego rw’umuvunyi rwahawe inshingano gukurikirana ishyirwa bikorwa ry’itegeko ngenga - ryo rigena imyitwarire y’abayobozi nzego leta nk’uko ryahinduwe kugeza n’itegeko ryo ryerekeye kubona amakuru abakora umwuga w’itangazamakuru rwanda bavuga itegeko ryo kubona amakuru hari by’inshi ryahinduye myumvire y’abayobozi n’abaturage ni abanyamakuru n’abaturage bungutse gutanga amakuru bayobozi nzego zigenga n’iza leta rushingwabigwi emmanuel impuguke by’itangazamakuru akaba n’umwarimu kaminuza y’u rwanda photofile rushingwabigwi emmanuel impuguke by’itangazamakuru akaba n’umwarimu kaminuza y’u rwanda avuga itegeko ryo kubona amakuru access to information law hari byinshi ryakemuye kandi ryanigishije akaba mpamvu abaturage barushishejo guhindura imyimvire kuko ababagezaho amakuru babinyujije itangzamakuru hari bamaze kugera gusobanukirwa n’itegeko ryerekeye kubona amakuru avuga abanyamakuru basobanukiwe n’impamvu ngombwa abaturage bagezwaho amakuru basobanukiwe n’itandukaniriro riri hagati y’amakuru atangwa n’amakuru asabwa public information and access to information akomeza avuga kandi abanyamakuru bagenda basobanukirwa n’itandukaniro riri hagati y’uburenganzira muturage cyangwa umunyamakuru afite kubona amakuru rushingwabigwi emmanuel akomeza avuga kuba abanyamakuru batangiye kumenya uburenganzira bafite tegeko bakanasobanukirwa n’uruhare rw’urwego rw’umuvunyi rwahawe nk’inshingano gukurikirana ishyirwa bikorwa ryaryo bikaba biri bimwe bigenda bihindura imyumvire y’abagenerwamakuru ignatius kabagambe umuyobozi ushinzwe ivugururwa ry’itangazamakuru rgbphotofile ignatius kabagambe umuyobozi ushinzwe ivugururwa ry’itangazamakuru kigo cy’imiyoborere rwanda rgb yavuze hakozwe ubukangurambaga bugamije kumenyesha abayobozi n’abaturage impinduka ziri itangazamakuru by’umwihariko abayobozi bakuru bakaba basobanukiwe guhinduka kw’imikorere y’itangazamakuru leta kabagambe yagize kumenyekanisha impinduka itangazamakuru byaratangiye kandi dufite icyizere rba izahabwa ubwigenge abantu abagize guverinoma barabyumva kandi bazi imikorere mishya ndetse n’abantu bubahiriza itegeko ignatius kabagambe yongeyeho kibazo kirimo kuba minisitiri cyangwa muntu yakwifuza kugaragara televiziyo ariko ubuyobozi rba buzajya bugena amakuru afitiye rubanda akamaro cyangwa se akenewe kubona amakuru kuyatanga twakoze ubukangurambaga n’ubu turacyabukora dufatanyije n’izindi nzego bireba kandi hari byinshi bigenda bigaragaza imyumvire benshi yahindutse tukaba twizera bihe biri imbere bizarushaho cyane ushobora kwibaza abashinzwe gushyira bikorwa tegeko babonwa n’uburyo barifata mbanda gerard umuyobozi ushinzwe itangazamakuru n’itumanaho kigo cy’igihugu cy’imiyoborere rgbphotofile mbanda gerard umuyobozi ushinzwe itangazamakuru n’itumanaho kigo cy’igihugu cy’imiyoborere rgb yagize akenshi usanga bavuga itangazamakuru ritari tukaba twibaza tuti twebwe buryo dushobora gushyiraho uburyo bufatika kwisuzuma tukareba imizamukire yaryo ibibazo rifite n’uko byakemuka’ mbanda gerard avuga hari zimwe mbogamizi zakuweho abanyamakuuru bahuraga mbere y’uko tegeko rijyaho atangaza abakora umwuga w’itangangazamakuru bavuga zimwe mbogamizi bahuraga nazo harimo guhutazwa n’inzego z’umutekano kudahabwa amakuru bamwe bashinzwe amakuru bigo leta n’ibishamikiye leta abakora ibikorwa by’itangazamakuru mugabane w’afurika by’umwihariko iryo karere k’iburasirazuba bakomeje kwibaza byegeranyo rimwe rimwe bivuga bwisanzure n’ubwigenge bw’itangazamakuru kubona amakuru n’ibindi yewe n’uko itangazamakuru rihagaze bishoborwa n’abanyaburayi n’abanyamerika gusa berna namata umunyamakuru w’umunyarwandakazi akaba n’umuyobozi w’ikinyamakuru rwanda day gikorera karere k’ibiyaga bigari yagize ese twe bande bumva amategeko akoreshwa ese ninde akomeza atangaza gukora akazi kawe ushingiye mategeko ibintu byiza cyane berna namata avuga twatangiye gukora umwuga gutara gutangaza amakuru rirya tegeko ritaraza ariko iterambere rigaraga itangazamakuru rituruka gusobanukirwa tegeko mpande zombi yaba muturage n’ukora akazi k’ubunyamakuru hari byinshi kugenda bahindura myumvire akomeza atangaza buri wese akwiye guhindura imyumvire kuko iterambere ryaraje rizana byinshi birimo n’imbuga nkoranyambaga buryo ushobora kubona n’umuyobozi rubuga nkoranyambaga rwe yagize ubonye umuyobozi kurubuga rwe nkoranyambaga ukamubaza aragusubiza atagusubiza akagushakira ugusubiza izina rye’’ ibi ibigaragaza uburyo tegeko rigenda rihindura benshi myumvire prof shyaka anastase umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’imiyoborere rgbphotofile ni gute abashinzwe gushyira bikorwa tegeko babona abagenerwa bikorwa n’uburyo babona hari ryahinduye riri gufasha myumvire y’abanyarwandaumuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’imiyoborere rgb prof shyaka anastase kiganiro yavuze hari ikigo gala amerika cyagaragaje mibereho y’abatuye afurika abanyarwanda mbere bafite ubwisanzure mibereho muntu manota ahereye bwisanzure bw’abaturage yagaragaje bushobora kuba bufitanye isano n’ubw’itangazamakuru akaba akomeza asaba abanyamakuru kunoza umwuga wabo haba hari ahakiri imbogamizi bikaganirwaho peacemaker mbungiramihigo umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’inama nkuru y’itangazamakuru mhc photofile peacemaker mbungiramihigo umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’inama nkuru y’itangazamakuru mhc yagaragaje bakomeje kubaka ubushobozi bw’itangazamakuru rwanda batanga amahugurwa agamije kongera ubunyamwuga kunoza ibikorwa by’igenamigambi n’igenamicungire inoze ibitangazamakuru bikiteza imbere ababikorera bakishimira uburyo bibafasha kunoza akazi kabo icyo itegeko ryerekeye kubona amakuru ryunguye abaturage buzima bwabo buri munsi tuganira alphonsine mushimiyimana utuye ntara y’amajyepfo akarere nyanza umurenge mukingo akagali kerezo umudugudu birambo avuga kuba itegeko ryo kubona amakuru ririho bimuha ubwisanzure icyizere gushirika ubwoba kuba navuga ikibazo cye akakibwira umunyamakuru akacyumva agira iyi anyumvishije mba nizeye kizakemuka abajijwe kuba itegeko ryerekeye kubona amakuru ryarahawe urwego rw’umuvunyi rikurikirane ugushyirwa nshingano zaryo alphonsine mushimiyimana yavuze ibibazo byananiranye bigeze muvunyi bikemuka buryo bwihuse kandi kuba itegeko ryarahawe umuvunyi nk’abaturage bikaba bibafasha kuko umuvunyi rwego bafata nk’urukoresha ukuri alphonsine mushimiyimana yagize uzarebe bibazo perezida repubulika yakira hari ibibazo biba byarageze muvunyi ni mpamvu turubona nk’urwego rw’ikirenga twe akomeza agira uburyo tubibona tubona leta yarebye igaha umuvunyi tegeko irikurikirane kubera urwego rufatwa nk’urugaragaza ubutabera buhamye aim kajangana umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe kugenzura imyitwarire y’abayobozi rwego rw’umuvunyiphotoindatwa aim kajangana umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe kugenzura imyitwarire y’abayobozi rwego rw’umuvunyi kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru indatwa avuga abanyamakuru hari uburyo bafatamo urwego rw’umuvunyi agira iyo bishimira hari tubafashamo kubona amakuru nzego leta gihe cyangwa kuyabona buryo bukurikije itegeko yakomeje avuga nabo bishimira batuma tegeko rimenyekana ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa byose by’urwego rw’umuvunyi bitari iby’itegeko gusa ryo kubona amakuru natwe twishimira ibikorwa by’umuvunyi bigera tubona abanyamakuru bafitiye urwego rw’umuvunyi byinshi baruha icyizere kubavuganira bibaye ngombwa kugirango amategeko yubahirizwe ngo uretse n’iri tegeko urwego rw’umuvunyi rukaba rusanzwe rukorana n’inzego z’itangazamakuru zitandukanye bamwe banyamakuru bavuga hari byinshi byahindutse myumvire kubera tegeko agira atisinavuga hari isuzuma gihanga ryakozwe rigaragaza abaturage bageze bumva iby’iri tegeko ariko nakubwira twatangira ntabwo
