title: gasabo abaturage gisozi biyubakiye sitasiyo polisi
content: abaturage b’umurenge gisozi babifashijwemo n’akarere gasabo biyujurije sitasiyo polisi ifite agaciro miliyoni zirenga z’amafaranga y’u rwanda rwego gushyigikira ibikorwa by’umutekano murenge wabo ikaba yamuritswe kabiri taliki gicurasi umuhango gushyikiriza ubuyobozi polisi y’u rwanda nyubako wayobowe minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu francis kaboneka umushyitsi mukuru aherekejwe n’umuyobozi mukuru polisi y’u rwanda igp emmanuel kgasana mu bandi bayobozi bahari harimo umuyobozi mukuru polisi wungirije ushinzwe ubuyobozi n’abakozi digp juvnal marizamunda umuyobozi w’akarere gasabo stephen rwamurangwa hamwe n’abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze gasabo n’ab’umujyi kigaliiyi nyubako izakoreramo sitasiyo polisi gisozi yamuritswe igizwe n’ibiro bitandukanye birimo ahazakorerwa n’umuyobozi w’iyi sitasiyo bafungira icyumba cy’ikoranabuhanga ibiro by’ubugenzacyaha icumbi ry’abapolisi n’ibindi minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu francis kaboneka ijambo rye yashimiye polisi y’u rwanda bufatanye bwayo n’inzego z’ibanze ashima imiyoborere myiza igihugu cyacu gifite yagize uyu umusaruro w’imiyoborere myiza irangaje imbere ubufatanye bw’inzego twahitiwemo nyakubahwa perezida repubulika iyo miyoborere myiza niyo ituma tugera bikorwa nk’ibi kuko hari abandi batabishoborayakomeje agira inzego z’ibanze nizo zishyira bikorwa gahunda leta ariko ntacyo zageraho mutekano ubufatanye hagati polisi n’abaturage bworoshya ishyirwa bikorwa ry’izo gahunda ubufatanye nizo mbaraga kandi n’ibindi bitari bizagerwaho bibe urugero yindi mirenge minisitiri kaboneka yakomeje avuga ntacyo umuntu cyangwa urwego runaka rushobora kugeraho gihe nyamwigendaho yabijeje nibakomeza bufatanye hirindwa icyabuhungabanya bazagera bindi biruta ibyagezweho cyane n’ubuyobozi buzakomeza kubatera ingabo bituguyarangije agira mwe nk’abapolisi abaturage babategerejeho umurimo unozeigp gasana yashimiye abaturage gisozi ubuyobozi bw’umurenge n’ubw’akarere gikorwa cyiza bakozeyagize ibiro by’umurenge biri kumwe sitasiyo polisi ikintu kiza kizoroshya ubufatanye kwihuta gukumira ibyaha gutabara bikenewe igp gasana yagize atiubuhamya dutanga munsi bushingiye gahunda y’umutekano n’iterambere hagati polisi n’abaturage harangwa ubufatanye bushingiye gukumira kurwanya ibyaha yagize iterambere n’umutekano ntibyagerwaho bufatanye tuzakomeza gutera imbere bushobozi buhari kandi tugera kubyo twifuza kugeraho umuyobozi w’umurenge gisozi theophile niragire ijambo rye yasobanuye igitekerezo kubaka sitasiyo polisi cyavutse nyuma y’aho abaturage gisozi bifashishaga sitasiyo kinyinya kandi hari kure niragire yagize n’ubwo abaturage baraguze imodoka ijyana abanyabyaha i kinyinya twatekereje tubonye sitasiyo polisi itwegereye modoka yakoreshwa yindi mirimo mu karere gasabo kagizwe n’imirenge gisozi niyo yonyine itagiraga sitasiyo polisi umuyobozi w’akarere gasabo rwamurangwa yavuze akarere ayobora imirenge n’abaturage bazakomeza gufatanya n’izindi sitasiyo polisi ako karere zuzuze ibyangombwa ubwandinsimuhaburarw

title: umuganga witaga kubarwayi coronavirus yagaragaye avura yambaye ubusa imbere y’abarwayi yahise yirukanwa
content: umuforomo burusiya witwa nadia yafashwe amafoto n’umurwayi yambaye ikanzu ibonerana imyenda y’imbere kugaragara bituma ahagarikwa kazi nadia w’imyaka yahagaritswe bitaro bikuru tula yakoraga ashinjwa kugaragaza imyambarire itandukanye n’iya kiganga nk’uko the tula pressa yabitangaje uwo mukobwa kazi kuvura abarwaye coronavirus aza kwambara imyambaro y’ubwirinzi yagenewe abaganga kwikingira cyorezo gusa yayambariye myambaro y’imbere gusa nyuma gusakara kw’ayo mafoto yafashwe n’abarwayi yitagaho ubuyobozi bw’ibitaro yakoragamo bwahise bumuhagarika kazi icyemezo kumuhagarika nticyishimiwe n’abaganga b’abarusiya n’abanyapolitiki batandukanye vitaly valentinovich milonov banyapolitiki bakomeye burusiya umwe bagaragaje batishimiye icyemezo cyafatiwe mukobwa yagize ndumva kintu kimwe cyatuma mukobwa ahagarikwa kazi ke

title: hagiye kurebwa uburyo zigama css yatanga inguzanyo nyungu
content: abanyamuryango koperative y’abasirikare abapolisi abacungagereza n’izindi nzego z’umutekano zigama css zigama credit and savings society basabye hagendewe buryo gutera imbere hasuzumwa inyungu bakwa nguzanyo igabanywa mu nama y’inteko rusange yayobowe minisitiri w’ingabo gen james kabarebe umuyobozi w’inama y’ubuyobozi dr james ndahiro n’umugaba mukuru w’ingabo z’u rwanda gen patrick nyamvumba gatanu tariki gicurasi hagaragajwe inyungu zigama css yiyongereyeho inyungu yabaye miliyari miliyoni z’amafaranga y’u rwanda gihe miliyari miliyoni dr james ndahiro yabwiye itangazamakuru ibikorwa zigama css bigenwa n’abanyamuryango bityo bateganya gihe kiri imbere birebana n’iterambere ry’ikigo n’abanyamuryangoati twita nguzanyo z’abanyamuryango twita mibereho rusange y’abanyamuryango bacu hari ababa bashaka inguzanyo gushaka amacumbi hari ababa barabonye amacumbi bafite imishinga iciriritse hari ababa bafite imishinga iciriritse bashaka kwaguraabanyamuryango zigama css bitabiriye inama y’inteko rusange dr ndahiro yavuze rwego gukomeza guteza imbere abanyamuryango zigama css hari inyingo zigiye gukorwa harimo n’iyo kugabanya inyungu yakwa nguzanyoyakomeje agira twemeranyije kureba twakongera kumanura inyungu nguzanyo ubu twari andi mabanki ariko abanyamuryango bakaba basabye turebye turimo kunguka cyangwa se n’icyerekezo cy’imyaka itaha twakongera kubamanurira inyungu nguzanyo nibura ikagera ibyo bizigwa n’itsinda twashyizeho ry’impuguke umwanzuro tukazawufata kwezi cumi mwaka umuvugizi w’agateganyo w’ingabo z’u rwanda lt col ren ngendahimana yavuze nk’abanyamuryango zigama css bashimishijwe n’uburyo yunguka umwaka utashye n’imibereho y’abanyamuryango ikarushaho kuzamukayakomeje agira ibyifuzo ukubona abanyamuryango barushaho koroherezwa nyungu bacibwa nguzanyo basaba koroherezwa kuba bakwiyubakira nk’inzu nk’urugero bashobora gukemura ibibazo zabo nk’uko mubizi ingabo z’igihugu abapolisi n’abandi banyamuryango zigama css imishahara ntabwo iba minini cyane ariko kubera dufite koperative yacu bidufasha gukemura bibazo buryo bidahungabanya akazi kacu buri munsikugeza zigama css ifite abanyamuryango ngabo z’igihugu polisi y’igihugu urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe imfungwa n’abagororwa n’abakozi b’inzego z’umutekano nk’urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe iperereza n’umutekano w’igihugu nisszigama css igeze mutungo mbumbe miliyari gihe zari harimo izamuka mwaka umweabanyamuryango zigama css bitabiriye inama y’inteko rusange yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: kwitwara neza buroko gufasha urukiko bimwe bitumye bagaragaza agiye kurekurwa
content: iki cyemezo cyafashwe tariki ukwakira n’umucamanza khalida rachid khan uyobora urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u rwanda tpir gusaba irekurwa bagaragaza michel wakatiwe igihano gufungwa imyaka mwaka ushize amakuru kigalitodaycom gikesha itangazo ry’uryo rukiko aravuga mpamvu zatanzwe kumurekura harimo kuba urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho yougoslavia tpiy rufite imikorere ijya gusa n’iya tpir ruteganya imfungwa zakatiwe zishobora kurekurwa nyuma kumara bitatu kane by’igifungo barakatiwe kandi bagaragaza amaze imyaka afunze ukuvuga by’imyaka umunani yakatiwe izindi mpamvu michel bagaragaza ubwe yiyemeje kwishyikiriza urukiko akanemera yashinjwaga ndetse akerekana azi uburemere bwabyo akanabyicuza kuba yararanzwe n’imyitwarire myiza afungiye sude mugabane w’u burayi nyakanga umunyarwanda michel bagaragaza yahoze umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo ocir- ishami ry’icyayi akaba yarafatwaga nk’umwe nkoramutima juvnal habyarimana perezida w’u rwanda yamaze igihe ashakishwa tpir byaha kunoza umugambi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi kugira uruhare jenoside n’ubufatanyacyaha jenoside tariki kanama bagaragaza yishyikirije tpir bwende bwe yitaba urukiko munsi ukurikiyeho ariko ahakana byaha byose yashinjwaga nyuma y’aho bidashobokeye yoherezwa kuburanishirizwa rwanda nyuma kugirana imishyikirano yihariye n’ubushinjacyaha bagaragaza yemeye kuba yaragize uruhare ruziguye jenoside kuko yaremeye intwaro zari zigenewe gukora jenoside zibikwa ruganda rw’icyayi rubaya ndetse akaba yaranaguriraga interahamwe inzoga akanaziha amafaranga yemereye urukiko kandi yahaga interahamwe imodoka z’uruganda bazikoreshe ngendo zabo ariko yongeraho yabikoraga akiza amagara n’umuryango uko gufasha interahamwe bikaba aribyo byatumaga ubushinjacyaha buvuga yazorohereje akazi bigatuma zibasha kwica abantu bahungiye musozi kesho kiliziya nyundo utwo duce twose turi karere rubavu kubera kwemera yaregwaga kubisabira imbabazi imbere y’urukiko tariki ugushyingo bagaragaza yakatiwe igifungo cy’imyaka umunani kandi urukiko rutegeka hakurwamo igihe yafunzwe michel bagaragaza azafungurwa itariki ukuboza bivuze ashigaje ukwezi kumwe n’iminsi itandatu buroko ernestine musanabera

title: musanze fc yavuze ihagaze kibazo cy’umutoza wayo udakozwa guhagarikirwa umushahara
content: ikipe musanze fc yagize ivuga mutoza wayo ahmed adel abdelrahman ibrahim udakozwa guhagarikirwa umushahara nyuma y’uko kipe ibitangarije abakozi bayo tariki mata nibwo musanze fc yandikiye abakinnyi n’abandi bakozi bayo ihagaritse imishahara kugeza igihe shampiyona izasubukurwa hari nyuma y’uko akarere musanze nako kandikiye ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe gahagaritse amafaranga kabageneraga kugeza shampiyona isubukuwe kuko ntayacyinjira mbere kubera icyorezo coronavirus adel ibrahim ukomoka misiri yanze kwemera cyemezo avuga batunguwe n’ibaruwa komite y’ikipe musanze fc ihagarika imishahara ndetse ntiyabyishimiye ati birumvikana ntabwo byadushimishije kuko buri muntu ava akagera ategereje umushahara abone abaho kwishyura icumbi guhaha ndetse gutunga umuryango wentabwo byiza kuba ikipe yahagarika umushahara cyane cyane bantu bakora kinyamwuga yunzemo bavuga bahagaritse amafaranga kuko akarere katakibaha amafaranga bityo byose bizasubukurwa covid- irangiye ariko njye navuga akarere atariko nagiranye nako amasezerano kandi tuba tugomba kuyubaha adel ibrahim akomeza avuga yabajije yandi makipe rwanda harafashwe icyemezo nk’icyo asanga ntayindi yagifashe ati nabajije yandi makipe nsanga ntayindi kipe irahagarika umushahara w’abakozi bayo sinzi impamvu komite musanze fc ariyo yafashe cyemezo ku bwanjye nanze kwemera mwanzuro nayo mpamvu nandikiye komite ibaruwa mbabwira ntashobora guhagarikirwa umushahara wanjye kuko mfite umuryango ngomba kwitaho misiri ntegereje igisubizo kiva ikipe kandi nizera bazubahiriza nshaka byanshimisha baramutse bubashye amasezerano twagiranye nkuko basanzwe babikora uyu motoza akomeza avuga yasinya amasezerano musanze fc kwezi k’ukuboza ibintu byose byagendaga neza nayo mpamvu adashaka havuka ikibazo ati kuva twatangira gukorana ibintu byari byiza nayo mpamvu ntifuza aka kanya aribwo havuka ibibazo nzi tegeko rimwe ryo rwanda rivuga uhagarika umushahara cyangwa uhagarika kontaro kubera ikibazo coronavirus ubu ntegereje hari igisubizo nyuma kizaturuka komite baramutse aricyo cyemezo bagumyeho njye sinzigera ndekeraho nzajya ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rwanda cyangwa nitabaze andi mategeko y’u rwanda cyangwa se nifashishe ambasade yanjye sinaguma mafaranga mfite kuko nakoze nshoboye kose mbere y’uko ingendo z’indege zihagarikwa rwanda mbe nagarutse kubera nubaha kontaro yanjye nizera nabo bazayubaha icyemezo sitwe cyaturutseho’ umunyamabanga musanze fc makuza ritishereka jean yatangarije umunyamakuru rwandamagazinecom icyemezo bafashe ataribo cyaturutseho ahubwo byatewe n’icyemezo bamenyeshejwe n’akarere musanze kabaye gahagaritse amafaranga kabageneraga kandi ariwe muterankunga mukuru ati uretse n’umutoza abantu babeshwaho n’imishahara kandi ntekereza kubera ingaruka z’iki cyorezo covid - musanze fc sirwo rwego gusa rwahagaritse imishahara ibituruka kucyo bita conge technique ikiruhuko tekiniki bitewe n’impamvu runaka bafashe icyemezo bagendeye itegeko rigenga umurimo rwanda makuza ritishereka jean yakomeje avuga cyemezo bafashe bagendeye itegeko rigenga umurimo rwanda ngingo yaryo ati hari ingingo igica n’icya cy’itegeko numero rigenga umurirmo gika kane bavuga kubera impamvu z’ubukungu tekiniki akazi gashobora kuba gasubitswemu gusubikwa kw’akazi tuba tuvuga gusubikwa kw’imishahara simbona ikintu gitangaje itegeko ntabwo rireba abenegihugu rireba abantu bakorera gihugu itegeko ry’umurimo musanze fc yagendeyeho ifata icyemezo rivuga isubikwa ry’umurimo mu gufata icyemezo musanze fc yagendeye itegeko n ryo rigenga umurimo rwanda isubikwa ry’amasezerano y’umurimo isubikwa ry’amasezerano y’umurimo ribaho gihe amasezerano adasheshweariko abayagiranye bahagarika zimwecyangwa zose nshingano bafite inshingano buri ruhande rusigaranazigomba kuba ziteganywa n’iri tegekocyangwa zumvikanyweho n’impandezombiamasezerano y’umurimo asubikwa kuberaimwe mpamvu zikurikira habayeho guhagarika umurimocyangwa gufunga ikigo hakurikijweibiteganywa n’iri tegeko umukozi ahagaritswe nk’igihanocyo rwego rw’akazi gihecy’iminsi umunani y’akaziidahemberwa umukozi ahanishijwe igihanocy’igifungo kitarengeje ameziatandatu cyangwa afunzweby’agateganyo gihe kitarenzeamezi atandatu ikigo gihagaritse imirimo yacyoby’igihe gito bitewe n’impamvuz’ubukungu cyangwa tekiniki habayeho guhagarika umukoziukorwaho iperereza rwegorw’akazi hari impamvu ndakumirwa zitumaimirimo y’ikigo ihagarara izindi mpamvu z’isubikwa ry’amasezeranoy’umurimo zigenwa binyuze mumasezerano y’umurimo amategekongengamikorere y’ikigo cyangwaamasezerano rusange ’ntabwo tuyobewe agomba kubaho ariko yarihuse’ umunyamabanga musanze fc akomeza avuga bafashe icyemezo batayobewe abakozi bagomba gukomeza kubaho kuri ntako babatari bagize kuko makipe make rwanda yahembye ukwezi werurwe uretse n’itegeko ry’umurimo bagendeyeho hari n’icyo amasezerano umutoza ibrahim yasinye avuga isubikwa ry’akazi ati mu masezerano ngingo bivugwamo habayeho cas de force majeure ibihe ndakumirwa amasezerano ashobora kuba asubitswentabwo tuyobewe agomba kubaho siwe gusa bizaba bikozeho kandi navuga yihuse cyane kubera turi makipe make yabashije guhemba ukwezi abandi n’ukwa mbere cyangwa ukwa kabiri ntibarayahemba akomeza avuga hari andi mahirwe babonye abakozi b’iyi kipe basubizwa buzima barimo ati yarihuse cyane kuko turi itariki mata ejo hashize yategereje akareba ukwezi nigushira tutazamuhemba igihe twaba tugize ahandi dukurakandi n’ubundi buzima busanzwe tuzajya tubureba nkuko zindi zego babikora abajijwe umutoza wabo yavuze yakwitabaza amategeko igihe batumvise ubusabe bwe umunyamabanga musanze fc avuga amategeko yakurikizwa ati ntekereza buryo buhari habamo n’ubwo gusesa amasezerano twebwe ntabwo twigeze tuyasesa ahubwo twabaye tuyahagaritse gihe gito turi bibazo covid- kandi bishobora guhinduka kutujyana nkiko nabyo ntekereza nazo zikurikiza amategeko ntizikurikiza umuntu runaka umunyamabanga musanze fc yasoje avuga kugeza ntawundi mukozi wigeze anenga umwanzuro ikipe yafashe kandi n’icy’umutoza wabo mukuru nacyo yizeye kizakemuka vuba ku munsi shampiyona nawo yasubikiweho musanze fc yanganyije - gasogi united stade ubworoherane ni umukino wakinwe tariki werurwe ukinwa bafana stade kuko nawo munsi habonetse umuntu mbere wanduye coronavirus rwanda kuva gihe nibwo leta y’u rwanda yahise ihagarika ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi birimo shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru rwanda musanze fc mwanya rutonde rw’agateganyo n’amanota i bumoso hari umutoza abdelrahman ibrahim umutoza mukuru musanze fci buryo hari bahha ibrahim umutoza wungirije bakomoka gihugu kimwe misiri makuza ritishereka jean umunyamabanga musanze fc

title: kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda izashyingura abazize jenoside bagera
content: venatie nyirabahire watanze ubuhamya bw’uko bantu bishwe yavuze akeka bishwe itariki kuko tariki bumvise amasasu arivugiramo nyiramuhire avuga ababazwa n’uko abantu batsinzwe shyamba ndetse n’abiciwe i butare rusange bazize akagambane k’abanyabwenge bagizwe ahanini n’abadogiteri n’abarimu kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda nyiramuhire umwarimukazi gihea avuga butare haguye abantu benshi bitewe n’uko bafite icyizere cy’uko bazaba bagendeye perefe butare umututsi bakumva azabarinda ikindi yongeraho uwari perezida w’u rwanda juvenal habyarimana akimara gupfa basabye abantu kuguma banabizeza umutekano icyizere cy’umutekano bizeye cyatangiye kuyoyoka uwahize perezida w’inzibacyuho theodore sindikubwabo yajyaga i butare tariki mata akavuga ijambo ryabatanze mugaragaro nk’uko nyiramuhire akomeza abivuga bukeye bwaho batangiye kujya bumva amasasu avugira arboretum n’ahandi hirya hino mugi nyuma yaho ndetse abicanyi babigiriwemo inama n’abarundi barahungiye rwanda batangira kujya bifashisha intwaro gakondo nk’amahiri kwica abatutsi banga gupfusha amasasu ubusa marie claire joyeuse

title: umurenge kanjongo wiyemeje gushaka miliyoni zisaga gufasha abacitse icumu
content: ayo mafaranga azagurwamo inka zigera ihene amasuka ashyire sima nzu ebyiri z’abacitse icumu yubake ubwiherere bumwe ndetse anafashe abacitse icumu mishinga iciriritse igamije imibereho myiza nk’uko byatangajwe n’umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’umurenge kanjongo ndindayino jean claude icyumweru kwibuka cyatangiye bafite amafaranga asaga gato miliyoni n’igice abaturage bakaba bazakomeza gutanga imisanzu bitewe n’ibyiciro barimo bishoboye biganiro bizajya bitangwa buri munsi cyumweru kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu muhango gutangiza icyumweru kwibuka nsuro jenoside yakorewe abatutsi karere nyamasheke hakusanyije inkunga ingana n’ibihumbi akaba yiyongereye kuyo basanganywe emmanuel nshimiyimana

title: igikombe cy’amahoro rayon sports as kigali zigiye kongera gucakiranira
content: nyuma guhurira mikino y’ijonjora ry’ibanze ry’igikombe cy’amahoro ikipe rayon sports igasezerera as kigali penaliti ariko nayo ikazamuka nk’iyatsinzwe byoroheje kipe zombi zongeye kwisanga zigomba gucakirana rayon sports yageze itsinze gicumbi fc ibitego - mikino yombi kuko umukino mbere wabereye stade kigali yayitsinze ibitego - none cyumweru yayisubiriye iyitsinda ibitego - ku rundi ruhande as kigali yasezereye bigoranye gasogi united kinyuranyo cy’ibitego - mu mukino ubanza wakiriwe as kigali stade kigali yabashije gutsinda - gihe mukino kwishyura kipe zanganyije - as kigali yagomboye munota igitego yatsinzwe gasogi fc ntangiriro z’igice mbere izindi kipe zizacakirana kiyovu sc police fc kiyovu fc yageze cyiciro isezereye intare fc giteranyo cy’ibitego - nyuma yaho umukino kwishyura wakinwe cyumweru kipe zanganyije - gihe umukino ubanza kiyovu sc yatsinze ibitego - police fc yasezereye etincelles giteranyo cy’ibitego - nyuma yaho banganyije - mukino kwishyura wabereye i kigali gihe mukino ubanza police fc yatsindiye etincelles i rubavu ibitego - umukino ubanza rayon sports as kigali uzaba gatatu tariki kamena gihe kwishyura uzaba gatandatu uzakurikiraho kiyovu sc police fc zizakine umukino ubanza kane tariki kamena bazongere bahure cyumweru mukino kwishyura

title: video king james ishusho y’uburyohe bw’urukundo n’umukobwa ufite ubumuga bw’uruhu
content: ruhumuriza james umuhanzi nyarwanda wamamaye king james yagaragaye mashusho y’indirimbo nshya yise igitekerezo rukundo n’umukobwa ufite ubumuga bw’uruhu ibintu byashimwe n’abantu batari bacye mbuga nkoranyambaga bashimangira uburyo gutanga umusanzu kugaragaza abafite ubumuga abantu nk’abandi kandi bashobora gukundwa ruhumuriza james umuhanzi nyarwanda wamamaye king james yagaragaye mashusho y’indirimbo nshya yise igitekerezo rukundo n’umukobwa ufite ubumuga bw’uruhu ibintu byashimwe n’abantu batari bacye mbuga nkoranyambaga bashimangira uburyo gutanga umusanzu kugaragaza abafite ubumuga abantu nk’abandi kandi bashobora gukundwa indirimbo nshya king james yasohotse minsi yashize ndetse ikundwa n’abantu benshi ngeri zitandukanye iyi ndirimbo yitwa igitekerezo king james asobanura uburyo imyitwarire y’umukobwa bahuye yatumye agira igitekerezo kumukunda ibyo yaririmbye ndirimbo ninabyo agaragaza mashusho yayo yashyizwe hanze muhanzi agaragaza igitekerezo gukunda mukobwa cyaje ndetse n’ibindi bitandukanye aririmbamo birimo umuryango w’uyu mukobwa wamwakiriye nabyo bigatuma igitekerezo kumukunda kirushaho gushinga imizi reba video y’iyo ndirimbo hano

title: rubavu abatishoboye barashima vup yabakuye bukene
content: bamwe baturage batishoboye murenge cyanzarwe karere rubavu baravuga imyato vup yabahaye akazi bakikura bukene bemeza bamwe bazava kiciro mbere cy’ubudehe aba batishoboye bakora imirimo gukora umuhanda kanembwebusigari-kinyanzovu bavuga imirimo bakoze nibura buri wese yinjijemo amafaranga atari munsi y’ibihumbi kandi yabafashije kugira bava n’aho bajya rugamba kwiteza imbere mukashema esperance umwe bakoze imirimo vup umukecuru w’imyaka avuga yakuwe ahakomeye kugira amahirwe gukora imirimo y’amaboko kubaka muhanda yemeza imirimo yakoze yamufashije gutegura amasaziro yagize gukora imirimo vup byaramfashije kubaho iwange mumbona ndi umupfakazi hepfo ruguru ngira nasannye inzu nabagamo igiye kungwaho ngura ihene ebyiri zirimo kororoka kandi mbayeho neza byose ndabishimira umukuru w’igihugu cyacu waduhaye mahirwe agashyiraho uburyo gufasha abatishoboye munderere yvette umwe baturage batishoboye wakuwe manegeka nkengero z’ishyamba gishwati yemeza yatangira imirimo gukora umuhanda ubuzima bwe bwahindutse ndetse bukagira bumukura n’aho bumuganisha aragira nimuwe manageka gishwati twabagaho duhangayitse nagize amahirwe gukora imirimo vup nishyuriye abana bange babiri biga mashuri yisumbuye ntunze umuryango wange kandi meze neza nabonye ubushobozi korora mbikesha mirimo tukiva twimuwe numvaga ngiye gutangira gusabiriza ariko ntibyabaho ndi kiciro mbere cy’ubudehe ariko ndumva narakivuyemo kubera nakoze byampinduriye ubuzima we n’abandi bemeza usibye gutezwa imbere n’imirimo bakoze gukora umuhanda bazamutse rwego rw’ubukungu aka gace habaye nyabagendwa ndetse ubuhahirane bwazamutse ugeraranyije n’igihe batari bakagize umuhanda nabyo bashimira leta y’ubumwe ihora ishishikajwe kuzamura imibereho y’abaturage ibaha ibikorwa remezo umuyobozi w’ishami gahunda kurengera abatishoboye guteza imbere imibereho myiza y’abaturage kigo leta gishinzwe gutera inkunga ibikorwa by’iterambere nzego z’ibanze loda gatsinzi justin asobanura vup ishamikiyeho gahunda nyinshi ariko zose ziganisha kuvana abaturage kiciro by’umwihariko mbere n’icyakabiri kugira bazamuke bagere rwego kwifasha kwivana bukene bagana nzira y’iterambere

title: beauty for ashes yitegura gukora igitaramo gikomeye yashyize hanze indirimbo pasika video
content: mbere y’uko itsinda beauty for ashes rimurika album nshya bise’ renaissance’ bakomeje gushyira hanze indirimbo zinyuranye zizaba zigize album kuri bashyize hanze indirimbo bise the cross’umusaraba kavutse olivier ukuriye beauty for ashes yatangarije rwandamagazinecom ndirimbo bayishyize hanze rwego gufasha abakristu kubasha kwizihiza neza umunsi mukuru pasika bibuka intsinzi y’umuzuko kristu ati ni indirimbo gufasha abantu kwizihiza pasika kandi uburyo beauty for ashes twahisemo kwifuriza abantu pasika nziza bibuka ibyiringiro by’umuzuko ndetse gihe cy’icyunamo cy’iminsi u rwanda rurimo amanda fung umwe bagize itsinda beuty for ashes kavutse olivieruri gucuranga niwe ukuriye beauty for ashes itsinda beauty for ashes riri kwitegura kumurika album nshya iyi ndirimbo ije ikurikira indirimbo n’uwambere basubiyemo ndetse bakayikorera amashusho ni indirimbo bashyize hanze kwezi gushize werurwe izi ndirimbo zose tsinda riri gushyira hanze zizaba zikubiye album nshya renaissance’ bazamurika mpeshyi y’uyu mwaka kavutse olivier yatangarije rwandamagazinecom batangiye kwitegura gitaramo nubwo hakibura amezi ariko impamvu kizaba igitaramo gikomeye cyane ati mu kumurika album yacu nshya turateganya gukora igitaramo gikomeye cyane kurusha ibindi byose beauty for ashes yaba yarigeze gukora hazaba harimo n’abandi bahanzi bakomeye tuzatangaza minsi imbere ubu imyiteguro twarayitangiye kuko dushaka gukora ikintu gikomeye abazaza gufatanya twe kuramya guhimbaza imana bazabibona itsinda beauty for ashes ryamenyekanye ryaririmbaga indirimbo ’suprisesiriprize ’yesu niwe super star’ ’turashima’ n’izindi zitandukanye ni itsinda rizwiho gucuranga umuziki rock ugezweho rihimbaza imana ariko bakaba kwibanda kuvangamo injyana nyafurika ndirimbo zizasohoka album’ nshya twavuze haruguru

title: urban boys munzira yogusenyuka kubera amakimbirane
content: urban boys itsinda ryatangiye umuziki ritangiriye huye ritangira abasore batanuimyaka irashize tsinda riri imbere muziki rwanda ndetse barwanye intambara nziza kumenyekanisha umuziki wabo hanze yarwo urban boys ifatwa nk’itsinda riyoboye muzika rwanda hagendewe ndirimbo zabo zikundwa n’abatari bake nubwo ariko itsinda rikunzwe gihugu ririmo umwuka mubi umaze imyaka umunani ushobora kurigeza ahakomeye buryo rishobora gutandukana burundu gishamya cy’uwo mwuka mubi urban boys yabaye ukudatumirwa nizzo bukwe safi icyo gihe nibwo abantu batangiye gukemanga imibanire y’abasore bagize iryo tsinda bajyaga bukwe bakabura nizzo kandi atari akwiye kuburamo hashize iminsi nibwo nizzo yashyize hanze ubutumwa avuga atatumiwe ibyo byatumye bamwe bahamya urban boys marembera kuburyo bidatinze ishobora gutandukana burundu abakunzi urban boys ariko ntibashyigikiye gato gutandukana kw’iryo tsinda bamwe bavuga byaba agahomamunwa tuyishimire moise wabaye uharanira inyungu zabo mbere urban boys igitangira umuziki igikorera umuziki mujyi huye avuga atifuza kubona abayigize bashwanye agira baramutse bashwanye nicyo kintu mbere cyaba kimbabaje showbiz’ nyarwanda sinifuza bashwana kuburyo niyo mbyumvise radio cyangwa mbuga nkoranyambaga mfunga amatwi akomeza avuga bagitangira ibya muzika ibintu byari byiza kuburyo cyari guteranya basore mu myaka itatu yamaranye nabo yabona bashobora kuzasaza nk’abavandimwe bagikorana ibibazo by’ubushyamirane kutumvikana byashegeshe urban boy myaka umunani ishize bifite umuzi gufunga umutwe safi nizzo aba basore baranzwe kutumvikana kugeza byabaye nk’umuco batumvikanye baterana ibipfunsi bakanakomeretsanya semuhungu jean de dieu uzwi two pac wabaye manager wabo akanabashoraho amafaranga bagitangira umuziki agaragaza basore bafunga umutwe cyane agira nizzo umusore uba ashaka yumva wahita ubyumva gutyo kandi ntabwo ava izima safi ntava izima akunda gusetsa kuganira ariko afunga umutwe kandi arakaye arabikwereka banga arivumbura agahita anabikwereka akomeza avuga nyuma gutandukana nabo bagie gukorera mujyi kigali akaguma i huye humble jizzo yahoraga amwiyambaza kugira aze gukiza safi nizzo two pac ahamya humble jizzo ariwe nk’umuhuza wabo bombi kuko yiyoroshya akavuga kuba urban boys igeze gihe itarashwana yabigizemo uruhare rukomeye akomeza avuga ariko nubwo basore bagirana amakimbirane abakozi cyane ahamya biyunze bashyira hamwe bagatanga imbaraga zose bafite n’amafaranga kugira bakore indirimbo zishimisha abanyarwanda aho niho bigaragarira bajyaga gukorana indirimbo n’abahanzi b’abanyamahanga uganda nigeria alexis muyoboke wabaye myaka avuga yiboneye neza safi nizzo bahoraga bashyamirana kindi bapfa uretse kwanga izima agira ni ibintu byabayeho ntabonye rimwe cyangwa kabiri barateruranaga bakaremana inguma nabonaga wagira amaraso y’abasore yabaryaga babyitaga ugukomagurana akomeza avuga hari umunsi urban boys yagombaga kujya kuririmba irushanwa ry’isiganwa ry’amamodoka safi aza yakererewe modoka bagenda safi nizzo batangira kurwana umwe akomereka jisho icyo gihe byabaye ngombwa umwe ajya rubyiniro yambaye igitambaro gitwikiriye uruhande rumwe n’amadarubindi arinda imirasire y’izuba biragoye kumenya impamvu nyamukuru ituma basore bashyamirana urban boys igitangira umuziki nizzo umuraperi safi ariwe uririmba inyikirizo akunganirwa bagenzi humble jizzo uririmba ukwe kwihariye cyongereza yabafashaga kwandika indirimbo zose bakoze iryo tsinda ritangiye gukomera nizzo yatangiye kuririmba bimwe bice by’inyikirizo kuburyo hari igihe yarwaniraga kuririmba igitero mbere cy’indirimbo atumva uburyo buri munsi gihabwa safi umwe tunganya indirimbo bakoranye n’iri tsinda igihe kinini avuga hashobora gushakirwa inkomoko y’amakimbirane hari abandi basanga amakimbirane adashobora gutandukanya urba boys ahubwo gutandukana gushobora guterwa bamwe bagize iryo tsinda bashobora kujya kuba mahanga kandi bihugu bitandukanye ibyo byemezwa eddie claude mudenge hakizimana wabanye nabo akaba n’inshuti magara safi madiba agira ndibuka batandukanaga safi ahita akora indirimbo yitwa ndambiwe agasuzuguro’ nizzo akora indi ndirimbo humble jizzo niwe utarakoze indirimbo gusa nyuma abantu barongeye barabunga banakomeza umuziki hamwe akomeza agira ku bwanjye mbona ikizatandukanya tsinda bamwe bazajya kuba hanze bitewe n’imiterere y’ingo zabo ariko nibaguma rwanda bazongera bakore nk’itsinda nizzo ntarashaka kugira ikintu kimwe atangaza mwuka mubi urban boys safi aviriye kwezi buki yabajijwe radio rwanda kiganiro samedi detante ahamya kizatandukanya iryo tsinda kuko kujya hanze atabiteganya agira ibikorwa by’itsinda ntabwo bishingiye bukwe bwange kandi si ubwa mbere umwe twe yategura ibirori ntabijyemo kandi ibikorwa by’itsinda byarakomezaga umva indimbo yabo yitwa mama

title: muri kbs banza uvunjishe cyangwa usigare
content: ku bishyura amafaranga ntoki itike kbs igura amafaranga buryo umugenzi udafite amafaranga avunje bamusaba gushaka avunje yayabura agasohoka modoka cyangwa se akemera bakamutwara batamugaruriye ibi birakaza abagenzi cyane buryo usanga baterana amagambo shoferi dore wakira amafaranga umugenzi w’umunyamahirwe asanze shoferi afite ibiceri aramugarurira yaba atabifite nyine akisubirira hanze murongo agategereza izindi taxi zitaza kumugora iyo ubajije shoferi akubwira atari amakosa kuko yabuze ibiceri ariko wareba ruhande rw’umugenzi ugasanga bibabaje kubona umuntu abura agenda atari yabuze amafaranga y’urugendo nubwo kibazo kitari ma taxi ikibazo kitoroheye abagenzi cyane cyane benshi bakunda gutega iza kbs kubera nini kandi zigatwara n’abantu benshi kugira ikibazo gikemuke kbs yagombye kujya ishaka ibiceri bihagije hakiri kare abagenzi nabo babishoboye bakazirikana bijya bibagora bakabika ibiceri baza gutegesha mugoroba ikindi gishobora kuba umuti w’iki kibazo service kbs ikoresha amakarita ariho iminsi runaka kugeza kwezi abayafite usanga biyinjirira nk’abajya iwabo basabwa ugukoza ikarita ahabigenewe ubundi bagahabwa uburenganzira kwinjira ntacyo bavuganye shoferi kbs masosiyete yigenga atwara abantu mujyi kigali yatangiye kugeza rwanda hari amasosiye yigenga atwara abantu arenga harimo azenguruka mujyi kigali n’akora ingendo hirya hino gihugu hanze yacyo marcelin gasana

title: sobanukirwa inkomoko y’insigamigani yateje ubwega
content: uyu mugani bawuca bumvise umuntu uvuga yamagirira cyane kugira rubanda imugoboke bavuga umva naka arateza ubwega wadukanwe rugaju mutimbo rutabo kinazi mayaga gitarama ahasaga umwaka rimwe yuhi gahindiro yaraje inkera gitaramo cy’imihigo haza kubamo impaka ndende bamwe bahiga ubugabo abandi bahiga amatungo ndetse bageza mbwa z’intozo gahindiro akabura imihigo batware ndetse mwe bahungu mwese undusha imbwa z’intozo ari umuhutu umutwa umututsi ati uwabona izihwanye n’izanjye namugororera maso yanyu arahaguruka marara munana ndi ingaju bwara umunyamutara uko muteraniye mbarusha imbwa z’intozo uwahwanya njye namuha inka cumi ziteruriwe imbyeyi rugaju mutimbo arakabuka ndi nkuba y’imiheto urabeshya marara ndetse ukabeshyana mwene wanyu gahindiro mwembi mbarusha imbwa z’ntozo uwabona izihwanye n’izanjye namuha ubushyo bw’inka z’imbyeyi abatware n’abahungu bakinje bicaye barababaza bati iyo mihigo yanyu se mubona mubona yakiranuka guryo marara atanguranwa ijambo dutume bahigi bimure imbwa zizateranire hano ibwami tuzambikire rimwe duhige igishanga n’ishyamba icyarimwe nicyo kizatumara impaka tukamenya ufite imbwa zirusha izindi ubutozo abatware n’abahungu bati ntihagire usubizayo twemeye irya marara gahindiro abaza rugaju marara imbwa zizaterane ryari abandi bati zizaterane gatatu rugaju marara batuma bahigi bimure imbwa zibasange i mulinja ntara y’amajyepfo ku munsi gatatu zibageraho bamenyesha gahindiro zaje na none araza inkera y’umuhigo abatware barababwira bati ngaho nimuhige twumve muhigiye gahindiro rugaju marara gahindiro imbwa zanjye nizirushwa nzatanga amashyo abiri y’inka z’imbyeyi n’abandi bemeza bemeza kuzahiga hagati rutabo jenda mu gitondo bambikira umuhigo bageze ishyamba rutabo babanza kurenza barebe imbwa zirenza kurusha izindi iza rugaju zirusha izindi mpamvu y’imbwa rukatanzogera izirimo intozo by’agahebuzo barakomeza bararenza bageze hagati rutabo jenda rukatanzogera ivumbura imondo irayirukana irayitota bigeze irayirara ihura n’intama z’umugabo rwagacaya w’umwega utuye i jenda kabugondo yicamo bw’umujijnya mondo yaraye yayobye uburari rwagacaya arahurura ayiyisanga hejuru ayitera icumu ayitsinda ariko ntiyari azi nyirayo rukatanzogera imaze kugwa abahigi barahashinze basanga yarinaze basubira inyuma kuyibikira rugaju abyumvise acika intege aricara amansonza amuzenga maso abwira gahindiro umuhigo urapfuye sinahiga rukatanzogera imaze gupfa bose barababara gahindiro atuma abajya gufata rwagacaya bamuhorere rukatanzogera baragenda baramufata baramuzana bamugejeje gahindiro abwira rugaju muhore rugaju aramubaza uri bwoko ki sha undi ndi umwega w’umuswere rugaju abwira gahindiro nta nahorera rukatanzogera umuswere natahe sinzabura ubundi bwega mpora ubwo yavugaga abega abashyondetse by’agasuzuguro umuhigo urapfuba barataha bageze rutabo abahigi rugaju baramubwira bati mbe harya ujya umenya ziriya z’umudugudu umuryango w’abega arazitegereza yiyumvira akanya ageze abwira ingabo ze niba iz’ubwega koko nimuvuze induru muhatere hakurya bulima babutege bavuza induru bakurikije imvugo rugaju ubwega bati rubanda hakurya murasangwe bwega ntibujye ntibujye ntibubacike uwo mudugudu barawusakiza ubwega bw’aho baraburimarima bamaze kuhateza itabi inkuru irakorerana igera nyirayuhi nyiratunga nyina gahindiro ivuga ak’abega karashize basigaye bahorerwa imbwa ahita ahamagaza rugaju gahindiro ababaza icyatumye bahorera imbwa abega dore umwegakazi rugaju aratanguranwa oya nyagasani bega twateje ahubwo twateje ubwega rutabo abahungu bumvise mvugo baratwarwa baraseka ndetse n’abatware bigumanyaga barerura baraseka nyirayuhi yumvise babihinduye ibitwenge arumirwa abura abituruka arekera bicira nuko imvugo guteza ubwega ivuka bumvise umuntu uvuga cyane nk’iyo amatungo yamwoneye cyangwa avuga ibindi yamagirira kugira rubanda bamugoboke bamutabare bakabigereranya n’induru yavugiye rutabo kinazi rugaju ateje abega baho abita ubwega kubashyondeka bati umva naka arateza ubwegaguteza ubwega gutabaza wamagirira yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: u rwanda mwanya gatatu bihugu byiza wakoreramo ubucuruzi afurika
content: iyi raporo yakozwe bihugu bikorerwamo ubucuruzi isi yasanze u rwanda ruri mwanya afurika rukaza mwanya rwego rw’isi rukaba rwigiye imbere ho imyanya itanu ugereranyije n’umwaka washize ibyo u rwanda rubikesha kuba rwaraguye ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi kwihangira imirimo rugerageza kugeza umuriro w’amashanyarazi ahatari hake amategeko agenga imisoro nayo yaravuguruwe ndetse runorohereza abashaka inguzanyo bihangire imirimo n’ubwo ariko u rwanda rwateye intambwe igaragara korohereza abashoramari gushora imari rwanda raporo itunga agatoki bimwe bidahagaze neza gihe rwanda cyane cyane bikorwa birimo kwemerera abantu kubaka guha abaturage uburenganzira butaka bwabo gushyiraho amategeko ahamye arengera abashoramari n’ibindi aha bakwiye kwikubita agashyi bityo bikabafasha gukomeza kwitwara neza ruhando rw’amahanga minisitiri w’ubucuruzi n’inganda francois kanimba yavuze asanga mwanya u rwanda ruriho udakwiye gutuma habaho kwirara avuga hakiri byinshi gukorwa birimo kugabanya umwanya ukoreshwa n’abashaka kwandikisha ubucuruzi kugirango abantu barusheho kwihuta bikorwa by’ubucuruzi n’ibindi madamu mimi ladipo umuyobozi banki y’isi rwanda yagize avuga raporo avuga habayeho gutera imbere buryo bugaragara yagize munsi u rwanda ruri mwanya rwego rw’isi bihugu umuntu yashoramo imari ntekereza tugomba gushima ikirenge rwateye kandi twizera ruzakomeza bityo n’ibindi bihugu bikareberaho anne-marie nwemwiza

title: patient bizimana yatumiwe gitaramo gikomeye buholandi
content: iki gitaramo cyiswe thanksgiving celebration live concert giteganyijwe kubera kerkplein buholandi - mata cyateguwe family fellowship ministries patient bizimana azagihuriramo n’umuramyi fortran bigirimana ukomoka burundi akaba afite ibingano binyura benshi bakunda umuziki uhimbaza imana bigirimana yakunzwe rwanda binyuze ndirimbo zirimo ntaco nzoba ni amahoro n’izindi amakuru agera igihe patient bizimana azahaguruka rwanda mpera werurwe yerekeza buholandi agiye gusubira gutaramira i burayi nyuma y’amezi asaga abiri ahavuye ubwo aherukayo mwaka ushize urugendo rwe yarusoje gitaramo yahuriyemo gentil misigaro cyabereye mujyi bruxelles bubiligi ukuboza uyu muramyi yabwiye igihe yiteguye neza kuzataramana n’abakunzi b’ibihangano bye mugabane w’u burayi yagize ni ubwa mbere nzaba ndirimbye gihugu ikindi kandi guhurirayo fortrand uzaba uvuye bufaransa nabyo bizatuma igitaramo kirushaho kuba cyiza bizimana patient yizeye igitaramo kizaba cyiza cyane amaze kumenyera ikirere cyaho n’uburyo abatuye bihugu bafite inyota kuramya imana uyu muhanzi usengera evangelical restoration church yakoreye ibitaramo bihugu byose afurika y’uburasirazuba yaririmbiye burayi n’ahandi henshi ni muhanzi rukumbi bakora umuziki uhimbaza imana rwanda umaze gukora ibitaramo bikomeye ndetse bikagaragaramo abahanzi bubatse izina ategura ibitaramo ngarukamwaka east celebration’ byitabirwa n’ibihumbi by’abakunda umuziki mu yatumiye solly mahlangu umunyempano ukomeye afurika y’epfo umunya-nigeria osinachi joseph sinach alka mbumba wiyita ’umusazi yesu’ n’abandi umuziki yawutangiye akiri muto agitangira kwiyumvamo impano yatangiye kwihatira kwiga gucuranga piano rusengero hanyuma bigeze asohora indirimbo bwite yitwa andyohera’ nabwo benshi batangiye kumubwira afite ijwi ryiza yakunzwe bihambaye ndirimbo iyo neza’ amagambo yanjye’ menye neza’ andyohera’ n’izindi reba indirimbo ijambo nyuma patient bizimana

title: diasipora rwanda belgique urubyiruko rwatangije ubukangurambaga gufasha abanyarwanda
content: mu gihe u rwanda ruri guhangana guhagarika gukwirakwira virusi corona icyorezo cyugarije isi buri wese asabwa kuguma rugo hirindwa ingendo zitari ngombwa bwizo mpamvu urubyiruko rutuye gihugu cy’u bubirigi diaspora rwanda belgique rwatangije ubukangurambaga rushishikariza urundi rubyiruko rwabanyarwanda ruri hirya hino kw’isi gufasha abanyarwanda bagizweho n’ingaruka z’icyorezo coronavirus nkuko byatangajwe mugabo pierre uhagarariye urubyiruko diaspora rwanda belgique avuga buri rubyiruko nyarwanda ruri hose kw’isi rukwiye kugira umutima w’impuhwe utabara abanyarwanda bahuye n’ingaruka z’icyorezo covi ubwo bukangurambaga buragira buti ’’ nk’ urubyiruko rutuye gihugu cyu bubirigi twifatanyije n’igihugu cyacu cy’ u rwanda mur’ikigihe kiri guhangana guhagarika ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo coronavirus cyugarije isi kubwizo mpamvu tuboneyeho guhamagarira urundi rubyiruko rw’abanyarwanda batuye hirya hino ku’isi kwitanga buri muntu yifite kugirango tugaragarize urukundo dufitiye u rwanda n’abanyarwanda nk’uko hozeho muco nyarwanda kandi burigikorwa cyose n’ingirakamaro gutanga wifite reba ubutumwa batambukije bw’urukundo urubyiruko rutangije bukanguramba nyuma y’uko ababyeyi nabo baramaze gutangira ibikorwa gukusanya inkunga kugoboka abanyarwanda kandi gikorwa kikaba kirimo genda neza nk’uko byemezwa n’umuyobozi diaspora rwanda belgique gilles bazambanza inkuru bifitanye isano diaspora covid abanyarwanda batuye bubiligi batangije gahunda kugobaka u rwanda mu butumwa umuyobozi diyasipora nyarwanda gihugu cy’ububirigi diaspora rwanda belgique gilles bazambanza yahaye abanyarwanda batuye gihugu cy’ububirigi yashimiye abavandimwe bamaze kwitanga anakangurira abandi kwihutisha gikorwa vuba kugirango nkunga ibashe kuba yagera kubo yagenewe gilles bazambanza yagize bavandimwe turabashimira ubwitange mo kugaragaza mugufasha abavandimwe rwanda bugarijwe n’ingaruka z’icyorezo covid turabamenyesha tumaze gukusanya inkunga eur turabasaba gukomeza guhuza ingufu gushishikariza inshuti n’abavandimwe kw’itanga minsi mike irimbere eur tuzayarenze nyuma yaho urubyiruko rutangirije ikigikorwa gutera ikirenge cy’ ababyeyi babyishimiye umubyeyi umaze imyaka irenga mirongo itatu gihugu cy’u bubiligi madame marie goretti mukunde bwiye umunyamakuru muhabura bishimiye uburyo urubyiruko rw’ifatanyije n’ababyeyi gikorwa gushaka inkunga kugoboka abanyarwanda bagizweho n’ingaruka y’icyorezo covid madame marie goretti mukunde yagize njye navuga hari umugani gifaransa ugira uti’’la pomme ne tombe jamail loin de l’arbre’’ nyuma kubona urugero rwiza rw’ababyeyi diaspora rwanda belgique urubyiruko ruhise rukomereza k’urugero rwiza byatunejeje ’’ madame mukunde akomeza agira ati byatunejeje urubyiruko n’ubuzima bw’igihugu ndetse n’ahazaza hacyo hari biganza byabo bityo bakaba bafite umukoro kurangwa n’ibikorwa n’imyifatire bitanga icyizere hazaza h’igihugu cyabo batanze urugero rwiza kugeza minisiteri y’ubuzima rwanda iratangaza umubare w’abagaragayeho coronavirus rwanda ugera barakize ruhumuriza richard muhaburarw

title: kayirebwa clarisse karasira bagiye guhurira rubyiniro gitaramo ikirenga bahanzi ’
content: igitaramo ikirenga bahanzi’ igitaramo gishingiye guteza imbere umuco biciye bahanzi hazashimirwa umuhanzi wamamaje umuco nyarwanda rwanda mahanga kizajya kiba buri mwaka kandi gihuze abahanzi b’injyana gakondo barimo abanyabigwi bihe byashize n’abo bihe igitaramo ikirenga bahanzi’ igitaramo gishingiye guteza imbere umuco biciye bahanzi hazashimirwa umuhanzi wamamaje umuco nyarwanda rwanda mahanga kizajya kiba buri mwaka kandi gihuze abahanzi b’injyana gakondo barimo abanyabigwi bihe byashize n’abo bihe igitaramo cy’uyu mwaka kizaba nshuro mbere kigali conference and exhibition village kcev hahoze hitwa camp kigali tariki werurwe ccile kayirebwa muhanzi watoranyijwe kubanziriza abandi bahanzi bakiriho ashimirwe uruhare rwe ndetse birori byashyizwe munsi w’abagore kugira munsi koko uzabe uwabo banishimira mugenzi wabo wabaye indongozi y’umuco’ iki gitaramo cyateguwe bwiza media ifatanyije agence karibu asbl umushanana media n’abacukumbuzi b’amateka n’umuco ccile kayirebwa azataramana n’abazacyitabira afatanyije n’abandi bahanzi barimo muyango yohani mariya yohani mani martin sentore jules karasira clarisse n’itorero ibihame by’imana mu kiganiro mecky kayiranga umuhuzabikorwa akaba n’umuvugizi w’iki gikorwa yavuze gitaramo kigamije guha ikuzo gushimira abahanzi bagize cyangwa bakomeje kugira uruhare kubungabunga umuco nyarwanda kuwamamaza gihugu mahanga ati uyu umwanya gushimira habanzi iyo bataboneka abenshi ntituba tuzi ibyaranze intwari zacu ntabwo tuba tuzi ibijyanye n’ubusizi twagiye turagwa n’abasokuruza babitwigisha bihangano mureke tubashimire bakiriho bakoze umurimo ukomeye ndakubwiza ukuri abahanzi batabayeho byagorana kumenya kumenyekanisha umuco wacu mecky kayiranga akomeza avuga gitaramo kizaba umwanya mwiza w’uko buri munyarwanda wese yaza agashimira bahanzi ndongozi z’umuco’ kuko bawubumbatiye avuga ubundi umuntu utarize ubuvanganzo cyangwa avukire rugo rukomeye muco byamugora kumenya ibijyanye n’ibisigo imbyino ibyivugo amahamba bivuze umuhanzi ishingiro ry’umuco kuko adufasha kubisakaza umuhanzi ubungabunga akanahererekanya umuco gicumbi cy’amajyambere arambye politiki by’ubukungu mibereho n’imibanire y’abantu bityo uguhesha agaciro indongozi twe zabigizemo uruhare rugaragara cyane cyane babashije kwigomeka iyaduka ry’indi mico iturutse hirya hino babasha gusigasira uwacu izo ndongozi dukesha zimwe ngeri z’umuco wacu twavuga nk’ibisigo imigani migufi n’imigani miremire ibitekerezo imbyino n’indirimbo rubanda ihuriyeho chansons populaires mecky kayiranga avuga kayirebwa yatoranyijwe hashigiye bigwi bye birimo kuba yaratangiye ubuhanzi bwe umwe bakobwa b’abanyarwanda bagiye rubyiniro mpuzamahanga bihugu bitandukanye baririmba ikinyarwanda njyana kinyarwanda yaririmbye bihugu byinshi cyane birimo uganda burundi ububiligi france suise america ubuhorande ubudage kenya ubwongereza n’ahandi kayirebwa ccile yakunze kuririmba akiri muto guhera mashuri abanza notre dame de citeaux i kigali agiriye kwiga karubanda atangira gushinga yise cercle de chants et de danse rwandaise atangira yasabaga buri mwana uvuka turere dutandukanye kumubwira indirimbo z’iwabo n’uko zibyinwa noneho akazihimbira injyana mu yafashwe amajwi radio rwanda indirimbo ze zitangira gukoreshwa biganiro binyuranye byanyuraga radio rwanda ndetse agira banyarwandakazi mwegere radiyo mwanya uwanyu iza guharirwa kuba ariyo ifungura radio saa tanu z’amanywa aho agiriye mahanga kubera amateka y’igihugu cyacu cyaciyemo yakomeje kuririmba kwigisha umuco abinyujije buhanzi mu bubiligi yatangije amatorero atandukanye ndetse anahabwa ibihembo bijyanye n’ubuhanzi bwamamaza umuco w’igihugu avukamo imwe ndirimbo yaje gutoranywa yitwa umunezero’ yafunguraga radiyo muhabura iya fpr-inkotanyi yakanguriraga abantu urugamba kubohoza igihugu avuga bijyanye n’uburyo umuhanzi azashimirwa mecky kayiranga yavuze ikintu mbere ukwereka umuhanzi nk’abanyarwanda turi kumwe tumushyigikiye yakoze byose yabikoze bacu n’igihugu cyacu kuki twazashimira cyangwa tukavuga umuntu atakiriho tumushimire akiriho bihe imbaraga n’abandi kuzamukira njyana ishingiye muco uriya umwanya umunyarwanda wese akwiye kuzaza azanye inka azanye ururabo kugirango ashimire umuhanzi akomeza avuga umuhanzi w’uyu mwaka azashimirwa n’abateguye igitaramo aribo agence karibu asbl bwiza media umushanana media n’abacukumbuzi b’amateka n’umuco azahabwa ishimwe ridashingiye mibare ahubwo rivuye mutima umuntu wese wumva hari uruhare abahanzi bagize muco w’u rwanda umwanya gushimira indongozi z’umuco nk’uko mecky kayiranga abivuga uyu mushinga gutegura bitaramo ugiye gutangira mwaka witezweho kugarura umuhanzi isangano hagati ry’ikusanya ibungabunga n’isakaza ry’umuco nyarwanda bizanafasha kugarura guha ireme indirimbo n’imbyino zigenda zibagirana nyamara zihetse umuco zibagirana bitewe kutagira urwego rubyihatira rwihariye ngo kuko gutakaza ikimenyetso kimwe cy’umuco w’abantu bisa nko gusibanganya amateka y’uwo muntu isi rusange gihugu by’umwihariko uyu mushinga kandi ugamije gutanga umuganda kurinda kubungabunga guhererekanya amahame shingiro y’umuco w’u rwanda soko y’imbaga ifite impagarike iki gitaramo mbere gushimira abahanzi title: ubwoba bwinshi ukuri kurajya hanze vuba uwariye ifaranga rayonsport azariryozwa rib inkuru hano
content: urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaharibrwatangaje rwatumije bamwe bahoze bayobora ikipe rayon sports bashinjwe munyakazi sadate uyiyobora ruswa kunyereza umutungo w’ikipe umuvugizi rib marie michelle umuhoza yabwiye igihe hari abayobozi rayon sports barimo abigeze kuyiyobora n’uyiyobora batumijweho iperereza ryatangiye nubwo yirinze kuvuga amazina y’abahamagajwe yagize yego hari abantu rayon sports bitabye ikirego twacyakiriye tariki gicurasi twatangiye iperereza hitabye abayobora rayon sports munsi n’abahoze bayiyobora abitabye ntabwo twabavuga kuko turi iperereza kandi rikorwa ibanga amakuru avuga ikirego cyatanzwe munyakazi sadate uyoboye rayon sports ariko akaba mazi abira kuko yaba akanama ngishwanama n’abafana bamusaba kwegura ibibazo rayon sports fc byageze rwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha rib nyuma y’aho umuyobozi w’iyi kipe munyakazi sadate yandikiye perezida repubulika y’u rwanda nyakubahwa paul kagameamusaba ubufasha gukemura ibibazo kipe ifite yavuze byatewe n’abayobozi bayoboye kipe muri baruwa ndende yandikiye perezida kagamemunyakazi sadate yashinje abahoze abayobozi rayon sports gusesagura umutungo w’ikipe bikayishyira bibazo by’ubukene hanyuma bakamwibasira kuko ashaka gushyira hanze byaha bakoze perezida munyakazi sadate yabwiye perezida kagame izingiro ry’ikibazo ryamenyekanye nyuma y’amakimbirane komite nyinshi zari ziyoboye ikipe hanyuma umuryango fpr inkotanyi minisiteri siporo bakabagira inama kwicara bagashyiraho komite inyuze mucyo yatoye bwana muvunyi paul bwana munyakazi sadate yavuze nyuma gusimbura muvunyi buyobozi rayon sports yasanze abayobozi bahoze bayoboye rayon sports baranyereje amafaranga asaga miliyari yaturutse bibugamu kugurisha abakinnyi bafana munyakazi yavuze habaye kunyereza imisoro kugeza ikipe yishyuzwa n’ikigo cy’imisoro n’amahoro ingana miliyoni frwmunyakazi yashinje abahoze abayobozi rayon sports gusesagura umutungo bawushora guha ruswa abasifuzi biravugwa rib yahamagaje munyakazi sadate perezida rayon sports gacinya chance denis wahoze ayiyobora rwego gukora iperereza iyi baruwa munyakazi yandikiye perezida kagameyamenyesheje rib nayo mpamvu yatangiye iperereza ryimbitse bivugwa ryahereye gacinya chance denis

title: abanyarwanda batuye canada bibutse abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: igikorwa kwibuka kitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo canada n’izindi nshuti uyu muhango watangijwe n’urugendo walk to remember rwatangiriye nteko ishingamategeko canada rugera biro by’umujyi ottawa ahabereye imihango kwibuka nyuma y’indirimbo zubahiriza ibihugu byombi hakurikiyeho umunota kwibuka inzirikarengane zishwe jenoside padiri callixte kabalisa wayoboye isengesho yasabiye abahuye n’ibibazo binyuranye harimo abafashwe ngufu asaba imana gukomeza impfubyi n’abapfakazi n’abandi bagize ibibazo bikomeye uhagarariye u rwanda canada edda mukabagwiza perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’abacitse kw’icumu rizwi kw’izina humura alain ntwali bagaragaje bibuka amateka jenoside yabaye rwanda bagamije gufata ingamba ibyabaye ntibizongere kuba ukundi nk’uko itangazo ambasade y’u rwanda canada ribivuga berekanye umuhango ukorwa ugamije kwibuka ariko abantu bakanatekereza uburyo gufasha abacitse icumu bagarutse nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka twigire mateka twubaka ejo hazaza bavuga genoside yakorewe abatutsi mateka y’ubu n’ejo hazaza itazibagirana mu muhango kwibuka kandi hatanzwe ibiganiro bibiri l’historique de l’impunit des crimes haineux au rwanda et les signes avant-coureurs du gnocide contre les tutsis cyatanzwe bwana richard nsanzabaganwa les mots qui tuent cyatanzwe prof philippe basabose nsanzabaganwa yerekanye ubwicanyi bwagiye buba ariko ubutegetsi ntibuhane abakoze ibyaha kwica aha yavuze uduce tunyuranye ubwoko bw’abatutsi bwagiye bwicwa yerekanye kwica byagiye bishyigikirwa n’ubutegetsi kurengera abatutsi babaga bibasiwe prof basabose yerekanye amagambo yagiye akoreshwa rwanda yagize uruhare ishyirwa bikorwa ry’ubwicanyi yakoze isesengura ry’ijambo ryavuzwe leon mugesera i kabaya yakanguriye abanyamuryango mrnd abereka umwanzi wabo umututsi n’abahutu mashyaka ataravugaga rumwe mrnd gahunda ziteganijwe zijyanye kwibuka zizagera kwezi gatanu zirimo amasengesho ikiriyo n’ibiganiro bizatangwa taliki mata abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo bongeye guhura gitambo misa kwibuka cyabereye paruwasi mutagatifu yozefu gatineau quebec

title: inzoga ikoze myumbati yashyizwe isoko
content: inkuru dukesha bbc ivuga ubusanzwe hari abantu basanzwe bakora ibinyobwa bitandukanye bikoze myumati cyangwa bindi binyabijumba ariko ikibazo kikaba aruko binyobwa bishobora kugira ingaruka zirimo n’urupfu abahagarariye sabmiller batangaza inzoga bakoze kibazo izatera buzima muntu iyo nzoga yakorewe gihugu mozambique uru ruganda ruvuga buri mwaka bizajya bisaba toni ibihumbi mirongo ine z’imyumbati gukora nzoga ibi byatumye bamwe bahinzi bavuga bizatuma inzara yiyongera afurika kuko imyumbati kimwe bihingwa bifitiye akamaro kanini abanyafurika bijyanye n’imirire uruganda sabmiller rukomoka bwongereza rwakoze umushinga guha akazi abahinzi barenga bahinga imirima myinshi y’imyumbati norbert niyizurugero

title: perezida kagame yabajijwe igihe azavira butegetsi
content: perezida w’ u rwanda paul kagame yabajijwe igihe azavira butegetsi kuko hashize imyaka abaturage bakaba bakimushaka avuga atigeze arwanira kuba perezida ahubwo yarwaniye kubona igihugu atari afite perezida w’ u rwanda paul kagame yabajijwe igihe azavira butegetsi kuko hashize imyaka abaturage bakaba bakimushaka avuga atigeze arwanira kuba perezida ahubwo yarwaniye kubona igihugu atari afite magingo itegeko nshinga riha perezida kagame uburenganzira kwiyamamariza kuyobora u rwanda kugeza mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ abanyamakuru nyakanga gihe hasigaye imyaka itanu manda irangire umunyamakuru yamubajije igihe azavira butegetsi cyane hashize imyaka abaturage bakaba bakomeje kugaragaza bamushaka umukuru w’ igihugu yavuze hari abaperezida bavuga abaturage barabashaka atari by’ ukuri abaturage babashaka ahubwo bashaka kuguma butegetsi nyungu zabo gusa siko rwanda bimeze yavuze ubushize atashaka kwiyamamaza ndetse yabwiye ishyaka rye fpr inkotanyi ubutaha bazashake ngo ishyaka rye ryashakaga yongera kwiyamamaza ariwe atabishaka perezida kagame yakomeje avuga yabaye perezida atarigeze abirwanira yagize mu mirwano nashoboraga kubura ubuzima nk’ abandi benshi babuze ubuzima bwabo nta nubwo narwaga nzabe perezida ni ikimenyimenyi biba ukurwana nzabe perezida ntabwo nari kujya rugamba yakomeje agira narwaniraga kubona igihugu ntari mfite nafatanyaga n’ abandi duharanira impinduka zari zikenewe gihugu cyacu perezida kagame yavuze hari abantu benshi bashaka kumusimbura ntebe ababwira ushaka kuba perezida agomba kwitegura akazabiharanira ati niba ushaka kuba perezida itegure ubutaha izabe witeguye kwiyamamaza ariko ugomba kubiharanira paul kagame afite imyaka y’ amavuko perezida w’ u rwanda mwaka yatowe mbere mangingo ayoboye manda gatatu muri bisabwe n’ abaturage barenga miliyoni itegeko nshinga rw’ u rwanda rwaravuguruwe kugira perezida kagame yongere kwiyamamaza ingingo y’ itegeko nshinga ry’ u rwanda ryavuguruwe ivuga perezida repubulika atorerwa manda y’ imyaka itanu ashobora kongera gutorerwa indi manda perezida kagame yavuze ubushize atashakaga kwiyamamaza

title: bamwe bakorera uburaya i nyamirambo ntibacyemera imibonano mpuzabistina idakingiye
content: kigalitoday yegereye itsinda bamwe bakorera uburaya i nyamirambo bayibwira bamenye ububi sida bakurikije babona sida imerera nabi bamwe bagenzi itsinda ry’indaya z’i nyamirambo ryemeye kuganira kigalitoday rivuga ntawabona cyangwa abe yumva ububi sida abure gufata ingamba kwirinda sida ntitucyemera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina gakingirizo n’abakiriya bacu kuko twamenye ingaruka mbi z’imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiyeabagabo badakoresha agakingirizo bafite virusi itera sidaiyo yanze dukoresha agakingirizo acaho njye nkacaho nubwo ariko bamwe bakora uburaya i nyamirambo bavuga batacyemerera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina abakiriya banga gukoresha agakingirizo hari abakora uburaya bageraho bakemera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina gakingirizo kubera ubukene kubura abakiriya itsinda ry’indaya z’i nyamirambo riti hari bagenzi bacu bageraho bakemera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina gakingirizo kubera ategereza umwanya munini umukiriya wemera agakingirizo akamubura kandi yenda abana baburaye ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’ubuvuzirwanda bio-medical center bugashyirwa ahagaragara mwaka buragaragaza bakora uburaya umuntu umwe babiri yanduye virusi itera sida umukozi rbc dr mwumvaneza mutagoma uyoboye itsinda ry’ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje imibare y’ubwandu virusi itera sida rwanda dr mwumvaneza avuga imibare yavuye bushakashatsi bakoze igaragaza gihugu hose rwanda abakora uburaya abagera banduye virusi itera sida mujyi kigali ijanisha rikaba riri hejuru ugereranije gihugu rusange kuko ho abagera banduye virusi itera sida inzobere ndwara sida zivuga indaya itsinda ry’abantu rifite ibyago byinshi kwandura virusi itera sida kurusha andi matsinda ibi biterwa indaya abantu bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina inshuro nyinshi kandi n’abantu batandukanye barimo abanduye vihsida u rwanda ubushakashatsi bugaragaza rutuwe n’abaturage barenga gato miliyoni muri rusange gihugu hose abantu babana virusi itera sida by’abanyarwanda ni ukuvuga rwanda abantu bagera bihumbi babana virusi itera sida jean baptiste micomyiza

title: minani washakishwaga kubera ibyaha jenoside yafatiwe i kigali yarihinduye umunyatanzaniya
content: polisi y’u rwanda yataye yombi umugabo w’imyaka y’amavuko wiyitaga umutanzaniya akaba asanzwe ashakishwa n’ubutabera rwanda kubera uruhare yagize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi hussein minani warabonye ubwenegihugu tanzaniya izina hussein abdi kitumba mujandi yafatiwe i remera karere gasabo itariki gicurasi mwaka akaba yareretswe itangazamakuru kabiri tariki gicurasi sitasiyo polisi kicukiro afungiye kugeza umuvugizi polisi y’u rwanda assistant commissioner of police acp celestin twahirwa yavuze minani yashakishwaga ruhare yagize jenoside ibyaha byibasiye inyoko muntu ubwicanyi gusambanya abagore gahato yakoreye cyahoze perefegitura butare komini ngoma karere huye minani watwaraga amakamyo hagati tanzaniya n’u rwanda mazina y’amahimbano akurikiranyweho mwaka w’ yatwaraga interahamwe bikorwa bibi zakoreye butare kandi akaba yaragize uruhare rukomeye kwica abanyeshuri n’abakozi b’abatutsi b’icyahoze kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda i butare afatanyije n’interahamwe kandi minani akurikiranyweho uruhare yagize rupfu rw’uwari umutoza mukura victory sport witwaga sitaki charles hamwe n’inshuti bivugwa yitwaga kamina babishe babasanze kamina bihishe acp twahirwa agira atinyuma kumenya amakuru ruhare minani jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ndetse n’amarorerwa amwe yakoze giti cye ishami ry’ubugenzacyaha polisi ryegeranyije ibyangombwa byose bigize dosiye bukaba bwarayishyikirije ubushinjacyaha yongeyeho atiishami ry’ubushinjacyaha rikurikirana abakoze jenoside bihishe ryari ryaramushyiriyeho impapuro zimufata ariko polisi mpuzamahanga interpol ikaba yarashyizeho urupapuro kumufata kuya ugushyingo umwaka ushize nyuma kwegeranya amakuru y’aho yaba aherereye n’uwo kugira afatwe minani yemera yahoze umushoferi nyiramasuhuko pauline ministri w’iterambere ry’umuryango wakatiwe n’urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rwashyiriweho u rwanda ictr ariko agahakana uruhare yagize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi minani kandi yakunze kuza rwanda azanye imodoka nshya yabaga avanye cyambu dar-es-salaam buryo n’igihe yafatwaga atwaye imodoka nshya kompanyi izicuruza hano rwanda yitwa rwanda motor ltd

title: rayon vs apr umukino w’imbonekarimwe cyumweru
content: aya makipe adashobora gupfa gukina umukino gicuti hagati yayo akaba azaba ahatanira amanota atatu mukino shampiyona izaba igeze munsi gatanu apr iyoboye urutonde rw’agateganyo ikaba irusha rayon sport mwanya gatatu amanota atatu uretse ngabo albert ruhande apr fc utazakina mukino kubera amakarita abiri y’umuhondo afite bokota labama ruhande rayon sport utarizerwa ijana ijana azaba yabonye ibyangombwa bimwemerera gukina abandi bakinnyi mpande zose bameze neza kandi buri ruhande rwizeye intsinzi jean marie ntagwabira utoza rayon sport nyuma y’imyitozo ikipe yakoze gatanu yavuze abakinnyi biteguye kandi mvune ikanganye afite akaba abona agendeye bakinnyi asanganywe hakiyongeraho bokota labama ushobora kuzakina mukino yizeye gutsinda nyuma gutsindwa la jeunesse abakinnyi bahise babyivana mutwe bategura neza umukino apr kandi abatarakinnye ubushize bazaba bahari kandi n’umwuka mwiza kuko n’ubuyobozi buturi inyuma rayon sport izaba ikinisha mbere shampiyona abakinnyi babiri b’abarundi mbanza hussein ndayisaba tambwe floribert gihe mukino uheruka yatsinzwe apr yorohewe kubona amanota atatu imbere as kigali yayitsindaga ibitego busa apr irimo gushakisha igikombe shampiyona nayo ifite ibikombe byinshi izaba igendera cyane kapiteni wayo ukubutse i burayi olivier karekezi wanadutangarije n’ubwo abona rayon sport ikomeye ariko intsinzi ayizeye nyuma y’imyaka adahura n’iyi kipebiragaragara rayon sport mwaka ihagaze neza ariko kuba naragarutse apr mbona nzafasha cyane gushaka intsinzi ikindi kandi akenshi makipe ahuye ntakunda kunganya haba hagomba kuboneka ikipe itahana amanota atatu ariko ngendeye bushake dufite nk’abakinnyi apr tugomba gutsinda mu gihe rayon sport yatsinda mukino izaba ikomeje gusatira mukeba wayo apr guhatanira igikombe shampiyona ariko apr iramutse itsinze mukino yaba isize rayon sport amanota atandatu atakorohera ikipe rayon sport kuzayakuramo uyu mukino ukaba uhuriranye n’undi w’amakipe ahora ahanganye bwongereza manchester united manchester city byanatumye uwa rayon sport apr wagombaga kuzatangira saa cyenda wimurirwa saa kumi n’igice kugirango abakunda makipe bwongereza banakunda rayon apr batazacikanwa uyu mukino manchester city uzanerekwanwa stade amahoro mbere y’uko uwa rayon apr utangira theoneste nisingizwe

title: abafite amazu i nyagatare barasabwa kwishyura umusoro nyungu y’ubukode vuba
content: abaturage bemera gusora ariko ntibavuga rumwe n’ubuyobozi buryo bikorwamo n’amafaranga bishyurwa kuko hari ubuyobozi bufata nk’igice cy’umujyi abaturage bakahafata nk’icyaro bitewe n’imirimo ihakorerwa urugero nko gasozi bita ruramira ubuyobozi bw’akagali nyagatare bwatumikiraga abaturage bahatuye bibaza bagomba gusora kimwe n’abafite amazu mujyi nyagatare kayumba eugene umugenzuzi w’imisoro karere nyagatare yasubije avuga yemeranywa n’abaturage ruramira isa n’icyaro ariko atarenga mabwiriza kuko akagali nyagatare kose gafatwa nk’umujyi abaturage basabye ubuyobozi kureba bajya bakora badahutaje uburenganzira bamwe baturage urugero uburyo igihe kwishyuza imisoro kigeze usanga abashinzwe iby’imisoro bitura bacuruzi batabateguje bagafunga amazu bakoreramo kandi barubahirije basabwa byose umwe basoreshwa karere nyagatare yagize ko tuba twishyuye imisoro dusabwa harimo n’ipatanti mwajya kwaka imisoro nyungu kuyibaza nyir’amazu mukaba twe muza mugafungira kureba nyir’amazu ibicuruzwa byacu bikangirika mwumva karengane karimo uretse umusoro nyungu y’ubukode indi misoro abaturage basabwa gutanga vuba bishoboka imisoro y’ipatanti y’ibabanza n’amapatanti y’ubucuruzi ku bishyura umusoro w’ipatanti basabwe kutarenza ukwezi werurwe niyonzima oswald

title: rubavu abaturage bashatse gukubita gitifu w’ umurenge abashinzwe umutekano baramutabara
content: mu murenge rugerero karere rubavu habereye imvururu umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge rugerero nkurunziza faustin n’ aba-dasso gikorwa gusenya inzu yubatswe byangombwa mu murenge rugerero karere rubavu habereye imvururu umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge rugerero nkurunziza faustin n’ aba-dasso gikorwa gusenya inzu yubatswe byangombwa byabereye kagari rwaza umudugudu mushoko ahagana saa cyenda n’igice z’igicamunsi kabili tariki werurwe nkurunziza faustin yatangarije ukwezi abaturage bashatse kumukubita nk’ ngo bisa n’aho bakoze babiteguye kuko basanzwe babizi kubaka byagombwa ikosa ubuyobozi bw’ umurenge rugerero bwari busanzwe bufite amakuru nzu bagiye gusenya yubatswe ihagarikiwe n’umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ akagari rubona murenge nyamyumba ati abaturage babonye igikorwa tukigeze hagati baramuhamagara araza aduteza abaturage baradusagarira twitabaza polisi karere iraza irabadukiza nkurunziza avuga barasabye abaturage kwikuriraho nzu ntibabikora bituma nk’abayobozi bafata icyemezo kujya kuyikuraho abaturage igihe barahawe cyari cyararenze kandi nzu yubakwaga igishushanyo mbonera cyahageneye ubwoko bw’inzu bugomba kuhubakwa kuko mujyi gisenyi nshimiyimana thacien umunyamabanga nshingwakobwa w’ akagari murenge nyamyumba mukanoheri donatha basa n’aho aribo bayoboye igitero gukubita gitifu nkurunziza n’abakozi dasso batawe yombi bafungiye rib sitasiyo gisenyi nkurunziza asaba abaturage kujya bakurikiza amategeko n’amabwiriza kubaka mujyi ariyo gusaba ibyangombwa kubaka avuga nabo gusenyera umuturage wubatse ntabyangombwa batabikora bishimye kuko babona muturage haribyo yaratakarije nzu gusa bagomba kuyisenya kugira n’abandi baturage bibabere isomo kandi n’igishushanyo mbonera cyubahirizwe mu byabaye igisa n’igiteye urujijo umunyabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ akagari byabereyemo atigeze agera gikorwa cyabereye akaba atigeze anitaba telefone y’ umuyobozi polisi karere nkurunziza yamuhamagara ntiyitabe

title: rtd brig gen yemerewe kwiyamamariza umwanya kuyobora ferwafa
content: akanama gashinzwe amatora y’umuyobozi ferwafa ateganyijwe mpera z’uku kwezi kemeje kandidatire rtd brig gen sekamana jean damascene wiyongereye bifuza kuyobora shyirahamwe kandidatire rtd brig gen sekamana jean damascene yemejwe mugoroba gatanu nyuma y’uko yashyikirije komisiyo kandidatire tariki gashyantare nk’uko bigaragara rubuga twitter ferwafa aka kanama gashinzwe amatora gahagarariwe kalisa adolphe camarade kanemeje kandidatire rurangirwa louis wifuza kuzahatanira mwanya brig gen sekamana si musirikari wenyine waba uyoboye ferwafa aramutse atowe kuko lt gen caezar kayizari yayiyoboye hagati - maj gen kazura jean bosco ayiyobora hagati - abajijwe impiduka azazana ferwafa yavuze azategereza akazabitangariza mwanya wagenewe kwiyamamaza dore ingengabihe y’amatora ferwafa iteye tariki gashyantare gutanga kandidatire kw’abifuza kwiyamamaza tariki gashyantare kwiga ubusabe bw’abatanze kandidatire tariki werurwe gutangaza abemerewe kwiyamamaza tariki werurwe gutangira kwiyamamaza kw’abakandida tariki werurwe amatora yanditswe niyomugabo albert

title: abakozi batsinda leta yabishyuye miliyoni itsindira ebyiri
content: raporo komisiyo ishinzwe abakozi leta igaragaza igihombo leta itezwa n’abayobozi bafata ibyemezo bidakurikije amategeko bigatuma abakozi bagana inkiko muri raporo - manza yatsinzemo ebyiri yishyura amafaranga arenga miliyoni magana atanu ihabwa ebyiri usibye mafaranga kandi hari n’izindi ngaruka zatejwe n’ayo makimbirane nk’ikiguzi cy’umwanya n’amafaranga yakoreshejwe gukurikirana bibazo haba ruhande rw’inzego abakozi bakoreraga ndetse ruhande komisiyo hakiyongeraho ibangamirwa serivisi zindi bakozi bagombaga gutanga ikindi ukuba abakozi batera icyizere ubuyobozi bw’inzego bakorera bikagira igaruka musaruro w’ibikorwa bakora ndetse serivisi bagenera abagenerwabikorwa b’izo nzego mu isesengura ry’iyi komisiyo zimwe mpamvu zatumye inzego leta ziregwa zikanatsindwa harimo kwirukana abakozi buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko gusesa amasezerano y’akazi buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko kudahembera umwanya w’ubusigire guhagarika umushahara w’umukozi cyemezo cy’umuyobozi ubifitiye ububasha gishingiweho kudaha abakozi bemererwa n’amategeko gihe gufatira abakozi ibyemezo bitubahirije amategeko cyangwa ibyemezo bishingiye mategeko atabagenga kudatanga icyemezo cy’imirimo yakozwe mu mwaka - leta yashowe manza abakozi baregaga ibigo leta ibi byatumye leta yishyura amafaranga arenga miliyoni magana atanu frw nyamara yatsindiye miliyoni ebyiri n’ibihumbi magana inani frw gusa aya mafaranga ahanini agizwe n’ayo abakozi bafitiye uburenganzira kabone n’iyo batari kujya nkiko arenga miliyoni magana ane mirongo itandatu frw kongeraho indishyi zisaga miliyoni mirongo itanu frw iri sesengura komisiyo y’abakozi leta ryagaragaje ibigo leta bifite umubare munini w’inzego zaburanye mwaka w’igenzura ibigera byaburanye n’abakozi manza bibiri gusa byatsinze imanza ebyiri bitsindira frw bicibwa angana frw ayo mafaranga arimo abakozi bafitiye uburenganzira imishahara indamunite angana frw ndetse n’indishyi zingana frw harimo kandi abakozi batanu babanje kujuririra komisiyo isanga ubujurire bwabo bufite ishingiro ariko imyanzuro yatanzwe bujurire ntiyashyirwa bikorwa kugeza baregeye inkiko ibi nabyo byatwaye leta miliyoni makumyabiri n’enye frw harimo indishyi title: abaturage bakwiye kurushaho kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo bihe by’imvura
content: mu bihe by’imvura aribyo tunarimo rwanda usanga aribwo hamera ibigunda nkike z’ingo nyinshi cyane biturage nk’uko mukambungo esperance umujyanama w’ubuzima mudugudu rubugurizoumurenge shyogwe karere muhanga abivuga yongeraho bihuru bishobora kuba indiri y’imibu ishobora kurya abantu ikabanduza malariya niyo mpamvu asanga abaturage bakwiye kugira ingamba nshashya kwirinda indwara zabo bihe by’imvura iyo imvura igwa usanga imyanda izanwa n’imvura yakwiriye hamwe hamwe ni nayo mpamvu asanga isuku ikwiriye kurushaho kwitabwaho cyane gihe cy’imvura kuko usanga gihe haboneka indwara nyinshi abantu batirinze zimwe ndwara nk’uko abivuga harimo choleraumusongainzoka ndetse malaria kubera ndwara zangiza umubiri w’uzanduye buryo hari n’ubwo zamwica ziramutse zitavuwemukambungo esperance nk’umujyanama w’ubuzima aboneraho gukangurira abaturage kwita gutema ibihuru bishobora kwihishamo imibu itera maralia uyu mujyanama w’ubuzima akomeza avuga kwirinda ibinogo birekamo amazi nabyo ngombwa kuko indiri y’inzoka zinjirira birenge igihe umuntu ayakandagiramo iyo umuntu abyirinze hakiri kare ndiri z’inzoka ntizibasha kuboneka rugo rwe ikindi ugutema ibihuru bizengurutse ingo byakwihishamo imibu kandi bikajyana kurara nzitiramibu ziteye umuti gihe nk’iki cy’imvura ibi bishobora kugabanya malariya kunywa amazi atetse cyangwa arimo umuti wica mikorobe sur’eau nabyo n’ingenzi kuko usanga gihe cy’imvura cyane cyane amasoko arushaho kuzana amazi yanduyebityo rwego kwirinda inzoka akaba yatekwa cyangwa agashyirwamo sur’eau mbere kunyobwa ababyeyi bakwiye gushishikarira gufubika abana bihe by’imvura kugira babarinde indwara ziterwa n’imbeho nk’umusonga n’izindi kwambara inkweto bihe buri wese nabyo byaba byiza cyane kuko birinda uzambaye inzoka zinjirira birenge n’izindi mikorobe zishobora gukurura indwara zitandukanye nk’uko umujyanama w’ubuzima mukambungo yabigarutseho kuri ningombwa abaturage babungabunga biruseho ubuzima bwabo gihe cy’imvura kandi n’abandi bajyanama b’ubuzima barusheho kubikangurira abaturage b’imidugudu bashizwe safari viateur

title: ikipe y’u rwanda yasezerewe beach volleyball
content: muri mikino ikinwa n’abakinnyi babiri babiri buri gihugu gihagararirwa n’amakipe abiri buri kipe ikina imikino ibiri ibiri u rwanda rwari ruhagarariwe emilienne uwineza hakizimana judith bagize ikipe mbere hamwe mutatsimpundu denise nzayisenga charlotte mu mikino ine yahuje amakipe y’u rwanda n’aya afurika y’epfo u rwanda rwasabwaga gutsinda nibura imikino itatu ine kugira rwizere gukomeza cyiciro gikurikiyeho ariko ntibyakunze kuko afurika y’epfo kugeza mwanya kabiri afurika yatsinze imikino itatu ine bakinnye n’u rwanda emilienne uwineza umukinnyi w’ikipe mbere y’u rwanda yavuze gutsindwa byatewe n’uko afurika y’epfo ibarusha inararibonye yagize afurika y’epfo yaturushije kubera bamenyereye cyane amarushanwa buryo usanga bazi amayeri menshi gusa n’ubwo badutsinze natwe twageragaje kugaragaza ubuhanga bwacu kandi nk’uko byagaragaraga badutsindaga ariko dufite amanota menshi ibyo buvuze hari urwego rwiza natwe tugezeho gutsindwa afurika y’epfo bivuze u rwanda ruvuye ruhando guhatanira itike kuzakina imikino olympique ndetse n’igikombe cy’isi ariko christian hatuminana ushinzwe tekinike ishyirahamwe ry’umukino volleyball rwanda yadutangarije u rwanda rugifite amahirwe kwegukana umwanya mwiza rushanwa hatumimana avuga afurika y’epfo n’ibirwa maurice ariyo makipe ahabwa amahirwe kwegukana umwanya mbere kuko amateka y’ayo makipe yombi ndetse n’uko bakinnye kane bigaragaza isonga iyi volleyball ikinirwa mucanga yitabiriwe n’amakipe u rwanda kenya rdc afurika y’epfo ibirwa maurice mozambique algeria hagendewe buhanga buri kipe iheruka kwitwara n’amanota yakuye mikino iheruka nama tekinike yabaye mbere y’iyi mikino hemejwe amakipe akomeye akina n’adakomeye nk’uko bisazwe bigenda marushanwa ibyo byatumye u rwanda rukina afurika y’epfo repubulika iharanira demukarasi congo ikina n’ibirwa maurice algeria ihura mozambique kenya yahise ikomeza cyiciro gikurikiyeho kuko maroc bagombaga gukina ititabiriye marushanwa ikipe y’ibirwa maurice mwanya mbere afurika kuko ariyo iheruka kwegukana umwanya mbere mikino nyafurika yebereye i mputo mozambique umwaka ushize ikaba ikurikirwa afurika y’epfo yabaye iya kabiri gihe iyi mikino irakomeza gatanu tariki hakinwa imikino cy’irangiza afurika y’epfo ikina n’ibirwa maurice byasezereye rdc mozambique yasezereye algeria irakina kenya gihe u rwanda ruzahatanira umwanya gatanu rukina algeria iyi mikino izasozwa gatandatu ikipe izaba yabaye iya mbere izahita ibona itike kuzakina imikino olympique izabera bwongereza nyakanga mwaka iya kabiri n’iya gatatu zikabona itike kuzakina igikombe cy’isi kizabera butaliyani umwaka utaha theoneste nisingizwe

title: film ubuzima ni gatebe gato ifite inyigisho zubaka umuryango nyarwanda
content: tina avuga yizeye filme abakunzi sinema nyarwanda bazayikunda kubera irimo inyigisho nyinshi z’ubuzima buri munsi nk’ihohoterwa ry’abana kubera ubupfubyi cyangwa kubera ubukene ndetse kwirinda ibishuko sugar daddy tina avuga igitekerezo gukora film yakigize amaze kubona ubuzima buri hanze bumeze nk’uko tina abyivugira filme yakozwe buryo bugoranye kuko nkunga afite avuga yafashijwe n’incuti ze zagiye zimuba cyane iyo filme yakozwe studio isanzwe ikora amasinema yitwa naom graphics muri film hazagaragaramo ibyamamare bijyanye n’imyidagaduro hano rwanda ilibagiza babla uzwi cyane mashusho y’indirimbo z’abahanzi batandukanye hano rwanda abahanzi vd frank knowless urban boys riderman n’abandi benshi hazagaragaramo kandi umukobwa witwa allen mutamba wagaragaye gikorwa gutora miss nur tina yatangarije rwandastarcom yizera abanyarwanda bamaze gucika muco gupirata kuko bidateza imbere abahanzi rusange kandi anashimira abitanze ndetse n’abamubaye gihe cyikorwa ry’iyo filme nsanzabera jean paul

title: abanyarwanda batuye canada bibutse abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: igikorwa kwibuka kitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo canada n’izindi nshuti uyu muhango watangijwe n’urugendo walk to remember rwatangiriye nteko ishingamategeko canada rugera biro by’umujyi ottawa ahabereye imihango kwibuka nyuma y’indirimbo zubahiriza ibihugu byombi hakurikiyeho umunota kwibuka inzirikarengane zishwe jenoside padiri callixte kabalisa wayoboye isengesho yasabiye abahuye n’ibibazo binyuranye harimo abafashwe ngufu asaba imana gukomeza impfubyi n’abapfakazi n’abandi bagize ibibazo bikomeye uhagarariye u rwanda canada edda mukabagwiza perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’abacitse kw’icumu rizwi kw’izina humura alain ntwali bagaragaje bibuka amateka jenoside yabaye rwanda bagamije gufata ingamba ibyabaye ntibizongere kuba ukundi nk’uko itangazo ambasade y’u rwanda canada ribivuga berekanye umuhango ukorwa ugamije kwibuka ariko abantu bakanatekereza uburyo gufasha abacitse icumu bagarutse nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka twigire mateka twubaka ejo hazaza bavuga genoside yakorewe abatutsi mateka y’ubu n’ejo hazaza itazibagirana mu muhango kwibuka kandi hatanzwe ibiganiro bibiri l’historique de l’impunit des crimes haineux au rwanda et les signes avant-coureurs du gnocide contre les tutsis cyatanzwe bwana richard nsanzabaganwa les mots qui tuent cyatanzwe prof philippe basabose nsanzabaganwa yerekanye ubwicanyi bwagiye buba ariko ubutegetsi ntibuhane abakoze ibyaha kwica aha yavuze uduce tunyuranye ubwoko bw’abatutsi bwagiye bwicwa yerekanye kwica byagiye bishyigikirwa n’ubutegetsi kurengera abatutsi babaga bibasiwe prof basabose yerekanye amagambo yagiye akoreshwa rwanda yagize uruhare ishyirwa bikorwa ry’ubwicanyi yakoze isesengura ry’ijambo ryavuzwe leon mugesera i kabaya yakanguriye abanyamuryango mrnd abereka umwanzi wabo umututsi n’abahutu mashyaka ataravugaga rumwe mrnd gahunda ziteganijwe zijyanye kwibuka zizagera kwezi gatanu zirimo amasengesho ikiriyo n’ibiganiro bizatangwa taliki mata abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo bongeye guhura gitambo misa kwibuka cyabereye paruwasi mutagatifu yozefu gatineau quebec

title: ku nshuro mbere u rwanda rubonye umusifuzi uruhagararira mikino mpuzamahanga
content: bwa mbere mateka y’u rwanda hagiye kuboneka umusifuzi uhagararira u rwanda mikino mpuzamahanga paralempike izabera i rio de janeiro gihugu brazil umunyarwanda gaju erick yatoranijwe basifuzi bazasifura ku nshuro mbere sitting volleyball w’umunyarwanda mikino paralempike ahereye yizabera i rio de janeiro brazil nzeli kuri gaju akaba yemeza yamaze kubona ubutumire kujya gusifura mikino paralempike makipe y’abagabo ndetse n’abagore yabonye tike kuyitabira gaju ubusanzwe umusifuzi mpuzamahanga volleyball y’abadafite ubumuga akaba n’umusifuzi mpuzamahanga sitting volleyball bafite ubumuga muri yasifuye igikombe cy’isi sitting volleyball amerika akaba ubwa mbere agiye gusifura imikino paralempike iba nyuma y’imyaka ine nzeyimana celestin umuyobozi komite y’igihugu y’imikino y’abantu bafite ubumuga npc rwanda yatangarije izubarirasherw kuba gaju azasifura mikino paralempike ishema rikomeye npc rwanda kuko niwe musifuzi mbere bihugu munsi y’ubutayu sahara uzaba usifuye imikino paralempike mbere nzeyimana avuga ubumenyi gaju buzagirira akamaro abandi basifuzi rwanda ndetse iterambere sitting volleyball rwanda gaju yabwiye izubarirashe yatangiye asifura imikino gihugu yaba iya sitting volleyball sitball ariko nyuma yatangiye kuzamuka ntera asifura imikino y’igikombe cy’isi sitting volleyball asifura imikino gushaka itike kujya mikino paralempike yabereye i london bwongereza nyuma y’aho akaba aribwo yemerewe gusifura imikino paralempike igiye kubera brazil imikino paralempike izatangira kuwa kugeza nzeli ikipe y’u rwanda sitting volleyball bagore izaserukira umugabane afurika mu mikino ngororamubiri u rwanda ruzaserukirwa muvunyi hermas uzasiganwa ahareshya metero ikipe y’u rwanda y’abagabo nshuro mbere yitabiriye imikino paralempike yabereye i london bwongereza ariko ihagarariye ibihugu munsi y’ubutayu sahara mikino yabaye ikipe y’u rwanda yatsinze ikipe marocyanditswe editor muhaburarw

title: ndererehe yafatiwe cyuho atetse kanyanga
content: umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’umurenge mayange nkurunziza francois avuga mugabo yatawe yombi nyuma kubona amakuru yavugaga ndererehe yengaga inzoga kanyanga yagize dufatanyije n’inzego z’umutekano twamuguye gitumo dusanga yatangiye guteka ariko inzoga itaraboneka ndererehe arabyemera akabisabira imbabazi ndetse akavuga atazongera kubikora kuko n’ubusanzwe yarabiretse nkurunziza avuga ukubeshya kuko atigeze abireka namba kuko amakuru bafite ndererehe amaze amaze arenga atanu ateka kanyanga nkurunziza avuga kugeza munsi bamaze kumena litilo zirenga ibihumbi bibiri kanyanga gusenya inganda zenga zirenga ndetse guta yombi abarenga mu murenge mayanjye ufatiwe cyuho ateka kanyanga acibwa ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi uyicuruza acibwa ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi uyinywa agacibwa ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi itegeko rihana abakora abacuruza n’abanywa inzoga kanyanga ntirirashyirwa gitabo cy’amategeko ahana kuko rikiri nteko ishinga amategeko egide kayiranga
